ESP.ORIGINAL: Cram
ESP.TRADUIT: 饱饱牌肉罐头

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Don,
What dumbass mixed up the Cram shipment? I'm up to my eyeballs in Cram, having to store it in the deep freeze next to the ice cream! This can't be right, can it? It doesn't match up with the market, there's no way we can move this quantity. Holy shit, I know it effectively has an endless shelf life, but space is tight around here. Let those bean counters know they screwed the pooch. In the meantime, everyone is getting Cram for their Christmas bonus.
- Ross
ESP.TRADUIT:
唐，
哪个蠢货把饱饱牌的货搞混了？我忙得不可开交，不得不把它放在冰淇淋旁边的冷冻室里！这不可能是对的吧？这与市场行情不相符，我们无法移动这个数量。我的天，我知道它的保质期很长，但这里的空间很紧张，让那些精打细算的人知道他们搞砸了。与此同时，每个人的圣诞奖金都是饱饱牌。
- 罗斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regional Manager's Password
ESP.TRADUIT: 区域经理的密码

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paradise
ESP.TRADUIT: 天堂

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Legion caught up with Curly outside Kingman, everyone split. Me and Joe ain't ending up on a cross.
Can't believe we found this place. Nobody around, doesn't look like there's any bugs or wild animals, either. I can't believe it.
Got the generator online, even managed to sit down and watch some tv. Joe keeps complaining about the volume, also says he hates horror movies. I told him he's a pussy. Joe won't do anything, never had the balls.
After we finish resting, we'll poke around and see about setting up shop. Might be able to raid the 93 from here. Here's hoping.
ESP.TRADUIT:
军团在金曼外面追上了卷毛，大家分头行动，我和乔不会死在十字架上的。
真不敢相信我们找到了这个地方，周围没有人，看起来也没有虫子和野生动物。我真不敢相信。
接上发电机，还坐下来看了会儿电视。乔一直抱怨电影音量太大，还说他讨厌恐怖片。我跟他说他是个孬种，乔什么都不敢做，没胆量。
休息完之后，我们将四处逛逛，看看是否有办法开张。也许能从这里突袭93号公路。希望如此。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cleanup
ESP.TRADUIT: 清理

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Doden,
Kurt and Nash have gone silent. Got confirmation that Dravec bought it in Goodsprings. Rumors are buzzing in Freeside about some hell-on-wheels wanderer who's behind it all. Witnesses say this vigilante was travelling with a child that matched the description of Michael Augen. Coincidentally, my contact reported that Michael's body was missing from the ambush site.
Check on Kurt and track down this do-gooder. Make an example. Public. Messy. If there is any truth to the rumors about the boy, you know what to do.
Finally, locate Mojo Wilson and ascertain the route to Potosi Pass. Discreetly dispose of him when you've gotten what you need. Conduct a reconaissance of Potosi Pass, then report back. You have your work cut out for you, so the pay will be commensurate. Multiple bonuses if you do this right.
- Dickman
P.S. If you keep stroking that shotgun during meetings I'll have Chonkers bite your nuts off. It's fucking unprofessional and fosters a hostile work environment. I won't tolerate it.
ESP.TRADUIT:
多登，
库尔特和纳什都沉默了，已经确认德劳韦茨是在清泉镇买的。在自由城有传言说有个疯狂的流浪者是幕后黑手，目击者说这名治安维持者带着一个符合迈克尔·奥根特征的孩子。巧合的是，我的联络人报告说，迈克尔的尸体在伏击地点失踪了。
去看看库尔特的情况，找到那个行善的人。举个例子，公开的，混乱。如果关于那个男孩的传言是真的，你知道该怎么做。
最后，找到莫乔·威尔逊，确定去波托西山口的路线。拿到你想要的东西后，小心的处理掉他。对波托西山口进行侦察，然后回来报告，你的工作很艰巨，所以报酬也是相应的。如果你干得好，就会有多重奖励。
- 迪克曼
另外，如果你在开会的时候还拿着那把猎枪，我会让人把你的蛋蛋咬下来。这太他妈不专业了，还会营造一个充满敌意的工作环境，我不能容忍。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Contract: Charles Augen
ESP.TRADUIT: 合同：查理斯·奥根

ESP.ORIGINAL:
John,
We conducted an advanced interrogation of the courier who delivered that package for Peter Augen; we determined it contained the records that Bellek is desperate to retrieve. The parcel was delivered to Charles Augen, the older brother of Peter (Bellek's old partner).
I couldn't find much on Charles Augen or his farm. He served at some point, but his records are sealed and not readily accessible. Considering his family history, he probably did a stint in a cushy MOS, but that's never certain. Once El Oso finishes his current contract I'm going to have him gather a complement of partners and short-term contractors to locate and seize the records.
As a precaution, I'd like for you to dispatch a small team to observe the farm and gather information before El Oso arrives. I'll keep you posted as this develops. We need to execute swiftly and discreetly. The future of this firm is riding on this contract.
Best, Aaron
ESP.TRADUIT:
约翰,
我们对给彼得·奥根送包裹的快递员进行了深入的审讯，我们确定里面有贝莱克迫切想要取回的记录。这个包裹被送到了查理斯·奥根手中，他是彼得(贝莱克的老搭档)的哥哥。
我找不到查理斯·奥根和他农场的任何资料。他曾服过役，但他的记录被封存了，无法查阅。考虑到他的家族史，他可能在一个轻松的军事部门呆过一段时间，但这并不确定。一旦埃尔奥索完成他现在的合同，我就会让他召集一批合伙人和短期合同工来找到并收回这些记录。
为了以防万一，我想让你在埃尔奥索到来之前，派一个小队去观察农场，收集情报，有进展我会随时通知你。我们需要迅速而谨慎地执行，这家公司的未来就靠这份合同了。
真挚的， - 亚伦

ESP.ORIGINAL: Recipes - Apple Fritter
ESP.TRADUIT: 配方 - 炸苹果饼

ESP.ORIGINAL: This recipe allows you to make Apple Fritter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个配方可以让你做炸苹果饼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pokey's Journal: Entry 1
ESP.TRADUIT: 波基的日记：条目1

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Things are changing around here.
No one knows how it happened, but one thing is certain - the tyrant is dead. His followers have scattered to the wind, with only Dickman remaining to hold a bit of turf. Good riddance to the oppressors, the murderers, the thieves! Justice, finally!
Someone really hates Bass. I'm sworn to secrecy, but suffice to say that playing even a small part in his downfall has filled me with the greatest pride - and more than a little pleasure. When that Legion slave collar digs into his neck, I hope he remembers the cruelty he meted out to my brethren in the sewers. The rest of his life will be spent in toil, pain and misery - just what he deserves!
Now is the time for revolution! We will cast down the profiteers, the whoremongers and all the petty tyrants who kept a boot on our throats! Freeside's unfortunates have put their faith in me. There will be freedom. There will be equality. There will be community.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这里的情况正在发生变化。
没有人知道这是怎么发生的，但有一件事是肯定的...暴君已经死了。他的追随者已经四散而去，只剩下迪克曼守着一小块地盘。终于摆脱了压迫者、杀人犯和小偷！正义终于来了！
有人真的很讨厌巴斯。我发誓要保密，但我要说的是，即使在他的垮台中扮演了一个很小的角色，也让我感到无比的自豪和快乐。当那个军团奴隶的项圈扎进他的脖子时，我希望他能记得他在下水道里对我的兄弟们是多么残忍。他的余生将在辛劳、痛苦和不幸中度过！这正是他应得的！
现在是革命的时候了！我们要打倒奸商、娼妓和所有把我们逼上绝路的小暴君！自由城的不幸之人都把希望寄托在了我身上。自由终将到来，平等终将到来，社区也是。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pokey's Journal: Entry 3
ESP.TRADUIT: 波基的日记：条目3

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Shortages.
All I hear about now is shortages. There simply isn't enough to go around, and the shopkeepers in Moleville all packed up after we raised taxes. Didn't help that Loco decapitated one of them. I tried to explain that he has mood swings due to his blood sugar, but they wouldn't listen. Ingrates.
Dickman reached out to me, so I met with her. Forceful woman. Offered a trickle of food in exchange for more "controlled" violence. I think she means more control of my brothers and sisters. They're getting hungry, though. They look to me, and rhetoric will only go so far. There are already murmurs about replacing me with Ahab. I worked too hard to get here, sacrificed too much. I won't let the dream die. I'll do whatever it takes.
ESP.TRADUIT:
短缺。
我现在听到的都是物资短缺。我们加税后，莫尔维尔的店主们都收拾行李走人了。可那疯子却砍了其中一个的头，我试着解释他的情绪波动是因为他的血糖，但他们就是不听。忘恩负义的人。
迪克曼联系了我，我就去见了她。强势的女人，提供少量食物以换取更多“有控制的”暴力。我想她的意思是更多的控制我的兄弟姐妹，不过，他们越来越饿了，他们都指望着我，夸夸其谈只能到此为止。已经有传言说亚哈要取代我了，我太努力了才走到这一步，牺牲了太多。我不会让梦想破灭的，我会不惜一切代价。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pokey's Journal: Entry 2
ESP.TRADUIT: 波基的日记：条目2

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Justice.
That's all we want. We're giving it back to them, finally. The greedy rats propped up and protected by Bass and all the other gangsters, they're getting their just due.
I'm keeping the boys on a leash - but it's a long damn leash. Mouthy vendor in Moleville refused to hand over his profits, so I let them break his legs and seize his merchandise. That'll show the others. We only tolerate your presence out of civility. We reserve the right to take what we want, when we want. Nothing will stop us now.
ESP.TRADUIT:
正义。
这就是我们想要的，我们终于要还给他们了。那些被巴斯和其他黑帮扶养和保护的贪婪的老鼠，他们得到了他们应得的惩罚。
我把孩子们拴在绳子上...但这绳子太长了。莫尔维尔的小贩不肯交出他的利润，所以我让他们打断了他的腿，没收了他的货物。给其他人看看，我们只是出于礼貌才容忍你的存在。我们保留在我们想要的时候得到我们想要的东西的权利，现在没有什么可以阻挡我们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Up and Running
ESP.TRADUIT: 运转良好

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This could be it - my ticket to easy street.
To hell with Ghouldom. To hell with Hobbes. I've found something better.
I came across this place by chance, thought I'd give it a look when I felt the warmth. That radiation wasn't an accident. It part of the same railway that links Ghouldom to Groom Lake and God knows what else. Limitless ferals drifting through. Enough to keep any intruders or river creatures away.
The Legion needs fungus. They're going to get it - and I'm going to sell it to them, in bulk!
ESP.TRADUIT:
这可能就是致富之路了。
去他妈的古尔多姆，让霍布斯见鬼去吧。我找到更好的了。
我偶然发现了这个地方，感觉到了温暖，就想去看看。辐射不是意外，它是一条铁路的一部分，连接着古尔多姆和格鲁姆湖，天知道还有什么。无尽的狂尸鬼在这里游荡。足以阻挡任何入侵者或河流生物。
军团需要菌类，他们会得到的。我将批量出售给他们！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Transactions
ESP.TRADUIT: 事务

ESP.ORIGINAL:
There are a lot of lies said about the Legion.
I collected the first harvest and hauled it up to Big Wash. They escorted me straight to the quartermaster, and he agreed to a contract then and there. He said they'd be sending over a caravan each month to collect the crop.
Last week they sent an engineer to fix the water pump. Yesterday one of their scouts killed those Nighstalkers roaming near the 93. Wiped out the entire nest.
Steady income, clean water and security. Why didn't I do this sooner?
ESP.TRADUIT:
有很多关于军团的谣言。
我收集了第一批收成，把它拖到大波浪。他们直接把我带到军需官那里，他当场就同意了一份合同。他说他们每个月会派一支商队来收庄稼。
上周他们派了一名工程师来修理水泵，昨天他们的一个斥候杀了在93号公路附近游荡的夜枭，摧毁了整个巢穴
收入稳定、水干净、安全。为什么我没有早点这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Complications
ESP.TRADUIT: 困难

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The creatures from the river are getting more intrusive. There's a real risk they'll overrun the tunnel and clean out the ghouls. Without them, I'm sunk. That's my security system.
I'll meet with Bubo, see if we can't come up with a solution. He's nothing if not reasonable.
ESP.TRADUIT:
河里的生物侵入性越来越强，他们很有可能会冲出隧道把食尸鬼都清理干净。没有他们，我就完蛋了，那是我的安保系统。
我去和布波见个面，看看我们能不能想出一个解决办法。他很通情达理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Solutions
ESP.TRADUIT: 解决办法

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I underestimated Bubo. The way to defeat the lurks is with sheer numbers. "Quantity has a quality of its own," he said. I have to admit, his methods are brutal but effective. It's simply a matter of enticing more ferals in from the tunnels. All we needed was bait.
Bubo is sending over a handful of "unproductive" slaves. He said they'll do the job.
A part of me is ashamed, but after the hunger and desperation, not to mention Hobbes' betrayal - I'm past caring. Smoothskins never lifted a finger for me, ever. Willem Clark was right.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我低估了布波。打败沼怪的方法就是依靠绝对的数量，“数量本身就有质量，”他说。我不得不承认，他的方法很残忍，但很有效，只是把更多的狂尸鬼从地道引过来而已。我们需要的只是诱饵。
布波派了一些“没有生产力”的奴隶过来，他说他们能完成这项工作。
我有些感到羞愧，但在经历了饥饿和绝望之后，更不用说霍布斯的背叛...我已经不在乎了。滑皮们从来没有帮过我一个忙，从来没有，威廉·克拉克是对的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pokey's Journal: Entry 4
ESP.TRADUIT: 波基的日记：条目4

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I took the deal.
The complaints have ceased, though I admit I'm troubled by having to compromise. All those years ago I went to the Followers, learned to read, write and speak so I could help my comrades, not to enrich myself.
I have to admit, though - I look forward to the meetings. Fresh food, silverware, civil conversation - it gives me a feeling I didn't think was possible outside of sex or violence. It's an eery warmth that washes over me. Happiness? Is that possible? Why shouldn't I be happy, though? Haven't I sacrificed enough?
Dickman is making moves, but so am I. The brothers sent a messenger yesterday. They want to meet. I'll hear them out.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我接受了协议。
抱怨已经停止了，尽管我承认不得不妥协给我带来了困扰。多年前，我到天启追随者那里学习读、写、说，这样我就可以帮助我的同志，而不是为了充实自己。
不过我得承认，我很期待这次会面。新鲜的食物、银器、礼貌的交谈...给了我一种我认为除了性和暴力之外不可能存在的感觉。一种莫名的暖意涌上我的心头，幸福？这有可能吗？但是，我为什么不能快乐呢？我的牺牲还不够多吗？
迪克曼在行动，但我也在行动。兄弟俩昨天派人来了，他们想要见面，我来听听他们怎么说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pokey's Journal: Final Entry
ESP.TRADUIT: 波基的日记：最后的条目

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Goodbye, Moleville.
Wearing a suit feels strange, but empowering. I look in the mirror and see a man I would've loathed not long ago. But it's necessary. I'll do what I must for my brothers and sisters in Freeside.
I'll be operating out of Gomorrah now. The brothers put me up in a suite. I'll still continue speaking for Freeside, but I'll be better positioned to do it on the Strip. Networking, attending meetings, making deals - that's how I'll help them. I'll be disciplined. I won't forget where I came from.
Loco will be taking over the bar. I told him to have the boys clean the floors regularly. Hate getting dirt on my new shoes.
ESP.TRADUIT:
再见，莫尔维尔。
穿西装感觉很奇怪，但很有力量。我在镜子里看到了一个不久前我还会厌恶的男人，但这是必要的。为了我在自由城的兄弟姐妹们，我会做我必须做的事。
我现在要在蛾摩拉外行动了，兄弟俩给我安排了一间套房。我还是会继续为自由城发言，但我在长街的位置会更好。建立关系网、参加会议、达成交易...这就是我帮助他们的方式。我会遵守纪律的，我不会忘记我从哪里来。
洛科会接管酒吧。我告诉他让孩子们定期擦地板，我讨厌把脏东西弄到我的新鞋上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lubricant Inventory
ESP.TRADUIT: 润滑油库存

ESP.ORIGINAL: Item: Quantity: ------------------------------------ Mineral Oil 550 gallons Motor Oil 550 gallons Brake Fluid 110 gallons Hydraulic Fluid 550 gallons Piston Oil 330 gallons Petroleum Jelly 5,555 gallons Whale Oil 3,300 gallons Vegetable Oil 110 gallons
Network Traffic: DPG
ESP.TRADUIT: 网络流量：达格威试验场

ESP.ORIGINAL:
DEPARTMENT OF THE ARMY RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT FIELD OPERATIONS SECTOR, 21Z
RED-FA21-P
TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN:
Progress continues on Operation Re-Founding. All attempts at replication in human subjects have failed, though we had a recent success in a heavily-modified canid. Colloquially referred to as "Doggington", this specimen has demonstrated tremendous aptitude for higher reasoning, tactics and leadership. Field trials will begin shortly.
Credentials are included. Specimen 0222-1732 will have full access to facilities, per mission requirements.
Respectfully, Dugway Proving Grounds Science Team
ESP.TRADUIT:
陆军部 研究与开发 外勤行动区，21z
RED-FA21-P
致有关人士： 业务重建工作继续取得进展。所有在人类身上复制的尝试都失败了，尽管我们最近在经过大量修改的犬科动物身上取得了成功。这个被称为“道金顿”的标本在更高的推理、战术和领导能力方面表现出了巨大的天赋。现场试验将很快开始。
证书包括在内。根据任务要求，0222-1732号标本可以完全使用设施。
恭敬地， 达格威试验场科学小组

ESP.ORIGINAL: Network Traffic: Clark County Armory
ESP.TRADUIT: 网络流量：克拉克县军械库

ESP.ORIGINAL:
RED-FA21-P
THIS IS AN AUTOMATED MESSAGE. DO NOT RESPOND.
CLI-O is online.
ESP.TRADUIT:
RED-FA21-P
这是自动留言。不要回应。
CLI-O已上线。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Network Traffic: Camp Ibis
ESP.TRADUIT: 网络流量：宜必思营地

ESP.ORIGINAL:
SAB-FA11-A
THIS IS AN AUTOMATED MESSAGE. DO NOT RESPOND.
***THIS IS NOT A DRILL***
A security breach has been detected in the Camp Ibis Arsenal.
***BROKEN ARROW***
ESP.TRADUIT:
SAB-FA11-A
这是自动留言。不要回应。
***这不是演习***
在宜必思兵工厂发现了安全漏洞。
***断箭***

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rampart in Town
ESP.TRADUIT: 城里的壁垒

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Kurt,
Our sources indicate that Aaron King is putting together a team for some work at a place called Potosi Pass. Something to do with Peter Augen's brother. There are major shake-ups happening with the barons back in California, so we need to position ourselves to take advantage. We also can't afford to let Rampart get a long-term foothold in town.
It's likely that Rampart will be employing a local guide who knows how to navigate the mountains. The most probable candidate is Mojo Wilson, a wandering trader who spends most of his days at Boulder City. Seek him out and learn the best routes to Potosi Pass, then dispose of him. Send a hand-picked team to scout the mountains and ascertain why Aaron King is snooping around in our backyard.
A warning - make sure your people don't get captured by the Rampart boys. This group will be led by John Sharp. Yes, that John Sharp. The one who tortured his way through Bullhead alongside the likes of Glanton and Will Botten. He can get information out of anyone. Anyone. No fuckups allowed.
- Dickman
P.S. If you're short again I'll kill your entire family in front of you.
ESP.TRADUIT:
库尔特，
我们的线人说亚伦·金在一个叫波托西山口的地方组建了一个团队，跟彼得·奥根的兄弟有关。加州的大亨们正在发生重大变动，所以我们需要定位自己，以便占得先机。我们也不能让壁垒在城里长期立足。 壁垒很可能会雇佣一名知道如何在山上导航的当地导游，最有可能的候选人是莫乔·威尔逊，他是一名流浪商人，大部分时间都在巨石城度过。找到他，找出通往波托西山口的最佳路线，然后干掉他，派一支精挑细选的队伍去探山，弄清楚为什么亚伦·金会在我们的后院打探。
警告，千万别让你的人被壁垒的人抓住。这个小组将由约翰·夏普领导，是的，就是那个约翰·夏普，那个和格兰顿和威尔·博腾一起血洗布尔海德的人。他能从任何人嘴里套出消息，任何人，不准搞砸。
- 迪克曼
另外，如果你再缺斤少两，我就当着你的面杀了你全家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Change of Plans
ESP.TRADUIT: 改变计划

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Sharp,
Change of plans. Our source says that NCR is not accompanying [%];. Ranger Hart is out of the picture, so the gloves are off. Eliminate Charles Augen and secure all pertinent documents. Location [%]; and eliminate all followers. Eliminate the witness.
Gather proof and deliver it to Bellek. He's at a room in the Ultra-Luxe. Keep it professional, even if his bodyguard provokes you. This contract is too big to let egos get in the way. It's dirty work, but it will put us in prime position to finally overtake the competing firms.
Your point of contact is Julio, Bellek's chief bodyguard. Let me reiterate - professional. Your promotion and bonus will be waiting at the finish line. Thanks for your hard work.
Best, King
ESP.TRADUIT:
夏普，
计划有变。我们的消息来源说，NCR没有陪同[%];，游骑兵哈特已经不在了，所以我们要出手了。除掉查理斯·奥根，确保所有相关文件安全。[%]; 位置并消灭所有追随者，消灭目击证人。
收集证据，交给贝莱克，他在超美多酒店的房间里。即使他的保镖激怒了你，也要保持专业的态度。这份合同太大了，不能被自负妨碍，这是一项肮脏的工作，但它将使我们处于有利地位，最终超越竞争对手。
你的联系人是胡里奥，贝莱克的首席保镖。让我重申一下：专业，你的晋升和奖金会在终点线等你。谢谢你的辛勤工作。
恭敬的， - 金

ESP.ORIGINAL: Festina Lente
ESP.TRADUIT: 从容赶急

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I've never seen Meles this angry. After his pet escaped, he went into a blind rage and beat two slaves to death in front of everyone. This little scheme of yours better produce results. Move methodically, but don't dawdle. If you fail, expect to answer to Meles.
San Salvador may be a lie, but it's a lie that instills hope to the sheep. Do what you must to find it and destroy it. Bring back the fertile women. Kill everyone else.
Pardus
ESP.TRADUIT:
我从没见过梅莱斯这么生气，他的宠物逃跑后，他大发雷霆，当着众人的面打死了两个奴隶。你的这个小计划最好能奏效，行动要有条理，但不要磨蹭。如果你失败了，就等着回答梅莱斯吧。
圣萨尔瓦多也许是个谎言，但这个谎言给羊群灌输了希望。尽你所能找到并摧毁它，把有生育能力的女人带回来，杀了其他人。
- 帕杜斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blood-Stained Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 血迹斑斑的笔记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
My Prince, I heard your voice.
My Prince, I saw your face.
My Prince, your will be done.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我的王子，我听到了你的声音。
我的王子，我看见了你的脸。
我的王子，你的意志完成了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: PIROUETTE Weather System
ESP.TRADUIT: 轴转天气系统

ESP.ORIGINAL:
System Overview:
PIROUETTE builds on the DERVISH design with improved density, duration and area of coverage. The system will enhance concealment of the Willow Spring facility, and is estimated to remain in operation for roughly three hundred years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 轴转建立在旋转舞设计的基础上，改进了密度、持续时间和覆盖范围。该系统将增强柳树泉设施的隐蔽性，预计将继续运行大约三百年。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cleanup
ESP.TRADUIT: 清理

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dravec,
You know the mark. Make it look like mutants, then announce it in town to get the rumor mill going.
No witnesses. You know the client and you know what's at stake. It's more than a bonus. No fuckups allowed.
Nash will take care of the sister. She lives near the Sharecropper Farms. Dickman said the Rampart boys are going after that lunatic brother in the mountains. I didn't get many details. They're keeping this compartmentalized for obvious reasons.
- Kurt
P.S. Someone should be coming by to fix the espresso machine. Also, keep it professional with Nash. Yes, he's weird, but he gets the job done. Most of those old "associates" that came over after all that drama are a little weird. At least Nash is manageable. Just be glad you're not working with Dickman. Fuck, this was supposed to be a postscript and it turned into another letter. Just don't fuck up out there.
ESP.TRADUIT:
德劳韦茨，
你知道那个记号，弄成变种人的样子，然后在城里宣布，让谣言满天飞。
没有目击者，你了解客户，也知道利害关系。这不仅仅是奖金，不允许搞砸。
纳什会搞定妹妹，她住在佃农农场附近，迪克曼说壁垒的人在山里追那个疯子哥哥。我没有得到很多细节，他们把这个区分开的原因很明显。
- 库尔特
另外，应该有人过来修一下咖啡机。还有，和纳什要保持专业的态度。是的，他很奇怪，但他能完成任务。在那出闹剧之后过来的那些老“合伙人”大多都有点奇怪，至少纳什是可控的，庆幸你没和迪克曼一起工作吧。妈的，这本该是个附言结果变成了另一封信。别搞砸了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: New Safehouse
ESP.TRADUIT: 新安全屋

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Nash,
The new safehouse is open for business. I'm operating out of Wolf's Bakery in Freeside. Lots of work coming down the pipe. The brothers are making moves, and it's gonna get bloody.
- Kurt
P.S. Boss knows about Doden's "issues" with his shotgun. She's going to address it.
ESP.TRADUIT:
纳什，
新的安全屋开始营业了，我在自由城的沃尔夫面包店工作。接下来有很多工作要做，兄弟俩开始行动了，肯定会血雨腥风。
- 库尔特
另外，老板知道多登的猎枪“问题”，她会解决这个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pokey Problem
ESP.TRADUIT: 波基问题

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Kurt,
Pokey Collins is moving up in the world. He's gone from spokesman for the homeless to a legitimate player with connections to the brothers. With his influence over the unwashed masses, he could be a real problem.
Have someone shadow him and gather information that we can use as leverage. Everyone has vices, and I'm sure Pokey is no different. Until we can negotiate from a position of power, we'll play it safe.
- Dickman
P.S. Bobby was right. We should've killed that filthy hobo.
ESP.TRADUIT:
库尔特,
波基·柯林斯的地位正在上升，他从无家可归者的代言人变成了和兄弟俩有关系的合法玩家。鉴于他对底层民众的影响力，他可能是个真正的问题。
让人跟踪他，收集我们可以利用的信息，每个人都有恶习，我相信波基也不例外。在我们能以权力地位谈判之前，我们会谨慎行事。
- 迪克曼
附言：鲍比是对的，我们应该杀了那个肮脏的流浪汉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Recipes - Molly's Pemmican
ESP.TRADUIT: 配方 - 莫莉干肉饼

ESP.ORIGINAL: This recipe allows you to make Molly's Pemmican.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个配方可以让你做莫莉的干肉饼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Record of Events
ESP.TRADUIT: 事件记录

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I heard an ad from Ben Earner's law firm. Very catchy. After everything I've seen in this place, I think we might have a case, so I'm recording events with dates and times.
09/02/2077: - Manager made us work through break to get shipment loaded. Worked after clock-out, no overtime.
09/15/2077: - Forklift blade hit Tommy in the dome, knocked him right on his ass. He's bleeding all over the place, and boss refuses to let him leave. Tells us to slap a tampon on his head and get back to work. Joe told boss to go eat shit and walked Tommy out. Both gone the next day.
09/22/2077: - Corporate suits come by and inspect the place. Give us a big speech about productivity, stock prices, bla bla bla. Oh, and benefits are getting cut. We all fill out employee feedback forms and guess what? Everyone calls the boss an asshole, says Super-Duper Mart can burn in hell. Boss throws a titty tantrum in the break room for two hours, demanding to know who wrote, "The regional manager looks a walking micropenis." Wish I knew, I'd buy them a beer.
10/05/2077: - Corporate has responded to our feedback by sending a robot. It works 24/7, marching around the warehouse and chirping about "Time Theft". It stands in the break room, scolding anyone who it thinks is going over the alloted time. Boss loves it, calls it a "Miracle of Science". I hope it falls off the fucking ledge.
10/20/2077: - Robot is following workers into the bathroom now. For a few minutes it stood outside the women's restroom and told the ladies to "Urinate in a receptacle of opportunity". We almost had a riot! It's too much, even for the steady types who never complain.
10/22/2077: - We approached boss about the robot, told him we were threatening a walk-out if he kept it. He gave us a chickenshit excuse of it "Being over his pay grade" and saying it's a corporate requirement now. Very well, boss. On Monday we're walking out of here if they keep that tin can around.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我听到了本·厄尔纳律师事务所的广告。非常吸引人。我在这里经历了这么多，我觉得我们可能有案子了，所以我用日期和时间记录事件。
2077年9月2日： - 经理让我们加班加点把货装好。下班后工作，不算加班。
2077年9月15日： - 铲车的刀片击中了汤米的圆顶，正中他的屁股，他血流得到处都是，老板拒绝让他离开，让我们用卫生棉条盖住他的头然后回去工作。乔叫老板去吃屎，然后带汤米出去了。第二天他们都走了。
2077年9月22日： - 西装革履的人过来检查，给我们来了一场关于生产力，股票价格，诸如此类的大演讲。对了，福利也被削减了。我们都填写了员工反馈表，你猜怎么着？每个人都叫老板混蛋，说顶好超市可以下地狱去。老板在休息室大发了两个小时脾气，要求知道是谁写的，“区域经理看起来像一根会走路的小阴茎。”要是我知道就好了，给他们买杯啤酒。
2077年10月05日： - 公司回应了我们的反馈，派出了一个机器人。它24小时不停地工作，在仓库里走来走去，唧唧喳喳地叫着“时间小偷”。它站在休息室里，训斥任何它认为超过规定时间的人。老板很喜欢，称之为“科学奇迹”，我希望它能从窗台上掉下来。
2077年10月20日： - 机器人正在跟随工人进入洗手间。它在女厕所外站了几分钟，告诉女士们“随便找个临时容器小便”。我们差点发生暴动！这太过分了，即使对那些从不抱怨的稳定型的人来说也是如此。
2077年10月22日： - 我们跟老板谈了机器人的事，告诉他，如果他保留机器人，我们就威胁他要罢工。他给了我们一个鸡毛蒜皮的借口“超出了他的职权范围”，还说现在这是公司的要求。很好，老板。如果他们还留着那个锡罐，我们周一就离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: To Corporate
ESP.TRADUIT: 致公司

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Diane,
I'm ecstatic to hear that you, Steven and Rose will be dropping in. I'm sure the employees all feel the same way. I'll have a presentation prepared with quarterly statistics, including the latest data from our TPS reports. I don't want to spoil the presentation, but all metrics are on the upswing this quarter. I look forward to sharing the details with you in person.
Respectfully, Ross Reynolds
P.S. We're having Kingman's cater the meal (management only). If you have any dietary restrictions, please let me know.
ESP.TRADUIT:
黛安娜,
听说你、史蒂文和罗斯要来拜访，我真是欣喜若狂，我相信所有员工都有同样的感受。我会准备一份季度统计数据的报告，包括我们TPS报告的最新数据。我不想破坏演示，但本季度所有指标都在上升，我期待着与您面对面分享细节。
恭敬地， - 罗斯·雷诺兹
附言：这顿饭由金曼承办(仅限管理层)。如果您有什么忌口，请告诉我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blood-Stained Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 血迹斑斑的笔记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Mars, this is it.
The powder isn't working. I can feel my life slowly draining away. Priestesses said it would be glorious. The priestesses lied.
We killed them. The adults, the mother, the younglings. Cooked up the eggs and celebrated, ate until we couldn't move. I've done this dozens of times. I assured them we were safe. I was wrong.
It fell on us without a sound, just claws slashing out of the void, tearing us to pieces. Marcus was decapitated outright, others had their guts spilled, limbs torn. He hit my leg, was ready to finish me off when the other two took off, grabbed his attention. I got into the tower and hunkered down. I've been hunting these things for fifteen years. This one is different.
I hear him now. He's out there, panting, clawing, growling, digging... just waiting for me to die. You'll get your wish soon, beast.
Alcohol. Never had a drop in my life. If Meles wants to punish me, he can march in here and flog my corpse. I'm having a drink.
ESP.TRADUIT:
玛尔斯在上，就是这样。
药粉不管用了，我能感觉到我的生命在慢慢流失。女祭司说这会很光荣，女祭司撒谎了。
我们把他们杀了，成年的，母的，幼小的。煮了蛋庆祝，吃到我们动弹不得。我已经做过很多次了，我向他们保证我们很安全，我错了。
它无声无息地落在我们身上，只是从虚空中伸出的利爪，将我们撕成碎片。马库斯被直接斩首，其他人的内脏被撒了出来，四肢被撕裂。他打中了我的腿，正准备杀了我的时候，另外两个逃跑了，引起了他的注意。我进了塔，蹲了下来。我追捕这些东西已经十五年了，这次不一样。
我听到了。他在外面，喘气，抓爪，咆哮，挖掘...等着我死去。你很快就会如愿的，野兽。
酒精，我这辈子从没喝过一滴，我现在要喝一杯。如果梅莱斯想惩罚我，他可以进来鞭打我的尸体。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robots?
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器人？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Don,
I heard a rumor that all the southwest distribution centers are getting new robots. Not the typical security or janitorial types, but a real go-getter that will whip these bums into shape. Corporate is breathing down my neck, and I've got workers taking extended breaks in the bathroom. This younger generation is the worst bunch of lazy, entitled whiners I've ever seen. They dress like bums. They talk like bums. They ARE bums!
Bring on the robots!
- Ross
ESP.TRADUIT:
唐，
我听说西南地区所有的配送中心都在装新的机器人。不是典型的保安或清洁工，而是一个真正有进取心的人，可以把这些游手好闲的家伙收拾好。公司一直在紧盯着我，我让员工在卫生间里休息了很长时间。这一代年轻人是我见过的最懒惰、最爱抱怨的人。他们穿得像窝囊废，他们说话像窝囊废，他们是废物！
让机器人上场！
- 罗斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Diary of Ace Yoblanski, Part 1
ESP.TRADUIT: “王牌”约布兰斯基的日记，第一部分

ESP.ORIGINAL:
November 1, 2077
My family is dead.
I should've been with them at Randolph. It's completely gone, along with everything on the I-35 corridor, if the traffic from SAC is to be believed. Airbursts did a real number here, even if they were inaccurate. Had just enough time to get in the command bunker before we got rocked. Still can't believe anything is left standing.
Between the EMPs, fallout and winter, we're all fucked. I wanted to get them in a vault, but big blue needed me visible for morale. One last show with the Thunderbirds before you retire, they said. Had us lined up with a private shelter near Kerrville, up in the Hill Country. Two more weeks. Two fucking weeks.
There are few survivors, but we've all soaked up lethal doses. I don't give a damn anymore. Found this terminal in storage. I don't know why I'm writing this. Already published one biography, not to mention all the interviews. None of it matters now. At least I can still enjoy scotch in the latent stage.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2077年11月1日
我的家人都死了。
我应该和他们一起去伦道夫的，它已经完全消失了，连同35号州际公路走廊上的所有东西，如果SAC的交通情况可信的话。空中爆炸在这里造成了很大的损失，即使它们不准确。我们有足够的时间在被袭击前进入指挥部，还是不敢相信什么都没留下。
在电磁脉冲，辐射和冬天之间，我们都完蛋了。我想把他们藏进避难所，但蓝色巨人需要我的存在来鼓舞士气，他们说你退休前最后一次和雷鸟表演。让我们在克尔维尔附近的一个私人庇护所排队，就在希尔郡。还有两周，他妈的两周。
幸存者寥寥无几，但我们都吸收了致命剂量，我已经不在乎了。在仓库里找到了这个终端，我不知道我为什么要写这些，我已经出版了一本传记，更别提那些采访了。现在这些都不重要了，至少我还能在潜伏期享受苏格兰威士忌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Diary of Ace Yoblanski, Part 2
ESP.TRADUIT: “王牌”约布兰斯基的日记，第二部分

ESP.ORIGINAL:
November 6, 2077
Manifest illness. Moving hurts. Typing hurts. Vomit. Shit. Blood.
Lost my sidearm or I'd end it. God, make it stop. I talk to Martha. She whispers to me. Honey, I'll see you soon.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2077年11月6日
显性疾病。移动会疼，打字很疼，呕吐，大便，血。
枪丢了，不然我就了结了。上帝，让它停止吧。我和玛莎聊了聊，她低声对我说，亲爱的，我们很快会再见的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Diary of Ace Yoblanski, Part 3
ESP.TRADUIT: “王牌”约布兰斯基的日记，第三部分

ESP.ORIGINAL:
November 12, 2077
I don't understand. I shouldn't be alive. Lost my skin, my hair - I was in a death spiral, no way of pulling out, but I did. I never bought into the religious stuff, but this has to be some type of purgatory, right? Somewhere between life and death. Goddamn, I look hideous.
Appetite is back with a vengeance, though. Readings are lethal outside, but it almost feels comforting, like warm sunlight. I actually got up and walked around outside. I'm not dreaming.
Nobody outside, at least no one alive.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2077年11月12日
我不明白，我不应该活着。我失去了我的皮肤，我的头发...我陷入了死亡的漩涡，没有办法脱身，但我做到了。我从来不相信宗教之类的玩意，但这一定是某种炼狱，对吧？介于生与死之间。妈的，我看起来真的很丑。
不过，人的胃口又回来了。室外的读数是致命的，但它几乎让人感到舒适，就像温暖的阳光一样。我真的站起来在外面走了一圈，我不是在做梦。
外面没有人，至少没有活着的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Diary of Ace Yoblanski, Part 4
ESP.TRADUIT: “王牌”约布兰斯基的日记，第四部分

ESP.ORIGINAL:
November 21, 2077
I'm walking out of here today. Packed up all the water and MREs I could carry. I'm heading out to our cabin at Big Wash Canyon. If I'm going to wait around to die, I'll do it someplace scenic.
I'll hit the Security Forces shop on the way out, make sure I'm locked and loaded. I can only imagine what this world will look like when the dust settles. I plan on staying out of it.
I doubt I'll make it very far. This has to be some kind of illusion, a cruel trick by God. He played us pretty well this time. Whatever happens, I'll live to the fullest with every second I've got left. Nothing and nobody left to live or die for, that's the way I see it.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2077年11月21日
我今天就要走了，把能带的水和美军口粮都打包好了。我要去大波浪峡谷的小木屋，如果我要等死的话，我得去个风景优美的地方。
我出发的时候去趟安保部队商店，确保我全副武装。我只能想象尘埃落定后这个世界会是什么样子，我打算置身事外。
我怀疑我坚持不了多久，这一定是某种幻觉，是上帝的残酷诡计，这次他把我们耍得团团转。不管发生什么，我都要充分利用我剩下的每一秒。我是这么看的，没有人，没有任何东西可以让我活着或死去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Move
ESP.TRADUIT: 移动

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ace Yoblanski just made contact via radio. In exchange for immunity, he's provided us the location of the escaped slaves and several NCR saboteurs. They're located at Willow Spring, an abandoned airfield due west of Mineral Park on the 93.
No harm will come to Yoblanski if you encounter him. We honor our deals, and though he may be personally repugnant, I have no doubt he'll be a boon to our infrastructure projects.
Our last scouting mission to Willow Spring didn't return. Reports indicate it's a perpetual dust bowl and rife with dangerous wildlife. Make the necessary preparations to ensure you don't fail.
- Crabro
ESP.TRADUIT:
“王牌”约布兰斯基刚刚通过无线电与我们取得联系。作为豁免权的交换，他向我们提供了逃亡奴隶和几个NCR破坏者的位置。他们位于柳树泉，一个废弃的机场，位于93号公路矿物公园正西。
如果你碰到约布兰斯基，不要伤害他。我们遵守协议，虽然他个人可能很反感，但我毫不怀疑他会为我们的基础设施项目带来好处。
我们上次去柳树泉的侦察任务没回来。报告显示，这是一个永久的尘暴区，到处都是危险的野生动物。做好必要的准备，确保你不会失败。
- 克拉布罗

ESP.ORIGINAL: Recipes - Ultimate Babka
ESP.TRADUIT: 配方 - 极品巴布卡

ESP.ORIGINAL: This recipe allows you to make Ultimate Babka.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个配方可以让你做出极品巴布卡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gotta Take a Chance
ESP.TRADUIT: 要抓住机会

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Making a shopping list. I can do this. Cool Joe has to sleep some time, right?
Traded everything for that stealth gadget. It'll give me the edge.
The List: - 10 Sugar Bombs - 4 Salisbury Steaks - 5 Blamco Whatever the Fucks - Whatever I can grab after that
Here goes nothing!
ESP.TRADUIT:
列购物清单，我可以这样做。酷乔也得睡一会儿，对吧？ 用一切换来那个隐形小玩意，这会让我更有优势。
列表: - 10个甜麦炮弹 - 4块索尔兹伯里牛排 - 5个什么鬼白兰哥 - 之后能拿的都拿
这里什么都没有！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leaving
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开

ESP.ORIGINAL:
[%];,
I don't think Robert House himself could fix this piece of shit. There's also the issue of fuel. Ethanol? Are you serious?
The radio was easy to repair, though. I contacted the garrison at Grasshopper Junction before I left, so don't attempt a pursuit. They'll be at the airport soon. I'm going my way, you should go yours.
My advice? Leave the slaves and go home. If you're foolish enough to attempt a rescue, you'll find an abandoned dock at Sidewinder Cove, due west of your position. Don't count on making it, though - Crabro is sending his fastest scouts after you.
Arizona is my home. Go back to yours and let me live in peace. You may not see it, but the Legion will improve life for a lot of people, and I'm going to help them do it.
- Ace
ESP.TRADUIT:
[%];，
我觉得罗伯特·豪斯自己修不了这破东西。还有燃料的问题。乙醇？你说真的吗？
不过，无线电很容易修理。我离开前联系了蚂蚱路口的守军，所以不要试图追击，他们很快就到机场了。我走我的路，你走你的。
我的建议？放下奴隶，回家去吧。如果你傻到试图营救，你会在响尾蛇湾找到一个废弃的码头，就在你位置的正西侧。不过，别指望能成功...克拉布罗会派出最快的斥候来追你。
亚利桑那州是我的家。你回去吧，让我过平静的生活。你可能看不出来，但军团会改善很多人的生活，而我将帮助他们做到这一点。
- 王牌

ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: Private party. Fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 私人派对。滚蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Julio [0202F67D] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_GREETING_0002F686_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And then... he snorted it out of my ass!
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后...他从我屁股里吸出来的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prostitute [0202F691] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_GREETING_0002F698_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got the stuff? Any Psycho? He loves Psycho!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有这些东西吗？有疯狂药吗？他喜欢疯狂药！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prostitute [0202F691] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_GREETING_0002F698_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell is going on out here? Who the fuck are you? Julio! Julio?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这到底是怎么回事？你他妈是谁？胡里奥！胡里奥？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_GREETING_0002F6A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whores?
ESP.TRADUIT: 妓女？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceStuff_GREETING_000261C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did it... you blew it all to hell!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做了...你把一切都搞砸了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceStuff_GREETING_00026204_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fucking maniacs! I had it made here! You've ruined everything!
ESP.TRADUIT: "你们这些该死的疯子！我在这里本来一切都安排好了！你们毁掉了一切！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceStuff_GREETING_00026205_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm fucked... I'm completely and totally fucked!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完蛋了...我彻底完蛋了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceStuff_GREETING_00026206_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fucking jackasses! I had whores! Endless whores! Now I've got nothing! These fuckers will hunt me to the ends of the earth!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这些混蛋！我有妓女！无数的妓女！现在我一无所有了！这些混蛋会追杀我到天涯海角！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceStuff_GREETING_00026207_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You idiots... do you have any idea what you've done?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这些白痴...你知道你做了什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceStuff_GREETING_00026225_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceStuff_GREETING_00026233_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿到底想干啥？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Freddy [02023713] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_0002371E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get the fuck out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 快他妈滚蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Freddy [02023713] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_0002371F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Ranting>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咆哮>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Freddy [02023713] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_00023721_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Ranting>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咆哮>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Freddy [02023713] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_00023722_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the next shipment... wait, what is this? Who are these creatures? You always assured us you were operating alone, Freddy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一批货...等等，这是什么？这些生物是谁？你一直向我们保证你是独自行动的，弗雷迪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veteran Legionary [02023711] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_00023723_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You there, explain yourself! What's the meaning of this intrusion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给我解释一下！这次闯入是什么意思？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veteran Legionary [02023711] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_00023723_2.ogg
NPC : Veteran Legionary [02023711] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a restricted area. You're not on the list of approved traders. Register with the consul in Kingman if you want to get on the list.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是禁区，你不在批准的贸易商名单上。如果你想上名单，就去金曼的领事那里登记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [02024504] (ID) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_000246EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not on the list. On your way, traveller.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不在名单上。走吧，旅行者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [02024504] (ID) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_000246EB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Approved traders only. No loitering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 仅限获批准贸易商。不许闲逛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [02024504] (ID) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_000246EC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're free now. On behalf of everyone who labored under Bubo's whip, thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们现在自由了。我代表所有在布波的鞭子下辛苦劳作的人，感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0202626B] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_0002626D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion will give pursuit, and there's no way we can all escape. The women and young ones can make it, though... with your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团会追击，我们不可能都逃掉。不过，女人和年轻人可以做到...在你的帮助下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0202626B] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_0002626D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please... you've already done so much, but it will all be for naught if the Legion recaptures them. Torment, abuse... pain. Please help them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托...你已经做了这么多，如果军团再把他们抓回去，一切就都白费了。折磨、虐待...痛苦，请帮帮他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0202626B] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_0002626D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please help them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请帮帮他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0202626B] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_00026272_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aaaaaaaggghhh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊啊啊啊！！！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Appius Ungula [0202ABA2] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: By Mars, you startled me! I was expecting that monster to come barging in!
ESP.TRADUIT: 玛尔斯在上，你吓了我一跳！我还以为那个怪物会闯进来呢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Appius Ungula [0202ABA2] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your business here, subject? If you're a prospector, you'll only find death here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来这里做什么，臣民？如果你是一名淘金客，你只能在这里找到死亡！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Appius Ungula [0202ABA2] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Appius Ungula [0202ABA2] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to Zulu Site 21. Unauthorized access is not permitted. Stand by...
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到祖鲁21号站点，不允许未经授权的访问。准备...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_0002CBD6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scanning... credentials not recognized. Authenticate credentials or you'll be subject to summary judgment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 扫描中...无法识别凭据。验证身份，否则你将受到临时判决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_0002CBD6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How may I be of assistance?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能帮什么忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_0002CBD7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Salve. Thank you for giving me Bubo's pet. Insolent mutants have no place in our society, even those with... minor skills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安康。谢谢你把布波的宠物给我，无礼的变种人在我们的社会没有立足之地，即使靠那些...小技巧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_0002D531_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To think that he threw it all away for a handful of slaves... and the likes of you. I never thought he'd stoop so low.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想想看，他为了几个奴隶而抛弃了一切...还有像你这样的人。我从没想过他会堕落到这种地步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_0002D531_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My girls are hungry. They can dine on every piece you, save the head. That goes to my patron. They'll make me a centurion for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的女儿们饿了，除了头，它们可以吃掉你的每一部分。这要归功于我的赞助人，他们会因此封我为百夫长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_0002D531_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Salve. You won't find Ace. He's well on his way to Grasshopper Junction. Once you're dead, I'll reclaim the slaves and return a hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安康。你找不到王牌的，他正在去蚱蜢路口的路上。等你死了，我会抓回奴隶，以英雄的身份回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_0002DE06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My girls are hungry. They can dine on every piece you, save the head. That goes to my patron. They'll make me a centurion for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的女儿们饿了，除了头，它们可以吃掉你的每一部分。这要归功于我的赞助人，他们会因此封我为百夫长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMayQuest_GREETING_0002DE06_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Howdy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ken Serra [02015A60] (mod) Quest : ([02015A55]aaDetourSide03) The Last Ride EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Howdy! Constantine Planis, trader in goods and information, at your service. What brings you out to Crimson Caravan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好！康斯坦丁·普拉尼斯，商品和信息贸易商，随时为你服务。什么风把你吹到深红商队来了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Howdy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_GREETING_0001D83D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hiya, sport! What brings you down to the sewers? If you're looking to trade, I'm afraid Scabby's is out of business. No more stock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，哥们儿！什么风把你吹到下水道来了？如果你想交易的话，恐怕痂皮已经停业了，没有存货了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabbyStuff_GREETING_0001953E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up, sport?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了，哥们儿？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabbyStuff_GREETING_00019541_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, there he is! Man of the hour! Hero of our time! The knight in shining armor! Bing! Pow! Zoom! Cool Joe is dead and we're back in business!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，他来了！风云人物！我们时代的英雄！穿着闪亮盔甲的骑士！砰！噗！嗡！酷乔死了，我们又要重操旧业了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabbyStuff_GREETING_0001CB69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got partners now, sport! Partners! Margins are looking mighty good down here! Hey, you want anything? It's employee discount for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在有搭档了，哥们儿！合作伙伴！这里的利润看起来很不错！嘿，你想要什么吗？这是给你的员工折扣！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabbyStuff_GREETING_0001CB69_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, there she is! Lady of the hour! Hero of our time! The knight in shining armor! Bing! Pow! Zoom! Cool Joe is dead and we're back in business!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，她来了！风云女神！我们时代的英雄！穿着闪亮盔甲的骑士！砰！噗！嗡！酷乔死了，我们又要重操旧业了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabbyStuff_GREETING_0001CB6A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got partners now, sport! Partners! Margins are looking mighty good down here! Hey, you want anything, it's employee discount for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在有搭档了，哥们儿！合作伙伴！这里的利润看起来很不错！嘿，你想要什么，都可以给你员工折扣！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabbyStuff_GREETING_0001CB6A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back! Care to take a look?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来！想看看吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabbyStuff_GREETING_0001CB6C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there! Welcome to my bakery! Just opened up, everything is fresh. Apple pie, pear pie, donuts, all the sugary goodness you could want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿你好！欢迎来到我的面包店！刚开张，全都是新鲜的。苹果派、梨派、甜甜圈，所有你想吃的甜食。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_GREETING_00015FA0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_GREETING_00015FA1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_GREETING_00015FA2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew this was a mistake. Time to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就知道这是个错误。该走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_GREETING_00017E86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, he was really upset. I hope they leave us alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，他真的很难过。我希望他们离我们远点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_GREETING_00017E66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jesus, I thought I was a goner. They really worked me over. Thought it was going to be a baby beating, but they gave me the real deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，我以为我死定了。他们把我狠狠收拾了一顿，本以为只是小打小闹，结果他们来真的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_GREETING_0001AA28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even the big boss got in on it. Loco, that's his name... has a good right hand. Others came at me with pipes and bats, did quite a number on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 连大老板都参与进来了，洛科，那是他的名字...他的右手很厉害。其他人拿着烟斗和球棒朝我冲过来，狠狠地揍了我一顿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_GREETING_0001AA28_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know what you did to pull me out of it, but thank you. Is all this blood mine? What a mess. At least nobody else got hurt. I'll manage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道你做了什么才把我拉出来的，但谢谢你。这都是我的血吗？真是一团糟，至少没有其他人受伤。我能应付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_GREETING_0001AA28_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你明白我的意思吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_GREETING_0001AA50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't the time for talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在不是说话的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_GREETING_0001C661_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't talk now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在不方便说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_GREETING_0001C662_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in a killing mood right now. Best not to ask me questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在情绪很糟。，最好别问我问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_GREETING_0001C663_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_GREETING_0001CA7E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll talk back at the shop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们回店里再谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_GREETING_0001CA7F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess it's time for me to hit the road. Don't know what I was thinking, trying to open a shop and be a regular citizen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我该上路了。我不知道我当时是怎么想的，想开个店，做个普通市民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_GREETING_0001CA80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you enjoy the babka. Still... I gotta be on my way soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你喜欢巴布卡。不过...我马上就要走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_GREETING_0001CAAF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What'll it be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那会怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prospector [02015A51] (mod) Quest : ([02015A56]aaDetProspectorStuff) Prospector Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetProsp_GREETING_00015A58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you see them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能看见他们吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide02_GREETING_0001412D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide02_GREETING_0001412E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... you crossed over to the other side... I can smell the pheromones... you're awash in the sin of the ants. You've joined them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...你已经穿越到另一边了...我闻到了信息素的味道...你沉浸在蚂蚁的罪恶之中。你加入了他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide02_GREETING_00017A03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think you'll chew me up with your mandibles and feed me to larvae? Think again, bug! I'll bash your fucking head in like a bag of carrots!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想用你的下颚把我咬碎喂给幼虫吗？再想想吧，虫子！我要把你的头像胡萝卜一样砸烂！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide02_GREETING_00017A03_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll get clean, I promise. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会戒掉的，我保证。谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide02_GREETING_00017E45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll cut back, I promise. Everything will be fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会减少的，我保证。一切都会好起来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide02_GREETING_00017E46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck off, I'm talking business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚开，我在谈正事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Freeside Thug [02017E51] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide02_GREETING_00017E63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get the fuck away from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的离我远点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck off, dickweed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚开，杂碎。

ESP.TRADUIT: [他咆哮着，眼睛里闪着明显的仇恨，大量的口水从它的尖牙中渗出。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got a message for Mister Wolf... Loco killed Kisses, has her out front of Pokey's, down in Moleville. I'm getting out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个口信要给沃尔夫先生...洛可杀了亲亲，把她带到莫尔维尔的波基酒吧门前。我要离开这里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Messenger [0201AA36] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide02_GREETING_0001AA4A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, howdy! Fancy seeing you here. May I introduce you to the newly-elected sheriff of Molesville, yours truly!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你好！很高兴在这里见到你。请允许我向你介绍莫尔维尔新当选的治安官，鄙人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sheriff Mackenzie [0201D421] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide02_GREETING_0001D465_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Howdy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sheriff Mackenzie [0201D421] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide02_GREETING_0001D466_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're not going back, you hear me? I don't care what you do! You'll have to kill us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不会回去的，听到了吗？我不管你做什么！那就杀了我们吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_0001273F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will you help us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会帮助我们吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_00012C13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_00012C14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ask?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你问？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spear-Hand [02012C0C] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_00013032_1.ogg
NPC : Thistle [0201273D] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He continues drinking, content to ignore your presence.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他继续喝酒，满足于无视你的存在。]
