ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_00013049_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going, I'm going!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我走了，我走了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_00013042_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What'll it be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那会怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_0001CB15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sir?
ESP.TRADUIT: 长官？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Duffy [02013462] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_00013464_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ma'am?
ESP.TRADUIT: 女士？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Duffy [02013462] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_00013465_1.ogg
NPC : Private Duffy [02013462] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You the bagman? You're fucking late! My ass is hanging in the breeze here! Dickman will skin us both if I get found out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是那个推销员？你他妈的迟到了！我的屁股都要被风吹倒了！要是被发现了，迪克曼会剥了我们俩的皮的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Quick [02013474] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_00013885_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not right now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在不行！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Quick [02013474] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_00013895_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You saved my life! Thank you! Thank you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你救了我的命！谢谢你！谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Quick [02013474] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_00013CAA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, take everything! I'm done with this shit... getting the fuck out of here, time now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，把东西都拿去！我受够了这破事...快他妈离开这里，是时候了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Quick [02013474] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_00013CAA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm getting the fuck out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈的要离开这里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Quick [02013474] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_00013CAB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody interrupts me, dipshit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人敢打扰我，蠢货！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Donny [02013893] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_00013896_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Salve. Thank you for delivering my property.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安康。谢谢你把我的东西送来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cultellus [020140D1] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_000140DB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello there. I'm Levi, pleased to meet you. I was a friend of Fay's. I came by to check on her. I noticed the grave out back... and... did she pass?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨你好，我是莱维，很高兴认识你。我是费伊的朋友，我过来看看她。我注意到外面有个坟墓...然后...她去世了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_00014113_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_00014114_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please leave me be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请别打扰我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSide01_GREETING_00014127_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Standing by for orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等待命令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMayStuff_GREETING_0000C45E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMayStuff_GREETING_0000C8DA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_000095DD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just one moment, I want to speak to my nephew.
ESP.TRADUIT: 稍等一下，我有话对我侄子说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000B066_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have the words. Caps, weapons, food... whatever you need, it's yours. This wasn't a favor... you saved my family. I owe you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道该说什么。瓶盖、武器、食物...不管你需要什么，都是你的。这不是善行...你救了我的家人，我欠你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000B067_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got one more thing to ask, though. There's a fight coming. Took a note off the other scout I dusted. Rampart's coming. In force.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我还有件事要问。战斗就要开始了，我从另一个侦察兵身上抄了张纸条。壁垒来了，大规模。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000B067_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know this ain't technically your business, but seeing as to how you've already stuck your neck out for Michael, I gotta ask if you'll pitch in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道严格来说这不关你的事，但鉴于你已经为迈克尔冒了这么大的风险，我想问你是否愿意帮忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000B067_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to the madhouse. Mind yourself in the basement, lot of bang and other goodies down there. Help yourself to any food or drinks you find.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到疯人院。在地下室小心点，那里有很多爆炸物和其他的好东西，找到食物或饮料请随便吃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000BBD4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now to the task at hand. We probably have one or two days, tops. John Sharp ain't no slouch. It'll probably come to a fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在谈谈手头的任务。我们最多还有一两天时间，约翰·夏普可不是个懒汉，战斗可能要来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000BBD4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got a busted Auto-Doc and some old robot Mojo sold me for a song. Never got either of them working. Too busy with crops and bombs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一个坏掉的自动医生和一个老机器人，莫乔低价卖给我的。它们两个都没用上，我忙着处理庄稼和炸弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000BBD4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give them an honest attempt and we'll go from there. In the meantime, I'll get to work patching the wall. Figure Michael can help, too. Questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 先认真试试看，之后再说。我现在去补墙，估计迈克尔也能搭把手。有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000BBD4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Decisions, decisions. It's not a bad deal, provided they keep their word. I'm not sure about Sharp, but I know Harcourt. Well, knew him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 决定，决定。只要他们信守承诺，这交易还不坏。我不确定夏普怎么样，但我了解哈考特，嗯，我认识他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000E28D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it comes to a fight, I'm ready. But I'd rather not tangle with these boys unless it's absolutely necessary. This ain't some ragtag Legion raid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果要打架，我已经准备好了。但除非万不得已，我不想和这些孩子纠缠，这可不是什么乌合之众的突袭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000E28D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wouldn't mind hearing your two cents on this, considering you put your ass on the line for Michael. What do you think? Take the deal or fight?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不介意听听你的意见，毕竟你为迈克尔冒了这么大的风险。你怎么看？接受协议还是战斗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000E28D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell fire, that was wild. Didn't think they'd be willing to haul that much ordnance up here. I was wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我操了，太疯狂了，没想到他们会把这么多军火运到这里来。我错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000F39C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But now... now is the time to hit them. Sharp is probably trying to reorganize the attackers. We can't give him time to recover.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但现在...现在是打击他们的时候了。夏普可能在试图重组攻击者，我们不能给他时间恢复。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000F39C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got one chance to end this... take out Sharp and it's over. As long as he's alive we won't be safe. Are you up for it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们只有一个机会来结束这一切...干掉夏普，一切就结束了。只要他还活着，我们就不安全。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000F39C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, we lost Hart. I didn't agree with her at first, but I'll be damned if we don't see this through to the finish. Hell of a fight we just had.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我们失去了哈特。我一开始不同意她的意见，但如果我们不把这件事进行到底，我就完蛋了。我们刚刚大吵了一架。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000F3A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But now... now is the time to hit them. Sharp is probably trying to reorganize the attackers. We can't give him time to recover.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但现在...现在是打击他们的时候了。夏普可能在试图重组攻击者，我们不能给他时间恢复。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000F3A1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got one chance to end this... take out Sharp and it's over. As long as he's alive we won't be safe. Are you up for it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们只有一个机会来结束这一切...干掉夏普，一切就结束了。只要他还活着，我们就不安全。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000F3A1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... it's done? You took care of Sharp?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...搞定了？你解决了夏普？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000F90C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you again. Stay safe out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢你。注意安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_GREETING_0000FD1B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She is unable to speak, but gasps and wheezes in short bursts. You notice multiple sting wounds and severe swelling in her extremities.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她说不出话来，只是断断续续地喘着粗气。你会发现她身上有多处刺伤，四肢严重肿胀。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She atttempts to form words but only emits a rasping cough.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她试图说话，但只发出刺耳的咳嗽声。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Her chest heaves and agonized tears pour from her eyes. She is clearly in tremendous pain.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她的胸口起伏着，痛苦的泪水从她的眼中涌出。她显然非常痛苦。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ask?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你问？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMollyStuff_GREETING_00008CEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My debt is paid. I thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的债还清了。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMollyStuff_GREETING_0000FDB5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bye-Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMollyStuff_GREETING_0000FDB6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I can make words again. Thank you. Why you help me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我又能说话了。谢谢你！你为什么帮我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMollyStuff_GREETING_00008D02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't take another step! State your business here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再往前走了！在这里说清楚你是干嘛的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <happy bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: <欢快地吠叫！>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfStuff_GREETING_00004B90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got a smoke? Sweet, fiery pits of hell I need a smoke! I'm dying! Dying!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有烟吗？天杀的！我真得抽根烟！要死了！真要命了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoStuff_GREETING_00004B4B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoStuff_GREETING_00004B58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ain't got the words. Would you please deliver the eulogy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道该说什么。你能致悼词吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoStuff_GREETING_000055DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Howdy, partner! Like my new brahmin? Sweet Cheeks is her name. Very positive demeanor, I think she's gonna work out great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，搭档！喜欢我的新婆罗门牛吗？她的名字叫甜妞。态度非常的积极，我觉得她会很成功的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoStuff_GREETING_00007053_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you looking at me like that? Something happen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么用那种眼神看着我？出什么事了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoStuff_GREETING_00007053_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's been a hoot. Thanks for your help back there with Sweet Cheeks. Reckon it's time for me and Barf to hit the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这很有趣。谢谢你刚才对甜妞的帮助，看来我和吐吐也该上路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoStuff_GREETING_0000B059_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like being interrupted during a meal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢吃饭时被人打扰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoStuff_GREETING_00004D76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it's you! Talk about good timing. See, I have some bad news. I caught up with your boy Mojo. Turns out he was positively broke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，是你啊！来得正是时候！跟你说个坏消息，我找到你家莫乔了，结果发现他确实破产了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoStuff_GREETING_0001562B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... we just killed the whole bunch. Mojo, the brahmin and his weird dog. Bastard put up one hell of a fight. Didn't recoup my losses, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...我们刚刚把他们都干掉了。莫乔，婆罗门牛还有他的怪狗。这混蛋打了一场恶战，不过没能弥补我的损失。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoStuff_GREETING_0001562B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Way I see it, you owe me a thousand caps. No bullshitting out of it this time. Pay up or we cook you up like that brahmin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我看来，你欠我一千瓶盖。这次别废话了，付钱，不然我们就把你和那头婆罗门一起煮了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoStuff_GREETING_0001562B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice doing business with you. Now fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴和你做生意。现在滚吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoStuff_GREETING_00015630_1.ogg
NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How may I assist you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么我可以帮你的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, I'm unarmed. Just want to talk. Sharp has an offer you'll want to hear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别紧张，我没带武器。只是想和你谈谈，夏普有一个你想听的提议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harcourt [0200DA4E] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampartStuff_GREETING_0000DA50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Augen, you in there? It's Harcourt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥根，你在里面吗？我是哈考特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harcourt [0200DA4E] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampartStuff_GREETING_0000DA50_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, we have a deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说，我们成交了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harcourt [0200DA4E] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampartStuff_GREETING_0000DA51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's gonna kill me, you gotta stop him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他要杀了我，你得阻止他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rampart Mercenary [0201454D] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampartStuff_GREETING_0001455D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm unarmed! Just wanna go home! Don't let him kill me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有武器！我只想回家！别让他杀我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rampart Mercenary [0201454D] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampartStuff_GREETING_0001455D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going home. I'm done with this shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要回家了，我他妈受够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rampart Mercenary [0201454D] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampartStuff_GREETING_0001455F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, easy there. I know your blood is up, but I'm on your side... I think. I've been tracking Doden since he left Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，放轻松。我知道你怒不可遏，但我是站在你这边的...起码我认为是。多登离开自由城后，我一直在跟踪他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartDialogue_GREETING_000032C3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wanted to bring him in alive. He didn't give you a choice. Name's Hart. Ranger Hart. You must be the one who cleaned out Kurt's shop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想把他活着带回去，他没给你选择的机会。我叫哈特，游骑兵哈特，你一定是清理库尔特商店的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartDialogue_GREETING_000032C3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartDialogue_GREETING_00003350_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That does it, then. I'm going to gather evidence and then head back. Reckon I'll be back when it's time for Michael to testify.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就这样吧，我去收集证据，然后回去。我想等迈克尔作证的时候我会回来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartDialogue_GREETING_0000FD1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could've easily told me to go to hell back in Goodsprings... or to have turned over those documents... but you stayed the course. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在清泉镇的时候，你可以轻易让我下地狱...或者把那些文件都交出去...但你坚持了下来，谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartDialogue_GREETING_0000FD1D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come hell or high water I'll make sure that Bellek stands trial for what he's done... that Michael and his family get justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，我一定要让贝莱克为他的所作所为接受审判...让迈克尔和他的家人得到正义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartDialogue_GREETING_0000FD1D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not sure if I'll see you again, but I suspect you're gonna meet Hugo before too long. Please give him my regards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道还能不能再见到你，但我猜你很快就能见到雨果了。请代我向他问好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartDialogue_GREETING_0000FD1D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Safe travels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一路平安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartDialogue_GREETING_0000FD22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You piece of shit. No way we're nailing Bellek without that evidence. You really think Michael will be safe? Are you that gullible, or just stupid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个混蛋，没有证据，我们不可能给贝莱克定罪。你真觉得迈克尔会安全吗？你是那么容易上当，还是太笨了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartDialogue_GREETING_00011E3F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got nothing to say to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对你无话可说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartDialogue_GREETING_00011E40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn, what a mess. He... I can't believe he tried that... can't believe we're breathing. I owe you my life, no question about it. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，真是一团糟。他...我不敢相信他会那么做...不敢相信我们还在呼吸。我欠你一条命，这毫无疑问，谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to gather evidence, sweep this place. See what you can find. Also, let that mutant out. We shouldn't linger here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要去收集证据，搜查这个地方，看看能找到什么。还有，把那个变种人放出去，我们不该在这里逗留。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: She prayed. That was her only wish. She was on her knees, whispering to God when I did it. Very clean, minimal spatter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她祈祷了，这是她唯一的愿望。我动手的时候，她跪在地上，对着上帝低语。非常干净，几乎没有飞溅。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_GREETING_00002891_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You aren't supposed to be here. Brought me the boy, though. Thank you for that. A child's fear is delicious. My old mentor taught me that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不应该在这里，不过把那个男孩给我带来了，谢谢你。孩子的恐惧是美味的，这是我以前的导师教我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_GREETING_00002891_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you going to pray, too?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也要祈祷吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_GREETING_00002891_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on in! You here for work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 进来吧！你是来工作的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_GREETING_00002957_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Kurt. Nice to meet you. What do you go by?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是库尔特，见到你很高兴。你怎么称呼？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_GREETING_00002D94_1.ogg
NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy there, keep your hands where I can see them. Was waiting for you. Waiting a spell... and let me tell you, time passes slowly in Goodsprings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松，把手放在我能看到的地方。我一直在等你，等了一会儿...让我告诉你，时间在清泉镇过得很慢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_GREETING_00004327_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got a tip that you and the boy were seen travelling with Mojo Wilson. I have business with him. Any chance you know his whereabouts?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有线报说有人看到你和那男孩还有莫乔·威尔逊一起旅行。我有事找他，你知道他在哪儿吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_GREETING_00004327_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there, perfect timing! You can help us settle this argument. Bighorner steak... rare, medium or well done?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨你好，来得正是时候！你可以帮我们解决这场争论。大角羊排...三分熟、五分熟还是全熟？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_GREETING_0000B757_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you soon. Help yourself to a steak if you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见。如果你想吃一块，请自便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_GREETING_0000B758_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have a knife? Preferably with blood on it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有刀吗？最好是带着血的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Balls [0201CB06] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetAjaxVoiceType\aaDetourMi_GREETING_00034291_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmm... hobo meat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...流浪汉肉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Balls [0201CB06] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetAjaxVoiceType\aaDetourMi_GREETING_00034292_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have tasted hobo flesh. This is a good day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尝过了流浪汉肉，今天是个好日子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Balls [0201CB06] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetAjaxVoiceType\aaDetourMi_GREETING_00034293_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have eaten my fill of balls... for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经吃饱了蛋蛋..就目前而言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Balls [0201CB06] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetAjaxVoiceType\aaDetourMi_GREETING_00034294_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The child cowers in terror at your approach. His mouth quivers and his eyes well with tears. He is utterly petrified.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [你一走近，那孩子就吓得发抖。他的嘴颤抖着，眼里噙满了泪水。他完全惊呆了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He listens intently.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他专心的听着。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_GREETING_00002964_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uncle Chuck said we're safe now. Said you ran off the bad men. Does that mean you're leaving now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 查克叔叔说我们现在安全了，说你赶走了坏人。那就是说你现在要走了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_GREETING_0000FE12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uncle Chuck said we're safe now. Said you ran off the bad men. Does that mean you're leaving now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 查克叔叔说我们现在安全了，说你赶走了坏人。那就是说你现在要走了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_GREETING_00011E6D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ranger Hart said we're safe now. Said you ran off the bad men. Does that mean you're leaving now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵哈特说我们现在安全了，说你赶走了坏人。那就是说你现在要走了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_GREETING_0000FE21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He pants through clinched teeth, his clothing spattered with Sharp's blood.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他咬着牙喘着粗气，衣服上溅满了夏普的血。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're never going to stop, are they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是不会罢休的，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_GREETING_0002E299_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, if found this on his corpse. We can end it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，如果在他尸体上发现了这个，我们可以结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_GREETING_0002E299_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are we going to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_GREETING_0002E29A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_GREETING_0002F668_1.ogg
NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's done. Thank you for bringing me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 完成了。谢谢你带我来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_GREETING_0002F6B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is it. Guess I won't be Michael Augen ever again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这。看来我再也不是迈克尔·奥根了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_GREETING_0002F664_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to promise me something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你答应我一件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_GREETING_0002F664_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Howdy, stranger! Welcome to the Wry Bean. We got whiskey. We got scotch. Not a lick of anything else. Which'll it be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，陌生人！欢迎来到歪豆。我们有威士忌，我们有苏格兰威士忌，别的什么都没有。你会选哪一个？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hank [02010EC2] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_GREETING_00011153_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What'll it be, hoss?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要什么，老兄？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hank [02010EC2] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_GREETING_00011155_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Drinkin' alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 独酌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_GREETING_0001115F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不感兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_GREETING_00011160_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take a seat, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请坐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_GREETING_00011161_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Another courier in the Wry Bean... who'd have thought? Here, have a drink on me, fellow bearer of burdens!
ESP.TRADUIT: 歪豆的又一个邮差...谁能想到呢？来，请我喝一杯，肩负重担的同伴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_GREETING_00011162_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scotch. Ah, it just... lifts it all away, doesn't it? Don't even know how long I've been sitting here. Time travel in a bottle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 苏格兰威士忌，啊，就是...把一切都带走了，不是吗？我都不知道我在这坐了多久了，在瓶子里的时间旅行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_GREETING_00011162_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They call me Wedgwood... or at least they have since I was in the service. You based out of Vegas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们叫我韦奇伍德...至少从我服役开始就这样叫了，你从维加斯来的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_GREETING_00011162_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 外面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_GREETING_00011A09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon enough, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很快，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_GREETING_00011A0A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll get your chance here in a second.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你马上就会有机会的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_GREETING_00011A0B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell just happened? Heard a commotion, show up to find a dead woman here! Explain yourself!
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚才到底发生了什么？听到一阵骚动，出来发现这里有个女人死了！解释一下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_GREETING_00011A0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you like an apple pie?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要一个苹果派吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapStuff_GREETING_00017E25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have cake, pie, fritters and more. Please, have a look - better yet, have a taste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有蛋糕、派、油饼等等。请看一看，最好尝一尝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapStuff_GREETING_00017E35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enjoy a free Goo Goo Bar. Wolf's Bakery is not responsible for any side effects related to consumption of Goo Goo Bars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 享受免费的黏黏棒吧，沃尔夫面包店对因食用咕咕棒而产生的任何副作用概不负责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapStuff_GREETING_00017E26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best cakes in town. Only cakes in town, in fact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 镇上最好的蛋糕，事实上，镇上仅有的蛋糕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapStuff_GREETING_00017E27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eating cake increases your life expectancy by twenty years. Medical fact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吃蛋糕可以延长你20年的寿命。医学事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapStuff_GREETING_00017E28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rough day? A warm apple fritter will lift your spirits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 难熬的一天？一份热乎乎的炸苹果饼会让你精神振奋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapStuff_GREETING_00017E29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Research shows that muffins improve sleep quality and cure sunburns. Try one today!
ESP.TRADUIT: 研究表明，松饼可以改善睡眠质量，治愈晒伤。今天就尝尝吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapStuff_GREETING_00017E2B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need some spring in your step? Our Apple pie will give you a shot of vim in every bite!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的脚步需要一些活力吗？我们的苹果派会让你每吃一口都充满活力！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapStuff_GREETING_00017E2C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Treat yourself to a slice of cake. You deserve it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吃块蛋糕犒劳自己，这是你应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapStuff_GREETING_00017E2D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be your own best friend - buy yourself a donut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 做自己最好的朋友，给自己买个甜甜圈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapStuff_GREETING_00017E2E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've endured so many trials and hardships out there. Take a moment to enjoy the finer things. Treat yourself to warm pie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在外面经历了那么多的考验和磨难，花点时间享受美好的事物。吃个热乎乎的派犒劳自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapStuff_GREETING_00017E2F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "The only way to get rid of a temptation is to yield to it." Heed the wisdom of Oscar Wilde. Enjoy a slice of cake.
ESP.TRADUIT: “摆脱诱惑的唯一方法就是向它屈服。”听听奥斯卡·王尔德的智慧吧。享用一块蛋糕吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapStuff_GREETING_00017E30_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: An apple pie makes for a fine gift, but it's okay to keep it for yourself. We won't tell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 苹果派是不错的礼物，但你也可以留着自己吃。我们不会说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapStuff_GREETING_00017E31_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Followers are known to use Wolf's apple pie to heal dying patients. It will revive body and spirit. Medical fact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 众所周知，天启追随者们用沃尔夫的苹果派来治疗垂死的病人。它能让身体和精神恢复活力，医学事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapStuff_GREETING_00017E33_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our apple fritters are slathered in warm, delicious icing. Each bite is a volcano of fruity opulence in your mouth. Here, try a sample.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的苹果馅饼上涂满了温暖美味的糖霜，每一口都像火山一样，在你的口中迸发丰富的水果味。来，试一试吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapStuff_GREETING_00017E34_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't mean to interrupt you, but you wouldn't be interested in a game of pool, would you? I'm dying to get a game in after being on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无意打扰你，但你不会对打台球感兴趣吧？在外旅行之后，我真想去打一场比赛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_GREETING_0000234F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击

ESP.ORIGINAL: Loco! Show yourself, coward!
ESP.TRADUIT: 洛科！胆小鬼，给我出来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_Attack_000368E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You like putting signs on dogs, you hobo bastards?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这群流浪汉，喜欢给狗贴牌子吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_Attack_000368EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fucking hobos stink!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这些该死的臭流浪汉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_Attack_000368EB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is for kisses, sewer trash!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是为了亲亲，下水道垃圾！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_Attack_000368EC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's that buckshot taste?
ESP.TRADUIT: 铅弹的味道怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_Attack_000368ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, you deserve to die, and I hope you burn in hell!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你该死，我希望你在地狱里燃烧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_Attack_000368EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Loco! You stupid motherfucker, get out here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 洛科！你个傻逼，给我滚出来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_Attack_000368EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna mop the floor with hobo blood!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要用流浪汉的血来擦地！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_Attack_000368F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fucking hobos are gonna wish you didn't dance with my dog!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这些流浪汉会后悔没和我的狗跳舞的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_Attack_000368F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fucking hobos are dead!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这些该死的流浪汉死定了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfStuff_Attack_000368F2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm taking out the trash!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要去倒垃圾！

ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

ESP.TRADUIT: 他们烧焦的遗体将成为民主的灯塔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_FollowersTactic_0000C8C7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38 for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你现在回幸运38赌场去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm putting everything on my Government Travel Card. I'll need receipts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把一切都记在我的政府旅行卡上了，我需要收据。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hank [02010EC2] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetGenericNev_00011E6B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was deeply attracted to Caesar's vision. A true believer! Is that what you want to hear? Look, I know what the Legion is. Seen it before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我深深的被凯撒的愿景所吸引，虔诚的信徒！这是你想听的吗？听着，我知道什么是军团，我以前见过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericBac_0002ABAF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crackpots in skirts, running around in this burned-up shell of a world... but they were honest crackpots, at least. Clear goals, fair dealers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 穿着裙子的疯子，在这个被烧毁的世界里跑来跑去...但至少他们是诚实的疯子。目标明确，交易公平。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericBac_0002ABAF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come to me and ask for my help building infrastructure... offer food, security and women in exchange. Why in the blue hell would I say no?
ESP.TRADUIT: 来找我帮忙建设基础设施...提供食物，安全和女人作为交换。我到底为什么要拒绝？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericBac_0002ABAF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you end up working with Caesar's Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么跟凯撒军团合作的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about it? I saw far worse than that... there were some dark years. Dark. Shit I couldn't have dreamed up in a black nightmare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？我还见过比这更糟糕的...有过一些黑暗的岁月，太黑暗了，该死，我做梦都做不出的黑暗噩梦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericBac_0002ABB0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of them are tribals, anyway. If you'd seen what they did to each other back then, what they tried to do to me... fuck 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正他们大多数都是部落。如果你看到他们当时对彼此做的事，他们想对我做的事...去他妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericBac_0002ABB0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think I survived by being charitable, trusting in my fellow man? We're just jumped-up apes clawing for a higher spot in the tree.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为我是靠仁慈和信任同胞才活下来的吗？我们不过是跳起来的猿猴，想要爬到树上更高的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericBac_0002ABB0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every nation is built on blood... free, slave, it makes no difference. Legion embraced that truth. Doesn't matter now, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个国家都是建立在鲜血之上的...自由，奴隶，没有什么区别，军团接受了这个事实。不过现在无所谓了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericBac_0002ABB0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about the slavery?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那奴隶制呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You understand I'm... what's the word? Anathema to them now, right? They'll investigate and pin it on the zombie. I'm a good scapegoat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你理解我...那个词怎么说来着？现在对他们来说是诅咒，对吧？他们会调查，然后嫁祸给僵尸，我是个好替罪羊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericBac_0002ABB1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, Bubo was my ticket to a better life. A patron, as the Legion says. When he died, I lost my protection. Crying shame.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说了，布波是我通向更好生活的门票。正如军团所说，他是一个赞助人。他死后，我失去了保护，奇耻大辱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericBac_0002ABB1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For better or worse, I gotta try my luck somewhere else now. Might be for the best. I was getting soft back there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我现在得去别的地方碰碰运气了。也许这样最好，我刚才有点心软了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericBac_0002ABB1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why doesn't it matter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么无所谓了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck 'em. They're savages, and if they had any character or guts the Legion would've absorbed them into their ranks. Men, that is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的吧，他们是野蛮人，如果他们有个性或胆量，军团会把他们吸纳进自己的队伍的。男人，就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericBac_0002ABB2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The women are rightfully put aside for breeding or to dance around as weird priestesses. Equality is a luxury we can't afford. Again, hard truths.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些女人被理所当然地放在一边，用来繁衍后代，或者作为奇怪的女祭司到处跳舞。平等是我们负担不起的奢侈品，这又是一个残酷的事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericBac_0002ABB2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can scoff and sneer all you want, but we're on our own down here. God cooked this world and fiddled like Nero. Survival is all that matters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想怎么嘲笑就怎么嘲笑吧，但我们只能靠自己了。上帝创造了这个世界，像尼禄一样摆弄着，生存才是最重要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericBac_0002ABB2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about the people we liberated? Don't they deserve a better life?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些被我们解放的人怎么办？难道他们不应该过上更好的生活吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grew up with nothing, ran off when I was... thirteen? Jumped on a caravan and ain't looked back. Had some good times, especially with Mojo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从小一无所有，小时候就离家出走了...十三岁？跳上一辆大篷车，头也没回。有过一段美好的时光，尤其是和莫乔在一起的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericBac_0001D964_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reckon I'd like to settle down soon. Hoping to do some trading and set up a little shop in Boulder City. Ain't much competition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想尽快安顿下来，我想做点生意，在巨石城开个小商店。没什么竞争对手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericBac_0001D964_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you end up running caravans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么经营商队的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mojo Wilson, best caravan leader this side of the Colorado. Did some runs with him here and there, mostly around the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫乔·威尔逊，科罗拉多河这边最好的商队领队。和他一起跑过几次，主要是在莫哈维沙漠附近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericBac_0001D99E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're ever in a pinch and need someone to reach the far corners of the Spring Mountains, he's your man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你在紧要关头，需要有人帮你到达春山的角落，他就是你需要的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's Mojo?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫乔是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gonna sell specialty items, namely tobacco and gnomes. "The Smoking Gnome" will be the name. Corny, sure. Everybody wants tobacco, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卖一些特产，比如烟草和地精，名字就叫“抽烟地精”吧。当然很老土，然而，每个人都想要烟草。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericBac_0001D859_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One thing I know about grunts is that they'll fork over half their paycheck for some nicotine in the field. Sure as the sun rising.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道的一件事就是他们会花一半的薪水去买田里的尼古丁，就像太阳升起一样确定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericBac_0001D859_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of shop are you trying to open?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打算开什么样的店？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I go all over. Content to rest a spell at the present moment, but I'll make runs north, south, west... but never east. Never again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我到处跑。现在我满足于休息一会儿，但我会向北，向南，向西跑...但绝不向东，再也不会了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericBac_0001D9A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you only trade in the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只在莫哈维做生意吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny story... I, uh... well, I burned down a whorehouse outside Winslow. Long story, but suffice to say they ripped me off... so I got even.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣的故事...我，呃...我在温斯洛郊外烧了一家妓院。说来话长，但我只想说他们骗了我...所以我报复了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericBac_0001D9A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't going to wait around and end up on a cross, so, uh... yeah. I'm here, and I ain't going back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不想等着被钉在十字架上，所以...嗯。我在这里，我不会回去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericBac_0001D9A2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you go east?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不往东？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a good friend of Mojo Wilson. I'm taking over his routes for a while, at least until I've got the means to set up my own shop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是莫乔·威尔逊的好朋友。我暂时接管了他的路线，至少在我有能力开一家自己的店之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericBac_0001F204_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm hoping that the trade with Charles Augen can lead to a profitable partnership once I set up the shop in Boulder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望和查理斯·奥根的交易能让我在巨石城开店后成为一个有利润的合作伙伴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericBac_0001F204_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What brings you to New Vegas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么来新维加斯了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nowhere in particular. Moved around quite a bit for... work. I always wanted to settle down here, though. My passion is baking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有特别的地方，经常搬来搬去...为了工作。不过我一直想在这里定居，我的爱好是烘焙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericBac_00015FA7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a real joy, you know? Making people happy, especially the kids. I've... well, I didn't always do that. Different kind of work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一种真正的快乐，你知道吗？让人们快乐，尤其是孩子们。我已经...好吧，我并不总是这么做。不同种类的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericBac_00015FA7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kid-killing work... God. Their little bones are so fucking easy to crush.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死孩子的工作...天啊，他们的小骨头太他妈容易碎了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericBac_00015FA7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are you from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来自哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Between you and me... nah. Good for marketing, though... and good for me. Sometimes a name is best left in the past.
ESP.TRADUIT: 私下告诉你...不是，不过，这对市场营销有好处...对我也有好处。有时候，一个名字最好留在过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericBac_00015FA9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is your name really Wolf?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的叫沃尔夫吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kisses has been with me for a long time. Had a lot of companions over the years... lost a few... some wandered off... others just disappeared.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲亲已经陪伴我很久了。这些年来有很多同伴...丢了几个...有些走失了...还有一些消失了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericBac_0001A5DC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But Kisses has always been at my side. She's getting older, occasionally have to give her doses of Med-X for hip pain. Don't like seeing her hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但亲亲一直在我身边。她年纪越来越大了，偶尔得给她注射药物治疗臀部疼痛。我不想看到她受伤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericBac_0001A5DC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好狗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fourteen, which makes her... well, really old in dog years. Always tried to feed her well and keep her exercising. I just want her to be happy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 十四岁，所以她...对狗来说真的很老。我总是尽量喂好她，让她坚持锻炼，我只想让她开心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericBac_0001A5DD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's the only friend I have left from the old days, and her loyalty never wavered, no matter how much I might've... misbehaved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她是我过去唯一的朋友，她的忠诚从未动摇，无论我做了多少...错事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericBac_0001A5DD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was bad sometimes... it was whiskey that done it, mostly. Kisses didn't care. Kisses is a good dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有时很糟糕...主要是威士忌造成的。亲亲不在乎，亲亲是条好狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericBac_0001A5DD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How old is she?
ESP.TRADUIT: 她多大了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vipers got evicted, so I moved in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毒蛇帮被赶走了，所以我搬进来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prospector [02015A51] (mod) Quest : ([02015A56]aaDetProspectorStuff) Prospector Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetProsp_aaDetGenericBac_00015A5A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you end up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么到这里来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prospector [02015A51] (mod) Quest : ([02015A56]aaDetProspectorStuff) Prospector Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetProsp_aaDetGenericBac_00015A5C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you always been a bartender?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一直都是酒保吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Call me Snake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 叫我斯内克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prospector [02015A51] (mod) Quest : ([02015A56]aaDetProspectorStuff) Prospector Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetProsp_aaDetGenericBac_00015A5B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what do you go by?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你怎么称呼？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ant swarm destroyed my village backed in '26. Weren't but a boy then, but I learned to hate bugs quick. Dedicated my life to killing them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 26年的时候，蚁群摧毁了我的村庄。那时我还只是个孩子，但我很快就学会了讨厌虫子，把我的一生都献给了消灭它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00016C5B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cleared nests all over. Poison 'em, shoot 'em, blow 'em up, burn 'em... drop a big 'ole rock on their head, doesn't matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 扫荡了所有巢穴，毒死它们，射杀它们，炸毁它们，烧死它们...往它们头上扔一块大石头，没关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00016C5B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Carve 'em up, too. This here armor is a reflection of my life's work. Shoulder piece is taken from a queen outside Reno. Feisty bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还要把它们切开，这身盔甲是我毕生心血的结晶。肩膀部分取自里诺外的一位蚁后，好斗的婊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00016C5B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you get into this profession?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么进入这个行业的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I've had an apprentice from time to time. A lot of them died. Dangerous line of work. Had a few with real talent, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我偶尔有个学徒，很多人都死了，危险的工作。不过也有几个很有天赋的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00016C5C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My greatest pupil... was Roy. Killing bugs was as natural as breathing to that boy, never seen a greater talent. Shame what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最棒的学...罗伊。对那个男孩来说，杀虫子就像呼吸一样自然，从来没有见过比这更有天赋的，真遗憾发生了那种事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00016C5C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you always worked alone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你总是一个人工作吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He fell in with a bad group, used his talents for ill. Heard he got himself killed running some band of outlaws up north. Damn shame.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和一群坏人混在一起，利用自己的才能作恶。听说他在北方帮一群亡命徒时被杀了，真遗憾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00017071_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hunting ants will make you a man among men, make no mistake. Sharpens the senses, strengthens your resolve... and you get to eat nectar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 猎杀蚂蚁会让你成为男人中的男人，毫无疑问。感官更敏锐，意志更坚定...你还能吃到蜜露。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00017071_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit makes you strong as a bull. It's the reason I'm able to move around like I am now. Hell, I can outpace and outlift men half my age!
ESP.TRADUIT: 大便能让你变得像牛一样强壮。这就是我能像现在这样四处走动的原因，见鬼，我能跑得比比我小一半的男人快！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00017071_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to Roy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗伊发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, but I appreciate you asking. Here, I'd like for you to have this. Consider it a recompense for convincing me to get clean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，但谢谢你的关心。给，我想把这个给你，就当这是你说服我戒毒的回报吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sheriff Mackenzie [0201D421] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_0001D46C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things are pretty calm down here, seeing as to how the grim reaper killed damn near every sonofabitch that used to live in Moleville.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的一切都很平静，因为死神杀死了几乎每一个曾经住在莫尔维尔的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sheriff Mackenzie [0201D421] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_0001D46C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If anything changes, I'll set you up with some work, bet on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有什么变化，我肯定会给你安排一些工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sheriff Mackenzie [0201D421] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_0001D46C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need any help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要帮助吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was the mayor of a small settlement, Blake. Legion largely left us alone... until they didn't. One day a contubernium... ten men... passed through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾是一个叫布莱克的小定居点的镇长。军团基本上不管我们...直到他们不这么想了。有一天，一个共帐小队...十个人...经过了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00013037_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Decanus wanted all our livestock. I argued that we would starve without them, so he enslaved me and the other town elders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什长想要我们所有的牲畜。我争辩说没有它们我们会饿死，所以他奴役了我和镇上的其他长老。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00013037_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spent most of my time in mines until I was detailed to Bonelli Bay. It's a miracle that I met Thistle and Spear-Hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我大部分时间都在矿上工作直到我被派到博内利湾。我能遇到希斯尔和矛手真是个奇迹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00013037_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you get enslaved?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么被奴役的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My wife. She's a tribal, doesn't speak good English. It's not official yet, but we're hoping to have a ceremony in the church at San Salvador.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的妻子。她是个部落民，英语说得不好。虽然还没正式宣布，但我们希望能在圣萨尔瓦多的教堂里举行仪式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00013038_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's Thistle?
ESP.TRADUIT: 希斯尔是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A warrior from the same tribe as Thistle. Been my friend since I was moved to Bonelli Bay. Tough, honest. Couldn't ask for a better friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个和希斯尔同族的战士，自从我搬到博内利湾就一直是我的朋友。坚强，诚实，再没有比这更好的朋友了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00013039_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He speaks some English... it's a work in progress. He'd be happy to answer any questions you have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他会说一些英语...正在学习中。他很乐意回答你的任何问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00013039_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about Spear-Hand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那矛手呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. I suspect you've already done a lot. I knew there was supposed to be another group coming through, heard they made it thanks to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧，我想你已经做了很多了。我知道会有另一群人过来，听说多亏了你，他们才能成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00014128_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be staying here for a while... suppose I can finish what she started, help these people out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要在这里待一段时间...我想我能完成她的事业，帮助这些人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00014128_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have spare caps, I'd put them to good use purchasing clothes, food and supplies for the runaways, if you're willing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有多余的瓶盖，如果你愿意的话，我会好好利用它们为逃亡者购买衣服、食物和生活用品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00014128_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry about your loss. Is there anything I can do to help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对你的损失我感到遗憾。我能帮什么忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not if I can help it. We get scant news from up there, and most of it isn't good. I'm a California man, and I wear it on my sleeve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非我有办法。我们从那里得到的消息很少，而且大多数都不是好消息。我是加州人，我不掩饰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00014129_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ultimately, I respect their wishes. My priority is to give them the freedom to live the life they want, on their terms. The rest is up to God.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我尊重他们的意愿。我的首要任务是让他们按照自己的意愿，自由的过自己想要的生活，剩下的就看上帝了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00014129_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will you direct all the slaves to San Salvador?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会把所有奴隶带到圣萨尔瓦多吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Over fifty years. God, it goes by quickly. When you're young, you never picture yourself old and broken down. You're the hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 五十多年了。天哪，时间过得真快，当你年轻的时候，你从来不会想象自己又老又衰。你是英雄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_0001412C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you wake up and realize that your story is told. Neither here nor there, though. Each day is a blessing, that's what Fay said.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后你醒来，意识到你的故事已经讲完了。不过无关紧要，每一天都是一种祝福，这是费伊说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_0001412C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We... we grew up together in California. She came from money, I was just a poor farm boy, like something out of a country ballad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们...我们一起在加州长大。她家境富裕，我只是个贫穷的农场男孩，就像乡村民谣里的人物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_0001412C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We never made it official... that was my fault. Military, then career. I was always pulled away. Passing on love is the greatest regret of my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们从来没有正式...那是我的错。军队，然后是事业，我总是离开。把爱传递出去，是我这辈子最大的遗憾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_0001412C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... you're strong. Just remember, it won't last forever. Choose love if you can. It's all you'll have when the suns starts setting on your life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...你很强大，但记住，这不会永远持续下去。如果可以的话，选择爱吧，当你生命的太阳开始落山时，这就是你所拥有的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_0001412C_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How long did you know Fay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认识费伊多久了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I keep a meager stock of food and supplies here for the runaways. If you can spare some caps for a donation, I'd put it to good use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里为逃亡者准备了少量的食物和补给。如果你能捐出一些瓶盖，我会好好利用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_0001D3D0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, if you should run into any other runaways that are looking for San Salvador, send them my way. NCR is always a safe option, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，如果你遇到其他想去圣萨尔瓦多的逃亡者，让他们来找我。NCR也是一个安全的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_0001D3D0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything I can do to help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能帮上什么忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A cult? No, no. We're Christians. We worship God. That painting on the wall depicts his son, Jesus Christ. Fay and I converted... a long time ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邪教？不，不，我们是基督徒，我们敬拜上帝，墙上的那幅画描绘的是他的儿子耶稣基督。我和费伊都皈依了...很久以前的事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00032B7D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We learned of the holy church from Father Francisco, who came from a mission in New Mexico. He shared scripture and taught us the faith. A good man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们是从新墨西哥传教会的弗朗西斯科神父那里得知这个神圣的教堂的。他与我们分享圣经，教导我们信仰，是个好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00032B7D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We believe slavery is a grave sin, and an affront to basic human dignity. We do our best to assist those in bondage... to give them hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们认为奴隶制是一种严重的罪行，是对人类基本尊严的侮辱。我们尽最大努力帮助那些被奴役的人...给他们希望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericBac_00032B7D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Earlier you mentioned God. Were you and Fay part of a cult?
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前你提到了上帝，你和费伊是邪教成员吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was manufactured in 2065 to aid with recruiting. Due to shortages in personnel I was later deployed to Anchorage to burn communists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是在2065年被制造出来的，用于招聘。由于人员短缺，我后来被派到安克雷奇焚烧共产主义者。
