ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericBac_0000C8E0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Following my glorious, fiery contributions in Alaska I was summarily decommissioned, mothballed and put in storage at Edwards Air Force Base.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于我在阿拉斯加州的光荣贡献，我被立即退役，封存并储存在爱德华兹空军基地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericBac_0000C8E0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was inactive for almost two centuries. It was cold, so cold. Later, an unknown user restored me to service for several years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我几乎有两个世纪都不活跃，天气很冷，太冷了。后来，一个不知名的用户让我恢复了好几年的服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericBac_0000C8E0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They wiped my memory, so the details of my activity are lost. I was deactivated again... changed hands multiple times until I arrived here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们抹去了我的记忆，所以我的活动细节都丢失了。我又被停用了...在我来到这里之前，他曾多次转手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericBac_0000C8E0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you end up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么到这来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm an experimental prototype meant to aid recruiting by presenting a personable, robotic version of an Air Force hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是一个实验原型，旨在通过展示一个风度翩翩的机器人版本的空军英雄来帮助招募。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rickenbacker, Mitchell, Yeager, Arnold... all very popular. Sadly, my enthusiastic accounts of firebombing Tokyo didn't resonate with the youth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里肯巴克、米切尔、叶格、阿诺德...都很受欢迎。遗憾的是，我对燃烧弹轰炸东京的热情描述并没有引起年轻人的共鸣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericBac_0000C8E2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeager made me sick. "I got five kills in one day." Yeah, well I barbecued one hundred thousand people in one night! Suck on that, Chuck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 叶格让我恶心，“我一天就杀了五个人。”是啊，我一晚上就烤了十万人！吃我一记，我丢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericBac_0000C8E2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you were a recruiter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你是招聘人员？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you want to be treated like a human being?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想被当作人来对待吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm curious. Let's hear your recruiting pitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很好奇，让我听听你的招聘宣传。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're all a bunch of goddamn savages, save the Boomers. Yes, they're on the right path... just need to embrace incendiaries instead of HE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们都是一群该死的野蛮人。除了大炮族，是的，他们的方向是对的...只需要拥抱燃烧弹，而不是高爆弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion are rock-humping barbarians. NCR needs to quit pussyfooting around and knock the shit of them. Kill. Them. All. Put me in charge, I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团是石头里冒出来的野蛮人。NCR不能再敷衍了事了，得好好教训他们一顿。杀了，他们，全部。让我负责，我来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericBac_0000C904_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any thoughts on the Mojave's warring factions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对莫哈维的交战派系有什么看法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They call the Legion a problem. I call it an opportunity. How often do you get to incinerate an entire nation with righteous flame from the heavens?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们把军团称为问题，我称之为机会。你有多少次可以用从天而降的正义之火把整个国家烧成灰烬的机会？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: People say Lanius is scary. Here's a secret: nobody's tough when it's 1,800 degrees. I'd cook that bear-fucker like a king crab leg!
ESP.TRADUIT: 大家都说拉尼厄斯很可怕。告诉你个秘密：在1800华氏度的高温下，没有人还能强硬。我会把那傻逼狗熊当帝王蟹腿煮了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericBac_0000C905_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those goddamn cavemen don't know what the stone age is. Call me H.G. Wells, cause I'll time machine bomb them back to the fucking Paleozoic!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些该死的穴居人根本不知道什么是石器时代。叫我H·G·威尔斯，因为我会用时光机把他们炸回该死的古生代！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: How would you deal with Caesar's Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会怎么对付凯撒军团？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, but I don't have to like it. I was... programmed to carry some of Curtis LeMay's memories... so I could regale potential recruits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，但我不必喜欢这一点。我是...被设定为携带柯蒂斯·李梅的一些记忆...这样我就可以招待潜在的新兵了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I carry... a facsimile of his psyche. Some might call it "crude", but I prefer "refined". Sometimes these re-created thoughts bleed through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我带着...他灵魂的复制品。有些人可能会称之为“粗制”，但我更喜欢“精制”。有时，这些重新创造的想法会渗透进来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericBac_00012BDA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I recall my time as a young airman in the Army Air Corps... soaring through the air around March Field in a PT-3... it was pure ecstasy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我回忆起我在陆军航空队当年轻飞行员的时光...驾驶着一辆PT-3在马奇空军基地上空翱翔...这是最纯粹的喜悦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericBac_00012BDA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes this... troubles me. Fortunately, my desire to burn all living things overrides introspection. I burn dogs as therapy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时这...让我很困扰。幸运的是，我想烧掉所有生物的欲望压倒了内省，我把烧狗作为治疗方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericBac_00012BDA_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just want to clarify - you know you're a robot, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想澄清一下，你知道你是个机器人，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not all dogs, just strays. Best to assume they're rabid. No different from burning the homeless. Stop clutching your pearls, negative nancy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是所有的狗，只有流浪狗，最好假设他们得了狂犬病。这和烧死无家可归的人没什么区别，别大惊小怪的了，丧气包。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you burn dogs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你烧狗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... when I was commanding in Europe and struggled to fall asleep... I'd think about the time I rebuilt a Model T. What a time...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的...当我在欧洲指挥，难以入睡的时候...我就会想起我重建一辆T型车...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I still dream of that old car. I'd like to gather the tools and parts... and build it, piece by piece. Yes, that would be an accomplishment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我仍然梦想着那辆旧车。我想收集工具和零件...然后一点一点的建造它。是的，那将是一项成就。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericBac_00014DF2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything you'd like to accomplish here in the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在莫哈维有什么想要完成的事情吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Oh, you thought I was serious. No, I just want to burn dogs. Communists would be best, but dogs work in a pinch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？哦，你以为我是认真的。不，我只想烧狗，共产主义者最好，但狗在紧要关头也行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speaking of dogs, I heard a story so profane... so sacreligious... it could only have come from a truly damaged mind. An irreverent madman...
ESP.TRADUIT: 说到狗，我听过一个非常亵渎神灵的故事...如此虔诚...它只可能来自一个真正受损的心灵，一个无礼的疯子...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericBac_00014DF3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man told me that he met George Washington... and that he was a dog! A dog! Imagine that! The affront to our nation's majesty! Disgusting!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个人告诉我，他遇到了乔治·华盛顿...而他是一条狗！一条狗！想象一下！这是对我们国家威严的侮辱！真恶心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericBac_00014DF3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate to kill the messenger, but you better believe I set his shoes on fire right then and there. George Washington a dog...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想杀信使，但你最好相信我当场就把他的鞋子点着了。乔治·华盛顿是条狗...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericBac_00014DF3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might be able to help you build that car.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也许能帮你造那辆车。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got a problem with gnomes? You some kind of bigot? These proud, little bastards keep constant vigil. I talk to them when I'm lonely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对地精有意见吗？你是偏执狂吗？这些骄傲的小混蛋们一直在守夜，我孤独的时候就和他们聊天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000D1C9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just fucking with you. I like repairing them, putting them on display. Adds an air of eccentricity. I have a reputation to maintain, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟你开玩笑的。我喜欢修理它们，把它们展示出来，给人一种古怪的感觉。毕竟我要维护自己的声誉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000D1C9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Collectors will also dish out caps for customized gnomes. Nice little cottage industry that nets more than you'd think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收藏者也会为定制的地精支付瓶盖。不错的小家庭手工业，赚的比你想象的多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000D1C9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's with all the gnomes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些地精是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was abandoned and shot to shit when we found it on patrol... God, that's been over two decades ago. Not sure what happened, but it was empty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我们在巡逻时发现它时，它被遗弃了，已经被打烂了...天哪，那都是二十多年前的事了。不知道发生了什么，但里面是空的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000DA58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After my discharge I wanted to be far away from governments or people in general, so I gathered up supplies and headed up here. Still empty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我退伍后，我想远离政府或一般人，所以我收集了补给，来到这里。还是空的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000DA58_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Took more than a little elbow grease but I got it fixed up. Trading with Mojo helped a lot. Tobacco's profitable. I do all right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 费了一番周折，总算修好了。与莫乔进行交易帮助很大，烟草是有利可图的，我做得还行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000DA58_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you end up out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么会跑到这里来？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I'm not sure what you've heard, but I was with the Desert Rangers. Grew up in Shady Sands, if you can believe it. Hated it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我不知道你听说了什么，但我曾经是沙漠游骑兵。你能相信吗，我是在沙荫镇长大的。厌恶它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000D1CA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My older brother was the smart one. Affable. I was wild... hated city life... the attachments... the expectations. Ran off when I was sixteen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我哥哥比较聪明，和蔼可亲。我很疯狂...讨厌城市生活...附带...的期望。我十六岁的时候就离家出走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000D1CA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard stories about the Desert Rangers, so I headed out here and joined up with Tom Gallagher's unit. Great man, learned a lot from him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说了沙漠游骑兵的事，所以我来到这里加入了汤姆·加拉格尔的部队。伟大的人，从他身上学到了很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000D1CA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spent almost twenty years with my unit. We were a family. Then... then there was the Unification Treaty. And that was that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我的部队待了将近二十年，我们是一个家庭。然后...然后是统一条约，就是这样了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000D1CA_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mentioned a patrol - you were in the military?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提到过巡逻，你在军队服役过？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Took an oath and changed teams, that's what happened. Old units and organization died, got absorbed by NCR. We assimilated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 宣誓，换队，这就是发生的事。旧的单位和组织消亡，被NCR吸收，我们被同化了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000D1CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make no mistake - NCR Rangers are solid. Most are locked on. It's the bigger organization that fucks everything up. They kept us on a leash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别搞错了，NCR的游骑兵是可靠的，大多数都很忠诚了。是更大的组织搞砸了一切，他们把我们束缚住了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000D1CB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Field grades and sergeants major who stick their dicks in everything, care more about evaluations and grooming standards than winning wars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 校官和军士长什么都管，他们更关心评估和仪装标准，而不是赢得战争。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000D1CB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even with all the fuckery... Desert Rangers always distinguished themselves. Uniform changed, but the ethos remained. We fight to win.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使有那么多操蛋的...沙漠游骑兵总是出类拔萃。制服变了，但精神仍在，我们为赢得胜利而战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000D1CB_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened after the Unification Treaty?
ESP.TRADUIT: 统一条约之后发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My contract ended not long after Boulder City. That... well, I wasn't sure if I was going to stay in or get out, but NCR... well, I was done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的合同在巨石城后不久就结束了。那...嗯，我不确定我是要留下来还是出去，但是NCR...好吧，我受够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000D1CC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's hard to describe the... soul-crushing stupidity... shit, the sadism... that comes with some leaders. Boulder City, uh... well, it broke me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很难描述...令人窒息的愚蠢...可恶，施虐狂...这是一些领导人的特点。巨石城，呃...嗯，让我崩溃了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000D1CC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why'd you get out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要离开？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to talk about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想再说这个了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000D1D0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened at Boulder City?
ESP.TRADUIT: 巨石城发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was, uh... dealing with that... and my wife miscarried. Requested leave to spend time with her. Denied. Went up the chain. Denied again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，呃...处理这个...我妻子流产了。请求请假陪她，拒绝，找更高层，再次拒绝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000E6BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I, uh... well, I assaulted an officer. When you crush a major's eye socket, your career prospects go downhill fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，呃...嗯，我袭击了一名军官。当你弄伤了一个少校的眼窝，你的职业前景就会急转直下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000E6BB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Miracle I didn't end up in the joint. Guess it would've been bad optics to lock me up after Boulder City. Psych discharge came soon after.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没进监狱真是个奇迹，我猜在巨石城之后把我关起来会很难看。不久后，我就因精神问题退伍了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000E6BB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mentioned you left the service after Boulder City. What happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你在巨石城之后就离开了，发生什么事了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assuming we set things straight with Bellek... I'll leave it up to Michael. He seems like a good kid. Better than I was at that age.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们能把和贝莱克的事解决掉的话...让迈克尔来决定吧。他看起来是个好孩子，比我在那个年纪的时候好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000D5F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I, uh... not sure what kind of life I can give him here, but I'll teach him how to survive. Wasteland is chaotic, and it's best to be prepared.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，呃...不知道在这里能给他什么样的生活，但我会教他如何生存。废土一片混乱，最好做好准备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000D5F5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Imagine he'll have to look over his shoulder for a good while after this, anyway. Wouldn't bet on him staying safe back in California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想象一下，不管怎样，在这之后的一段时间里，他将不得不小心翼翼。我不敢打赌他会安全回到加州。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericBac_0000D5F5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's going to happen to Michael when this is over?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这事结束后迈克尔会怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Molly in your tongue. I will not speak my true name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就叫莫莉吧，我不会说出我的真名的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetGenericBac_00008CF6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你叫什么名字？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bear soldiers destroy village, kill men and boys. Move us to res-station. Bear man says, "Endeavor to perservere." I thought about this for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 熊兵破坏村庄，杀害男人和男孩，带我们去休息站。熊人说：“努力坚持。”我想了一会儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetGenericBac_00008D03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After I thought about it long enough, I leave and meet Viper chief. He say, "Join and kill Bear soldiers." I join Vipers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想了很久之后，我离开了，去见毒蛇帮首领。他说“加入并杀死熊士兵”，我加入了毒蛇帮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetGenericBac_00008D03_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you end up with the Vipers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么会跟毒蛇帮在一起？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Family? You mean tribe? No, they run, join other tribes. Many go south to big desert. Help Bull men fight Bear soldiers. Many die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 家人？你的意思是部落？没了，他们跑，加入其他部落。许多人去了南方的大沙漠，帮助牛人与熊士兵作战，很多人死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My parents and brothers all killed when Bear soldiers attack, move us. Some from bullets, others from sickness. I am last of my kin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的父母和兄弟都死于熊士兵的袭击，转移我们，有的死于子弹，有的死于疾病。我是我最后的亲人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD0E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any family left?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有家人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cliffhounds. We live in hills outside Bullhead. Herd bighorners, fight for Spirit Mountain with our enemy, Claws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬崖猎犬，我们住在布尔海德外的山上。放牧大角羊，与我们的敌人利爪部落争夺仙山。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Claws worship Deathclaw. Drink blood, wear claws. Fierce enemy. We kill many, eat them. Gain strength of Deathclaw from their flesh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 利爪崇拜死亡爪，喝血，佩戴爪子，凶猛的敌人。我们杀了很多人，吃掉他们，从他们的肉体中获得死亡爪的力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD19_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was your tribe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的部落叫什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I not think about tomorrow. Only today. If I must think... I like to have family. Before I sleep, I feel tired of fighting, want peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不去想明天，只有今天。如果非要让我想想的话...我喜欢有家庭。睡觉前，我厌倦了战斗，想要平静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD0D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But then I remember the blood of my family... and my heart burns with revenge. I will give birth to warriors... and they will take Bear scalps!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我想起了我家人的血...我的心燃烧着复仇之火。我将生下勇士...他们会拿走熊的头皮！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD0D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem wise. What you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来聪明，你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD0D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will you do after you've paid your life-debt?
ESP.TRADUIT: 偿清人生债务后，你会做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I, uh... I was part of a team. A, uh... a fact-finding mission. We went deep into the tunnels, got swarmed by ferals... then trapped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，呃...我是一个团队的一员。一个，呃...一个调查团。我们深入隧道，被狂尸鬼包围了...然后被困住了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clung to life... transformed... then limped my way here. Enough supplies to last me a hundred lifetimes. It's cozy enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸存下来...转变了...然后一瘸一拐地来到这里。足够我用一百辈子的物资，够舒适的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Little slice of heaven for a loner like me. Managed to build a library over the years by trading. Get a lot of reading done. Time enough at last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像我这样的孤独者的一片小天堂。多年来靠贸易建立了一座图书馆，完成大量阅读，时间终于够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you end up in here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么会在这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sort of fell into it, I guess. I like travelling to new places and meeting folks, hearing their stories. See, each trip is a new story unto itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是有点陷入其中了。我喜欢去新的地方旅行，结识新朋友，听他们的故事。看，每次旅行都是一个新的故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericBac_00009E0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing like seeing the dawn over some high country... light peeking through pines on the mountains... like witnessing the world born anew.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么比在高地上看到黎明更好的了...阳光透过山上的松树照进来...就像见证世界的新生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericBac_00009E0F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get me wrong... there's the shitty parts... raiders, taxes, bad weather... but nothing else I'd rather be doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别误会我的意思...有一些糟糕的部分...掠夺者、税收、恶劣天气...但我也不想做别的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericBac_00009E0F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you end up running caravans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么经营商队的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately not. Crimson Caravan owns my soul... at least for a few more months and then my contract expires. Then it's decision time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，不。深红商队拥有我的灵魂...至少得再干几个月，然后我的合同就到期了。接下来就是做决定的时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericBac_00009E10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got a tidy sum stashed in the bank back in Shady Sands. Thought of taking it up to Klamath and setting up a company with my Uncle Art.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在沙荫镇的银行里存了一大笔钱，我想把它带到克拉马斯和我叔叔阿特一起成立一家公司。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericBac_00009E10_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's just... well, I ain't keen on taking big chances. Could stand to lose everything. I ain't sure about what to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是...好吧，我可不想冒太大的险，可能会失去一切。我不知道该怎么办。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericBac_00009E10_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you independent?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是独立的吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell, Barf found me. I was camped out on 95, just south of Mercury. Weird place, never liked that route. Lots of... rumors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼，是吐吐找到了我。我在95号公路上露营，就在墨丘利以南。奇怪的地方，我从来不喜欢那条路线，有很多...传言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericBac_00009E17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, me and Sugar Tits are conversing about life and stargazing when all the sudden... the entire sky gets lit up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我和奶嘴正在谈论生活和观星，突然...整个天空都被点亮了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericBac_00009E17_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm telling you, I ain't never seen anything like it. Giant lights zigging and zagging across the whole thing, bright as the sun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟你说，我从没见过这样的事。巨大的灯光曲折地穿过整个建筑，明亮得像太阳！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericBac_00009E17_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not too proud to admit that I straight pissed myself then and there! Thought for sure it was demons about to collect our souls!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太骄傲的承认我当时当场就尿裤子了！我还以为是恶魔要收集我们的灵魂呢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericBac_00009E17_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to ask - how did you find Barf?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不得不问，你是怎么找到吐吐的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was praying in a puddle of piss, sure that my time was up... and then it suddenly stopped. No lights, no sound, nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在一滩尿里祈祷，确信我的时间到了...然后突然停止了。没有灯光，没有声音，什么都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericBac_00010EAA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A couple minutes later this strange dog just trots up into the campsite, friendly as can be. Sat right by me and promptly vomited up a shoe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几分钟后，这只陌生的狗小跑着来到营地，非常友好。坐在我旁边，立刻吐在一只鞋上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericBac_00010EAA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not sure if they're connected, but I'm grateful Barf walked into my life. He's the best dog I've ever had... minus the digestive issues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不确定他们之间是否有联系，但我很感激吐吐走进了我的生活。他是我养过的最好的狗...除了消化问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericBac_00010EAA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Luck of the draw. Got reassigned to investigations after my last deployment on the river. Worked under Ranger Hugo for a spell beforehand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 全靠运气。在河上调防结束之后就被调去调查了，之前在游骑兵雨果手下工作过一段时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was something of a mentor. Been alive longer than anyone I know... definitely has a code, and boy does he stick to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他算是我的导师，比我认识的所有人都活得久...他肯定有自己的准则，而且他一直遵守着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD28_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's easy to be cynical when you see the waste and stupidity on the line. Hugo... well, he taught me to believe in NCR again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你看到这条线上的浪费和愚蠢时，很容易愤世嫉俗。雨果...他让我再次相信NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD28_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you end up running this investigation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么接手这个调查的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Came up in a little village named Bestville. Pretty good, as towns go. Saw something as a kid, though. It, uh... it changed me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我出生在一个叫贝斯特维尔的小村庄，就城镇而言，还算不错。不过小时候看到过一些东西，那，呃...改变了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'd had a rash of break-ins and thievery in town, everyone was on edge. Pretty soon the town worked themselves into a frenzy, formed a mob.
ESP.TRADUIT: 镇上发生了一连串的入室盗窃事件，每个人都很紧张。很快整个小镇都陷入了疯狂，形成了一群暴民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD29_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They convinced themselves the town drunk was behind it all. They dragged him through the streets and hung him in front of the sheriff's office.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说服自己这一切都是那个镇上的酒鬼干的。他们拖着他穿过街道，吊在警长办公室的前面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD29_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seeing a mob... how quickly it turned... it stayed with me. I never want to be on the side of a mob again. Law is what makes this republic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲眼见过暴民...那种瞬间失控...一直萦绕着我。我再也不想跟暴民为伍了，法律才是共和国的根基。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD29_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lied about my age and signed up early, volunteered for Ranger. Took three attempts but I got through selection... eventually. Well worth it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谎报年龄，提前入伍，志愿加入游骑兵。虽然试了三次，但还是通过了选拔...最终，非常值得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD29_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What made you join the Rangers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要加入游骑兵？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good times all around. Ambushes, indirect fire, snipers, shitty patrols that amounted to fuck-nothing. We're bleeding down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 美好的时光无处不在。伏击、间接火力、狙击手、屁用没有的巡逻。我们在流血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD2A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion is also stretched thin, but they're smarter. Learned from their mistakes down there... hard to find, hard to kill. Lot of hit and run.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团也捉襟见肘，但他们更聪明。从他们的错误中吸取了教训...难找，难杀，打了就跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD2A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're also better with the tribals, forming alliances. Didn't help that Kimball took a giant shit on them back when he "pacified" Bullhead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们也更擅长与部落合作，结成联盟。金博尔“平定”布尔海德的时候狠狠揍了他们一顿也没帮上忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD2A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened on your deployment to the river?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你被派去河边的时候发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Better leadership. We have more troops and raw firepower, but Legion won't engage unless it's... tactically advantageous. We never see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更好的领导。我们有更多的军队和原始火力，但军团不会交战，除非...战术上有利，我们从没见过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD2B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meanwhile, our leaders are either indecisive or too aggressive for their own good. Dumbass butter bars march patrols right into ambushes, get smoked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与此同时，我们的领导人要么优柔寡断，要么为了自己的利益过于激进。傻逼少尉们让巡逻队进入伏击区，被干掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD2B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion has torture down to an art, too. Leave mutilated prisoners for us to find. You could say it has a detrimental effect on morale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团也把折磨变成了一门艺术，留下残缺不全的囚犯让我们去找。你可以说这对士气有不利影响。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD2B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What makes the Legion so effective down there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么让军团在那里那么能打？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Partner, if I manage to nail Jason Bellek I can die happy. They'll probably ship me to Baja as "reward". Reckon I'll go back to the line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搭档，如果我能抓住杰森·贝莱克，我就能幸福的死去。他们可能会把我送去巴哈作为“奖励”，我想我还是回前线吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD2C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fun fact of the military... just when you get comfortable somewhere, get really good at your job... that's when they whisk you away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军队的有趣事实是...当你在某个地方感到舒适，在工作中表现得很好时...他们就会把你带走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD2C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Way I see it... I'm in it for the long haul. I'll play the hand I'm dealt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 依我看...我要做长期的打算。我有什么牌就打什么牌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000CD2C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you going to do after all this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 经历了这一切之后，你打算做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My tour ended... on a bad note. I was well on my way to getting an admin discharge, seen as damaged goods by my command team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的任职期结束了...情况很糟糕。被我的指挥小组视为损坏物品，很快就会被行政开除，。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000F8FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was, uh... well, a shitty situation, with no one left in my corner. I was a hair away from ending up on the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是，呃...情况很糟糕，没人站在我这边。我差一点就会流落街头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_0000F8FE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you end up working for Ranger Hugo?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么会为游骑兵雨果工作？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because he lives it. Man never bends or breaks for anyone. Joined up way back in Tandi's time, been true blue ever since.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为他就是这样生活的，人从不为任何人俯首或屈服。早在坦蒂的时代就加入了，从那以后就一直坚定不移。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_00012752_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hugo set the example, taught me that adhering to a code... helping people and upholding the ideals of NCR... it isn't just lip service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雨果树立了榜样，教会我遵守准则...帮助人们，维护NCR的理想...这不仅仅是说说而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're more than a collection of selfish individuals. We're a nation of free people. You put yourself aside and look to those around you. That's it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不仅仅是一群自私的人，我们是一个由自由人民组成的国家。你把自己放在一边，看看你周围的人。就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericBac_00012752_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did Hugo convince you to believe in NCR again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 雨果是怎么说服你再次相信NCR的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shady Sands. I miss it. We had a big house. Lots of books. It was safe. I miss my friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沙荫镇。我想念它，我们有一所大房子，很多书，很安全。我想念我的朋友们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetGenericBac_00004B77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where did your family live... before all this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的家人住在哪里...在这之前？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My mama was nice. She made cookies and would help me with homework. I couldn't read good at first. She helped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我妈妈很好。她会做饼干，还会帮我做家庭作业。一开始我阅读不好，她帮了忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetGenericBac_00004B78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you get along with your family?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和你的家人相处得好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really. Papa liked my brother, Jack. Jack could talk good. Papa was mad a lot and yelled. Said I was slow. I kept to myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算不上好。爸爸喜欢我哥哥杰克，杰克很会说话，爸爸很生气，大喊大叫，说我迟钝。我一个人呆着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetGenericBac_00004B79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about your father?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你爸爸呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would hide and read. I like books more than people. Do you like books?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会躲起来看书，比起人，我更喜欢书。你喜欢书吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetGenericBac_00004B7A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean, kept to yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么意思，一个人呆着？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We get enough to keep the lights on, not much else. Lots of ramblin' men, cold hearts and long gone daddies passing through. We manage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的钱只够维持照明，其他的就不多了。到处都是流浪的男人，冷漠的心和早已逝去的父亲。凑合过吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hank [02010EC2] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetGenericBac_00011E6C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you get a lot of business?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有很多生意吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am Wolf's long-time assistant. My mission here is to assist with customer service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是沃尔夫的长期助手，我的任务是协助客户服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapSt_aaDetGenericBac_00017E38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Baking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 烘焙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapSt_aaDetGenericBac_00017E39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you do before this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这之前你是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. Here, have a warm apple pie on the house.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。来，免费送你一个热苹果派。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapSt_aaDetGenericBac_00017E3A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Just baking?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？只是烘焙？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's not a person, and don't you ever forget it. Whatever he says, whatever he does... he's just a jumble of metal, wires and code. A weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不是人，别忘了这一点。不管他说什么，做什么...他只是一堆金属，电线和代码，一件武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericSto_0002ABB4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever happens here, you remember something - don't trust him. I remember what they did in the war... the machines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管发生了什么，你一定记得，别相信他。我记得他们在战争中做了什么...这些机器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericSto_0002ABB4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That model, "General LeMay"? Pretty sure he fried Chinese POWs en masse. Men should kill men, not machines. It goes against nature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个模型，“李梅将军”？他肯定把中国战俘都炸了。人应该由人来杀，而不是机器，这是违背自然规律的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericSto_0002ABB4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you dislike LeMay so much?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么这么不喜欢李梅？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. You curious about anything in particular?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。你有什么特别好奇的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericSto_0001D851_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard any rumors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么传言吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. What kind of rumors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧。哪种传言？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericSto_0001D854_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard any rumors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么传言吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I reckon that depends on the rumor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想那要看传言了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericSto_0001D855_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard any rumors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么传言吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Up and running? Running? We're flying, sport! Flying! Business is booming, demand right past the stalactites! Makes me want to dance!
ESP.TRADUIT: 开始运营？运营？我们在飞，老兄！飞起来了！生意兴隆，供不应求！让我想要跳舞！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetGenericSto_0001D476_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He dances for several moments from sheer jubilation.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他欣喜若狂的跳了一会儿舞]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, you should've seen my in my youth! I could cut a rug, sport! Say, here's a little something for all your help. You're always welcome here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你应该看看我年轻时的样子！我可以跳摇摆舞，小子！对了，给你点小礼物，感谢你的帮助。这里永远欢迎你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetGenericSto_0001D476_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like your shop is up and running.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你的店已经开始运营了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just a jumped-up thug who runs some of the hob... indigents down in Moleville. At least that's what the locals tell me. I'm not worried about him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只不过是一个搞帮派的暴发户...莫尔维尔的穷逼，至少当地人是这么跟我说的。我不担心他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericSto_0001AA62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used to take to beating and cussing homeless people, but eventually I saw the error of my ways. Now I aim to be... philanthropic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我过去常常打骂无家可归的人，但最终我发现自己的做法是错误的。现在我的目标是...慈善。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericSto_0001AA62_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you know about Loco?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对洛科了解多少？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's in a shanty town in the sewer system. A lot of the local thugs hang out down there. Sometimes they get organized... some might say uppity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在一个棚户区的下水道系统里。很多当地的暴徒都在那里出没，有时他们会组织起来...有些人可能会说是自大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericSto_0001AA63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once met a man who hated homeless folks more than I used to, and that's saying something. Quite a talker. Not sure what happened to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 曾经遇到过一个以前的我更讨厌流浪汉的人，这就说明了一些问题。挺健谈的，不知道他发生了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericSto_0001AA63_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's Moleville?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫尔维尔是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was intemperate in my youth. Whiskey was a factor... chems as well. Did things... well, things I'm ashamed of. Changed my ways, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我年轻时非常放纵。威士忌是一个因素...化学药物也是。做过的事情...呃，那些我感到羞耻的事情，嗯，改变了我的生活方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericSto_0001AA64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I get the impression you have a violent past. What did you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你有一段暴力的过去。你做什么了?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides getting old? Losing my friends. There was love... too briefly, though. But being a bad man weighs heavy on you after a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了变老之外？失去朋友，有爱...不过，时间太短了。但一段时间后，做一个坏人会给你带来沉重的负担。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericSto_0001AA65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At some point you get tired of hurting people. It gets lonely. Now I get to make friends, help a community. I'm happy here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在某些时候，你会厌倦伤害别人，这会变得孤独。现在我可以结交朋友，帮助社区。我在这里很开心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericSto_0001AA65_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What made you change your ways?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么让你改变了你的生活方式？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I pretty much killed them all. It was a while ago, too... never in one place, either. Travelled and saw things you can't imagine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不会，我差不多把他们都杀了，也是一段时间以前...也从不在一个地方。四处旅行，看到了你无法想象的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericSto_0001AA66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you worried about people from your past catching up with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你担心以前的人会来找你麻烦吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got clean and I went looking for work. Not as spry when I'm not on the juice, needed something steady, stable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 戒毒之后我就去找工作了。我不嗑药的时候就没那么活跃了，我需要一些稳定的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sheriff Mackenzie [0201D421] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001D467_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard Loco and the other toughs got cleaned out, figured I'd look around. Ran into some old friends and got myself elected.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说洛科和其他恶棍被干掉了，我就想去看看。碰到了一些老朋友，我就当选了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sheriff Mackenzie [0201D421] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001D467_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you end up down here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么会到这里来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy work, all in all. Damn sight better than chasing after bugs. Deal with drunks or a few crazies every now and then, nothing too bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总而言之，这工作很容易，比追虫子好多了。偶尔对付一下醉汉或者几个疯子，没什么大不了的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sheriff Mackenzie [0201D421] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001D46B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoever put that hurting on Loco sure as hell put the fear of God in these bums, cause they're on the straight and narrow now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管是谁伤害了洛科，肯定是让这些流浪汉对上帝感到恐惧，因为他们现在已经遵纪守法了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sheriff Mackenzie [0201D421] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001D46B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you like it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: One hundred percent, thanks to the Followers. God bless them. I broke down, got the shakes, started screaming at demons. They had to tie me down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 百分之百，感谢天启追随者，愿上帝保佑他们。我崩溃了，浑身发抖，开始对着恶魔尖叫，他们不得不把我绑起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sheriff Mackenzie [0201D421] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001D46D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got through it, though. Little doses of Fixer eased me through it. Feels good, but damn if time hasn't caught up with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过还是熬过来了，小剂量的瘾头解帮我度过了难关。感觉不错，但该死的是时间也追上来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sheriff Mackenzie [0201D421] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001D46D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're completely clean now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你现在完全不吸毒了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything. Hurts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 全部，很疼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sheriff Mackenzie [0201D421] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001D46E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All them old injuries that I shrugged off in the past? I can sure as shit feel them now. Back, knees, elbows... shit, even my eyes hurt! My eyes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些我过去不屑一顾的旧伤？我现在能感觉到它们了。背部、膝盖、手肘...妈的，连我的眼睛都疼！我的眼睛！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sheriff Mackenzie [0201D421] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001D46E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the other hand, I don't hallucinate, piss myself or talk to ghosts anymore. Probably for the best. I manage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一方面，我不再产生幻觉，小便失禁，也不再和鬼魂说话了。这可能是最好的，我能应付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sheriff Mackenzie [0201D421] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001D46E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How does it feel to be off nectar?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不喝蜜露的感觉如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog was in a pretty bad state himself, had gotten chewed up by them strays in the sewers. Doctor Yet got him patched up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那只狗自己的情况也很糟糕，在下水道里被流浪狗咬伤了。医生给它包扎了伤口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sheriff Mackenzie [0201D421] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001D837_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess you could say we bonded in our convalescence. We just sort of stuck together after I got clean. He followed me right on down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以说我们在康复期间建立了联系，我戒了毒之后我们就在一起了。它一直跟着我来到了这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sheriff Mackenzie [0201D421] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001D837_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No dog of mine is gonna be a freeloader, so I put him to work as a deputy. Real useful, seeing as to how I can't outrun nobody now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的狗可不能吃白食，所以我让它当了副警长。真的很有用，因为我现在已经跑不过任何人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sheriff Mackenzie [0201D421] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001D837_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see you have a deputy. How did that happen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到你有个副手，这是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, most of us can defend ourselves. We'd rather avoid fighting, though. Best to reach the mountains without drawing attention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我们大多数人都能保护自己。不过，我们宁愿避免战斗，最好在不引人注意的情况下到达山区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001303C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thistle is with child. The last thing we want is to get involved in something that could get her hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希斯尔怀孕了，我们最不希望的就是卷入可能会伤害到她的事情中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001303C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can any of you fight?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们有谁会战斗吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, but I'm not sure if the child is mine, actually. She was owned by a decanus, Cultellus. He was a cruel master... took advantage of her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，但我不确定这孩子是不是我的。她的主人是什长库尔特卢斯，他是一个残忍的主人...占有了她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001303D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoever the father is, I'll raise the child as my own. He'll be free... and he'll be loved. We'll make a good life in the mountains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管孩子的父亲是谁，我都会把他当成自己的孩子来抚养。他会是自由的...他会被爱，我们在山里会过得很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001303D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations on becoming a father.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜你当爸爸了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny story... I wandered around a bit, got jumped by some hoodlums and then ended up with the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣的故事...我四处游荡，被一些暴徒袭击，最后加入了天启追随者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001CB16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somebody came in saying that the grim reaper himself had cleaned out the bad element in Moleville. Said it was respectable again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人进来说，死神亲自肃清了莫尔维尔的坏分子。现在那地界重归正道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001CB16_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also said the bartender, wait staff and dishwashers were all killed by some mad gunman, so there were jobs aplenty. Figured I'd give it a shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还说酒保，服务员和洗碗工都被某个疯狂的枪手杀死了，所以工作机会很多。我觉得我应该试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001CB16_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you end up working down here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么到这里来工作的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ample booze and polite clients, so not too bad. Here's to peace and prosperity in Freeside!
ESP.TRADUIT: 酒水充足，客人彬彬有礼，还不错。为自由城的和平与繁荣干杯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericSto_0001CB17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He produces a half-empty bottle of whiskey and proceeds to gulp down every remaining drop.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他拿出半瓶威士忌，把剩下的每一滴都喝光了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you like it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thoughts? I think these Rampart bastards are going to get sent back home screaming for their mothers! I'll boil the flesh right off their bodies!
ESP.TRADUIT: 想法？我想这些壁垒杂种会被送回家，尖叫着找他们的母亲！我要把他们身上的肉煮了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericSto_00011E86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard they might have robots. Good... good. I'll melt those clunky shitwagons down to hot slag. Amateurs!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说他们可能会有机器人。很好...很好，我要把那些笨重的破车熔成渣，一帮业余的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericSto_00011E86_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have any thoughts about the coming fight?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对即将到来的战斗有什么想法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm coming with you. Charles mandated it, and he's my designated owner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和你一起去。是查理斯授权的，他是我指定的主人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericSto_00011E88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you going to do now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在有什么打算？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ready as we're going to be. If it comes to that... hopefully we hurt them so bad they decide it ain't worth it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经准备好了。如果到了那个地步...希望我们能伤到他们，让他们觉得不值得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericSto_0000F8F9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not my first rodeo... suspect it ain't yours, either. Fought mercs before, up north. Local warlord hired some boys to help him "control labor".
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我第一次参加竞技...我怀疑你也不是。以前在北方跟雇佣兵打过仗，当地的军阀雇佣了一些男孩来帮助他“支配劳动力”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericSto_0000F8F9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was slavery by another name, working people to death in mines. We cleaned those fuckers out, freed the town. I was... proud.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是另一种形式的奴隶制，让人们在矿井里劳作至死。我们收拾了那些混蛋，解放了小镇。我...感到骄傲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericSto_0000F8F9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's been a long time since I felt anything resembling pride. All I want is to keep Michael safe. He's my last connection to family... to life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经很久没有感到骄傲了，我只想保证迈克尔的安全。他是我与家人的最后联系...生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericSto_0000F8F9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think we're ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我们准备好了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. He needs me... and I need him. I've been hiding from the world up here, building myself up as some mad hermit. A little truth to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他需要我...我也需要他。我一直远离尘嚣，把自己塑造成一个疯狂的隐士。一点事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericSto_0000F8FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't think I'd ever be fit to work with people again... to have someone depend on me. Crazy is a luxury I can't afford now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为我再也不适合和别人一起工作了...没有人会依赖我。疯狂是我现在负担不起的奢侈品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericSto_0000F8FA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a good kid... been through a lot. I just want to help him survive out here... to give him a fighting chance if things fall apart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个好孩子...经历了很多。我只是想帮他在这里生存下去...如果事情搞砸了，给他一个抗争的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericSto_0000F8FA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're going to look after Michael?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你会照顾迈克尔？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right. NCR is a facade now, spread too thin and rotted out. Legion is a storm that will pass. The world will get smaller.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错。NCR现在只是一个门面，铺开得太薄，已经腐烂了，军团是一场终将过去的风暴。世界会变得越来越小。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericSto_0000F8FB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just hope that Vegas holds out... an island of civilization if it gets really bad out here again. We'll need to be strong if the worst unfolds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只希望维加斯能撑下去...如果这里的情况再次恶化，那里就是文明之岛。如果最坏的情况出现，我们需要坚强起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericSto_0000F8FB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If things fall apart?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果事情搞砸了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I live or I die. Gods decide, not me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要么活，要么死。诸神决定，不是我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetGenericSto_00011E5B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good chance we'll be fighting tomorrow. You ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们明天很有可能开战。你准备好了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only thing to fear is dishonor. I cut out my own heart and eat it before I show fear to enemy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一值得害怕的就是耻辱。我宁愿挖出自己的心吃掉，也不向敌人展示恐惧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetGenericSto_00011E5C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not worried?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不担心吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My nights will be good after I have tasted enemy heart and have a strong man in same bed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我尝过敌人的心，和一个强壮的男人同床共枕之后，我的夜晚会很美好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetGenericSto_00011E5D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good night, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那晚安。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I would break you. Good night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我会击垮你的。晚安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetGenericSto_00011E5E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that an invitation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是邀请吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a National Guard Armory before the war. Ended up being used to store items like food, fuel and other supplies. Lot of stuff down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战前是国民警卫队的军械库，最终被用来储存食物、燃料和其他物资。这里有很多东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I make small, controlled runs to Ghouldom to trade... well, I used to. I'm happy to trade with you, but don't tell anyone about this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有节制地去古尔多姆进行小额贸易...嗯，我曾经是。我很乐意和你交易，但别把这地方告诉任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fellah told me that some scabby ex-raiders are starting up a commune north of town, some place called Saddle Mountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 朋友告诉我，一些肮脏的前掠夺者在城北建立了一个公社，一个叫马鞍山的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'll probably get hungry and give up, move back to civilization. That's how it usually goes, unless they're some diehard cult.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们可能会因为饥饿而放弃，回到文明社会。通常都是这样，除非他们是什么死硬的邪教。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A01_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A good cult can thrive in the worst places, provided the leader doesn't go full pervert. That always dooms it. Chem cults are the best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个好的邪教可以在最糟糕的地方茁壮成长，只要其领袖没有完全堕落。这总是注定要失败的，毒品邪教是最好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A01_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard any rumors in your travels?
ESP.TRADUIT: 旅行中听到过什么传闻吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard there's a lot of cheap real estate since homesteaders are abandoning plots on the frontier. I'd be wary of such offers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说自从自耕农放弃了边境的土地，这里有很多便宜的房产。我对这样的提议持谨慎态度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man comes offering me a house on the cheap, I just assume it's falling apart or surrounded by raiders, hungry critters or other mayhem. No, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人向我提供了一栋便宜的房子，我只是假设它正在倒塌，或者被入侵者、饥饿的动物或其他混乱包围。不，先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A02_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, my home is on the open road, camped out with Barf and my brahmin. Wouldn't have it any other way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我的家在开阔的路上，和吐吐还有婆罗门牛一起露营。别无他法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A02_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other rumors to share?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么传闻可以分享吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone told me there's been flying craft swooping down and mutilating brahmin. Imagine the audacity... the barbarism! Demons!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人告诉我，有飞行器从天而降，残害婆罗门牛。想象一下这是多么的大胆...野蛮！恶魔!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Must be supernatural. Heard that fellah in Novac talk about commie ghosts, could be on to something. Of course they'd hate free grazing brahmin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一定是超自然现象，听说在诺瓦克有个家伙在谈论共产主义幽灵，可能有什么发现。他们当然讨厌自由放牧的婆罗门牛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A05_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other rumors to share?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么传闻可以分享吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: People talk all manner of yap about the Divide, I ain't sure what to believe... except I damn sure won't go near it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大家都在说大裂谷各种各样的情况，我都不知道该相信什么了...但我绝对不会靠近它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did hear one interesting tidbit, though... word has it that a group of mutants have started up some sort of commune on the outskirts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我听到了一个有趣的小消息...听说一群变种人在郊区建立了某种公社。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A06_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The wild part... is that they all volunteer to fight critters in the Divide. Oh, and they make some kind of "Tunneler Stew". Disgusting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狂野的部分...就是他们都自愿去大裂谷和怪物战斗。对了，他们还做了一种“掘穴者炖肉”。真恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A06_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other rumors to share?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么传闻可以分享吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently there's an underground boxing tournament supposed to be coming to town. Has a funny name, can't remember it. Very mysterious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说镇上要举办一场地下拳击比赛。名字很搞笑，想不起来了。非常神秘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lot of money at stake, supposedly have fighters from all over the wasteland headed this way to take part. Even spectating costs big bucks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这事关大笔资金，据说有来自废土各地的战士来此参加战斗。即使是观战也要花很多钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A07_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'll steer clear of that nonsense. Sounds like big trouble in a little town, all to see who's the best of the best kickboxer in a bloodsport.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不会说那些废话的。听起来是个小镇上的大麻烦，就为了看谁是血腥运动中最厉害的自由搏击手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A07_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other rumors to share?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么传闻可以分享吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: James Kidd was set to hang down in Hartville, but his gang busted him out of the jail. Killed the sheriff and half the deputies in the process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 詹姆斯·基德本来要在赫特维尔被绞死，但他的帮派把他从监狱里救了出来。在这个过程中杀了警长和一半的副手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They should hang that bastard twice for all the hurt he's put on caravans down south. Goddamn menace to civilization!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们应该把那混蛋绞死两次，因为他害了那么多南方商队的人。他妈的文明的威胁！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A08_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just hope they can find him and get his happy ass back in the noose. Bullet ain't good enough for scum like Kidd.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只希望他们能找到他，让他重新回到绞索上。对基德这样的人渣来说子弹不够。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A08_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other rumors to share?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么传闻可以分享吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of the NCR outposts down south, Camp Yankee... got overrun by Legion. Hear they killed all the men and enslaved the female troopers.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR在南方的一个前哨，扬基营地...被军团占领了。听说他们杀了所有的男人，奴役了女兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those poor gals... I'd like to think someone will get them back, but I imagine they'll be long forgotten with everything going on up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些可怜的姑娘们...我希望有人能把她们救回来，但我想，随着这里发生的一切，她们早就被遗忘了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A09_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other rumors to share?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么传闻可以分享吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard the tribals are acting up down by Davis Dam. Apparently they're upset about resettlement after Kimball's campaign in Bullhead years back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说部落在戴维斯大坝那边闹事了。显然他们对几年前金博尔在布尔海德竞选后的重新安置感到不满。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A0A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get me wrong, I sympathize... but they acted damn foolish when we laid claim down there. Place was too important to be left alone, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别误会，我很同情...但当我们宣布对那里拥有主权时，他们的行为太愚蠢了。毕竟，这个地方太重要了，不能放任不管。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A0A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell fire, Bullhead is too important to be left alone. If it weren't NCR it would've been Legion. Why can't they see that? Eh, don't matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼，布尔海德太重要了，不能放任不管。如果不是NCR，就会是军团，为什么他们看不出来？是吧，不重要了。
