ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A0A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other rumors to share?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么传闻可以分享吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk of a town up in the Sheep Range. Only thing up there is isolation and shitty weather. If they want to live up there, I say let 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说到绵羊牧场的一个小镇，那里只有与世隔绝和糟糕的天气。如果他们想住在那里，就让他们住吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A0B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what, though... if they was to get something going, I imagine the timber and mines could be valuable. Something to think about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我告诉你...如果他们要做点什么，我想木材和矿山可能会很有价值。值得思考的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A0B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other rumors to share?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么传闻可以分享吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lots of mayhem down south since that Quemedor fool died. Got a cult worshipping him down there, want to burn up the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从那个魁梅多傻瓜死后，南方发生了很多混乱。那里有一群崇拜他的信徒，想要烧毁整个世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A0C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to the good old days when cults were just about chems and orgies, huh? Why you gotta try to destroy stuff? Piss on that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以前的邪教都是些毒品和狂欢什么的，现在怎么这样样了？你为什么要破坏东西？去你的吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A0C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other rumors to share?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么传闻可以分享吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goliad is really taking off from what I hear. Only issue is whether or not they stay independent or go with NCR. We'll find out soon, I reckon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我所知，戈利亚德真的很成功，唯一的问题是他们是保持独立还是支持NCR。我想我们很快就会知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A0D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear it's something to see, though... warm sunrise over that valley, thick meadows of green grass by a clean lake. One day I'll see it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，听说很值得一看...温暖的日出从山谷中升起，清澈的湖边有茂密的草地。总有一天我会看到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_00009A0D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other rumors to share?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么传闻可以分享吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_0000FD23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you ever encounter Ulysses in your travels?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在旅途中遇到过尤利西斯吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_0000FD24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have any thoughts about him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对他有什么想法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericSto_0000FD25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're sure?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm right as rain, chief. Not my first scrap. Fought raiders down south, Legion on the river. Rampart is just another breed of asshole in my book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一切正常，这不是我第一次战斗了。南边的掠夺者，河上的军团，在我看来，壁垒只是另一种混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericSto_0000F8FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'll have firepower, better tactical sense than most Legion boys... but what they also have is a keen sense of self-preservation... and profit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们有强大的火力，比大多数军团的孩子更有战术意识...但他们也有一种强烈的自我保护...和利益意识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericSto_0000F8FC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we can whip 'em. Only question is whether or not we can convince Charlie to play ball. Man is... well, he's been through a lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们可以打败他们，唯一的问题是我们能否说服查理合作。那人...嗯，他经历了很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericSto_0000F8FC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are you holding up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还撑得住吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I do. Jason Bellek has enough wealth to buy Rampart outright, if he wanted. They're not leaving empty-handed. Sharp won't allow it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我觉得。杰森·贝勒克有足够的财富，如果他愿意，可以直接买下壁垒。他们不会空手而归，夏普不会允许的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericSto_0000F8FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: From everything I've heard about Sharp's work in Bullhead... he won't stop until the job's done, and the ends always justify the means.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从我听说的夏普在布尔海德的行为来看...他不完成任务是不会善罢甘休的，为了达到目的不择手段。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericSto_0000F8FD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really think we'll have to fight them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真觉得我们得和他们打一架吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just wanted to say thank you for not leaving me. I hope my uncle is nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想谢谢你没有离开我，我希望我的叔叔很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetGenericSto_00004B89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like you have a question. Spit it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好像有问题要问，快说吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Has any of your family died?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有家人去世了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetGenericSto_00008CE0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么心事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like it a lot. Uncle Chuck is helping me learn to shoot. Later he says he's gonna teach me how to blow up mannequins. It's not boring.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很喜欢。查克叔叔在教我学射击，之后他说他要教我怎么炸掉人体模型。这并不无聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetGenericSto_0000D5FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know I could be living here a long time. You seem pretty tough. How... how do I be more like you? To survive and be... good at stuff?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我可能会在这里住很长时间。你看起来挺厉害的，如何...我怎么才能更像你？生存下来并...擅长某件事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetGenericSto_0000D5FF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you like it here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得这里怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He shakes his head and wipes tears from his eyes. He is overwhelmed with emotion.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他摇了摇头，擦去了眼角的泪水。他激动得不知所措。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, son. I won't hurt you. Can you tell me what happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松点，孩子，我不会伤害你的。你能告诉我发生了什么事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nods and looks downward, his lips quivering. He repeatedly wipes his eyes with his shirt, unable to speak.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他点了点头，向下看，嘴唇颤抖着。他反复用衬衫擦眼睛，说不出话来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to help. You were part of that caravan, weren't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来帮忙的。你是那个商队的一员，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He shakes his head repeatedly and buries his head in his hands. He is utterly distraught.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他不停摇着头，双手捂着头。他完全心烦意乱。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak up, kid. I'm not a mind reader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大声点，孩子。我不会读心术。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nods and chokes back tears.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他点点头，强忍住泪水。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been hiding here for some time, haven't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里躲了一段时间了，是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He is confused by your response, but still terrified.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他对你的回答感到困惑，但仍然害怕。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kid, you're shit at hide and seek.
ESP.TRADUIT: 孩子，你躲猫猫玩得很烂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He eagerly accepts the water and gulps it down.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他急切的接过水，一饮而尽。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give Purified Water> Here, have some water.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给予纯净水>给，喝点水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [His eyes flood with tears and he stares at the ground.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他眼睛里充满了泪水，他凝视着地面。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: No visible injuries, but I know you're hurting on the inside. We'll get you help, son.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有明显的伤口，但我知道你内心受伤了。我们会帮你的，孩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [His mouth agape, he stares at you in disbelief for several moments. He is unable to process your remark as reality.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他张着嘴，难以置信的盯着你看了一会儿。他不能把你的话当作事实来接受。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I remember my first near-death experience. One day you'll look back on this and laugh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还记得我第一次濒死的经历。总有一天，当你回首往事时，你会开怀大笑的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nervously nods his head in acceptance.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他紧张的点点头表示接受。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get out of here. Stay close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们离开这里吧。跟紧点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nervously nods his head in agreement, but remains on guard. He looks poised to bolt at a moment's notice.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他紧张的点头表示同意，但仍然保持警惕。他似乎随时准备逃跑。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come with me to Goodsprings and we'll get you some food. Then we'll talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我去清泉镇，我们给你弄点吃的。然后我们再谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Wide-eyed with fear, he nods and backs away.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他惊恐的睁大了眼睛，点点头，往后退去。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Send him away> It's a hard-knock life out here, kid. Primm is that a-way.
ESP.TRADUIT: <把他打发走>这里的生活很艰苦，孩子。普瑞姆在那边。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He listens intently.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他专心的听着。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: No point waiting around here. I have a plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这儿等没意义。我有个计划。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [His eyes widen and his breathing picks up.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他睁大了眼睛，呼吸急促起来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you've been through a lot, but I'd like to ask you about the ambush.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你经历了很多，但我想问问你关于伏击的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He collects himself and then sheepishly nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他镇定下来，然后不好意思的点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, Michael. It's over. We need to get moving. I'm taking you to your relative's house.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松，迈克尔，都结束了。我们得走了，我带你去你亲戚家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It... it's my fault. They killed Aunt Fay because of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...这是我的错，他们因为我杀了费伊姨妈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelPro_00002965_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry you had to see that. We need to talk about our next move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉让你看到这个。我们得谈谈下一步的行动。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He handles the rifle with care and strokes the wooden stock. He appears nervous but eager to learn.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他小心翼翼的拿着步枪，抚摸着木枪托。他看起来很紧张，但渴望学习。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give rifle> Here, this is your rifle now. Take good care of it. Let's go outside and shoot.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给予步枪>给，这是你的步枪，好好保管它。我们出去射击吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He listens attentively.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他聚精会神的听着。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go over the basics. First, treat every weapon as if it were loaded...
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们回顾一下基础知识。首先，把每件武器都当成是上膛的...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. Can I ask you something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。我能问你件事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelPro_00004735_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Just be sure to maintain your weapon. Now let's get on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，一定要保养好你的武器。现在我们上路吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He listens attentively.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他聚精会神的听着。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about our next move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们谈谈下一步行动吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think so. Never been near a battle before. What's it like?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是吧。我从来没有接近过战场，是什么样的?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelPro_0001454E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you doing all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn supermutants! Found a caravan bushwacked south of town. Hear that, everyone? Muties at it again. Makes me sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的超级变种人！我们在城南找到了一个商队被袭击的地点。大家听到了吗？这些变种人又在干好事了，我恶心死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecBark_00001C72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boys, wet your whistles and then we'll head out, see if we can't track down those murdering bastards. You folks are welcome to join our posse, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟们，润润嗓子我们就出发，看看能不能揪出那些杀人的混蛋。也欢迎你们加入我们的队伍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: God, I fucking love pool. Parker, you play? Of course you don't, you undexterous savage. Jackson? No? Well, shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老天，我他妈爱死台球了，帕克，你会打吗？当然不会了，你这手不灵活的野蛮人。杰克逊？也不会？好吧，该死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: [His eyes suddenly widen and his entire body vibrates with fear. His pupils dart back and forth in the direction of the visitor's voice.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他的眼睛突然睁大，身体因恐惧而抖动。他将眼球迅速扫视着说话人的方向。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He trembles uncontrollably and begins to panic.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他无法控制的颤抖，开始恐慌。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Panicked breathing>
ESP.TRADUIT: <惊慌的呼吸>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He looks up at you with a sheepish, uncertain expression.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他带着一种羞愧和不确定的表情抬头看着你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He looks up at you with a sheepish, uncertain expression.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他带着一种羞愧和不确定的表情抬头看着你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I ask you something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能问你些问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFor_000055E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you should help her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你应该帮助她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFor_00008CA6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you grow up in a town like this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在这样的小镇长大的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFor_0000FDF8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're... they're all dead. You killed them all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们都...都死了。你把他们都杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFor_0000FE09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is it. Guess I won't be Michael Augen ever again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这。看来我再也不是迈克尔·奥根了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFor_0002F65F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to promise me something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你答应我一件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFor_0002F65F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nods and makes an effort to control his breathing.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他点点头，努力控制自己的呼吸。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Whisper softly> I understand. Play it cool, we'll get through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: <轻声说>我理解。冷静点，我们会熬过去的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He tries to speak but can't form the words. Tears spill from his eyes as he motions toward the visitor by the pool table.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他想说话，但想不出词来。当他颤巍巍指向台球桌旁的客人时，泪水从他的眼睛里流出来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Open your mouth and ar-tic-u-late. This is why I believe in corporal punishment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 张开嘴，说-清-楚，这就是我认为体罚有必要的原因。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He wipes his eyes and then stares at his plate in silence.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他擦了擦眼睛，然后默默的盯着自己的盘子。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Subtly nod in acknowledgment>
ESP.TRADUIT: <含蓄的点头致意>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great game. Lose money every time, but I love it. "Play your opponent, not the hand." That's the line, right? Never works for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好游戏，每次都输钱，但我喜欢。“盯着你的对手，而不是你的手。”老话是这么说的，对吧？这对我没用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPool_00002354_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you've got a good poker face, don't you? Ready to hustle me out of my paycheck, aren't you? Maybe later, gotta get these guys drunk first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你是个好扑克手，对吧？准备好骗走我的薪水了吗？待会儿再说吧，我得先把这些家伙灌醉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPool_00002354_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say... you look familiar. You ever done work for Rampart? Administrative Solutions? Or was it William Gray?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说起来...你看着很眼熟。你在壁垒工作过吗？行政解决方案？还是威廉·格雷？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPool_00002354_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm more of a poker guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我更喜欢玩扑克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great game. Lose money every time, but I love it. "Play your opponent, not the hand." That's the line, right? Never works for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好游戏，每次都输钱，但我喜欢。“盯着你的对手，而不是你的手。”老话是这么说的，对吧？这对我没用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPool_00020272_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you've got a good poker face, don't you? Ready to hustle me out of my paycheck, aren't you? Maybe later, gotta get these guys drunk first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你是个好扑克手，对吧？准备好骗走我的薪水了吗？待会儿再说吧，我得先把这些家伙灌醉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPool_00020272_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say... you look familiar. You ever done work for Rampart? Administrative Solutions? Or was it William Gray?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说起来...你看着很眼熟。你在壁垒工作过吗？行政解决方案？还是威廉·格雷？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPool_00020272_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm more of a poker gal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我更像个扑克高手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problem. Been a long time since I visited Goodsprings. Always seems to draw me back in. Something about this weird, little town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。我已经很久没来清泉镇了，似乎总能被它吸引回来。这个奇怪的小镇有点东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPool_00002353_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always tell myself, "By God, I'm not going to Goodsprings ever again." And here I am. It's fated. That's my conclusion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我总是告诉自己，"上帝作证，我再也不去清泉镇了。" 结果我现在就在这里。这是命中注定的，这就是我的结论。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPool_00002353_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say... you look familiar. You ever done work for Rampart? Administrative Solutions? Or was it William Gray?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说起来...你看着很眼熟。你在壁垒工作过吗？行政解决方案？还是威廉·格雷？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPool_00002353_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not right now, but thanks for the offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在不行，不过谢谢你的邀请。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, excuse me for asking. This little toilet of a town gets worse every time I visit, I swear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，请原谅我的提问。我发誓，每次我来，这个小镇的小厕所都会变得更糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPool_00002355_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say... you look familiar. You ever done work for Rampart? Administrative Solutions? Or was it William Gray?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说起来...你看着很眼熟。你在壁垒工作过吗？行政解决方案？还是威廉·格雷？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPool_00002355_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're having a private conversation here. You mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在进行私人谈话。你介意吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, excuse me for asking. This little toilet of a town gets worse every time I visit, I swear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，请原谅我的提问。我发誓，每次我来，这个小镇的小厕所都会变得更糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPool_00020271_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say... you look familiar. You ever done work for Rampart? Administrative Solutions? Or was it William Gray?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说起来...你看着很眼熟。你在壁垒工作过吗？行政解决方案？还是威廉·格雷？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPool_00020271_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not talk to strangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不和陌生人说话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay. That tracks. Probably walked some of the same, shitty roads that I guard caravans on. Damn risky profession. I salute you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好吧，这就对了。可能也走过一些和我守卫商队一样的烂路。该死的高危职业，我向你致敬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWork_0000236E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't mean to bother you and your son. I'll leave you to your dinner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是故意打扰你和你儿子的，我就不打扰你吃饭了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWork_0000236E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm with the Mojave Express.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是莫哈维邮政的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay. That tracks. Probably walked some of the same, shitty roads that I guard caravans on. Damn risky profession. I salute you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好吧，这就对了。可能也走过一些和我守卫商队一样的烂路。该死的高危职业，我向你致敬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWork_00020274_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't mean to bother you and your son. I'll leave you to your dinner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是故意打扰你和你儿子的，我就不打扰你吃饭了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWork_00020274_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me curry-her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在讨好她。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, my mistake. Mercenary outfits. Just, uh... call it a look around the eyes, seemed like someone from my world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我的错。雇佣兵的装束，就是，呃...眼睛周围的感觉，像是我这行的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWell_0000236F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't mean to bother you and your son. I'll leave you to your dinner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是故意打扰你和你儿子的，我就不打扰你吃饭了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWell_0000236F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not familiar with any of the groups you mentioned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的这些组织我都不熟悉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, my mistake. Mercenary outfits. Just, uh... call it a look around the eyes, seemed like someone from my world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我的错。雇佣兵的装束，就是，呃...眼睛周围的感觉，像是我这行的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWell_00020273_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't mean to bother you and your son. I'll leave you to your dinner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是故意打扰你和你儿子的，我就不打扰你吃饭了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not know long names.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没听过这么长的名字。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, my mistake. You had a... and don't take this the wrong way... a dangerous air about you. You've done your share of wetwork, right? Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我的错。你有...别误会我的意思...你身上有种危险的气息。你干过不少湿活吧？嗯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWork_00002371_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not my business, anyway. Certainly can't judge. Sorry to have bothered you. You and your son enjoy your dinner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正不关我的事，当然不能评判。抱歉打扰你了，祝你和你儿子用餐愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWork_00002371_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: God, no. I could see you thinking that, though. We have some dusty, desperate-looking boys in the group. Not that hard up, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，不是。但我可以看出你是这么想的，我们确实有一些灰头土脸、神情绝望的小伙子。不过也没那么困难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWork_0000236D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tough line of work, even with the agencies. No, I'm a soldier of fortune... hired gun, contractor... a mercenary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 工作很艰难，即使是帮专业机构干活。不，我是一个军事冒险家...雇佣枪手，承包商...雇佣兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWork_0000236D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you all bounty hunters or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们都是赏金猎人之类的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Contract work for Rampart. We aren't full partners, but got a special job clearing the roads of muties. Been a lot of attacks recently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 壁垒的合同工作。我们不是完全的合作伙伴，但有一项特殊的工作，清除道路上的变种人。最近发生了很多袭击事件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWork_00002370_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just take that ambush south of town, for example. No survivors, even the women and children. Makes me sick to think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就拿城南的伏击来说吧。没有幸存者，包括妇女和儿童。一想到这事我就恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWork_00002370_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What brings you to Goodsprings?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么风把你吹到清泉镇来了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny... how? Like... I'm fabricating this whole thing funny? The kind of funny that needs to be resolved outside? Is that what you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣...怎么？比如说...我把这整件事都编得很有趣？是那种需要在外面解决的有趣吗？是这个意思吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWork_00002372_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He glares at you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他瞪着你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jesus, you should see your face! I'm just Joshing you, partner. I don't know, honestly. They pay us, we do the job. Ya'll enjoy your dinner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，你真该看看你的表情！我只是开个玩笑，伙计。说实话，我也不知道，他们付我们钱，我们就干活。祝你用餐愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWork_00002372_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's funny. I haven't heard about any supermutant attacks near Goodsprings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真有趣。我没听说过清泉镇附近有什么超级变种人袭击的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: M-michael... Au-augen. Michael Augen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迈...迈克尔...奥...奥根，迈克尔·奥根。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSal_00002364_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me your name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能告诉我你的名字吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Loud... b-b-boom. M-m-mama p-pushed me away. T-told me to hide. I d-did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很吵...砰...砰...砰。妈...妈妈把我推...推开，叫...叫我躲起来。我躲...起来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSal_00002366_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice to meet you, Michael. I'm [%];. Can you tell me what happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴认识你，迈克尔，我是[%];。你能告诉我发生了什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: M-m-men. C-c-could hear them. D-didn't s-see. H-had my eyes c-closed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 男人。能...能听到他们，没...没看...看见，我...把...眼睛闭...闭上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSal_00002365_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Th-they w-walked up... sh-shot... shot my mama.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他...他们走...走过来...开...开枪，打死了我妈妈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSal_00002365_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He buries his head in his hands and sobs.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他双手捂着头抽泣起来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a brave boy, Michael. Did you see or hear whoever attacked your caravan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个勇敢的孩子，迈克尔。你有没有看到或听到袭击你商队的人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [His lips shake as he struggles to speak.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他嘴唇颤抖着努力开口说话。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: A-a-aunt F-f-fay's house.
ESP.TRADUIT: 费...费...费伊姨...姨...姨妈的家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSal_0000235F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me where you were going?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我你要去哪里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Papa s-s-said b-by the c-corn. Corn fields.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸爸说...说...说在...在玉...玉米，玉米地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSal_00002362_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're doing great. Do you know where Aunt Fay lives?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做得很好。你知道费伊姨妈住在哪里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nods and continues eating.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他点了点头，继续吃。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that was hard for you. Eat some dinner and then we'll get you to Aunt Fay, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这对你来说很难。先吃晚饭，然后我们送你去找费伊姨妈，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: M-mama, Papa... and m-my brother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈...妈妈，爸爸...还有我...我哥哥。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSal_00002369_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you know anyone else in the caravan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认识商队里的其他人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: P-papa said b-b-business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸...爸爸说有生...生...生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSal_0000236A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm so sorry. Why were you all travelling to New Vegas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉。你们为什么要去新维加斯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He continues eating in silence.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他继续默默的吃着。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough for now. You finish your dinner and then I'll take you to your family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先到这儿吧。先吃完饭，然后我带你去找家人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't mean to interrupt you, but you wouldn't be interested in a game of pool, would you? I'm dying to get a game in after being on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无意打扰你，但你不会对打台球感兴趣吧？在外旅行之后，我真想去打一场比赛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecForc_0000236B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy shit, is he all right? He's hyperventilating!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去，他没事吧？他喘不过气来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecForc_00002375_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's having some kind of fit, what the hell set him off?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他突然发作了，到底是什么引起的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecForc_00002375_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heads up, boys! We're going hot!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当心，小伙子们！我们得上膛了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecAtta_00002389_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I know what you did. Now you're gonna pay for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击> 我知道你们干了什么，现在你要为此付出代价了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, easy! You think I like doing this? I'm not some sick, kill-crazy maniac! It was just supposed to be the father, not the whole family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静，冷静！你以为我喜欢这样吗？我又不是什么变态的杀人狂魔！目标应该是父亲，而不是整个家庭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecBloo_0000238F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it wasn't me, it would've been someone else. This is just one part of a bigger play by prime movers in California... way over my pay grade!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算不是我，也会又其他人。这是加州幕后黑手们策划的大局中的一小部分...远远超出了我的职权范围！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecBloo_0000238F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These guys have a private army at their disposal, not to mention the hired guns in town. We're talking experts! They're not fucking around!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些人有一支私人军队随时待命，更不用说城里的雇佣枪手了。我们说的是专业的！他们可不是闹着玩的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecBloo_0000238F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Blood-Nap] <Press the blade against his groin> Right now I'm the most powerful person in the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: [嗜血之眠] <把刀片按在他的腹股沟上>现在我是世界上最有权力的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Agonized Scream>
ESP.TRADUIT: <极度痛苦的尖叫>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecBloo_00002398_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Blood-Nap] <Stab in him the groin> Say goodbye to your mercenary balls.
ESP.TRADUIT: [嗜血之眠]<刺进他的腹股沟>跟你的雇佣兵蛋蛋说再见吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? I've seen asthma, that ain't asthma! He's scared out of his fucking mind... as if... hold the fuck on. He ain't your kid, is he?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么啦？我见过哮喘，那不是哮喘！他吓得要命...好像...他妈的等一下。他不是你的孩子，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPani_0000237D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay... we're talking straight now... where'd you find this boy? Cause now that I think about it... he fits the description of a... missing person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧...我们现在直接说了...你在哪里找到这个男孩的？因为现在我想起来了...他符合一个...失踪人口的描述。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPani_0000237D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He has asthma. It will pass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有哮喘，会好的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? I've seen asthma, that ain't asthma! He's scared out of his fucking mind... as if... hold the fuck on. He ain't your kid, is he?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么啦？我见过哮喘，那不是哮喘！他吓得要命...好像...他妈的等一下。他不是你的孩子，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPani_0002026F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay... we're talking straight now... where'd you find this boy? Cause now that I think about it... he fits the description of a... missing person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧...我们现在直接说了...你在哪里找到这个男孩的？因为现在我想起来了...他符合一个...失踪人口的描述。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPani_0002026F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He get ass math.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他擅长数学。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Now you're just fucking with me. Kid, are you all right? He's melting down, as if... hold on... he's not your kid, is he?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你现在是在耍我。孩子，你没事吧？他快要崩溃了，好像...等一下...他不是你的孩子，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPani_0000237E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay... we're talking straight now... where'd you find this boy? Cause now that I think about it... he fits the description of a... missing person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧...我们现在直接说了...你在哪里找到这个男孩的？因为现在我想起来了...他符合一个...失踪人口的描述。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPani_0000237E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's just his allergies acting up again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他只是过敏症又发作了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Now you're just fucking with me. Kid, are you all right? He's melting down, as if... hold on... he's not your kid, is he?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你现在是在耍我。孩子，你没事吧？他快要崩溃了，好像...等一下...他不是你的孩子，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPani_0002026E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay... we're talking straight now... where'd you find this boy? Cause now that I think about it... he fits the description of a... missing person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧...我们现在直接说了...你在哪里找到这个男孩的？因为现在我想起来了...他符合一个...失踪人口的描述。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPani_0002026E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He get sniffles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他感冒抽鼻子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean, you don't know? He's your kid, don't you know his medical issues? It's as if... hold on... he's not your kid, is he?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么意思，你不知道？他是你的孩子，你不知道他的健康问题吗？这就好像...等一下...他不是你的孩子，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPani_0000237F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay... we're talking straight now... where'd you find this boy? Cause now that I think about it... he fits the description of a... missing person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧...我们现在直接说了...你在哪里找到这个男孩的？因为现在我想起来了...他符合一个...失踪人口的描述。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPani_0000237F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look alive, boys!
ESP.TRADUIT: 打起精神来，弟兄们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPani_00002381_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> The sound of your wretched voice, "mutie".
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>你那讨厌的声音，“变种人”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look alive, boys!
ESP.TRADUIT: 打起精神来，弟兄们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecPani_00020270_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> You is mootie!
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击> 你就是变种人！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boys, we got big trouble!
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计们，我们有大麻烦了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecTP_00012BE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to peel your skin off and make it into a hammock for Easy Pete.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把你的皮剥下来，做成吊床给闲人彼得。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boys, we got big trouble!
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计们，我们有大麻烦了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecTP_00012BE9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I make skin into sleepy swing for Pete.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要剥皮给彼得做吊床。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I appreciate your honesty. As for the ambush... yeah, not proud of it. It was a clusterfuck, all of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我很欣赏你的诚实。至于伏击...嗯，不值得骄傲。这一切都是一团糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_00002390_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a loose end. Five hundred caps and we'll see to him. Quick and painless. The alternative is messy... and unprofitable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个麻烦，五百瓶盖，我们会解决他的，又快又无痛。另一种选择是混乱的...而且无利可图。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_00002390_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I respect what you did. Guess you found him hiding out, so you got him some help. Admirable. I can't let him go, though. Not for this employer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尊重你的所作所为，我猜你发现他躲起来了，所以找了人帮他，令人钦佩。但我不能让他走，对这个雇主来说不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_00002390_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and I are the same... just tools for the prime movers. Make the smart play. These are powerful, dangerous people. Just let him go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和我是一样的...只是主导者的工具。做明智的选择，他们是强大而危险的人。让他走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_00002390_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found him hiding near his murdered family. I'm guessing you're the one behind that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现他躲在被谋杀的家人附近，我猜你就是幕后黑手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally, yes. Not this client. Not this job. It's much more than this kid and his family. We're just pieces on the chess board, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常情况下可以，这个客户不行，这份工作也不行。这不仅仅是这个孩子和他的家庭，我们只是棋盘上的棋子，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_00002391_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You let that boy go or we're getting bloody. Your call.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你放了那孩子，不然我们就得流血了。你决定吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_00002391_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any chance I can convince you to let him go? Everyone has a price.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有没有可能说服你放了他？每个人都有价格。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, I love hypotheticals. Okay... let's say you Django Westwood your way out of here, smoke me and my boys. Unlikely, but possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我喜欢假设。好吧...假设你用姜戈·韦斯特伍德的方式离开这里，把我和我的人都干掉。不太可能，但有可能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_00002399_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Word will get back to my employer. This isn't some penny-ante bunch of thugs. They're organized and well-funded. They'll find you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的雇主会知道的。这不是一群无足轻重的暴徒，他们组织严密，资金充足。他们会找到你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_00002399_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyone and anything is fair game. Your friends and family, your assets... shit, you got a dog? They'll kill your dogs. Seen it happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何人、任何事都是可攻击的对象。你的朋友和家人，你的财产...妈的，你养狗吗？他们连你的狗都会杀掉，亲眼所见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_00002399_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, it's just business. Pissing contest that's way above our heads. I shouldn't be making you this offer... but I like to do things... easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，这只是生意，这是我们无法理解的比赛。我不该给你这个条件的...但我喜欢做些...简单的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_00002399_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paint me a picture of the worst-case scenario here... if I were inclined to say no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我描绘一下最坏的情况吧...如果我倾向于说不的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. I'm just a contractor, anyway. Temporary labor. I ain't gonna make some speech like in the dime novels. I got shit to do. Make a choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能。反正我只是个承包商，临时工。我不会像廉价小说里那样胡言乱语，我还有事要做。做选择吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_0000239C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me anything else about your employer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我一些你雇主的其他情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fair enough. That's honest, at least. If that boy is who I think he is... this can be a lucrative evening for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很合理，至少这是诚实的。如果那个男孩是我想的那个人...对你来说，这将是一个有利可图的夜晚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_0000238E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a loose end. Five hundred caps and we'll see to him. Quick and painless. The alternative is messy... and unprofitable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个麻烦，五百瓶盖，我们会解决他的，又快又无痛。另一种选择是混乱的...而且无利可图。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_0000238E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I respect what you did. Guess you found him hiding out, so you got him some help. Admirable. I can't let him go, though. Not for this employer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尊重你的所作所为，我猜你发现他躲起来了，所以找了人帮他，令人钦佩。但我不能让他走，对这个雇主来说不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_0000238E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and I are the same... just tools for the prime movers. Make the smart play. These are powerful, dangerous people. Just let him go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和我是一样的...只是主导者的工具。做明智的选择，他们是强大而危险的人。让他走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_0000238E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not telling you shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我什么都不会告诉你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally, yes. Not this client. Not this job. It's much more than this kid and his family. We're just pieces on the chess board, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常情况下可以，这个客户不行，这份工作也不行。这不仅仅是这个孩子和他的家庭，我们只是棋盘上的棋子，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_00002392_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You let that boy go or we're getting bloody. Your call.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你放了那孩子，不然我们就得流血了。你决定吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_00002392_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any chance I can convince you to let him go? Everyone has a price.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有没有可能说服你放了他？每个人都有价格。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, I love hypotheticals. Okay... let's say you Django Westwood your way out of here, smoke me and my boys. Unlikely, but possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我喜欢假设。好吧...假设你用姜戈·韦斯特伍德的方式离开这里，把我和我的人都干掉。不太可能，但有可能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_0000239B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Word will get back to my employer. This isn't some penny-ante bunch of thugs. They're organized and well-funded. They'll find you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的雇主会知道的。这不是一群无足轻重的暴徒，他们组织严密，资金充足。他们会找到你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_0000239B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyone and anything is fair game. Your friends and family, your assets... shit, you got a dog? They'll kill your dogs. Seen it happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何人、任何事都是可攻击的对象。你的朋友和家人，你的财产...妈的，你养狗吗？他们连你的狗都会杀掉，亲眼所见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_0000239B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, it's just business. Pissing contest that's way above our heads. I shouldn't be making you this offer... but I like to do things... easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，这只是生意，这是我们无法理解的比赛。我不该给你这个条件的...但我喜欢做些...简单的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_0000239B_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paint me a picture of the worst-case scenario here... if I were inclined to say no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我描绘一下最坏的情况吧...如果我倾向于说不的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. I'm just a contractor, anyway. Temporary labor. I ain't gonna make some speech like in the dime novels. I got shit to do. Make a choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能。反正我只是个承包商，临时工。我不会像廉价小说里那样胡言乱语，我还有事要做。做选择吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_0000239D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me anything else about your employer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我一些你雇主的其他情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and I both know he ain't your kid. Whatever con you're pulling... I'll do business with you, but you need to come clean. No more bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你我都知道他不是你的孩子。不管你在耍什么花招...我可以和你做生意，但你得坦白。别再胡扯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_00002388_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you, a doctor? He's my kid, clear as day. He even has my eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么，医生吗？他是我的孩子，一清二楚，他的眼睛都跟我一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn, I like your moxy. It takes a special kind of crazy to really commit to a lie... you almost have to believe it yourself. I admire it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我喜欢你的勇气。只有特别疯狂的人才能坚持谎言...你自己都得相信。我很佩服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_0000238C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But this is your last chance... all I want is the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这是你最后的机会了...我只想要真相。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_0000238C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That child sitting across from me is my own flesh and blood. Now kindly fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坐在我对面的那个孩子是我的亲骨肉。现在请你滚吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got it. Boys, it's go time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说对了。伙计们，开始了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecWher_0000238D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's my kid. Now get on with it or stop wasting my time. I'm tired of hearing your voice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是我的孩子。现在开始吧，不然就别浪费我的时间了，我已经听腻你的声音了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next round is on me. Drink enough and eventually you'll forget this happened. I promise it'll be quick. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一轮我请。喝够了，最终你会忘记这件事的，我保证会很快的。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecOffe_00002393_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Sell Michael> Deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: <卖掉迈克尔> 成交。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He takes a deep breath.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他深吸了一口气。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shame it had to come to this. Boys!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真遗憾事情发展到这一步。弟兄们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dravec [02001C59] (mod) Quest : ([02001C64]aaDetSaloonDialogue) Saloon Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSaloo_aaDetDravecOffe_0000239A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I love this part.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我喜欢这部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashAttack_0000294E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> Not necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>没必要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're sick!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你疯了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashAttack_00021FF8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> Lady needs cuddles. You nap with her.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>女士需要拥抱，你和她一起睡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, get away from me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，离我远点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashTP_0000294F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to hurt you so badly that you'll pray to enter hell before I'm finished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要狠狠伤害你在，我结束之前，你会祈祷赶紧下地狱的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，别再来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashTP_000206B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I give you biggest ouchie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会给你最大的疼痛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was concealed outside. Years ago a former co-worker taught me how to move and shoot in silence. Ironic, considered he never shut up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我躲在外面。多年前，我的一位前同事教我如何无声的移动和射击。考虑到他从来没闭上嘴，挺讽刺的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhoWor_00002C62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suspected that Dravec would botch the ambush... drunken oaf. I was waiting to catch any stragglers. I'd say it worked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怀疑德劳维茨会搞砸这次伏击...醉醺醺的白痴。我在等着抓那些掉队的人，我得说这起作用了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhoWor_00002C62_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa! Where did you come from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇！你是从哪里来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was concealed outside. Years ago a former co-worker taught me how to move and shoot in silence. Ironic, considered he never shut up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我躲在外面。多年前，我的一位前同事教我如何无声的移动和射击。考虑到他从来没闭上嘴，挺讽刺的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhoWor_00021FF4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suspected that Dravec would botch the ambush... drunken oaf. I was waiting to catch any stragglers. I'd say it worked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怀疑德劳维茨会搞砸这次伏击...醉醺醺的白痴。我在等着抓那些掉队的人，我得说这起作用了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhoWor_00021FF4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Agh! You ghost man!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！你这鬼人！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, no begging or crying? Just friendly conversation? Okay. I work for a small outfit, do freelance work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，没有乞求或哭泣吗？只是友好的交谈？好吧，我为一家小公司工作，做自由职业者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhoWor_00002951_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Used to be a certain order of things... now it's just chaos and turf wars. This always happens when there's a changing of the guard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过去是一种特定的秩序...现在只有混乱和地盘之争。这种情况总是发生在权力更迭的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who sent you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁派你来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you actually think I'm a ghost? I thought you were just making a tired joke about my complexion. You really are... special.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你真以为我是鬼？我还以为你只是拿我的肤色开个无聊的玩笑呢。你真是...特别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhoWor_00021FF5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I explain this? Ugh, big boss... change. Different boss send me. You make people mad. Now you're in trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该怎么解释呢？唔，大老板...换了，不同的老板派我来的。你总是让人生气，现在你有麻烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: God, it feels so dirty when I put it like that. Can we just get this over with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，我这么说的时候感觉好脏。我们能快点结束这事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhoWor_00021FF5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who send you, ghost man?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁派你来的，鬼人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rich, powerful people who are competing for power. The most ruthless among them won't think twice about employing men like me or Dravec.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有钱有势的人在争夺权力。他们中最无情的人会毫不犹豫的雇佣像我和德劳维茨这样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem like a decent sort. Probably wrong place at the wrong time and it escalated. It's beyond our control. Best to accept it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来是个正派人，可能是在错误的时间出现在了错误的地点，事态升级了。这是我们无法控制的，最好还是接受吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhoWor_00002952_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dravec mentioned powerful clients. Can you tell me anything about them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 德劳维茨提到了强大的客户，能告诉我一些关于他们的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Biggest ghost? Look, I'm not a ghost. I have fair skin, you understand? It's hell in this climate. I'll probably have skin cancer before I'm forty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最大的鬼？听着，我不是鬼，我皮肤白皙，你明白吗？这种天气简直是地狱，我可能会在四十岁之前得皮肤癌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll settle our affairs shorty, but there's no need for name-calling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的事情会很快解决的，但没有必要互相辱骂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhoWor_00021FF6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bigger ghost send you? Tell who biggest ghost!
ESP.TRADUIT: 更大的鬼派你来的？告诉我谁是最大的鬼！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will, one way or another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会的，无论如何。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhoWor_00002954_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> That's the difference between us, then. I won't accept it.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>那就是我们之间的区别了。我不会接受的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough!
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhoWor_00021FF7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I ain't afraid of no ghost!
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我不怕鬼！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Odd question. I, uh... well, it's not just money. It is for many of my coworkers, not me. I fell into this line of work, grew to love it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇怪的问题。我，呃...不只是钱的问题，我的很多同事都是因为钱，但我不是。我开始从事这一行，并爱上了它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhy_00002953_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The last moment... the crossing of the bar, that's what I live for. All the inertia of an entire life brought to bear on one point. Beautiful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一刻...跨过那道界，这就是我活着的意义。用整个人生的惯性撞向临界点，痛快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhy_00002953_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, I just want to talk. Why are you doing this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别紧张，我只是想谈谈。你为什么要这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You poor, simple beast. This won't even be sporting. You remind me of another who also fell into this work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这可怜、单纯的畜生，这根本算不上竞争。你让我想起了另一个同样陷入这项工作的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhy_00021FF2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could paint a picture, but I doubt you'd understand. I'll make it quick for you. You won't hurt any more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以描述清楚，但说了你也不懂。干脆点，这就让你解脱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhy_00021FF2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just talky. Why do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是聊聊，为什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was purchased as a child. I... performed my duties diligently. I became one of his favorites. He was always dancing, and I danced with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还是个孩子的时候就被买下了。我...兢兢业业地履行职责，我成了他的最爱之一。他总是跳舞，我也和他一起跳舞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhy_0000295B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Later I learned how to wield the tools of mortality, how to hold life and death in my hands. He taught me everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 后来我学会了如何使用死亡的工具，如何将生与死握在手中。他教会了我一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhy_0000295B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said you fell into this line of work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你陷入这行当?

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Oh, I fell into this work. Yes. Big man bought me when I was a boy. Very young. He made me do... bad things... hurt me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？哦，我陷入了这份工作。是，我小的时候被一个大人物买走了，非常年轻。他逼我...不好的事情...伤害我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhy_00021FF3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Later, I learned how to... hurt people... so I'd never be hurt again. This isn't helping, is it? God, talking to you was a mistake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 后来，我学会了如何...伤害别人...这样我就再也不会受伤了。这一点用都没有，对吧？天啊，和你说话是个错误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhy_00021FF3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fall on fork?
ESP.TRADUIT: 跌倒在岔路？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] All growth entails pain, a loss of the former self. Tethering yourself to notions of moral law anchors you to the weak. I became strong.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 所有的成长都伴随着痛苦，是对过去自我的丧失。把自己束缚在道德法则的概念中，会使你成为弱者。我变强了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhySpe_0000295C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That must have been a painful experience. I'm sorry you had to go through that as a child.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那一定是一段痛苦的经历，很遗憾你小时候要经历这些。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] You don't know what you're talking about. He was magnificent. He wasn't supposed to die! You won't drag me down!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]你根本不知道自己在说什么。他很伟大，他不该死的！你别想拖我下水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhySpe_0000295D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your old boss sounds like a diabolical piece of shit. Good riddance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以前的老板听起来像个邪恶的混蛋。总算摆脱了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I wagered it all on this... he said it wasn't work, it was a game. I should've listened to Robert. I should've run. I'm so tired.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]我把一切都押在这上面了...他说这不是工作，这是游戏。我应该听罗伯特的，我应该逃跑的，我太累了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhySpe_0000295E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this the life you really wanted? Surely you dreamed of something different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是你想要的生活吗？你肯定梦想过一些不同的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] What? I... I was talking about mental fortitude, not your petty, gym class metrics! Idiot!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]什么？我...我说的是精神上的坚韧，不是你体育课上的琐碎指标！白痴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nash [0200288A] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetNashWhySpe_0000295F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Strong" might be a stretch. Can you even perform five pull-ups with full range of motion?
ESP.TRADUIT: “强”可能有点牵强。你能做五个完整的引体向上吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nods his head and then looks at Fay's corpse. His eyes well up with tears in response.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他点了点头，然后看着费伊的尸体。他的眼里噙满了泪水。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry about your aunt. Are you all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对你姨妈的事我很遗憾。你还好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nervously nods in agreement.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他紧张地点头表示赞同。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: There may be danger ahead, but I'll be with you every step of the way. Can you travel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 前面可能有危险，但我会陪你走好每一步。你能旅行吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He takes a moment to collect his thoughts.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他花了一点时间整理思绪。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: U-uncle Ch-chuck. He's C-c-crazy. Crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查...查克叔...叔叔，他是疯...疯...疯子，疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelPos_0000296B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of these notes mentioned that you have an uncle. Do you know anything about him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 其中一张纸条提到你有个叔叔。你了解他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Papa said guns are bad. I couldn't touch them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸爸说枪不好，我不能碰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelPos_0000296C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Michael, we might be travelling in some dangerous places. Can you shoot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 迈克尔，我们可能要去一些危险的地方。你会开枪吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelPos_0000472B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure he meant well, but you need to learn how to defend yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信他是出于好意，但你得学会如何保护自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelPos_0000472C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay put for a moment and I'll find you a weapon that you can handle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 稍等片刻，我帮你找一把你能驾驭的武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He reluctantly nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他不情愿的点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to talk to some bad guys, so I'll need you to wait outside when we get there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得跟几个坏人谈谈，所以我们到那后你得在外面等着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He unexpectedly hugs you for a brief moment. You hear him gently sobbing.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他出乎意料的拥抱了你一会儿。你听到他在轻声啜泣。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Gently pat his shoulder.> You'll be safe with the NCR, I promise. Goodbye, Michael.
ESP.TRADUIT: <轻拍他的肩膀>你和NCR在一起会很安全的，我保证。再见，迈克尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [His eyes well up with tears as he accepts his fate.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他接受了自己的命运，眼里噙满了泪水。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've done everything I can, kid. NCR will take care of you now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经尽力了，孩子。现在NCR会照顾你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nods in agreement.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他点头表示同意。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He smiles at the prospect of finding his family.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [想到有可能找到家人，他笑了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've changed my mind. Let's go find your uncle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我改变主意了，我们去找你叔叔吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He reluctantly nods and struggles to fight back tears.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他不情愿的点点头，强忍住泪水。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is your new home, Michael. Arcade and Doctor Farkas will help you. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的新家，迈克尔。阿卡德和法卡斯医生会帮你的。再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He looks around at his surroundings and begins sobbing. He then collects himself and stares at the ground.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他环顾四周，开始抽泣起来。然后他镇定下来，盯着地面。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: End of the line, kid. Start toughening up or you won't survive here. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到此为止了，孩子。要坚强起来，否则你在这里活不下去。再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We got all the work you can handle, I promise. Have a seat and we'll get you started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能做的工作我们都有，我保证。请坐，我们马上开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtJobs_00002D9F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here for work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来工作的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little bit of this, a little bit of that. Collections, standard leg-breaking stuff. Slinging, moving if you want it. Underground fights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个搞点，那个弄点。暴力催收、散货运货、地下格斗之类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtJobs_00002F48_1.ogg
