ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if this is your bag... but there's also wet work. No pressure, but it's there... and boy, does it pay. You came in at the right time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道这是不是你的专长...但也有湿活。没什么压力，但确实有...报酬相当可观。你来得正是时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtJobs_00002F48_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of work are you offering?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们提供什么样的工作？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm all about business. Have a seat and we'll talk it over. Booze and coffee if you're in the mood, help yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只谈生意。请坐，我们再好好谈谈。酒和咖啡如果你想喝，请自便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtBusine_00002D93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈生意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, we got trouble!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，我们有麻烦了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtAttack_00002D98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I know what you did, Kurt. I'm here to make you pay.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我知道你做了什么，库尔特。我是来让你付出代价的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, we got trouble!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，我们有麻烦了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> Enough of this crap. I'm putting you down, Kurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>别说这些废话了。我要把你干掉，库尔特。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not a real bakery! Fuck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是真正的面包店！操！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtTP_00011EAF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to peel you open and make you watch as I bake your living guts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要剥了你的皮，让你看着我烤你的内脏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not a real bakery! Fuck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是真正的面包店！操！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtTP_00012BE6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I scratch tummy and make yum yums from poopy rope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我抓挠肚子，用便便绳做美味佳肴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Okay, okay. Nothing like waking up next to some hideous broad after a bender, am I right? I'll give you a general idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好吧，好吧。没什么比喝醉酒后在一个丑陋的女人旁边醒来更好的了，对吧？我会给你一个大致的概念。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtSpeech_00002DA9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the barons, man. They're making plays for land, going at each other's throats. Someone got double-crossed, so they're killing the whole family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是那些大亨，伙计，他们在争夺地盘，互相掐架。有人被出卖了，所以他们要杀了他全家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtSpeech_00002DA9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We also got work in the city. New players making moves, competing for turf after the recent... happenings. Caps galore if you play it right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在城里也有工作。最近...偶发事件之后，新玩家采取行动，争夺地盘。如果你干得好，瓶盖会很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtSpeech_00002DA9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No disrespect, but I don't know you. I want to be sure about who I'm getting in bed with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无意冒犯，但我不认识你。我想确定和我上床的人是谁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Okay, you're either an undercover... or you're an idiot who just pushed my button. Either way, it's curtains for you. Boys!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]好吧，你要么是卧底...或者你是个白痴，惹毛我了。不管怎样，你都完蛋了。弟兄们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtSpeech_00002DAA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like to get a clear picture of the chain of command before I begin a job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在开始一项工作之前，我喜欢对整个指挥系统有个清楚的了解。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That rings a bell. Mojave Express? Aren't you the one who got whacked? Doesn't matter, you're here now. How can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来有点耳熟，莫哈维邮政？你不就是被干掉的那个吗？没关系，你现在在这里了。我能帮你什么忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtMeetNa_00002D9A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can respect that, we can do the courtesies later. In the meantime, what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以尊重你，礼貌的事以后再说吧。在此期间，我能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtMeetNa_00002DA0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No offense, but I'd rather not give out my name just yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无意冒犯，但我现在不想透露我的名字。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, like that director! God, I'd love to meet that guy. Then again... after hearing some of the stories... maybe not. Anyway, what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，跟那个导演一样！天啊，我真想见见那家伙。而且...听了一些故事之后...也许不是。总之，我能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtMeetNa_00002DA1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> They call me... Albert.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎> 他们都叫我...阿尔伯特。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet you do. Might have its advantages, you know? So... what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌你会。可能有它的好处，你知道吗？所以...我能为你做什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtThough_00002D9E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I get that a lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我经常听到这样的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh? My employer? You... no offense, but you just walk in off the street... looking more than a little bedraggled... and you ask that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？我的雇主？你...无意冒犯，但你只是随便从街上走进来...看起来不止是有点邋遢...你问这个？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoEm_00002DA3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about your employer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的雇主吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're new at this, aren't you? Either that or I'm smelling bacon... choose your words wisely from here on out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是新手，对吧？要么就是我附近有条子...从现在开始，请明智地选择你的措辞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoEm_00002DA4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just want to know who I'd be working for, that's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想知道我会为谁工作，仅此而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? I... yeah, that's a good point. The brothers, they're newcomers... very efficient. Dickman... brutal woman. Whew, she scares me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？我...嗯，有说服力。兄弟俩，是新来的...非常高效，迪克曼...残忍的女人。呼，吓到我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoEm_00002F49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some other small-time crews, specialists and such. A lot of the big dogs are dead or moved on. City is ripe for the taking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些其他的小团队，专家之类的。很多大公司要么死了，要么搬走了，这座城市的时机已经成熟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoEm_00002F49_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's also the mercenary groups, but that's just temp work. Rampart does a little work, but they're based further west.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也有雇佣兵团体，但那只是临时工。堡垒做了点工作，但他们的基地在更西边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoEm_00002F49_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which players? I might've worked for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哪些玩家？我可能为他们工作过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [His face reddens and he shifts in his chair.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他的脸变红了，在椅子上挪动了一下。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... how do you know Dravec?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你怎么认识德劳维茨的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoEm_00002F4A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about Dravec?
ESP.TRADUIT: 德劳维茨呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fucking what? He... why? Just... this about money? Did Dickman send you? What's the deal here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈什么？他...为什么？就是...是因为钱吗？迪克曼派你来的吗？这是怎么回事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoEm_00002F4B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you're not connected? You just up and saved some strange kid? I wouldn't believe it if someone told me... you're fucking nuts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你们没有联系？你就这么救了一个陌生的孩子？如果有人告诉我，我也不会相信的...你他妈的疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoEm_00002F4C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do understand you're not leaving here, right? I mean... you either cough up that kid or we take your scalp. Otherwise it's my ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你不能离开这里，对吧？我的意思是...你要么把那孩子交出来，要么我们割了你的头皮。否则就是我的屁股了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoEm_00002F4C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But before the... uh, festivities... why? Why would you do this? This some kind of loco crusade?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是在...呃，庆祝活动...为什么？你为什么要这么做？这是某种疯狂的运动吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoEm_00002F4C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He wanted to hurt the Augen boy, so I put him down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他想伤害奥根家的男孩，所以我干掉了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [His demeanor shifts as he leans forward.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他的神态随着身体前倾而改变。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fuck did you just say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈刚才说什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoAu_00002DA2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you know about the Augen family?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对奥根一家了解多少？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He leans to the side and gives a nod to one of his associates.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他歪向一边，向他的一个同事点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know any Augens. I do know there's about to be a corpse sitting in front of me if you don't drop it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认识什么奥根。我只知道如果你再不放手我面前就会有一具尸体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoAu_00002DA5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't stutter. The Augens - what do you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有结巴。奥根一家...你知道什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... two of my associates were supposed to have checked in by now. They're no-shows. For one of them... that's unusual.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的...我的两个同事现在应该已经来报到了，他们没有出现。其中一个...这很不寻常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoAu_00002DA6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: By the look of you... I can infer that you had something to do with it. You with another firm? Dickman? Bounty hunter? What's your play?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看你的样子...我可以推断你跟这事有关。你是另一家公司的？迪克曼？赏金猎人？你在玩什么花样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoAu_00002DA6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not leaving without information on the Augen family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有奥根一家的消息我是不会走的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gotta be shitting me. You iced two of my best guns over a stray kid? You're not related, not a bodyguard, anything like that.... crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定是在逗我，你为了一个流浪的孩子干掉了我最好的两把枪？你不是亲戚，也不是保镖之类的...疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoAu_00002DA7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're nuts... I mean certifiable. The kid is a witness, a loose end. You won't be safe anywhere with him, at least not this side of the Colorado.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你疯了...我的意思是有证的。那孩子是目击证人，是个麻烦。你跟他在一起哪儿都不安全，至少在科罗拉多这边不安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoAu_00002DA7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you took down Nash... well, you're capable. Cool. I just... look, you can kill me, it won't change a thing. These people will never stop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你打倒了纳什...嗯，你很有能力，真酷。我只是...听着，就算你杀了我，也改变不了什么。这些人永远不会停下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoAu_00002DA7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just want to keep that boy safe. That's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想保证那孩子的安全。就是这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: On your feet!
ESP.TRADUIT: 起身！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtInfoAu_00002DA8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> Neither will I.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我也不会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Self-righteous fool. Any way you play it, the kid is a corpse. You won't change that. Well... I hope your virtue comforts you in death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？自以为是的笨蛋。不管你怎么玩，那孩子就是一具尸体，你改变不了的。嗯...我希望你的美德能让你在死亡时得到安慰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtWhyRig_00002F54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was the right thing to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是正确的选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I get it. Time and place, I might've done the same... in a past life. Gonna be a pain to track down that kid. Starts with you. Up and at 'em, gents!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。时间和地点，我可能也会这么做...在前世。要找到那孩子可不容易，从你开始。起身吧，先生们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtWhyHel_00002F53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't going to hand over a helpless kid to those animals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会把一个无助的孩子交给那些畜生的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See... you're wrong about that. These people control the big picture, friend. You made your choice... now die with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着...你错了，这些人掌控着大局，朋友。你做出了你的选择...现在和它一起去死吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtWhyBig_00002F51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the grand scheme of things, aligning with small-time crooks never pays off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从大局上看，和小骗子合作是不会有好结果的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell of a reason to die. Well... I won't bore you. Boys!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的死理由。嗯...我就不烦你了。孩子们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtWhyBor_00002F52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was bored.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是无聊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That ain't gonna fly, partner. Your beef with these mercs is on hold until I finish my investigation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那行不通的，伙计。在我完成调查之前，你和这些雇佣兵的矛盾暂时搁置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to kill some people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来杀几个人的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm conducting an investigation. Can't go into further detail than that. So I ask again - what are you doing up here? Hardly a tourist spot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在调查，不能透露更多的细节了。所以我再问一遍，你在这里做什么？这可不是旅游景点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could ask the same of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也想问你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little fact-finding in the hills, uh? Look, I'm running an investigation here, and I can't have you interfering. Months of work at stake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在山里收集情报？听着，我在这里进行调查，我不能让你干涉。几个月的工作岌岌可危。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gathering information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在收集情报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See... there you're wrong. I'm here to wrap up an investigation that's involved months of work, and I won't have you mucking it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着...你错了。我是来结束一项耗时数月的调查的，我不会让你搞砸的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: None of your business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不关你事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He pants through clinched teeth, his clothing spattered with Sharp's blood.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他咬着牙喘着粗气，衣服上溅满了夏普的血。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're never going to stop, are they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是不会罢休的，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetGenericPro_0002E280_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, I found this on his body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，我在他身上发现了这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetGenericPro_0002E280_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, it's over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，结束了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deathclaws nests are a big reason there are so few settlements close to the Colorado. Legion is chipping away at them, but they're tough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死亡爪的巢穴是科罗拉多河附近很少有人定居的一个重要原因。军团正在逐渐削弱它们，但它们很顽强。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericPro_0002C5BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need spare parts. Compressor blades, fuel pumps, spark plugs, wiring, anything you find. This will be one jury-rigged sonofabitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要备用零件。压缩机叶片，燃油泵，火花塞，电线，任何你能找到的东西。这将是一个临时拼凑的狗日的玩意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I imagine it's going to be slim pickings, but see what you can find. I started in maintenance, so I can do a lot with duct tape and elbow grease.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我估计你不会有什么收获的，不过看看吧。我之前在做维修工作，所以即使只用胶带和蛮力也能修好不少东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericPro_0002C5BB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We cleared out the local wildlife. The airfield is secure now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们消灭了当地的野生动物，机场现在安全了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not quite. Wounded man over by that building. See if you can cut some information out of him before he bleeds out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不完全是，那栋楼旁边有个受伤的人。看你能不能在他失血过多之前从他嘴里套出些情报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think that's the last of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这是最后一个了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion is coming. Picked it up on the radio chatter out of Grasshopper Junction. A contubernium or two, veterans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团来了，在蚱蜢路口的无线电通讯中发现的。一两个十人队，老兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericPro_00037FFD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I went ahead and moved the slaves inside. There's only one entry point - the southeast canyon. You have time to set up an ambush.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经把奴隶安置好了。只有一处入口，东南峡谷，你有时间布置埋伏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericPro_00037FFD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll keep monitoring the radio chatter and keep the slaves calm. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会继续监听无线电，让奴隶们保持冷静。有什么问题吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericPro_00037FFD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, my dream come true! It's a work in progress, but business is good. Cigarettes and coffee go together like peas and carrots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我的梦想实现了！工作还在进行中，但生意不错。香烟和咖啡简直是天作之合。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericPro_0001D99F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The gnomes enhance the ambience, I think. Steady demand, too. Give Charles his due, the man's an artist. All the good ones are crazy, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得是地精让气氛更浓了，需求也很稳定。给查理斯说句公道话，他可是个艺术家。好人都是疯子，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericPro_0001D99F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Open for business?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要开张了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had built up some capital after years of... prospecting. Just a matter of being organized and then executing. I know all about execution.
ESP.TRADUIT: 经过多年的...淘金，我积累了一定的资本。只是组织和执行的问题，我知道怎么执行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericPro_00015FA6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tight real estate market out here now. Wasn't like this in the old days. Soon as something opened up I jumped on it. Right time, right place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在这里的房地产市场很紧张，以前可不是这样的。一有动静，我就扑了上去，正确的时间，正确的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericPro_00015FA6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You took over this shop very quickly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你接手这家店的速度很快。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can offer you paying work, but fair warning... it's not easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以给你提供有偿工作，但提醒你一下...这可不容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericPro_00015FB8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My goal... is to make the ultimate babka. To do this, I need a variety of ingredients, starting with Fire Ant Queen Nectar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的目标...就是做出终极巴布卡。要做到这一点，我需要各种各样的食材，首先是火蚁蚁后的蜜露。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericPro_00015FB8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand the risk involved with getting rare items, so it's two hundred caps for each job. You up for it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白获取稀有物品会冒很大的风险，所以每份工作200个瓶盖。你干不干？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericPro_00015FB8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for work. You need help with anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在找工作。需要帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Offer still stands. Not like anyone else is going to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 报价仍然有效。不像其他人那样做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericPro_00015FB9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to discuss the job you mentioned earlier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈你之前提到的工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Awesome, thank you! I hope it wasn't too much trouble. This mess? It's just the locals trying to intimidate me. No big deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了，谢谢你！希望你没费多大劲。噢，这个烂摊子？只是那些本地人想吓唬我罢了，不算什么大事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericPro_00019DBE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, how was it down there? Was Scabby helpful?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么样，下面的情况如何？难不成哑巴的建议你都采纳了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericPro_00019DBE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got the Sugar Bombs. What happened here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我拿到甜麦炮弹了。这里发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay close, we're about to wade through a river of hobo blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟紧点，我们要蹚过流浪汉的血河了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericPro_0001C1E6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For Kisses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了亲亲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericPro_0001C1E6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to Ken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟肯聊聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prospector [02015A51] (mod) Quest : ([02015A56]aaDetProspectorStuff) Prospector Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for work. Got any leads?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想找点活干，有门路吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come to your senses, huh? Ain't nothing personal, pilgrim, but hunting bugs is a serious business. Can't trust just anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 清醒点，嗯？不是针对你，旅行者，但捉虫子是件严肃的事。不能随便相信任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericPro_00016C42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just paint a picture for me. Tell me if he's got any distinguishing features... or... and this is a long shot... a unique pet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我描绘一下吧，告诉我他有没有什么特别的特征...或者...这是一个很渺茫的机会...独一无二的宠物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericPro_00016C42_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to talk about finding the nectar again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想再谈谈寻找蜜露的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He curls his lip at your inquiry and presses on in silence.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他对你的询问不屑一顾，沉默不语的继续前行。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are we getting closer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们接近了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He curls his lip at your inquiry and presses on in silence.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他对你的询问不屑一顾，沉默不语的继续前行。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are we getting closer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们接近了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nods and points in the direction of the nearby ant hive.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他点了点头，指了指旁边的蚁巢。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are we getting closer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们接近了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Awesome, thank you! I hope it wasn't too much trouble. Oh, this mess? It's just the locals trying to intimidate me. No big deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了，谢谢你！希望你没费多大劲。这个烂摊子？只是那些本地人想吓唬我罢了，不算什么大事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericPro_00019DBD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got the Sugar Bombs. What happened here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我拿到甜麦炮弹了。这里发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a relief. We're ready to leave if you'll guide us. Father Flaherty is supposed to be waiting for us near the route to Gass Peak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就放心了。如果你能带领我们，我们已经准备好离开了，弗莱厄蒂神父应该在去加斯峰的路上等我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericPro_00013CAE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I assume you can navigate with your Pip-Boy. Take any preparations you need to - we're ready when you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我估计你应该会用哔哔小子进行导航吧。做好你需要的一切准备，你准备好了我们就准备好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericPro_00013CAE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was some strange activity, but nothing involving the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实有一些奇怪的活动，但与军团无关。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're right behind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们就在你后面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericPro_00013CB0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了。我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never expected Spear-Hand to turn on us... it breaks my heart. In time, I'll forgive him. I'm grateful for your help. We were prepared to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没想过矛手会背叛我们...我的心里很难受，总有一天我会原谅他的。我很感谢你的帮助，我们做好了赴死的准备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericPro_00015215_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: God sent you to us, I'm sure of it. Thistle would've been back in chains, her child born into slavery. You saved the next generation from misery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢肯定，是上帝派你来的。否则希斯尔会被绑起来，她的孩子生来就是奴隶，你从苦难中拯救了下一代。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericPro_00015215_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We collected a handful of caps from the safehouse. All of it is yours. If you come to San Salvador one day, there will be more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们从安全屋收集了一些瓶盖，全都是你的了。如果有一天你来圣萨尔瓦多，还会有更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericPro_00015215_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the last of them. You should have a clear path to San Salvador now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是最后一个了，现在去圣萨尔瓦多的路应该很畅通了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you ready to do the right thing now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在准备好做正确的事了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_0002242B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to discuss Ace Yoblanski.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈“王牌”约布兰斯基。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm sure of it. Most of my maps are dated, so there have been some subtle changes in the geography. Nothing stops this mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我敢肯定。我的大部分地图都是过时的，所以在地理上有一些微妙的变化。没有什么能阻止这项任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_00022E10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This cave roughly corresponds to the cove on my maps. I believe it will get us close to the 93. From there, I can easily find a way to Big Wash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个洞穴与我地图上的小海湾大致对应，我相信它能让我们接近93号公路。从那里，我可以很容易地找到去大波浪的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_00022E10_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust me, I'm an accomplished navigator. I found the SS Rex... I'll find Ace Yoblanski!
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，我是个熟练的领航员。我找到了国王号...我也会找到“王牌”约布兰斯基的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_00022E10_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure this is the spot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定是这里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I call a successful interdiction. According to my internal calculations and your Pip-Boy... we're 15 miles southwest of Big Wash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我所说的成功拦截。根据我的内部计算和你的哔哔小子...我们在大波浪西南15英里处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_00023738_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll travel off-road and cross the 93 at night. Hopefully we can slip into the canyon at dawn. I'm ready to go when you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会走越野路线，晚上穿过93号公路，希望我们能在黎明时分溜进峡谷。你准备好了，我就出发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_00023738_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ready to travel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好出发了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_0002621B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like my centurions well-done, if you know what I mean. So, did you find Ace?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢全熟的百夫长，你懂我的意思吧。那么，你找到王牌了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_0002621B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to be honest... I didn't foresee this kind of complication. I thought we'd swoop in, rescue Ace, burn everything and then leave. The end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须坦白...我没有预见到这种复杂局面。我以为我们可以突袭，救出王牌，烧毁一切，然后离开，结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_00026279_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't really care about slaves... and children annoy me. Still... they are pretty pathetic. I'd hate to think they'd fall prey to wild dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的不关心奴隶...孩子们让我很烦。不过...他们很可怜，我不希望他们成为野狗的猎物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_00026279_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's all piss in the wind, though. They can't come with us, at least not if they want to live. We're going back through the ghoul express, remember?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过这都是无稽之谈。他们不能和我们一起走，至少如果他们想活命的话。我们要通过食尸鬼快车回去，记得吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_00026279_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a crying shame, but these kiddos need to pull themselves up by their bootstraps and exercise a little ingenuity and can-do attitude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真是太遗憾了，但这些孩子需要靠自己的力量振作起来，锻炼一点聪明才智和积极进取的态度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_00026279_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to talk about these slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得谈谈这些奴隶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, it's been a while. Let's make sure this works...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，有段时间了。让我们确保这行得通...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_0002B8A3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, we're live! {Coughing}Salve, amicus! This has been a truly successful hunt! Surely Mars will smile on our success! True to Caesar!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我们活着！{Coughing}安康，朋友！这真是一次成功的狩猎！玛尔斯一定会为我们的成功而微笑的！忠于凯撒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_0002B8A3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Whispering}Your turn! Improv!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Whispering}该你了！即兴表演！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_0002B8A3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready. Let's start the ambush.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了，开始伏击吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's be clear... we're not dealing with Ace Yoblanski. This is an elaborate, communist conspiracy. That man is a spy who defiles Ace's legacy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们明确一点...我们要对付的不是“王牌”约布兰斯基。这是一个精心策划的共产主义阴谋，那个人是个玷污王牌遗产的间谍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We could attempt to rescue the slaves. Noble, human course of action. We could also leave them to fend for themselves. Craven.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以尝试营救奴隶，高尚的人类行为。我们也可以让他们自生自灭，懦夫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He neglected to mention the last option... we chart a course for Grasshopper Junction and melt that shithole down to hot slag!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他没有提到最后的选择...我们去蚱蜢路口然后把那破地方烧成渣！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It looks like Ace bailed on us. What's the plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来王牌弃我们而去了。有什么计划？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Burning down another town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 烧掉另一个镇子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about our next move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们谈谈下一步行动吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now Ace is finally at rest. We've lost a national treasure, but it wasn't all for naught. Let's guide these savag... er, lost souls to freedom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在王牌终于安息了。我们失去了一件国宝，但这并非毫无意义。让我们来引导这些野蛮...呃，为自由而迷失的灵魂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_0002D544_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to get these slaves to NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得把这些奴隶送到NCR去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He ignores you and continues blasting the corpse for several moments.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他无视你，继续炮轰尸体好几分钟。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now he's dead. Let's get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在他死了，我们快离开这里吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_0002D55A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think he's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想他已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He ignores you and continues blasting the corpse for several moments.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他无视你，继续炮轰尸体好几分钟。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ace Yoblanski is an American hero who died fighting Chinese communists. We've been dealing with an infiltrator, impersonator... an imitation.
ESP.TRADUIT: “王牌”约布兰斯基是一位美国英雄，他在与中国共产党的战斗中牺牲了。我们一直在对付一个渗透者，冒牌货...仿制品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_0002E221_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's... let's get out of here. To hell with Arizona.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们...我们离开这里吧。让亚利桑那见鬼去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_0002E221_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think he's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想他已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm tired of looking at these savages. Let's get them to those do-gooders in Freeside. If I were human, I'd vomit all over you right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我厌倦了这些野蛮人，把他们送到自由城那些好心人那里去吧。如果我是人类，我现在就会吐在你身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_0002E248_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That wasn't Ace Yoblanski, but if it were... I would be sorely disappointed. Nauseous, if I were capable of feeling nausea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是“王牌”约布兰斯基，但如果是的话...我会非常失望的。恶心，如果我能感觉到恶心的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_0002E248_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where the hell is Ace? Where the hell have you been? We need to get going, now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 王牌到底在哪里？你到底去哪儿了？我们得走了，马上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGenericPro_00034729_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you ready to fly?
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好飞行了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn mercenary whores. Did you make it right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的雇佣兵妓女。你做对了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_0000B7AB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got bad news. Rampart was already there. They killed Jonas and the other herders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个坏消息。壁垒已经在那里了，他们杀了乔纳斯和其他牧民。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time for the most crucial part of my plan: gnomes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来是我计划中最关键的部分：地精。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_0000C459_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can see you look a little skeptical, but hear me out. You noticed all the gnomes I have scattered around, right? There's a reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能看出你有点怀疑，但听我说完。你注意到我四处散布的地精了吧？这是有原因的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_0000C459_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyone strolling into this pass will see the gnomes and say, "Well, he's clearly a lunatic. Look at the gnomes." They ignore them and walk on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何一个走进这片山口的人都会看到地精，然后说：“好吧，他显然是个疯子，看看那些地精。”然后无视它们，继续前行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_0000C459_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I do like collecting and restoring gnomes, I also put them to practical use. Listening devices, motion sensors... and initiators.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我确实喜欢收集和修复地精，但我也会让它们有实际用途。监听装置、运动传感器...还有起爆器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_0000C459_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to prime them into the stockpiles of bulk HE. You'll be able to initiate each store by shooting the gnome from a perch. Questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 把那些装进散装高爆仓库，你可以在高处射击地精装置来逐个引爆。有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_0000C459_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did what I could. What's next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做了我能做的，接下来呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now we eat. Could all be dead soon, so might as well enjoy a good last meal. Get the fire going and I'll do the cooking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们吃饭。可能都快死了，所以还是好好享受最后一餐吧。把火生起来，我来做饭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_0000D1B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gnomes are set. What now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 地精设置完成，现在该做什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem pretty alert, so I'd like for you to take first watch while everyone rests. I'll be sleeping at the wall if anything kicks off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来很警觉，所以我想让你在大家休息时先值班。如果有什么事发生，我就睡在墙上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_0000DA42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good time to have words with everybody in case this goes south. Might not get a chance to talk to them again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是时候跟大家谈谈了以防事态恶化，可能再也没机会和他们说话了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_0000DA42_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and don't worry about Michael. He'll be inside with Hondo watching him. Woe be unto anyone who tries to harm that child.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，别担心迈克尔。他会在里面，洪多会看着他。任何企图伤害那个孩子的人都会遭殃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_0000DA42_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 计划是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we're good. It's not glorious, but it keeps Michael safe. That's all I care about. Thank you for this, for everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就没问题了。虽然不光彩，但能保证迈克尔的安全，我只关心这些。谢谢你，谢谢你做的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_0000F90B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I put together some caps for you. Reckon Michael will want a word before you go. You ever need anything or need a good hiding spot, we're here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你准备了一些瓶盖，我想迈克尔在你走之前会想跟你说几句。无论你需要什么或者需要一个好的藏身之处，我们都在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_0000F90B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I gave the documents to Harcourt. The deal is done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把文件给了哈考特，交易完成了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. By reputation, he had it coming. Guess that's the end of the line, then. I know you have business waiting for you back in Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。根据他的名声，他真是罪有应得。我想这就是报应吧。我知道你在维加斯还有事在等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_00011EB1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dug into my stash and got some caps for you... let's just call it a gratuity. Least I can do after all your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从我的藏物里翻了些瓶盖给你...就当是小费吧。你帮了这么多忙，至少我能做点什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_00011EB1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and before you go... I know Michael would like a word with you. Your call. Couldn't have done this without you. Thank you, and good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，在你走之前...我知道迈克尔有话跟你说，你决定吧。没有你，这一切都不可能完成。谢谢，祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_00011EB1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You believed him? Hot damn, I'd feel a lot better if he were six feet under. Well... he's gone, guess I'll just cope. Thank you, regardless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你相信他？该死，如果他被埋在六英尺深的地下，我会感觉好得多。嗯...他走了，我想我能应付。不管怎样，谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_0000F911_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dug into my stash and got some caps for you... let's just call it a gratuity. Least I can do after what you've done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我翻出了我的存货，给你找了一些瓶盖...就当是小费吧。在你做了那些事后，至少我还能做些什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_0000F911_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and before you go... I know Michael would like a word with you. Your call. Couldn't have done this without you. Thank you, and good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，在你走之前...我知道迈克尔有话跟你说，你决定吧。没有你，这一切都不可能完成。谢谢，祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericPro_0000F911_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I convinced him to leave. He won't be back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说服他离开，他不会回来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had a change of heart?
ESP.TRADUIT: 改变主意了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk about the deal you discussed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈你之前说的那个交易。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? How do you know Chuck? He doesn't have a lot of friends... no friends, actually, except some of the old Desert Rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你怎么认识查克的？他的朋友不多...其实没有朋友，除了一些以前的沙漠游骑兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericPro_00004B64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and if you're NCR... specifically anyone even loosely affiliated with their revenue collection agency... don't even think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，如果你是NCR...特别是任何与他们的税收机构有松散联系的人...想都别想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericPro_00004B64_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not coming to kill him, are you? And who's this kid? I need answers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会是来杀他的吧？这孩子是谁？我需要答案！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericPro_00004B64_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand you know Charles Augen. I'd like for you to take us to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你认识查尔斯·奥根，我希望你能带我们去见他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you kidding? I'm in a state of mourning here! We need to bury her with dignity and hold a proper funeral service!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在逗我？我现在正在哀悼呢！我们要体面地埋葬她，举办一场像样的葬礼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericPro_000051CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry about Sugar Tits. Ready to get moving?
ESP.TRADUIT: 奶嘴的事我很抱歉，准备好出发了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you kidding? I'm in a state of mourning here! We need to bury her with dignity and hold a proper funeral service!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在逗我？我现在正在哀悼呢！我们要体面地埋葬她，举办一场像样的葬礼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericPro_000051D0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry about Sugar Tits. At least El Oso won't bother you any more. Ready to travel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 奶嘴的事我很抱歉，至少埃尔奥索不会再打扰你了。准备好旅行了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please... just have a little compassion. She was my best friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托...稍微有点同情心吧。她是我最好的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericPro_000051D5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk about holding a service for Sugar Tits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想和你谈谈为奶嘴举行葬礼的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know, it's time. Friend at Crimson Caravan owes me a favor, so I'm gonna swing by there and pick up a new pack brahmin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，是时候了。深红商队的朋友欠我个人情，所以我要去那里再买一头驮运婆罗门牛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericPro_000059EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meet me at Goodsprings and we'll get started to Chuck's place. Ain't too long of a trip from there into the mountains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在清泉镇等我，然后我们去查克家。从那里到山里的路程不太长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericPro_000059EE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to get moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好出发了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: East of town. I know where it is, just need your help accessing the entrance. How about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在城镇的东边。我知道它在哪里，只是需要你帮我进入入口。怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you, though?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetGenericPro_00007457_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a change of heart?
ESP.TRADUIT: 改变主意了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericPro_0000360F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to talk about the job offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈你给的那份工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bellek? As in Jason Bellek? Holy shit... he's... well, he's the face of the barons. One of the most powerful men in California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 贝莱克？杰森·贝莱克？可恶...他...嗯，他是大亨们的代言人，加州最有权势的人之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She reads over the note for several moments. Her expression stiffens after she puts the paper down.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她看了好一会儿笔记，读完后表情变得僵硬起来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Potosi Pass... Charles Augen... can't be. Boy, this just got interesting. I never figured he was related to the Peter Augen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 波托西山口...查理斯·奥根...不可能。天啊，这下有趣了，我从没想过他和彼得·奥根有亲戚关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Show Note> Here. Rampart is working for someone named Bellek.
ESP.TRADUIT: <出示笔记>给，壁垒在为一个叫贝莱克的人工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, thank you. It's a long, hard road, and sometimes you just need to rest a spell and let out life's hardships with a good drink and some music.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，谢谢你。这是一条漫长而艰难的道路，有时你只需要休息一段时间，喝上一杯，听听音乐，释放一下生活中的艰辛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hank [02010EC2] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetGenericPro_00011E69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This here's a place to forget your blues, or if need be... well, shed a tear or two in that beer for lost loves and for long-gone friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是一个让你忘记悲伤的地方，或者如果需要的话...好吧，为失去的爱人和久违的朋友，在啤酒里流下一两滴眼泪吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hank [02010EC2] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetGenericPro_00011E69_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Drink in peace, drink in friendship. I'll be here if you need something... or just want to talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在平静中举杯，在友谊中举杯。如果你有什么需要，我随时都在...或者只是想聊聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hank [02010EC2] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetGenericPro_00011E69_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice place you got here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这地方不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Uh... sure. I mean... I can toss you a few caps once I'm done. I'll also put in a good word for you in my report.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？呃...当然。我的意思是...等我搞定了，我可以扔给你一些瓶盖，我还会在报告中为你美言几句。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not looking for trouble, I just want to conduct an interview. If you can keep your cool... welcome aboard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是在找麻烦，我只是想进行一次采访。如果你能保持冷静的话...欢迎加入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need any help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要帮助吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No can do. Besides, you're not getting in there without my help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没办法。再说了，没有我的帮助你是进不去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look... you seem like you can handle yourself. Seeing as to how you're not on good terms with Rampart... any chance you'd want to team up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着...你看起来能照顾好自己。鉴于你和壁垒的关系不太好...你愿意跟我合作吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll get a few caps and I'll put in a good word for you with the Bear. I just want to talk, but I'd like backup if this goes south. You game?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会得到一些瓶盖，我会在熊面前为你美言几句。我只是想谈谈，但如果事态恶化，我需要支援。你加入吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care, just stay out of my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不管，别挡我的路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't expect to find a friend out here. I guess I can fill you in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没想到会在这里遇到朋友，我想我可以告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gathering evidence on Rampart's operations out here. Lot of stink around that firm... very serious allegations from multiple parties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在收集壁垒行动的证据。那家公司有很多丑闻...来自多方的非常严重的指控。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of the bigger barons use them to muscle out small landowners and other independents. Rumors of intimidation and murder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些大亨利用他们排挤小地主和其他独立人士，有恐吓和谋杀的传言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rampart also has a lot of vocal defenders, and it's not just the barons. They're popular with settlers, people on the frontier. I need facts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也有很多为壁垒辩护的人，而且不只是大亨，他们很受拓荒者和边疆居民的欢迎。我需要事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] I'm on your side. What kind of investigation is this?
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]我支持你，我们要调查什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking to interview a high-level mercenary who recently set up shop here in the Mojave. My command team already made the appointment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想采访一位高级雇佣兵，他最近在莫哈维开了一家店。我的指挥官已经约好了见面时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't mean to sound paranoid, but I'd like an extra gun with me. I know you're not Rampart, so the job is your if you want it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想多疑，但我想多带一把枪。我知道你不是壁垒的人，所以只要你愿意，这份工作就是你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What exactly will you be doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打算做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent. I'm going to be interviewing John Sharp about his activities here in the Mojave Wasteland. Just talking. Shouldn't be any trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了。我要采访约翰·夏普关于他在莫哈维废土的活动。只是谈谈，应该不会有什么麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to be the silent partner. Cool, collected, quiet. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要做一个沉默的合伙人，冷静、镇定、沉稳。有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我加入。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we're at an impasse. Good luck getting in without the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们就陷入僵局了，祝你不用钥匙也能进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're fucking crazy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈疯了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I'm a solo act, sister. You should've stayed away from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我是单干的，姐妹，你应该离这里远点的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't even want to know where you got this. Let me see...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我甚至不想知道你从哪里得到的。让我看看...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She takes a few moments to read the note.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她花了几分钟时间阅读笔记。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm taking this as evidence. We'll have to be careful in here. Whatever his faults, I want to give John Sharp the benefit of the doubt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把这个作为证据。在这里我们得小心点，不管约翰·夏普有什么过错，我都想假定他是无辜的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a lot of ugly rumors about the Bullhead campaign, but the man served NCR for decades. That has to count for something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有很多关于布尔海德竞选的丑陋谣言，但他在NCR服务了几十年。这肯定有意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give Kurt's Note> I "found" this note. You might need it for your investigation.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给予库尔特的笔记>我“发现”了这张纸条，你调查时可能会用到。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jesus, there's blood on this... don't even want to ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，这上面有血...我都不想问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She takes a few moments to read the note.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她花了几分钟时间阅读笔记。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn. I'll take it as evidence. This potentially points to something bigger than I thought. Regardless, I need more information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我会把它作为证据，这可能意味着比我想象的更大的事情。无论如何，我需要更多的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Show Dravec's Note> What about this?
ESP.TRADUIT: <给予德劳维茨的笔记>这个呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You what? Why didn't you take him to McCarren or the Mojave Outpost? What gives you the right to put a witness up in that tower?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说什么？你为什么不带他去麦卡伦或者莫哈维前哨？你有什么权力把证人关进塔里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came across those notes after rescuing a witness to Dravec's ambush. He's in the Lucky 38.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我在营救目击德劳维茨伏击的人时偶然发现的笔记。他在幸运38。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A very dim-witted supermutant gave us a key when he made his statement a few weeks back. Claims the mercs massacred everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个非常愚蠢的超级变种人几周前发表声明时给了我们一把钥匙，声称佣兵团屠杀了所有人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: His testimony was a barely intelligible, not to mention he was in hysterics. Never seen a mutant so distraught. Figured it was worth a look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的证词几乎听不懂，更不用说他当时歇斯底里的样子。从未见过如此悲痛欲绝的变种人，我觉得值得一看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are you going to make entry?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要怎么进去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've worked with Rampart in the past. They do a lot of VIP protection and security work in the mining towns. Most of them are vets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前和壁垒合作过。他们在矿业小镇做了大量的VIP保护和安全工作，他们大多是老兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would take a special kind of stupid to bushwhack a ranger. My chain of command knows where I'm at and what I'm doing. We'll be fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有特别愚蠢的人才会在丛林中袭击一个游骑兵，我的指挥系统知道我在哪里，我在做什么。我们会没事的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure about this? We could be walking into a deathclaw's den.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定要这么做吗？我们可能会走进死亡爪的巢穴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All my partners are scattered around the stations or running ops against the Legion. In case you haven't noticed, there's a war on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我所有的搭档都分散在各个基地或者在对付军团。你可能没注意到，战争正在进行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: These kind of investigations are a low priority for command, especially if it involves mutants. That's the hard truth of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这类调查对指挥部来说优先级很低，尤其是涉及到变种人的时候。这是一个残酷的事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you out here by yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么一个人在这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was at the tip of the spear when Kimball pacified Bullhead. Botten, Medina and Glanton were involved as well. It wasn't pretty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 金博尔平定布尔海德的时候，他打头阵。博腾、梅迪纳和格兰顿也参与其中，这并不好看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Botten was the real mastermind. You don't earn a nickname like "The Devil's Right Hand" by being nice. Different time, different rules.
ESP.TRADUIT: 博腾才是真正的策划者。你不会因为友善而得到“魔鬼的右手”这样的绰号。不同的时间，不同的规则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I digress... Ranger Sharp was responsible for counter-intel in that theater. A lot of the rules in place now are because of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跑题了...游骑兵夏普负责那个战区的反情报工作。现在的很多规定都是因为他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever the methods, the results were undeniable. Kimball took the credit, Botten became the scapegoat. Politics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管是什么方法，结果是不可否认的。金博尔抢了功劳，博腾成了替罪羊。政治。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about John Sharp?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能和我说说约翰·夏普吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Botten, Medina and Sharp were all pushed out after Kimball moved up. Congressional hearings, investigations didn't turn out well for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 博腾，梅迪纳和夏普都在金博尔升职后被解雇了。国会听证会，调查结果对他们不利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aaron King scooped up Sharp soon after the hearings and forced retirement. He's been instrumental in securing a lot of frontier territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听证会后不久，亚伦·金就挖来了被迫退休的夏普，他在保卫边境地区方面发挥了重要作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did Sharp end up in Rampart?
ESP.TRADUIT: 夏普怎么会在壁垒？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I actually met him at a seminar that Rampart held for us a few years back. He's a professional, not the caricature painted by the newspapers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是。几年前，我在壁垒为我们举办的一次研讨会上见过他。他是专业人士，不是报纸上的漫画人物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not my first rodeo, either. Bumped heads with plenty of hard cases in my day. We're just going to talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这也不是我第一次做这事，我以前碰到过很多棘手的案子。我们只是聊聊天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think you can handle this guy? He made a career out of breaking people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得你能搞定这家伙吗？他以打击他人为业。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, let's go. Remember: silent partner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，我们走吧。记住：沉默的合伙人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more questions. I'm ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有问题了。我准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, sorry. Get caught up in the job and forget basic courtesy. I'm Hart. Leah Hart. Pleased to meet you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，抱歉，专注于工作而忘记了基本的礼貌。我是哈特，莉亚·哈特，很高兴认识你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before we get started we should make introductions. I'm [%];.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们开始之前，我们应该互相介绍一下。我是[%];。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? No, absolutely not! I'm here to question someone and gather evidence, I don't want trouble!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不，绝对不行！我是来审问某人，收集证据的，我不想惹麻烦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look... you seem like you can handle yourself. If you're able to exercise some restraint, I could see us working together... temporarily.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着...你看起来能照顾好自己。如果你能克制一点，我想我们可以一起工作...暂时。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll get a few caps and I'll put in a good word for you with the Bear. I just want to talk, but I'd like backup if this goes south. You game?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会得到一些瓶盖，我会在熊面前为你美言几句。我只是想谈谈，但如果事态恶化，我需要支援。你加入吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we work together we'll kill everyone in half the time. How about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们齐心协力，我们可以用一半的时间干掉所有人。怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a private facility. State your business or move on. You have twenty seconds to comply.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是私人设施，说明你的业务，否则就离开。你有20秒的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Ranger Hart. I'm here to interview Mister Sharp about Rampart's activity in the Mojave. Made the appointment last week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是游骑兵哈特，我是来采访夏普先生关于壁垒在莫哈维的活动的。上周预约的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stand by... appointment confirmed. Your guest was not included in our records. This is a private meeting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备...预约已确认。您的客人不在我们的记录之内，这是一次私人会议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Contractors are authorized. If Mister Sharp doesn't like it, I'll be back with a warrant and more contractors. Surely he wants to avoid that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 获得授权的承包商。如果夏普先生不喜欢，我会带着搜查令和更多的承包商回来，他当然希望避免这种情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stand by... your guest may enter. Mister Sharp is waiting at the conference table. Please proceed inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备...您的客人可以进来。夏普先生在会议桌旁等着，请往里面走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ranger Hart, come on in. Have a seat. You want a drink or anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵哈特，进来，坐吧。要喝点什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, thank you. Just have a few questions, then I'll be on my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用了，谢谢。就问几个问题，然后我就走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... I got to work with your mentor, Hugo. Hell of a ranger. Very firm ethical boundaries. I respect that. I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的...我和你的导师雨果合作过。真是个出色的游骑兵，非常坚定的道德边界。我尊重这一点，真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn if he didn't have one hell of a work ethic, too. Men like him are the foundation of this republic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这狗日的太有职业道德了，像他这种人就是共和国的基石。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, I haven't seen Hugo in a dog's age, but word is he's staying busy. Now... if you don't mind, I'll get on with the questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，我很久没见过雨果了，但听说他现在很忙。现在...如果你不介意的话，我要继续提问了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have an eyewitness who claims that this bunker was occupied by supermutants... like the one you have caged up there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有目击证人声称这个地堡被超级变种人占领了...就像你关在那里的那个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Witness made a sworn statement that Rampart killed the mutants... indiscriminately. Care to explain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 目击者宣誓说，是壁垒杀死了变种人...不分青红皂白。能解释一下吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely, I'm glad you're here to get this cleared up. Our client contracted us to secure the area around Bonnie Springs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我很高兴你能来把事情弄清楚，我们的客户雇我们保护美女泉附近的区域。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our ultimate goal... is to secure another route between Goodsprings and New Vegas... given the recent complications at Sloan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的最终目标是...确保清泉镇和新维加斯之间的另一条路线，鉴于最近斯隆的复杂情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: We arrived, set up in concealed positions and began monitoring the area. Killed a few Cazadors, but nothing crazy. Then we saw the mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们到达后，在隐蔽的位置就位，开始监视该地区。杀了几只猎蜂，但没有什么异常，然后我们看到了变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing unusual, especially with Black Mountain nearby. But this wasn't some peaceful commune. They were ambushing travellers and prospectors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么不寻常的，尤其是黑山就在附近。但这并不是一个和平的公社，他们伏击旅行者和淘金客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. You interceded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。是你出面的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn right we interceded. Caught them in a close ambush the next night. No survivors. Traced their origin back to this bunker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我们出面得对。在第二天晚上的一次近距离伏击中发现了他们，没有幸存者，追查到他们的起源就在这个地堡。
