ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We made contact with the mutants, wanted to reach a peaceful resolution. Their spokesman, Zeno... the one in the cage... he refused dialogue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们联系了变种人，想要和平解决。他们的发言人，齐诺...笼子里的那个...他拒绝对话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... we took initiative. Made entry, cleaned them out. Took a few casualties, but we managed to take Zeno alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...我们采取主动，进入，清空。虽然有一些伤亡，但我们还是活捉了齐诺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood. You and your men will need to sign sworn statements. Also, I want to interview the captive before I leave. I want to be thorough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白了，你和你的人需要在宣誓证词上签字。另外，我想在离开之前采访一下俘虏，做得彻底一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to be disagreeable... but I'd strongly recommend against interviewing the mutant. He's intelligent... and manipulative.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想惹人讨厌...但我强烈建议不要采访变种人。他很聪明...而且善于操纵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can only assume that this entire inquiry was launched on the testimony of a mutant. You understand what they were doing out here, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只能假设整个调查是基于一个变种人的证词展开的。你知道他们在这里做什么，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I assure you... whatever stories you've heard, our client only wants a little extra security to foster trade. Nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我向你保证...不管你听到了什么，我们的客户只是想要一点额外的安全措施来促进贸易。仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: And a warm welcome to you as well. Haven't had the pleasure. What do you go by?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也热烈欢迎你的到来。一直没有这个荣幸认识你，你怎么称呼？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem very composed. Good. Now... if you both surrender your weapons you can leave... and our business will be concluded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来很镇定，很好。现在...如果你们都交出武器，你们可以离开...我们的生意也就结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? A veritable celebrity in our midst. Ranger Hart, you keep some interesting company.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？一个真正的名人在我们中间。游骑兵哈特，你结交了一些有趣的伙伴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a seat, make yourself comfortable. Bar is open if you want a drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请坐，别客气。如果你想喝点什么，酒吧是开放的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, on the job. No talking. Got it. Been there, done that. If you'd like a libation, the bar's open. Make yourself comfortable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，工作中，不许说话，明白了，我也经历过。如果你想喝点酒，酒吧开着，别客气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something tells me Ranger Hart doesn't need much of that. Well... "Moral Support", make yourself comfortable. If you're thirsty, the bar is open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直觉告诉我，游骑兵哈特不需要那么多，嗯...“精神支持”。别客气，如果你渴了，酒吧是开着的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just here as moral support.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是来提供精神支持的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. I'm going to interview the mutant. You don't get to... hey, tell your men to back off! Mister Sharp, are you trying to get hemmed up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 布，我要去采访那个变种人。你不能...喂，让你的人退后！夏普先生，你想自找麻烦吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ranger Hart, I need you to listen closely now. You're going to hand over your weapons and leave... or I'll hurt you both. Badly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵哈特，我需要你仔细听好。你们要交出武器，然后离开...不然我会伤害你们俩的，这样不好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're... you're crazy. You're all under arrest, you hear me? This stops now! I'm a Ranger of the New California Republic!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...你疯了。你们都被逮捕了，听到了吗？到此为止！我是新加州共和国的游骑兵！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ranger Hart... I know I'm supposed to say, "I don't want to hurt you." But the truth is that I want to hurt you... in ways you can't imagine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵哈特...我知道我应该说，“我不想伤害你。”但事实是我想伤害你...以你无法想象的方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just answer me... and you'll walk away, and we'll all forget about this. Before you balk, listen... listen...
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要回答我...然后你一走了之，我们就都忘了这件事。在你犹豫之前，听我说...听着...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't do this if I didn't know... in the marrow of my bones... that I could gut you on this table and get away with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我不是确信...从骨子里...我是不会这么做的...我可以在这张桌子上把你开膛破肚，然后逍遥法外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and your friend are nothing to my client. Nothing. Any sentimentality I had about the Republic and its agents died in Bullhead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和你的朋友对我的委托人来说什么都不是，什么都不算。我对共和国和它的特工们的任何感情都在布尔海德消失了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... just tell me... who is your witness... and what did they say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...快告诉我...谁是你的证人...他们说了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I, I... I can't... you're gonna kill us no matter what... you're insane.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，我...我不能...无论如何你都会杀了我们...你疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shhhh... easy, easy. It's going to be okay. I know that this is a shock. What we talk about stays in this bunker forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘘...放松，放松，会没事的。我知道你很震惊，我们的谈话会永远留在这个地堡里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... when my daughter was scared, I'd sing her a song. "All day I'd faced the barren waste without a taste of water... cool water."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道...当我女儿害怕的时候，我会给她唱一首歌。“每天我面对这贫瘠的荒地渴求着水...冰冷的水。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take a breath... think... who came to you. What did they say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 深呼吸...想想...来找你的人。他们说了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, a... a mutant. Name of L-Lucas. Simple, didn't say much, mostly babbling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，一个...一个变种人，叫卢...卢卡斯。很普通，没说太多话，主要是胡言乱语。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to leave now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想现在就走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did great, honey. Proud of you. You're a credit to the Republic. Almost finished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做得很好，亲爱的，为你感到骄傲，你为共和国争光。快完成了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is why I love the job... moments like this. No matter what happens, thank you for not being a bore. Okay, hand them over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我喜欢这份工作的原因...像这样的时刻，不管发生什么，谢谢你没有让我觉得无聊。好了，交出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cute, but the novelty is gone. You had your chance. Weapons. Floor. Now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可爱，但新鲜感消失了。你有过机会的，武器，地板上，马上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Were you born broken? Or was it repeated brain trauma? Doesn't matter, we're doing this the hard way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是生下来就有缺陷？还是反复的脑损伤？没关系，我们来硬的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: No siree Bob!
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝对不！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] You want to make an offer? Let's hear it.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 你想出个价？说来听听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a better way to resolve this. Hear me out for a moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有更好的解决办法，听我把话说完。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] You know... someone else, you might be right. Not me. Not ever. Disarm or we'll dust you both.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]你知道的...换一个人，你可能是对的，但我不是，永远不会。缴械，否则我们就把你俩都干掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're bluffing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在虚张声势。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] My client has honored every contract up to now. I'll admit... this is an exceptionally bold venture, but I keep my word.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]到目前为止，我的委托人履行了每一份合同。我承认...这是一次非常大胆的冒险，但我遵守诺言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like I said... throw down your arms and you walk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像我说的...放下你的武器，你就可以走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The truth will get out. Your client will make you a scapegoat when it's convenient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真相总会大白的，你的委托人会在方便的时候让你当替罪羊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] That's... that's your proposal? I'm at a loss... heard some dumbfuck, hair-brained ideas from desperate people, but that's a first.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]这...这就是你的提议？我有点不知所措...从绝望的人那里听过一些愚蠢的想法，但这是头一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: See if you can spell disarmament. If not, try homicide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看你能不能拼出“解除武装”，如果不行，那就试试"杀人罪"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't we settle this with a friendly spelling contest?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们为什么不通过一场友好的拼写比赛来解决这个问题呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: South. I'll go south. Lots of work on the river... and in Mexico. Yes, Mexico.
ESP.TRADUIT: 南方，我要去南方。河上的工作很多...还有墨西哥，没错，墨西哥。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's access to my safe. You'll find everything you need on Rampart. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的保险箱，你可以找到关于壁垒的所有资料。再见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plenty of work on the frontier. Strike out and start your own company.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在边境还有很多工作要做，开创自己的公司吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A gardener? Are you shitting me? Look, I know I'm old, but I'm not quite ready to trade it all in for a hand shovel and straw hat. Gardener... ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 园丁？你在逗我吗？听着，我知道我老了，但我还没准备好把这一切都拿去换一个手铲和草帽。园丁...哈!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should be a gardener. I hear it's rewarding and theraputic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该当个园丁。我听说这很有益，很有治疗作用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, okay. I'll head south. You're right about Rampart, though. Too much ambition for a simple, old soldier like me. Proof is in my safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，好吧，我往南走。你对壁垒的看法是对的，对于我这样一个简单的老兵来说野心太大了。证据在我的保险箱里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might see me again... but probably not. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许还能再见到我...但也许不会。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should leave before I get angry. You wouldn't like me when I'm angry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该在我生气之前离开，你不会喜欢我生气的样子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Makes no difference to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我来说没什么区别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> Come and take them.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>来拿吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Break contact!
ESP.TRADUIT: 脱离接敌！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't a bunker. It's your tomb.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是地堡，这是你的坟墓。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [His men collect your weapons and put them in a safe adjacent to Sharp's desk.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他的手下收走了你的武器，把它们放在了夏普的桌子旁边的保险箱里。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thing is... we need an escalation. Muties kill cattle and caravans, people get annoyed. They kill and mutilate a young Ranger? Rage. Real rage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是...我们需要事态升级。变种人杀死牲畜和商队，人们很生气，他们杀死并残害了一个年轻的游骑兵？愤怒，真正的愤怒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fewer muties, more contracts... everyone is happy. It's business, not personal... though I'll admit I'm going to enjoy it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 少些变种人，多些合同...大家都很开心。这是生意，不是私人恩怨...不过我得承认我会很享受的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Surrender your weapons> Here. I want them back after we leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: <交出你的武器> 给，我们离开后把它们还给我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I... I have a reputation. I let you go and I'm done. I'll never be safe in NCR again. Won't be trusted for contracts.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]我...我名声在外，我放你走，我就完了。在合同方面不受信任，我在NCR再也不会安全了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I came here to do a job. The weapons... drop them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我是来工作的。武器...放下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turning on Hart isn't boldness - it's desperation. Rampart is finished. Don't go down with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击哈特不是大胆，而是绝望。壁垒完蛋了，别跟他们一起沉沦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] My word is my bond. Ever heard the expression, "Reputation is all"? Words to live by in my profession. I want your weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我说到做到。听过“声誉就是一切”这句话吗？这是我职业生涯的座右铭。我要你们的武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever they're paying you... I'll double it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管他们付你多少钱...我都会加倍。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't that the truth? Rampart is... well, you ever heard the saying, "Overweening Ambition"? That sums up the boss man's goals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这难道不是事实吗？壁垒是...你听过“野心勃勃”这句话吗？这就是老板的目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... well, I know what I'm about. I have a part and I play it. King is doing his best to imitate Icarus. I'll move on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...好吧，我知道我在做什么。我有自己的角色，我要演好。金正在尽力模仿伊卡洛斯，我要继续。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's always work for an enterprising soul who's handy with a gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个有进取心的人，只要能熟练使用枪支，总能找到工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Proffer explanation for unauthorized distribution of explosive devices. You have twenty seconds to comply.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对未经许可分发爆炸装置作出解释。你有20秒的时间遵守命令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Negative. Recalibration of targeting parameters requires override. You lack proper credentials.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拒绝，重新校准目标参数需要覆盖。你缺乏适当的证书。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be advised - multiple attempts at subversion will signal communist infiltration. Such actions will be met with lethal force.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请注意...多次企图颠覆将表明存在共产主义渗透。此类行为将受到致命武力的打击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we should work together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们应该合作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am Ajax, a RobCo Mk 6 Mod II Sentry Bot. Programmed for a range of combat and peacekeeping roles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是阿贾克斯，一个罗科公司制造的6型II式铁卫兵。为一系列战斗和维持和平任务编程。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This unit was assembled but not activated prior to the Great War. A travelling merchant, "Stuart", discovered my husk at an abandoned bunker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这支部队是在第一次世界大战之前组装的，但没有被激活。一个叫斯图亚特的旅行商人在一个废弃的地堡里发现了我的外壳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Stuart" restored me to functionality and provided multiple upgrades to my combat capabilities. He then sold me to Rampart for an undisclosed sum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯图亚特恢复了我的功能，并为我的战斗能力提供了多次升级。然后他把我卖给了壁垒，价格没有透露。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until this assignment, I guarded supply routes to Bullhead. I have a body count of one hundred and fifty-three enemy combatants. Likely communists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这次任务之前，我负责看守通往布尔海德的补给路线。我有153名敌方战斗人员的尸体，可能是共产主义者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you end up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么到这来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The smelly, dishevelled specimens you refer to as "Raiders" closely resemble communists in manner and speech.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你称之为“掠夺者”的那些臭气淋漓、衣冠不整的家伙在举止和言语上都与共产主义者非常相似。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pathetic physiques, rancid, ill-fitting attire and a general air of sloth... yes, these are the hallmarks of communist infiltrators.
ESP.TRADUIT: 病态的身体，腐臭的，不合身的衣服和普遍的懒惰的气氛...是的，这些都是共产主义渗透分子的特征。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you know they were communists?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么知道他们是共产主义者？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Instant obedience to orders, fire superiority, destruction of communism.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即刻服从命令，火力优势，摧毁共产主义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are your prime directives?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的主要指令是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Communism represents the death of freedom, beauty and basic human dignity. It must be crushed into powder and left on the ash heap of history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 共产主义代表了死亡的自由、美丽和基本的人类尊严。它必须被碾碎成粉末，留在历史的灰烬堆上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you explain that last directive?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能解释一下最后一条指令吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Manufacturer's override accepted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已接受制造商覆写。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to engage the preventative maintenance override. Manufacturer's code is Whistles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想启动预防性维护系统，制造商代码是口哨。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Override accepted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已接受覆写。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Murphy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 墨菲 ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Processing... parameters altered. You are a beacon of freedom. I will destroy any and all communist transgressors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 处理中...参数改变，你是自由的灯塔。我将摧毁所有的共产主义罪犯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Subtly access a hidden panel and recalibrate his targeting parameters.> There you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: <巧妙地进入一个隐藏面板，重新校准他的目标参数。>就是这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rampart is a private security firm founded by Aaron King on October 26, 2271. Its clients include NCR, Python Mining and Doon Steel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 壁垒是一家私人安保公司，由亚伦·金于2271年10月26日创建。其客户包括NCR、巨蟒矿业和杜恩钢铁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ajax [020032A9] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Rampart?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于壁垒的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That may be true, but it still doesn't give you the right to keep him out of NCR custody. He's a citizen. We'll protect him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然那样可能没错，但你不能因为他违反了NCR的规矩就把他赶走。他是公民，我们会保护他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look... you were in a tight spot and you made a decision, I get that. We'll sort this out after the interview. You ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来...你当时处境艰难，你做出了决定，我明白，采访结束后我们再解决这个问题。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Lucky 38 is the safest place for him until we find his relatives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们找到他的亲戚之前，幸运38是对他最安全的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you put him in the Lucky 38? I... okay, I get it. I don't like it, but there isn't a soul alive who's breaking in there without credentials.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你把他放进了幸运38？我...好吧，我懂了。我不喜欢这样，但没人能未经许可闯入那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get one thing straight, though - he will be summoned to provide testimony when I get back to California. He could be the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过有件事我们得说清楚，等我回到加州他就会被传唤作证。他可能是关键。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look... you were in a tight spot and you made a decision, I get that. We'll sort this out after the interview. You ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来...你当时处境艰难，你做出了决定，我明白，采访结束后我们再解决这个问题。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: These people want to kill Michael. I won't let that happen. It was my call and I stand by it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些人想杀迈克尔，我不会让这种事发生的。这是我的决定，我坚持。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're dead wrong, buster. Rest assured this will get sorted out. Whatever your motives, that kid is gonna provide testimony for this case.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你大错特错了，老兄。请放心，事情会解决的。不管你的动机如何，那孩子都会为这个案子作证的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look... you were in a tight spot and you made a decision, I get that. We'll sort this out after the interview. You ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来...你当时处境艰难，你做出了决定，我明白，采访结束后我们再解决这个问题。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR could fuck up a wet dream. I won't risk leaving him in your "custody".
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR会毁了你的春梦，我不会冒险把他交给你“监护”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charles Augen is a former Desert Ranger. One of the "Old Breed", so to speak. Hugo knew him from years back when they brokered the treaty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查理斯·奥根是一名前沙漠游骑兵，可以说，他是“老派”之一。雨果和他多年前签订条约时就认识了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't tell you how odd it is that he's Peter Augen's brother... I mean... talk about opposites. Clears things up, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无法形容他是彼得·奥根的弟弟有多奇怪...我的意思是...就像对立面。不过，事情已经明朗了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Peter was a longtime partner of Jason Bellek. Kept his books. Guess he found some dirt on Jason and mailed it to his brother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 彼得是杰森·贝莱克的长期合伙人，保存他的账本。我猜他找到了杰森的黑材料寄给了他弟弟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to make our way to Potosi Pass and find Charles before Rampart does. As before, there will be caps and a reputation boost. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得去波托西山口赶在壁垒之前找到查理斯。和以前一样，将会有瓶盖和声誉提升。有什么问题吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Care to explain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 介意解释一下吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charles Augen is a former Desert Ranger. One of the "Old Breed", so to speak. Hugo knew him from years back when they brokered the treaty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查理斯·奥根是一名前沙漠游骑兵，可以说，他是“老派”之一。雨果和他多年前签订条约时就认识了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't tell you how odd it is that he's Peter Augen's brother... I mean... talk about opposites. Clears things up, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无法形容他是彼得·奥根的弟弟有多奇怪...我的意思是...就像对立面。不过，事情已经明朗了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Peter was a longtime partner of Jason Bellek. Kept his books. Guess he found some dirt on Jason and mailed it to his brother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 彼得是杰森·贝莱克的长期合伙人，保存他的账本。我猜他找到了杰森的黑材料寄给了他弟弟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to make our way to Potosi Pass and find Charles before Rampart does. As before, there will be caps and a reputation boost. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得去波托西山口赶在壁垒之前找到查理斯。和以前一样，将会有瓶盖和声誉提升。有什么问题吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like an intriguing development. Mind telling me what the fuck is going on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来是个有趣的发展。介意告诉我这他妈的是怎么回事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, I almost forgot! Here, this is an advance. You're going above and beyond, so I'll have more for you at Primm. Anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我差点忘了！给，这是预付款。你做得太好了，我会在普瑞姆为你准备更多的。还有别的事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speaking of caps...
ESP.TRADUIT: 说到瓶盖...

ESP.ORIGINAL: You what? Why didn't you take him to McCarren or the Mojave Outpost? What gives you the right to put a witness up in that tower?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说什么？你为什么不带他去麦卡伦或者莫哈维前哨？你有什么权力把证人关进塔里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't matter now, I guess. Anything happens to that kid and it's your ass, though. He's going to be a key witness in the case against Rampart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在也无所谓了，但那孩子要是出了什么事，你就完了。他将是壁垒案的关键证人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other questions before we head out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 出发前还有其他问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should know that I rescued Peter Augen's son from Dravec. He's up in the Lucky 38.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该知道我从德劳维茨手里救了彼得·奥根的儿子。他现在在幸运38。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The wants of a child witness are immaterial. He could make or break one of the biggest cases in the history of NCR. He stays in the tower.
ESP.TRADUIT: 儿童证人的需要是无关紧要的。他可以创造或破坏NCR历史上最大的案件之一，他待在塔里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: We could be marching into a real fight out there, or just sifting through what's left of his uncle and his farm. Hasn't this kid seen enough?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可能会在那里展开一场真正的战斗，也可能只是在他叔叔和他的农场残骸中搜寻。这孩子还没看够吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm letting my command team know of Michael's whereabouts in case something happens to us. Don't fuck with me on this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要让我的指挥团队知道迈克尔的下落以防我们有什么不测。别在这事上耍我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I plan on taking Michael to his uncle, if that's what he wants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打算带迈克尔去见他叔叔，如果那是他想要的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Meet me near the Canyon Wreckage west of Primm. I have a good idea of where Potosi Pass is located. Pip-Boy should do the rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，在普瑞姆西边的峡谷残骸与我汇合。我很清楚波托西山口的位置，剩下的交给哔哔小子吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd recommend grabbing some extra firepower or companions if you can. This could get hairy. See you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果可以的话，我建议你带上一些额外的火力或同伴，这可能会变得很棘手。到时候见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, it isn't. You endanger that boy and I'll see you brought up on charges. There's more at stake than just his happiness. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不是。如果你危及那孩子的生命，我就会起诉你，这关系到的不仅仅是他的幸福。有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's Michael's choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是迈克尔的选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, we won't. We'll bring him into protective custody when the investigation progresses and we have more resources. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们不会。等调查有了进展，我们有了更多资源，就会对他进行保护性监禁。有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please do that. Health and welfare, all of that. Let him know that NCR hasn't forgotten about him. We'll get justice for his family. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 请这样做，健康和福利，所有这些。让他知道NCR没有忘记他，我们会为他的家人讨回公道。有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might be right, but I want to check on him first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你说得对，但我想先看看他的情况。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He smiles and nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他微笑着点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a potential lead on locating your uncle. Let's go find him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一条可能找到你叔叔的线索。我们去找他吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, if you think that's best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果你觉得这样最好的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSta_00004745_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in over my head. This is a job for NCR. I'm taking you to the Mojave Outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经懵了。这是NCR的工作，我带你去莫哈维前哨吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nods dejectedly.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他低着头，显得很沮丧。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you're best off staying with the Followers. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你最好还是和天启追随者待在一起，我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want... to find my family. Uncle Charlie is family. Let's find him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想...去找我的家人，查理叔叔是家人，我们去找他吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSta_00004742_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! Thank you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的！谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroS_00004B52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He takes a moment to smell the cigarette before lighting up. His entire body quivers with anticipation as he holds the cigarette under his nose.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他在点烟前闻了闻香烟。当他把香烟放在鼻子底下时，他的整个身体都因期待而颤抖。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He lights up and ignores you while he puffs away at the cigarette. He savors every drag and then sighs in relief.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他点起了烟，一边抽着烟，一边无视你。他细细品味每一件苦差事，然后如释重负的叹了口气。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: God, I needed that. This has been the worst day of my life. Truly, I can't imagine how it can get worse. What did you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，我需要这个。这是我这辈子最糟糕的一天，说真的，我无法想象还有什么比这更糟的。你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroS_00004B52_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give one cigarette.> Here, have a smoke.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给一支烟> 给你，抽上一口吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! Thank you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的！谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroS_00004B55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He takes a moment to smell the cigarette before lighting up. His entire body quivers with anticipation as he holds the cigarette under his nose.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他在点烟前闻了闻香烟。当他把香烟放在鼻子底下时，他的整个身体都因期待而颤抖。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He lights up and ignores you while he puffs away at the cigarette. He savors every drag and then sighs in relief.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他点起了烟，一边抽着烟，一边无视你。他细细品味每一件苦差事，然后如释重负的叹了口气。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: God, I needed that. This has been the worst day of my life. Truly, I can't imagine how it can get worse. What did you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，我需要这个。这是我这辈子最糟糕的一天，说真的，我无法想象还有什么比这更糟的。你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroS_00004B55_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give a pack of cigarettes.> Here, take a pack.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给一包香烟> 给你，一包。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know who you are, but you have a beautiful soul. I'll make this last, I promise!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你是谁，但你的灵魂很美。我会让你死得痛快的，我保证！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroS_00004B56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He takes a moment to smell a cigarette before lighting up. His entire body quivers with anticipation as he holds the cigarette under his nose.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他先吸了一口烟，才点燃它。当他把香烟举到鼻尖上时，整个身子都在颤抖，充满了期待。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He lights up and ignores you while he puffs away at the cigarette. He savors every drag and then sighs in relief.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他点起了烟，一边抽着烟，一边无视你。他细细品味每一件苦差事，然后如释重负的叹了口气。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: God, I needed that. This has been the worst day of my life. Truly, I can't imagine how it can get worse. What did you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，我需要这个。这是我这辈子最糟糕的一天，说真的，我无法想象还有什么比这更糟的。你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroS_00004B56_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give a carton of cigarettes.> Take this carton. I won't use it.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给一盒香烟>拿着这盒，我不抽。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That figures. One more turd from the heavens, right on my face! That's it for Mojo! Robbed! Humiliated! Lost my best friend! God, strike me down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这很合理。又来一坨屎，打在我脸上！这就是莫乔！被抢了！丢脸！失去了我最好的朋友！上帝啊，打倒我吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroS_00004B57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm... I apologize. It's just... this has been the worst day of my life. I can't imagine how it could get any worse. Oh, did you need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...抱歉。只是...这是我这辈子最糟糕的一天，我无法想象还有什么比这更糟糕的了。对了，有什么事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroS_00004B57_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any cigarettes to share.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有香烟可以分享。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pardon me, Doctor Perfecto, M.D. I'm just experiencing a bit... of... a... crisis! I need tobacco in my lungs! Fuck the consequences!
ESP.TRADUIT: 原谅我，完美医生，医学博士，我只是有点...的...个...危机！我的肺里需要烟草！去他妈的后果！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroS_00004B71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm... I apologize. It's just... this has been the worst day of my life. Do you need something? Doubt I can help, but I'll try.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...抱歉。只是...这是我这辈子最糟糕的一天。你有什么需要吗？我恐怕帮不上忙，但我会尽力的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroS_00004B71_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You shouldn't smoke. It's an unhealthy habit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不应该吸烟，这是一种不健康的习惯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pardon me, Doctor Perfecto, M.D. I'm just experiencing a bit... of... a... crisis! I need tobacco in my lungs! Fuck the consequences!
ESP.TRADUIT: 原谅我，完美医生，医学博士，我只是有点...的...个...危机！我的肺里需要烟草！去他妈的后果！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroS_00012BC7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm... I apologize. It's just... this has been the worst day of my life. Do you need something? Doubt I can help, but I'll try.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...抱歉。只是...这是我这辈子最糟糕的一天。你有什么需要吗？我恐怕帮不上忙，但我会尽力的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroS_00012BC7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Smokies bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吸烟有害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is my pride and joy, Barf. He gets indigestion from time to time, owed to the fact he eats everything... and I mean everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的骄傲和快乐，吐吐。他经常消化不良，因为他什么都吃...我指的是一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoDogQue_00004B74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He tends to puke up random objects. Sometimes it's good salvage. One time he upchucked a battery and shit out a hammer at the same time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他动不动就吐些乱七八糟的东西，有时还挺有用，某次他就吐出了一个电池和一把锤子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoDogQue_00004B74_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really, I'm not sure how he's alive. He came wandering in from up north one day, just fell in with me and Sugar Tits. He's been a true friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的，我不知道他是怎么活下来的。有一天他从北方来这里，碰巧遇到了我和奶嘴。他是个真正的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoDogQue_00004B74_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that your dog?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是你的狗吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is my pride and joy, Barf. He gets indigestion from time to time, owed to the fact he eats everything... and I mean everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的骄傲和快乐，吐吐。他经常消化不良，因为他什么都吃...我指的是一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoDogQue_00012BC5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He tends to puke up random objects. Sometimes it's good salvage. One time he upchucked a battery and shit out a hammer at the same time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他动不动就吐些乱七八糟的东西，有时还挺有用，某次他就吐出了一个电池和一把锤子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoDogQue_00012BC5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really, I'm not sure how he's alive. He came wandering in from up north one day, just fell in with me and Sugar Tits. He's been a true friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的，我不知道他是怎么活下来的。有一天他从北方来这里，碰巧遇到了我和奶嘴。他是个真正的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoDogQue_00012BC5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Gesture towards Barf> Your puppy?
ESP.TRADUIT: <指向吐吐> 你的小狗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pure mutt, but he's got a little bit of Mississippi Leg Hound in him. If the mood catches him right, he'll grab your leg and just go to town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 纯正杂交犬，但他身上有一点密西西比猎犬的味道。如果他心情好，他会抓住你的腿，然后大操大办。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoDogQue_00004B75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Word of warning - if he does lay into you, it's best to just let him finish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 警告你一句...如果他真的弄你，最好让他弄完。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoDogQue_00004B75_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What breed is Barf?
ESP.TRADUIT: 吐吐是什么犬？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? How do you know Chuck? He doesn't have a lot of friends... no friends, actually, except some of the old Desert Rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你怎么认识查克的？他的朋友不多...其实没有朋友，除了一些以前的沙漠游骑兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroF_00004B5B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and if you're NCR... specifically anyone even loosely affiliated with their revenue collection agency... don't even think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，如果你是NCR...特别是任何与他们的税收机构有松散联系的人...想都别想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroF_00004B5B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not coming to kill him, are you? And who's this kid? I need answers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会是来杀他的吧？这孩子是谁？我需要答案！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroF_00004B5B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand you know Charles Augen. I'd like for you to take us to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你认识查尔斯·奥根，我希望你能带我们去见他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like I said... I'll need some clarification about your motives. He's liable to open fire on all of us if he suspects you. What's your deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像我说的...我需要你澄清一下你的动机。如果他怀疑你，他可能会向我们所有人开火。你是做什么的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroF_00004B65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to talk about finding Charles Augen again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想再谈谈找查理斯·奥根的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, much appreciated. This day has been full of reversals, but things are looking up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，非常感谢。这一天全是倒霉事，但事情正在好转！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroB_00004B60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He imbibes the liquor with relish.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他津津有味的喝着酒。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoo! That's better! Here, Barf. You can have the rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呜！这样好多了！来，吐吐，剩下的给你吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroB_00004B60_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He calls his dog over and then nonchalantly lodges the bottle between Barf's teeth. The dog tilts his head back and empties the bottle in one gulp.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他把狗叫过来，然后若无其事地把瓶子塞到吐吐的牙缝里。那只狗仰着头，一口气把瓶子里的酒喝光了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just like his owner. Gets thirsty when he's sad. So... what did you need? Don't waste your breath if you're selling stuff, I ain't got a cap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像他的主人一样，难过的时候就会口渴。所以...你需要什么？如果你是卖东西的，别白费口舌，我没有瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroB_00004B60_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give 20 caps.> Sorry you had a bad day. Here, have a drink on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给20个瓶盖>很遗憾你今天过得这么糟。来，我请你喝一杯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, God. Chuck had kinfolk? I mean... okay, that makes sense. You sure you want Chuck raising that kid? You know what? Not my business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，上帝，查克还有亲戚？我的意思是...好吧，这说得通。你确定你想让恰克抚养那个孩子吗？你知道吗？不关我的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroH_00004B67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thing is... I'm in a pickle and I need some help. The most valuable thing in the world was taken from me... my Sugar Tits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是...我遇到麻烦了，需要帮助。世界上最有价值的东西从我身边被夺走了...我的奶嘴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroH_00004B67_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn Vipers got the jump on me north of town, robbed me blind and took my pack brahmin hostage. That's why I'm so distraught. Poor Sugar Tits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的毒蛇帮在城北袭击了我，把我洗劫一空，把我的婆罗门牛扣了。这就是我心烦意乱的原因，可怜的奶嘴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroH_00004B67_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help me get my Sugar Tits and I'll take you to see Chuck. Deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮我救出奶嘴，我就带你去见查克。成交？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroH_00004B67_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This boy is his nephew. Charles is his only surviving relative.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个男孩是他的侄子，查理斯是他唯一在世的亲戚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell fire, another one? Just took a courier up there a few weeks back. Chuck's getting fan mail, I guess. Okay, I can work with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我了个去，又来？几周前我带了个邮差过去，我猜查克收到了粉丝的来信。好吧，我可以接受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroC_00004B66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thing is... I'm in a pickle and I need some help. The most valuable thing in the world was taken from me... my Sugar Tits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是...我遇到麻烦了，需要帮助。世界上最有价值的东西从我身边被夺走了...我的奶嘴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroC_00004B66_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn Vipers got the jump on me north of town, robbed me blind and took my pack brahmin hostage. That's why I'm so distraught. Poor Sugar Tits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的毒蛇帮在城北袭击了我，把我洗劫一空，把我的婆罗门牛扣了。这就是我心烦意乱的原因，可怜的奶嘴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroC_00004B66_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help me get my Sugar Tits and I'll take you to see Chuck. Deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮我救出奶嘴，我就带你去见查克。成交？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroC_00004B66_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个邮差。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, but I'm serious about this... don't even joke about taxes with Chuck. He's downright religious about that shit. I guess I could take you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，不过我是认真的...别跟恰克拿税收开玩笑，他对那件事非常虔诚。我想我可以带你去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroN_00004B68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thing is... I'm in a pickle and I need some help. The most valuable thing in the world was taken from me... my Sugar Tits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是...我遇到麻烦了，需要帮助。世界上最有价值的东西从我身边被夺走了...我的奶嘴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroN_00004B68_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn Vipers got the jump on me north of town, robbed me blind and took my pack brahmin hostage. That's why I'm so distraught. Poor Sugar Tits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的毒蛇帮在城北袭击了我，把我洗劫一空，把我的婆罗门牛扣了。这就是我心烦意乱的原因，可怜的奶嘴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroN_00004B68_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help me get my Sugar Tits and I'll take you to see Chuck. Deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮我救出奶嘴，我就带你去见查克。成交？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroN_00004B68_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a lot of things, but I'm definitely not a tax collector.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有很多身份，但我绝对不是税务员。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn brutes! They're led by some towering caveman, goes by "El Oso". They whipped my ass, took everything!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的畜生！领头的是一个高大的穴居人，叫埃尔奥索。他们打了我的屁股，抢走了我的一切！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroR_00004B6E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't enough to rob me, they had to take sweet Sugar Tits and hold her hostage. Five hundred caps, they said! I ain't got that kind of cash!
ESP.TRADUIT: 抢劫我还不够，他们还把奶嘴扣押了。五百瓶盖，他们说！我可没有那么多钱！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroR_00004B6E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they harmed a hair on her... I swear it's gonna get biblical in there... fire and brimstone! Burning frogs! Cats with plague! All that shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们伤害她一根头发...我发誓里面会有圣经里的情节...火与硫磺！燃烧的青蛙!染上瘟疫的猫！所有这些该死的东西！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroR_00004B6E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about the Vipers who took your brahmin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说抓走你双头牛的毒蛇帮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, yes. The warm, tender mercies of NCR... with tears in my eyes, I made an emotional appeal to one of the officers here. I begged him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，对。NCR温暖、温柔的怜悯...我热泪盈眶，动情的向这里的一位军官求助，我恳求他!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroR_00004B6F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did this kind-hearted representative of our fair republic tell me? Uh, "Fuck off, dirty hobo. Not my problem." Those were his words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们美丽共和国的这位善良的代表说了什么呢？"滚开，肮脏的流浪汉，这不关我的事。”这是他的原话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroR_00004B6F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's our tax dollars at work! Chuck was right all along! Robbed by the bandits, dicked down by the government! "Authorities" can go to hell!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是我们交的税！查克是正确的！被土匪抢劫，被官府打压！“当局”见鬼去吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroR_00004B6F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why didn't you go to the authorities? Plenty of NCR around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你不找当局？这附近NCR的人多的是。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who, Barf? Normally he's rock-solid, but he had a mean case of diarrhea after eating one of those lake creatures. They always give him the squirts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁，吐吐？他平时很坚强，但他吃了一只湖里的生物后就拉肚子了，总是喷射。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroR_00004B73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He fell behind while me and Sugar Tits moved ahead, didn't catch up until it was all over. He's a good dog, just has a big appetite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他落在后面，而我和奶嘴走在前面，直到一切都结束了才赶上来。他是条好狗，只是胃口很大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroR_00004B73_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd they get the drop on you? Your dog should've smelled them from a mile away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是怎么抢到你的？你的狗在一英里外就该闻到。

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's the fairest, most agile bovine this side of the Colorado. For ten years she's been by my side, bearing burdens across every clime and terrain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她是科罗拉多河这边最漂亮，最敏捷的牛。十年来，她一直陪在我身边，扛着担子穿越不同的地域。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroR_00004B70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's so special about Sugar Tits?
ESP.TRADUIT: 奶嘴有什么特别的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: These are Vipers, not to be trusted. If I show up with the caps alone, they're liable to rob me again or just kill me then and there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是毒蛇帮，不值得信任。如果我独自带着瓶盖出现，他们可能会再次抢劫我或者当场杀了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroR_00004B72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I need a hired gun to back me up. They got no reason to honor the deal if I'm alone. You look like you can handle yourself, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我需要雇个枪手帮我。如果只有我一个人，他们没有理由履行协议。不过你看起来能应付得来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroR_00004B72_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know I talked it up like I'm broke, but I've got just enough stashed away to cover the ransom. I can make it up when I get back on my routes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我说得好像我破产了一样，但我的钱刚好够支付赎金。等我回到原来的路线上再补给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroR_00004B72_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this just a matter of caps? I'll help you out if that's the issue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是瓶盖的问题吗？如果是这样的话，我可以帮你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you! I'll make it up to you, I promise! They're in a small cave between here and the 188. I'll mark it on your map. We need to hurry!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你！我一定会补偿你的，我保证！他们在188贸易站和这里之间的一个小洞里。我会在你的地图上做个标记。我们得快点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroR_00004B93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll help you. Let's go get Sugar Tits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会帮你的，我们去找奶嘴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, just know that Sugar Tits is suffering as we speak. Every second we delay is another second in bondage!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，但你要知道我们说话的时候奶嘴正在受苦。我们每耽搁一秒，就多被囚禁一秒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoIntroR_00004B92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need more time to decide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要更多的时间来决定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's great. No offense, that surprised me a little. You're good at a lot of things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那太好了。无意冒犯，这让我有点吃惊。你擅长很多事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelBac_00004B84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Papa said I should join the Followers when I get older. Said I would never survive on my own. Mama was nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸爸说我长大后应该加入天启追随者，说我一个人活不下去。妈妈很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelBac_00004B84_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's great. No offense, that surprised me a little. You're good at a lot of things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那太好了。无意冒犯，这让我有点吃惊。你擅长很多事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelBac_0001454B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Papa said I should join the Followers when I get older. Said I would never survive on my own. Mama was nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸爸说我长大后应该加入天启追随者，说我一个人活不下去。妈妈很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelBac_0001454B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like picture books.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比如图画书。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's okay. My brother hated reading and everybody loved him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。我哥哥讨厌读书，但大家都喜欢他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelBac_00004B7F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Papa said I should join the Followers when I get older. Said I would never survive on my own. Mama was nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸爸说我长大后应该加入天启追随者，说我一个人活不下去。妈妈很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelBac_00004B7F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不见得。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's okay. My brother hated reading and everybody loved him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。我哥哥讨厌读书，但大家都喜欢他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelBac_0001454A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Papa said I should join the Followers when I get older. Said I would never survive on my own. Mama was nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸爸说我长大后应该加入天启追随者，说我一个人活不下去。妈妈很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelBac_0001454A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not like wordy paper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不像冗长的文章。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. I won't forget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，我不会忘记的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelBac_00004B7E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Papa said I should join the Followers when I get older. Said I would never survive on my own. Mama was nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸爸说我长大后应该加入天启追随者，说我一个人活不下去。妈妈很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelBac_00004B7E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't ever feel like you have to hide the fact you're a reader. It sharpens your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 永远不要觉得你必须掩饰你是一个爱读书的人，这能让你的头脑变得敏锐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [His eyes widen and he nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他睁大了眼睛，点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I expect you to pull your weight, but I'll never feel sorry for you. Neither should you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你能尽职尽责，但我永远不会同情你。你也不应该。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [His eyes widen and he nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他睁大了眼睛，点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can do anything if you apply yourself. Don't let anyone tell you otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你努力，你可以做到任何事情。不要听信别人的说法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He silently nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他沉默的点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop dwelling on the past and focus on staying alive. You can't afford distractions out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要沉湎于过去，专注于活着。你不能在这里分心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He looks downwards and nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他向下看了看，点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you keep whining I'm going to leave you with the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你继续抱怨，我就把你留给天启追随者了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He looks downwards and nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他向下看了看，点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cry and I leave with Fall-Hearse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哭了我就带着灵车离开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you ever cry when you think about them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你想起他们的时候，你哭过吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelTea_00009E18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I think about them a lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我经常想起他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelTea_00009E19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I've been fortunate in that regard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，在这方面我很幸运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [His eyes widen with horror as he nervously backs away from you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他惊恐的睁大眼睛，紧张的向后退去。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I killed them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我杀了他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <happy bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: <欢快地吠叫！>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfFeed_000099EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about a snack?
ESP.TRADUIT: 来点零食怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: <happy panting>
ESP.TRADUIT: <快乐的喘气>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfPet_000099ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Pet him> You're a good boy, Barf.
ESP.TRADUIT: <抚摸它>你是个好孩子，吐吐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sugar Tits, we're here... wait... that smell... no, no, no, no, no!
ESP.TRADUIT: 奶嘴，我们来了...等等...这味道...不，不，不，不，不！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoScene_00004D6C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mojo, you took too long. Me and the crew had worked up one hell of an appetite... and this brahmin was too sweet to pass up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫乔，你耽搁太久了。我和弟兄们都大吃了一顿...这头牛太香甜了，不容错过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoScene_00004D75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for stopping by. Feel free to help yourself to a piece. The ribs are to die for. Oh, and you still owe us that 500... for insurance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你过来。随便吃一块吧，这排骨非常好吃。对了，你还欠我们500...用于保险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: You heartless bastard... how could you do this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个没心没肺的杂种...你怎么能这样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoScene_00004D77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, I was hungry. Turned out real good with that barbecue sauce we ripped off another shipment. Danny got it just right. He's the next Cook-Cook.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简单，我饿了，用我们从另一批货里偷来的烧烤酱做的真不错。丹尼做得刚刚好，他是下一个大厨库克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoScene_00004D78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're not polite enough to accept my hospitality... I'll insist that you pay what's owed. Now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不礼貌地接受我的款待...那我要求你偿还欠款，马上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't even think about that now... poor Sugar Tits. This is too much to bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在连想都不敢想...可怜的奶嘴。这让人难以忍受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoScene_00004D7B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Forceful gagging.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <强力作呕>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfVomit_00004D6E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Forceful gagging.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <强力作呕>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfVomit_00004D7F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Forceful gagging.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <强力作呕>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfVomit_00004D84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Forceful gagging.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <强力作呕>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfVomit_00004D86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Forceful gagging.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <强力作呕>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfVomit_00004D87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Forceful gagging.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <强力作呕>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfVomit_00004D88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Forceful gagging.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <强力作呕>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfVomit_00004D89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Forceful gagging.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <强力作呕>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfVomit_00004D8A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Forceful gagging.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <强力作呕>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfVomit_00004D8B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Forceful gagging.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <强力作呕>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfVomit_00004D80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's lost it. Looks like you're keeping your composure, though... if you and crybaby want to leave, hand over the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他失去理智了。不过看起来你很镇定...如果你和爱哭鬼想离开，就把瓶盖交出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoForce_00004D7D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't wanna be dog food!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想成为狗粮！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoTP_00004DB4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to slow-roast you over that fire and feed pieces of of you to Barf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把你放在火上慢慢烤然后把你的碎片喂给吐吐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't wanna be dog food!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想变成狗粮！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoTP_00012BC6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make you puppy treat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你做成小狗点心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love it when they say no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢他们说不。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoNoSim_00004DB7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: God, I'm gonna feel a little guilty about this one. I'll make it quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，我对这件事会有点内疚的。我会速战速决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoNoDum_00004DB6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack.> You hurt booger tips! No pay!
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击> 你伤害了鼻涕嘴！没报酬！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] What? Look, this ain't a board meeting... we take what we want, when we want! I... all right, what do you propose? Let's hear it.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 什么？听着，这又不是董事会...我们想要什么就拿什么！我...好吧，你有什么建议？让我们听听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoNoSpe_00004DB9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie.> He obviously doesn't have the means to pay you. I'd like to suggest another solution.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>他显然没钱付你，我想提出另一个解决办法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] You're a special kind of dumbass. No dice. Caps or I take your scalp.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 你真是个稀有的白痴，没门。瓶盖，不然我就割了你的头皮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoNoSpe_00004DBC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you accept a vomiting dog in place of caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能接受一只呕吐的狗代替瓶盖吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay the fuck away from me, freak!
ESP.TRADUIT: 离我远点，怪胎！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoNoCan_00004DB8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not the only one who's worked up an appetite. You'll be delicious with a side of beans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是唯一一个食欲大增的人，你配上豆子会很美味的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gotta be kidding me. Up and at 'em, boys!
ESP.TRADUIT: 开什么玩笑。起来对付他们，弟兄们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoNoAni_00004DB5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Justice for Sugar Tits!
ESP.TRADUIT: 为奶嘴讨回公道！

ESP.ORIGINAL: A loan, huh? Okay, Mojo. You have two weeks. With points you're gonna owe me an even thousand. Yeah. Don't make me come looking for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 贷款，嗯？好吧，莫乔，你有两周的时间。算上点数，你要欠我一千瓶盖。嗯，别让我来找你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoNoSpe_00004DBD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, you hold the caps for him. He's obviously upset. We're making a run down south but we'll be back. You can count on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，你帮他拿着瓶盖，他显然很沮丧。我们正在往南走，但我们会回来的。你放心吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoNoSpe_00004DBD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> Give him a loan and he'll pay you back with interest. You'll profit more in the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>借钱给他，他会连本带利还给你，最后你会赚得更多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... I'm gonna kill you... for wasting my time with this bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的...我要杀了你...在这些破事上浪费我的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoNoSpe_00004DC0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you would really benefit from a refreshing Nuka-Cola. That should settle things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得来杯清爽的核子可乐会对你很有好处，这样事情就解决了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell yeah, we got a fighter!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了，我们有个高手！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoNoHar_00004DBB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack.> I've heard enough of your guff. Throw down or stop wasting my time.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我受够了，滚蛋，别再浪费我的时间了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, handle her with care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请小心对待她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoPostVi_000051D6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Bury Sugar Tits.> Okay, let's bury her.
ESP.TRADUIT: <埋葬奶嘴> 好吧，我们把她埋了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, handle her with care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请小心对待她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoPostVi_00012BC8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Bury Sugar Tits.> Put in dirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: <埋葬奶嘴> 盖上土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I'm not taking you to Chuck's place. Good luck navigating that pass without me. God, this is just too much!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就不带你去查克家了，祝你在没有我的情况下顺利通过。天啊，这也太过分了吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoPostVi_000051D7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not helping you bury Sugar Tits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想帮你埋奶嘴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you even think about! To desecrate her body... it turns my stomach... though the aroma of barbecue is... oh, it's good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你连想都不要想！亵渎她的身体...这让我反胃...虽然烧烤的香味...噢，很棒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoPostVi_000051DD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn you for planting these evil, irreverent thoughts! We bury Sugar Tits! That's the end of it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，你把这些邪恶的，不敬的想法灌输给我！我们把奶嘴埋了！到此为止！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoPostVi_000051DD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have to admit she does smell good. One bite wouldn't hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得承认她确实很香，咬一口也无妨。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you even think about! To desecrate her body... it turns my stomach... though the aroma of barbecue is... oh, it's good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你连想都不要想！亵渎她的身体...这让我反胃...虽然烧烤的香味...噢，很棒。
