ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoPostVi_00012BCA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn you for planting these evil, irreverent thoughts! We bury Sugar Tits! That's the end of it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，你把这些邪恶的，不敬的想法灌输给我！我们把奶嘴埋了！到此为止！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoPostVi_00012BCA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Smell tasty. Nibble?
ESP.TRADUIT: 闻起来很美味，来一口？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! Show a little respect for the dead! She trekked across half of creation with me... bearing her burdens with grace and a cheerful attitude!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！给死者一点尊重！她和我一起走过了半个世界...以优雅和愉快的态度承担她的重负！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoPostVi_000051D8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's more than I can say about some of our present company.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这比我们现在公司里的一些人要多得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoPostVi_000051D8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't be serious. We don't have time to bury a half-cooked brahmin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会是认真的吧，我们没时间埋葬一头半生不熟的婆罗门牛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! Show a little respect for the dead! She trekked across half of creation with me... bearing her burdens with grace and a cheerful attitude!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！给死者一点尊重！她和我一起走过了半个世界...以优雅和愉快的态度承担她的重负！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoPostVi_00012BC9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's more than I can say about some of our present company.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这比我们现在公司里的一些人要多得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoPostVi_00012BC9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take too long to put moo-cow in dirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把牛放在土里花的时间太长了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, she's at peace now. Oh, I'm going to miss her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，她现在平静了。噢，我会想念她的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoBark_000051DA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is it, I'm sure of it. Let's clear this rubble and we'll find a hatch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这里，我敢肯定。把这些碎石清理干净，我们会找到一个舱口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoo! There it is, boys! Didn't I tell you! Didn't I tell you! This is gonna be great! Garth, you mumbling sonofabitch, I could kiss you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇！在那儿，孩子们！我不是说了吗！我不是告诉过你吗！这太棒了！加思，你这个喋喋不休的狗娘养的，我真想亲你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Viper scum... serves 'em right. Should've known better than to camp out up here. Karma is something. Uh-oh, looks like we got a survivor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毒蛇帮人渣...他们活该，我早该知道不该在这里扎营，因果报应。哦哦，看来有幸存者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoBark_00008C89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn, that's cold-blooded. Dying to the tune of Johnny Guitar... Lord have mercy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，这太冷血了。在约翰尼·吉他的旋律中死去...主啊，发发慈悲吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoBark_00008CD8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chuck, it's Mojo! Don't set off... whatever you got buried out here! It's friendlies!
ESP.TRADUIT: 查克，我是莫乔！不要引爆...不管你在这里埋了什么！是友军！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoBark_000095D1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to see you, Chuck. Figure it's a little premature for a full stash of tobacco. Got a few supplies to swap, but not my usual stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴见到你，查克。我觉得现在买一大堆烟草还为时过早，有一些东西要交换，但不是我常用的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoBark_0000B049_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ain't got the words. Would you please deliver the eulogy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道该说什么，你能致悼词吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoForceG_000055DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you believe this gal? Here we are on a no shit life-and-death mission... and she dictates that we've got to do some chore for her first!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能相信这个女孩吗？我们正在执行一项生死攸关的任务...她还要求我们先帮她做点家务！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you waste a bullet on that raiding bitch. They was probably looking to ambush folks in the canyon... karma stings, don't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别在那个突袭的婊子身上浪费子弹。他们可能想在峡谷里伏击别人...因果报应，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoForceG_00008C9E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wonder how many caravans she's ripped off over the years... how many people she's murdered for a few trinkets... no, let her die slow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道这些年来，她抢劫了多少个商队...她为了几个小玩意杀了多少人...不，让她慢慢死去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoForceG_00008C9E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nods in agreement and tries in vain to keep his composure when looking at the grave. He sobs repeatedly and wipes tears from his eyes.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他点头表示同意，并试图在看着坟墓时保持镇静，但却无济于事。他不停地抽泣着，擦去了眼角的泪水。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. I'll need a moment and then we can get on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。我需要点时间，然后我们就可以上路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoSTEulo_000055EA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it's best if we all observe a moment of silence for Sugar Tits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们最好为奶嘴默哀一分钟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nods in agreement and tries in vain to keep his composure when looking at the grave. He sobs repeatedly and wipes tears from his eyes.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他点头表示同意，并试图在看着坟墓时保持镇静，但却无济于事。他不停地抽泣着，擦去了眼角的泪水。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. I'll need a moment and then we can get on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。我需要点时间，然后我们就可以上路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoSTEulo_00012BC2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No move lips for tits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别动嘴唇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nods in agreement and tries in vain to keep his composure when looking at the grave. He sobs repeatedly and wipes tears from his eyes.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他点头表示同意，并试图在看着坟墓时保持镇静，但却无济于事。他不停地抽泣着，擦去了眼角的泪水。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. I'll need a moment and then we can get on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。我需要点时间，然后我们就可以上路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoSTEulo_000059EB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sugar Tits, you will be missed. Your moos will echo through the wasteland for generations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奶嘴，我们会想念你的。你的哞声将在这片废土上世代回响。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nods in agreement and tries in vain to keep his composure when looking at the grave. He sobs repeatedly and wipes tears from his eyes.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他点头表示同意，并试图在看着坟墓时保持镇静，但却无济于事。他不停地抽泣着，擦去了眼角的泪水。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. I'll need a moment and then we can get on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。我需要点时间，然后我们就可以上路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoSTEulo_00012BC3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Booger tips, we miss your moos.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鼻涕嘴，我们想念你的哞哞声。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He remains silent and reflects on your eulogy.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他沉默地听着你的悼词。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your words touched me. I'm sure Sugar Tits appreciates it, looking down on us from the green fields of brahmin heaven. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的话感动了我。我相信奶嘴会很感激的，在婆罗门牛天堂的绿色田野上俯视我们。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoSTEulo_000055E7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. I'll need a moment, and then we can get on the road
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。我需要一点时间，然后我们就可以出发了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoSTEulo_000055E7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sugar Tits is dead, dead ere her prime, young Sugar Tits, and hath not left her peer...
ESP.TRADUIT: 奶嘴死了，在她的盛年之前就死了，年轻的奶嘴，没有离开她的同伴...

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He stands in stunned silence, horrified at your words.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他怔怔地站在那里，被你的话吓坏了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: May God have mercy on your soul for such irreverence... because the spirit of Sugar Tits will haunt you for the rest of your days. I swear it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 愿上帝宽恕你如此不敬的灵魂...因为奶嘴的灵魂会在你的余生中挥之不去。我发誓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoSTEulo_000055E8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I made a deal and I intend to keep it... but I'll honor her in my own way first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做了一个约定，我打算遵守它...但我会先用我自己的方式来纪念她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoSTEulo_000055E8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here lies Sugar Tits. She was delicious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里长眠着奶嘴，她很美味。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nods in agreement and tries in vain to keep his composure when looking at the grave. He sobs repeatedly and wipes tears from his eyes.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他点头表示同意，并试图在看着坟墓时保持镇静，但却无济于事。他不停地抽泣着，擦去了眼角的泪水。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. I'll need a moment and then we can get on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。我需要点时间，然后我们就可以上路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoSTEulo_000059ED_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sugar Tits, you were no mere pack brahmin. You were a member of our family. Rest in peace, sister.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奶嘴，你不只是头婆罗门牛，你是我们家族的一员。安息吧，妹妹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just... just have a little patience, okay? I'm going above and beyond here, I need to secure my future!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就...有点耐心，好吗？我已经做得很好了，我要确保我的未来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's this thing... it's... well, it could change everything for me! Got it on good authority that there's an old armory northeast of town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个东西...它是...嗯，可能会改变我的一切！有可靠消息说在城镇的东北部有个旧军械库。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inside this armory are some pre-war robots, just waiting to be picked up! It's like a pack brahmin with armor and missiles! Perfect!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这个军械库里有一些战前的机器人，就等着被带走！就像一群带着盔甲和导弹的婆罗门牛！完美！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a tiny bit of labor involved, so I was waiting to get a team together. Well, we're a bonafide team! Let's go get it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这需要一点人力，所以我一直在等着组建一个团队。好吧，我们是一个真诚的团队！我们去拿吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: This sounds like you're about to waste more of our time. We need to get Michael to his uncle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你又要浪费我们的时间了，我们得带迈克尔去找他叔叔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Details? How about some secret squirrel, Brotherhood of Steel shit? Yeah, you heard me. That's the source for this... supposedly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 细节？秘密松鼠怎么样，钢铁兄弟会之类的？嗯，你听到了，这就是这个的来源...大概吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's this thing... it's... well, it could change everything for me! Got it on good authority that there's an old armory northeast of town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个东西...它是...嗯，可能会改变我的一切！有可靠消息说在城镇的东北部有个旧军械库。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inside this armory are some pre-war robots, just waiting to be picked up! It's like a pack brahmin with armor and missiles! Perfect!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这个军械库里有一些战前的机器人，就等着被带走！就像一群带着盔甲和导弹的婆罗门牛！完美！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a tiny bit of labor involved, so I was waiting to get a team together. Well, we're a bonafide team! Let's go get it! It's that simple!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这需要一点人力，所以我一直在等着组建一个团队。好吧，我们是一个真诚的团队！我们去拿吧！就这么简单！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to need more details.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要更多细节。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nonsense! The place is dead, sealed off. Not a soul has stepped foot in there since the war. It's was just a depot for surplus hardware.
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡说！那地方死气沉沉，被封了好久。战后就没人去过那里了，那只是一个储存多余硬件的仓库。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit fire, you'll probably find all kinds of goodies down there. Weapons, armor, ammunition... all that good stuff. Take as much as you can carry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我操了，你可能会在那里找到各种各样的好东西。武器、盔甲、弹药...都是些好东西，能拿多少就拿多少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: This sounds like a good way to get killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这听起来是个被杀的好方法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He exhales sharply and glares at you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他猛吸一口气，恶狠狠地瞪着你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: There will never be a replacement for Sugar Tits... never. Besides, it's too dangerous for brahmin on my routes, especially in the Great Basin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 永远不会有奶嘴的替代品了...永远没有。而且，我的路线对婆罗门牛来说太危险了，尤其是在大盆地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once I've secured a robot... and sufficient time for mourning has passed... yes, I will get another brahmin. She won't be a Sugar Tits, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦我找到了机器人...哀悼的时间也已经过去...是的，我会再买一头婆罗门牛，不过她不会是奶嘴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you just get another pack brahmin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不再买一头驮运婆罗门牛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I learned about it from a fellow trader, Matteo. He in turn learned of this spot from Garth, one of the most trusted sources in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从一位同行马特奥那里了解到这个的。他又是从加思那里得知这个地点的，加思是莫哈维地区最值得信赖的线人之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the good part... Garth bought this information from a true-blue Brotherhood Paladin. It's completely legitimate!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是最精彩的部分...加思是从一个真正的兄弟会圣骑士那里买到的这个信息。这是完全合法的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's hidden away, just waiting for us to stroll in there and take what we want! We gotta act fast before someone else beats us to it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 它藏得很好，就等着我们溜达进去，想要什么就拿什么！我们得快点行动，免得被别人捷足先登！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's your source for this information?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从谁那获取到这些情报的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No shit, it's double-secret. This guy was travelling undercover, needed information from Garth... so he did a squid pro dough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这是双重秘密。这家伙在卧底，需要加思的情报...所以他做了一个鱿鱼面团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: They aren't even supposed to tell anyone. Garth said... well, Matteo said this particularly paladin was, uh... disillusioned, didn't care. Boom!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们本不该告诉任何人的。加思说...嗯，马特奥说这个圣骑士是...幻灭了，不在乎了。砰！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Brotherhood of Steel] I highly doubt that this came from a real Brotherhood Paladin.
ESP.TRADUIT: [钢铁兄弟会]我非常怀疑这是出自真正的兄弟会圣骑士之口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Resistance? It's sealed up. Ain't nothing alive down there except maybe a few bugs and rats. I swear, this is gonna be a breeze!
ESP.TRADUIT: 抵抗？它被封起来了，除了几只虫子和老鼠，下面什么都没有。我发誓，这绝对是小菜一碟！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any real information on this place? Maps, expected resistance, anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有这里的真实情报吗？地图，预期的抵抗，什么之类的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't regret this, I promise! Here's the spot on your map. Lead the way, partner!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我保证，不会让你后悔的！这是你在地图上的定位。带路吧，搭档！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我做就是了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'll just stay here and continue mourning Sugar Tits. Hell fire, I'll build a goddamn mausoleum out of rocks if you leave me to my devices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就待在这里继续哀悼奶嘴吧。见鬼，如果你让我自生自灭，我就用石头建一座该死的陵墓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not doing this. Find someone else to be your prospecting buddy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不会做呢，找别人去当你的淘金伙伴吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think happens when you die? I think about my family a lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为你死后会发生什么？我很想念我的家人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelGre_00005A08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，现在不行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He looks downwards and nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他向下看了看，点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He blinks in bewilderment and fear for a moment.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他在困惑和恐惧中眨了眨眼。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelDea_00005A10_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's nothing. You're just dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都没有，你只是死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never thought of it like that. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没这么想过。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelDea_00005A0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know, but I won't live in fear of it. It's part of life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，但我不会活在恐惧中。这是生活的一部分。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope my family is happy. Sugar Tits, too. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我的家人幸福，奶嘴也是。谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelDea_00005A0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think death is the end. There's something on the other side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认为死亡就是终点，在另一边还有点什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <howling>
ESP.TRADUIT: <长嚎>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfHowl_00005A13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <growling>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咆哮>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfGrowl_000099EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who? Look, cut the bullshit. Talk straight or it's gonna get frisky. Mind the turret.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁？听着，废话少说，有话直说，不然会闹起来的。小心炮塔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you heard the good news of Jason Bright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说辐光杰森的好消息了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sugar, thanks for humoring my ego... but I'm afraid any sex appeal melted away with the better part of my skin years ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 甜心，谢谢你迁就我的自尊...但恐怕多年前，我的性感魅力就已经和我的好皮肤一起消失了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since I'd rather not exchange laser fire with such a charming and attractive guest... how about you state the purpose of your visit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然我不愿意和如此迷人的客人用激光交火...何不说明一下你此行的目的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Smile.> Frisky can be a good thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: <微笑>活泼可能是件好事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you hear about... Sparks, you dumb bitch. Yes, we have weapons, but they're off-limits. This is a restricted facility. You shouldn't be here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么听说...斯巴克的，你个愚蠢的婊子。是的，我们有武器，但这是禁区，这里是禁入区。你不该来这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: We heard there were some weapons down here. We'd like to look for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们听说这里有一些武器，我们想进去看看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bad way to start this conversation. Start over and keep it cool... a little courtesy goes a long way, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可不是个好开场白。重新来过，保持冷静...一点礼貌就能帮上大忙，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have time for this shit. Get out of my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没时间跟你扯这些，别挡我的路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are robots here... well, sort of. This was a pre-war armory, part of a large, underground rail system for... a variety of things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有机器人...嗯，有一些吧。这是一个战前的军械库，是一个大型地下铁路系统的一部分，用于...各种各样的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can get you access to the robots. Getting them running is up to you. Gonna require a little trading up front, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能让你接触到机器人，让他们运行起来取决于你。不过需要先做点交易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My friend here needs some protection for his caravan. We can trade to make it happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我朋友的商队需要些保护，我们可以通过交易来实现。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm... I go by Hypatia, not that it should matter. Now... what in the hell are you doing here? Speak up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我叫海帕夏，不过这无关紧要。现在...你到底在这里做什么？快说！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought this place would be empty. Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还以为这地方空无一人呢，你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, you have my attention. I assumed you'd be a bunch of bloodthirsty troglodytes... or maybe an angry mob on a witch hunt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你引起我的注意了。我还以为你们是一群嗜血的穴居人...也可能是一群愤怒的暴徒在进行政治迫害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, just tell me what you're after to and I'll see if I can help. Just shoot straight with me, that's all I ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，告诉我你在找什么，我看看能不能帮上忙。直截了当的告诉我，这是我唯一的要求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You down here working on conics?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里研究圆锥曲线吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack.> I'm here to take what I want, and you won't stop me.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我是来拿我想要的东西的，你阻止不了我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I can't argue with that logic. Helping a kid, huh? Okay... we might be able to work something out. Gonna take some work, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无法反驳这种逻辑。帮助一个孩子，是吗？好吧...我们也许能想个办法，不过还得花点功夫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Point to Mojo> This idiot needs a robot. I need him to get this kid home. Therefore, robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: <指着莫乔>这个白痴需要一个机器人，我需要他把这孩子带回家。因此，机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The northern railway will take you to the robot depot. Unfortunately, there's an obstacle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 往北的铁路会带你去机器人仓库。不幸的是，有一个障碍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally the tunnels are teeming with ferals. You might balk, but they're a security buffer for me. I can travel freely and trade with other ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正常情况下，隧道里到处都是狂尸鬼。你可能会畏缩，但他们是我的安全缓冲，我可以自由穿行并与其他食尸鬼交易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few weeks back a monster entered that chamber and killed my ferals. You kill that monster and I'll open the door remotely. Deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 几个星期前，一头怪物进入了那个房间，杀死了我的狂尸鬼。你杀了那个怪物，我来远程开门。成交？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you have in mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么想法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The northern railway will take you to the robot depot. Unfortunately, there's an obstacle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 往北的铁路会带你去机器人仓库。不幸的是，有一个障碍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally the tunnels are teeming with ferals. You might balk, but they're a security buffer for me. I can travel freely and trade with other ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正常情况下，隧道里到处都是狂尸鬼。你可能会畏缩，但他们是我的安全缓冲，我可以自由穿行并与其他食尸鬼交易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few weeks back a monster entered that chamber and killed my ferals. You kill that monster and I'll open the door remotely. Deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 几个星期前，一头怪物进入了那个房间，杀死了我的狂尸鬼。你杀了那个怪物，我来远程开门。成交？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: More bullshit distractions. Fine, tell me what you need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是一堆废话。好吧，告诉我你想要什么吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Far to the northeast, town called Ghouldom. Branches off the rail system going up to Groom Lake. Nice little community of ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在东北很远的地方，有个小镇叫古尔多姆，铁路系统的分支通往格鲁姆湖。不错的食尸鬼小社区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are you trading with other ghouls?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在哪里和其他食尸鬼交易？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've done a cursory inventory, and most of them are simple protectrons, probably intended for manual labor. There was one, however...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做了一个粗略的清单，大多数都是简单的保护者，可能是用于体力劳动的。不过，有一个...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's just say that if you're looking for firepower, you're gonna get it in spades. Repairing it is far beyond me, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说吧，如果你要的是火力，那你绝对能得到。不过，修理它远远超出了我的能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of robots are stored here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里存放的是什么类型的机器人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A ravenous beast, killing and eating everything indiscriminately. Bloodthirsty and merciless. You can't afford to hesitate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一只贪婪的野兽，不分青红皂白地杀戮和吃掉一切，嗜血无情。你不能迟疑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of monster?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么样的怪兽？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suffered some pretty serious leg injuries around the time I... changed. Never healed right, don't have good mobility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的腿受了很严重的伤，就在我...转化的时候。一直没有痊愈，行动不便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to be the idiot in a horror movie that can't outrun the monster. Better not to take the stage if you can't run.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不要当恐怖片里那个跑不过怪物的白痴呢。如果你跑不了，最好别登台。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not take care of it yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不自己处理呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent. Here, a little something from the stores. Just be careful not to... form a habit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了。给，这是我的一点小馈赠。不过你可得小心不要...养成习惯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've killed my share of monsters. I'll make short work of whatever's lurking in those tunnels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀过不少怪物。不管是什么潜伏在隧道里，我都会尽快解决掉的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent. I'll monitor your movements on the security cameras. Once the threat is neutralized I'll unlock the depot. It's up to you after that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。我会通过监控摄像头监控你的行动，一旦解除威胁，我就打开仓库。之后就看你的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't get far without my help. The tunnels are dangerous for humans, definitely not a place to dawdle. Knock yourself out, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有我的帮助，你走不了多远。隧道对人类来说很危险，绝对不是一个可以闲逛的地方。不过，请自便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see your wares.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看你的商品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericTra_0001D83E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best selection underground!
ESP.TRADUIT: 地下最好的选择！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetGenericTra_0001CB6D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's what I have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我有的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericTra_00015FA3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see your menu.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看你的菜单。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's what I got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericTra_000368E6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see your menu.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看你的菜单。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, inventory! Here it comes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，库存！来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericTra_000368E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see your menu.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看你的菜单。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me show you... what's in my pocket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我给你看看...我口袋里的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericTra_000368E8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see your menu.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看你的菜单。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prospector [02015A51] (mod) Quest : ([02015A56]aaDetProspectorStuff) Prospector Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetProsp_aaDetGenericTra_00015A59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: God bless you. Fay would hug you for this. I'll put it to good use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 愿上帝保佑你，费伊会为此拥抱你的。我会好好利用它的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericTra_0001412A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Pay 100 caps> I'd like to make a donation.
ESP.TRADUIT: <支付100瓶盖>我想捐点款。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Living in desperation and poverty under the heel of old, rich men is trading one master for another. Why would we do this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 生活在绝望和贫穷中，被老富人压迫，不过是换一个主人。我们为什么要这么做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericTra_000149B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any chance I can convince you to join NCR instead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能说服你加入NCR吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Living in desperation and poverty under the heel of old, rich men is trading one master for another. Why would we do this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 生活在绝望和贫穷中，被老富人压迫，不过是换一个主人。我们为什么要这么做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericTra_000149BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You like Bear better. Pretty flag.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你更喜欢熊，旗帜很美。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I recommend everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我推荐所有的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericTra_0001CB18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like a drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想喝一杯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetGenericTra_0000C02E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to give you some supplies for the fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想给你一些战斗所需的物资。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give killing things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给点杀人的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetGenericTra_0000C02F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to give you some supplies for the upcoming fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想给你一些接下来战斗所需的物资。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hypatia [02006A0A] (mod) Quest : ([02006A22]aaDetHypatiaStuff) Hypatia's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, first one is on the house.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来，第一杯免费。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hank [02010EC2] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetGenericTra_00011158_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like a drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想喝一杯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我马上照办。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hank [02010EC2] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetGenericTra_00011159_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like a drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想喝一杯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My pleasure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不客气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cap [02017E21] (mod) Quest : ([02017E24]aaDetCapStuff) Cap's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetCapSt_aaDetGenericTra_00017E37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just can't believe... oh... all right, let's get moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真不敢相信...哦...好吧，我们走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Glare at him>
ESP.TRADUIT: <瞪着他>

ESP.ORIGINAL: My position? I'm bereaved and destitute! She's living high on the hog down here, won't get off her ass and solve her own problems! Some people...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的资格？我失去亲人，一贫如洗！她在这里过着奢侈的生活，不愿振作起来解决自己的问题！有些人...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think you're in a position to criticize her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为你没有资格批评她。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No need to be rude. I'm just making a point. We're in real need here and she's making demands for her ghoul kingdom. My livelihood is at stake!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没必要这么粗鲁。我只是想说明一点，我们现在很需要她，而她却在为她的食尸鬼王国提出要求。我的生计岌岌可危！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mojo, whenever you speak I feel my mental faculties deteriorate. Please stop talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫乔，每次你说话，我都觉得我的智力在退化。请不要再说了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you go worrying about ol' Mojo, I'll be fine. Got Barf and a good rifle, ain't nobody messing with us. Just peachy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心老莫乔，我会没事的，我有吐吐和一把好步枪，没人敢惹我们。非常棒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoTrueSt_00006FD6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gonna be okay on your own?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一个人能行吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Safe travels. Let's go, Barf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一路平安。我们走，吐吐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoTrueSt_00006FD7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到时候见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Goodsprings. It's a fine town with very agreeable people. I've had a number of engaging conversations with Easy Pete, thank you very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，清泉镇。这是一个美丽的小镇，人们都很和蔼可亲。我和闲人彼得进行了很多有趣的对话，非常感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoTrueSt_00006FD9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe one day you'll come to appreciate the peace and common courtesy you can find in a small town like Goodsprings. See you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许有一天，你会开始欣赏在清泉镇这样的小镇上所能找到的和平和普遍的礼貌。到时候见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoTrueSt_00006FD9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodsprings? Really?
ESP.TRADUIT: 清泉镇？真的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Goodsprings. It's a fine town with very agreeable people. I've had a number of engaging conversations with Easy Pete, thank you very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，清泉镇。这是一个美丽的小镇，人们都很和蔼可亲。我和闲人彼得进行了很多有趣的对话，非常感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoTrueSt_00012BC4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe one day you'll come to appreciate the peace and common courtesy you can find in a small town like Goodsprings. See you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许有一天，你会开始欣赏在清泉镇这样的小镇上所能找到的和平和普遍的礼貌。到时候见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoTrueSt_00012BC4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why sad town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么是糟糕的小镇？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah... I think you do. You carved up one hell of a trail back in town. Goddamn, I like your sand. All for one kid you don't even know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...我觉得你认识。你在城里开辟了一条该死的小路，该死，我喜欢你的沙子，为了一个你根本不认识的孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenWhyMo_00006FE9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and thank you for getting rid of Nash. I'm not supposed to say this... but he was the weirdest sonofabitch I ever worked with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，谢谢你摆脱了纳什。我不应该说这些...但他是我共事过的最古怪的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenWhyMo_00006FE9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He would speak in the third person at our meetings. Drove me fucking crazy. Wish I could shake your hand. Truly, it's not personal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在我们的会议上以第三人称发言，快把我逼疯了。真希望能和你握个手，真的，这不是针对个人的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenWhyMo_00006FE9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> I don't know anyone named Mojo.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>我不认识什么叫莫乔的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... but my hands are tied... I'm... I'm just doing my job. Don't enjoy it, to be sure. Tell me where Mojo is and I'll get it done, no fuss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是，但我无能为力...我...我只是在做我的工作。不喜欢这样，可以肯定。告诉我莫乔在哪儿，我来搞定，无需紧张。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenWhyMo_00006FEF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You one of these sick bastards that likes killing kids?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也是那种喜欢杀小孩的杂碎吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That... was not wise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那...是不明智的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenWhyMo_00006FF0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spoken like a true coward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说话像个真正的懦夫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not this fucking place!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这个鬼地方不行！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenTP_00006FEC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to bury you alive in that cemetery. You'll be in Goodsprings... forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把你活埋在那个墓地里，你会留在清泉镇...永远。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not this fucking place!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这个鬼地方不行！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenTP_00012BE7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take nap in cement-hairy. Not wake up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在毛水泥里睡个午觉吧，别醒了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, it's... well, Goodsprings has that effect. Down to business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我...好吧，清泉镇有这种效果。干正事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenAttac_00006FED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> Stop stalling and do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>别磨蹭了快动手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I had a good teacher. Strict. Let's just say he took "Sleeping with a gun under your pillow" to a whole new level. Peculiar but effective.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我有位好老师，他很严厉。这么说吧，他把“睡觉时枕头下放把枪”提升到了一个新的高度。奇特但有效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenShotg_00006FEB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, this is my baby, Jolene. I tuck her in and sing her to sleep each night. More reliable than any of my ex-wives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这是我的宝贝，乔琳，每天晚上帮她盖好被子，唱歌哄她入睡。比我的任何一个前妻都可靠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenShotg_00006FEB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You even know how to use that thing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道怎么用那玩意吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you already know. Need information... and to tie up loose ends. Same for you and the boy. I'll make it quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你已经知道了，需要情报...还有收尾工作。你和那个男孩也一样，我会速战速决的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenCool_00006FEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and thank you for getting rid of Nash. I'm not supposed to say this... but he was the weirdest sonofabitch I ever worked with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，谢谢你摆脱了纳什。我不应该说这些...但他是我共事过的最古怪的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenCool_00006FEA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He would speak in the third person at our meetings. Drove me fucking crazy. Wish I could shake your hand. Truly, it's not personal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在我们的会议上以第三人称发言，快把我逼疯了。真希望能和你握个手，真的，这不是针对个人的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenCool_00006FEA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your business with Mojo?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找莫乔有什么事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're animals... but they're loyal. Nothing worse than disloyalty. I'm guessing that's what started this entire mess. Augen, that is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是动物...但他们很忠诚。没有什么比不忠更糟糕的了，我猜这就是整件事的起因，就是奥根。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenCool_00006FF9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You play at his level, with the highest stakes... you can't just turn away or change sides. These people haved murdered whole towns for less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在他的层级上玩，下最大的赌注...你不能就这么转身离开或改变立场。这些人为了一点小事就能屠杀整个镇子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenCool_00006FF9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thankfully I'm just a simple button-pusher. I turn out the lights and empty the trash, not much else. I like the simplicity of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运的是，我只是一个简单的接线员。我关了灯，倒了垃圾，就没别的事了，我喜欢这种简单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenCool_00006FF9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see you brought friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看你带朋友来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, afraid not. Above my pay grade. My boss is... well, she's a rigid, homicidal bitch born in the bottom rung of hell. Can't go back on a contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，恐怕不行，超出我的职权范围。我的老板是...她是个顽固的，爱杀人的婊子，出生在地狱的最底层。不能违背合同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenCool_00006FEE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, it'll be fast... for both of you. Just tell me where Mojo is and I'll get it done. You have my word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，会很快的...你俩都是。告诉我莫乔在哪里，我会搞定的，我向你保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenCool_00006FEE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any chance I can convince you to reconsider?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有没有可能说服你重新考虑？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it does. Hell of a place to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正是如此。死在这鬼地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doden [02006FDD] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetDodenCool_00006FF1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That concludes negotiations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谈判就此结束。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Part of my assignment here was going undercover in Freeside, monitoring dealings between barons and some unsavory characters - like Kurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里的任务之一是在自由城做卧底，监视大亨和一些令人讨厌的人物之间的交易，比如库尔特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: You made one hell of a mess in there. Would've preferred to bring them in alive. I want to see these people charged and put on trial, not murdered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把里面弄得一团糟。我更想把他们活着带回来，我希望这些人被起诉并接受审判，而不是被谋杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_00007049_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you know about Kurt?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么知道库尔特的事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right. Rule of law is just that, and I've seen what happens when people put their personal need for vengeance first. It's chaos.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错。法治就是这样，我看到过当人们把个人复仇的需要放在首位时会发生什么。一片混乱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_0000704B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kurt was a first-rate scumbag, no doubt about it. Doesn't give you the right to prance in there and go Django Westwood on the place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问，库尔特是个顶级的人渣。但你也没权力大摇大摆的闯进去，像姜戈·韦斯特伍德一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_0000704B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's done is done... and in terms of jurisdiction it was a bit ambiguous... but if we're gonna work together I won't tolerate vigilantism.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事已至此...就管辖权而言，它有点模糊...但如果我们要合作，我不能容忍自警团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_0000704B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Murdered?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谋杀？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That depends on you. I just want to meet Charles Augen and gather evidence. It's probably best if I don't show up alone. He's... unbalanced.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这取决于你，我只是想见查理斯·奥根，收集证据。我最好别一个人去，他...不稳定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_00007E2E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seeing as to how you're taking his nephew to him, he might be more receptive than usual. Could be in danger, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鉴于你要带他侄子去见他，他可能会比平时更愿意接受。也可能有危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_00007E2E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to verify his status and see if there's any evidence, then get that boy into protective custody. Better to work together, I figure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要核实他的情况，看看有没有证据，然后对他进行保护性监禁。我觉得最好是合作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_00007E2E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So we're working together now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以现在我们是合作关系了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm building a case against Jason Bellek, the baron who's behind all this. He's the one who paid for the hit on the Augen family. Ruthless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在立案调查杰森·贝莱克，他是这一切的幕后主使。他是杀害奥根一家的幕后黑手，冷酷无情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_0000704A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides hiring half the hitmen in Vegas, he's also got mercenaries on the payroll. Not sure where they're headed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉斯维加斯一半的杀手都是他雇的，他还雇了佣兵。不知道他们要去哪里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_0000704A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To answer your question... what do I want? Justice, plain and simple. I need evidence to prosecute this bastard... publically.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回答你的问题...我想要什么？正义，简单明了。我需要证据来起诉这个混蛋...公开的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_0000704A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tried to get Augen to turn witness but he panicked, fled. That boy and his uncle may be the only shot we get at nailing Jason Bellek.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让奥根作证但他惊慌失措，逃走了。那男孩和他叔叔可能是我们抓到杰森·贝莱克的唯一机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_0000704A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep. Before he fled, Peter Augen sent a package to his estranged brother. I'm guessing that package contained dirt on Bellek.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。逃跑前，彼得·奥根给他疏远的兄弟寄了一个包裹，我猜包裹里有贝莱克的丑事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_0000704C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't know, Charles Augen has something of a... reputation. One of the old Desert Rangers, served with us until Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不知道，查理斯·奥根有点...名望。一个老沙漠游骑兵，在胡佛大坝前一直为我们服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_0000704C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Word is that he was instrumental in setting up the demo in Boulder City. Some kind of wizard with explosives. Also out of his goddamn mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有传言说他在巨石城的示威中发挥了重要作用。一个带着炸药的巫师，但脑子也他妈彻底坏掉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_0000704C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Given his... hostility towards NCR... I'd rather not go knocking on his door by myself. Not sure if he'd be receptive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到他...对NCR的敌意...我可不想自己去敲他的门。不知道他是否能接受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_0000704C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: His uncle?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他叔叔？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a war on, so we don't have much manpower for internal investigations. Not the sexiest assignment, that's for sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战争正在进行，所以我们没有太多人力进行内部调查。这肯定不是最令人兴奋的任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_00007E39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not some doe-eyed rookie, in case you're wondering. I've done my time on the river and been in my share of scrapes. This is important, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想知道的话，我可不是什么眼神纯真的菜鸟。我在河上待过，也经历过困境。不过，这一点很重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_00007E39_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you alone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么一个人在这？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not here to take Michael. I would've preferred to get him into protective custody, but I understand keeping him with family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是来带走迈克尔的，我本想对他进行保护性监禁，但我能理解让他和家人在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_00007E2F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to accompany you to Charles Augen's ranch up in the hills. He has something of a reputation, and it's best if I don't show up alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想陪你去查理斯·奥根在山上的农场。他有点名声，我最好不要一个人去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_00007E2F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm taking Michael to his uncle's house. Don't try to stop me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要带迈克尔去他叔叔家，别试图阻止我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Here I was looking forward to a little excitement in Goodsprings. I want to see Cheyenne bite someone's nuts off one day, just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？我本来期待在清泉镇来点刺激的，我想看夏安有一天咬掉某人的蛋蛋，只是说说而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoStage7_00007059_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the good news is that I'm packed and ready to go when you are. It's a long, perilous journey. Good thing you've got me to guide you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好消息是我收拾好了，等你准备好就可以走了。这是一段漫长而危险的旅程，还好有我给你带路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoStage7_00007059_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm happy to spend some time in Goodsprings. You do your running around and what not, I'll be here when you're packed up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴能在清泉镇待一段时间。你去忙你的事吧，等你收拾好东西，我就在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoStage7_00007059_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> Nothing. Absolutely nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎> 没什么，绝对没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? And you're just calm as can be, all "This is a normal day for me, Mojo." I'm not built for this kind of... stimulation! I need a cigarette!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你只是尽可能冷静，说“这对我来说是正常的一天，莫乔。”我不适合这种...刺激！我要抽根烟！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoStage7_00007058_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the good news is that I'm packed and ready to go when you are. It's a long, perilous journey. Good thing you've got me to guide you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好消息是我收拾好了，等你准备好就可以走了。这是一段漫长而危险的旅程，还好有我给你带路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoStage7_00007058_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm happy to spend some time in Goodsprings. You do your running around and what not, I'll be here when you're packed up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴能在清泉镇待一段时间。你去忙你的事吧，等你收拾好东西，我就在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoStage7_00007058_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just more people sent to kill us. Nothing unusual.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又一批派来杀我们的人，没什么不寻常的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doden? The shotgun stroker? Holy shit! And.. and you killed him, right? Lord Jesus, I'm glad I took that nap back by Jean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多登？霰弹枪手？我的天！而且...你杀了他，对吧？上帝啊，真高兴我在吉恩睡了个午觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoStage7_00007057_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the good news is that I'm packed and ready to go when you are. It's a long, perilous journey. Good thing you've got me to guide you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好消息是我收拾好了，等你准备好就可以走了。这是一段漫长而危险的旅程，还好有我给你带路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoStage7_00007057_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm happy to spend some time in Goodsprings. You do your running around and what not, I'll be here when you're packed up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴能在清泉镇待一段时间。你去忙你的事吧，等你收拾好东西，我就在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoStage7_00007057_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A guy named Doden was waiting to take us both out. I dealt with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个叫多登的家伙正等着干掉我们俩，我解决了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doden? The shotgun stroker? Holy shit! And.. and you killed him, right? Lord Jesus, I'm glad I took that nap back by Jean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多登？霰弹枪手？我的天！而且...你杀了他，对吧？上帝啊，真高兴我在吉恩睡了个午觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoStage7_00012BCB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the good news is that I'm packed and ready to go when you are. It's a long, perilous journey. Good thing you've got me to guide you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好消息是我收拾好了，等你准备好就可以走了。这是一段漫长而危险的旅程，还好有我给你带路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoStage7_00012BCB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm happy to spend some time in Goodsprings. You do your running around and what not, I'll be here when you're packed up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴能在清泉镇待一段时间。你去忙你的事吧，等你收拾好东西，我就在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoStage7_00012BCB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doo-den bring shooty gun, try to hurt. He take nap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小多登带了一把枪，试图造成伤害。然后他睡了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, I won't get in your way. If I can help in any way, don't hesitate to ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，我不会妨碍你的。如果我能帮上什么忙，尽管开口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_00007E34_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, you can travel with us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你可以和我们一起去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're making a huge mistake. I'll be on my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在犯一个巨大的错误。我先走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartRedoIn_00007E38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't need your help. You'd better move on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不需要你的帮助，你还是走人吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. Howdy, Ranger! I'm Mojo. Barf, say hello. Glad to have you with us... I think. Just let me do the talking when we get to Chuck's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原来如此。你好，游骑兵！我是莫乔。吐吐，打个招呼。很高兴有你和我们在一起...我想，等我们到了查克家，让我跟他谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoStage7_00007E3B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else happen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有别的事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoStage7_00007E3B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ranger Hart will be joining us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵哈特会加入我们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. Howdy, Ranger! I'm Mojo. Barf, say hello. Glad to have you with us... I think. Just let me do the talking when we get to Chuck's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原来如此。你好，游骑兵！我是莫乔。吐吐，打个招呼。很高兴有你和我们在一起...我想，等我们到了查克家，让我跟他谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoStage7_00012BCC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else happen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有别的事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoStage7_00012BCC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bear hat lady join.
ESP.TRADUIT: 熊帽女士加入。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She makes a pained attempt to form words but can't speak. Saliva spills from her quivering lips as she cries in frustration.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她费力地想要说话，但却说不出话来。当她沮丧的哭泣时，唾液从她颤抖的嘴唇溢了出来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like you're having a rough day. Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你今天过得不太好。你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Her breathing quickens and turns into repetitive croaking. She attempts to write in the dirt but her arm flops aimlessly due to a loss of control.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她的呼吸加快，变成了重复的嘎嘎声。她试图在泥土上写字，但她的手臂由于失去控制而漫无目的地耷拉着。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's try that again. I'm [%];. What's your name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们再试一次。我是[%];，你叫什么名字？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Her eyelids flicker from pain as she gasps for air. She appears to be close to losing consciousness.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她大口喘气，眼皮因疼痛而抖动。她似乎快要失去意识了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your handwriting really stinks. Penmanship is truly a lost art, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的字写得真臭。书法真是一门失传的艺术，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She stops breathing and her eyes almost bulge from the sockets due to strain. A low, animalistic growl punctuates her demise.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她停止了呼吸，由于过度紧张，她的眼睛几乎从眼眶里鼓了出来。一声低沉的、兽性的咆哮宣告了她的死亡。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: What you need is a positive attitude. I find that music helps. <Whistle Johnny Guitar.>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要的是一个积极的态度，我觉得音乐有帮助。<吹约翰尼·吉他口哨>

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She stares in disbelief as you wave Barf over.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [当你挥手让吐吐过来时，她难以置信地盯着你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Motion Frantically> Barf, do something!
ESP.TRADUIT: <疯狂示意> 吐吐，做点什么！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She lets out a sigh of relief as the antivenom sets in. Her breathing slows and the swelling visibly recedes. She will make a full recovery.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [当解毒剂开始发挥作用时，她松了一口气。她的呼吸放缓，肿胀明显消退。她会完全康复的。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Administer Antivenom> Here, this should do the trick. Stay calm.
ESP.TRADUIT: <施用解毒剂>来，这个应该可以。保持冷静。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods in consent and watches apprehensively as you begin treating her.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点头表示同意，忧虑的看着你开始治疗她。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Treat her wounds> Stay still, I'll get you patched up.
ESP.TRADUIT: <治疗她的伤口>别动，我来给你包扎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She attempts to scream in pain but can merely croak as your clumsily palpate her swollen shoulders. Her eyes bulge as she wheezes in agony.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她痛苦的试图尖叫，但当你笨拙地触摸到她肿胀的肩膀时，她只能发出嘶哑的声音。她痛苦地喘着气，眼睛鼓了起来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Forcefully rub her shoulders> What you need is a deep-tissue massage.
ESP.TRADUIT: <用力揉她的肩膀>你需要的是深层组织按摩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She blinks in resignation as you begin in the injection. The Med-X quickly takes effect and her body goes limp.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [当你开始注射时，她无奈的眨了眨眼。吗啡针-X很快生效，她的身体瘫软了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Administer 3 Med-X> I can't save you, but I'll make it painless.
ESP.TRADUIT: <注射3剂吗啡针-X>我救不了你，但我会让你不那么痛苦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She stares into your pupils with as much composure as she can muster, desperately heaving until the life finally fades from her eyes.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她尽可能地镇定的凝视着你的瞳孔，绝望的喘着气，直到生命最终从她的眼睛里消失。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Silently watch her die>
ESP.TRADUIT: <默默看着她死去>

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Happy bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: <欢快地吠叫！>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfForceG_00008CDF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He begins to shake and retch violently; before you can react, he regurgitates a dose of Antivenom at your feet.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他开始剧烈地颤抖和干呕，你还没反应过来，他就把一瓶解毒剂吐在了你脚下。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfForceG_00008CDF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Happy bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: <欢快地吠叫！>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfForceG_00008CDF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well someone has to be the voice of wisdom around here. I've walked every craggly trail from here to Klamath, I've seen some things!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里总得有人来发出智慧的声音。从这里到克拉马斯，我走过了每一条崎岖的小路，我看到了一些东西！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoMollyI_00008CA3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't be saintly with these raider types. They're animals. She's probably taking suppository chems, got her higher than Mount Charleston!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这些掠夺面前可不能装圣人，他们是动物。她可能在服用化学栓剂，把她弄得比查尔斯顿山还嗨！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoMollyI_00008CA3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You help her out and she'll stab you in the back when you're asleep. Seen it happen. Let's walk on and leave her to the coyotes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你帮她，她会在你睡着的时候在背后捅你一刀，亲眼所见。我们走吧，把她留给郊狼吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoMollyI_00008CA3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mojo, I want you to stop talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫乔，我要你闭嘴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See that you do. We shouldn't linger here. Apt to be more bugs around... or worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看你的了。我们不该在这里逗留，周围可能会有更多的虫子...或者更糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoMollyI_00008CA2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, I'll handle it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放心，交给我吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Joke all you want, but I'm right. She's a murdering road-whore who's probably stolen and slutted her way across every trail in California!
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便你怎么开玩笑，但我是对的。那个杀人越货的公路婊子，可能把加利福尼亚每条路上的男人都偷遍睡遍了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoMollyI_00008CA4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Know how many friends I've lost to these bastards? I ain't just talking about brahmin, neither. Let that bug juice squeeze her to death... slowly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这些杂种让我失去了多少朋友吗？我说的不仅仅是婆罗门牛。让那些臭虫的汁液把她塞死吧...慢慢的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoMollyI_00008CA4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for your sage advice, Mojo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的忠告，莫乔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nods and smiles.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他点头微笑。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, I'll do my best to help her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我会尽力帮她的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He reluctantly nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他不情愿的点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you mean well, but she's too dangerous to be left alive. I'll make it quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你是好意，但让她活着太危险了。我会尽快解决的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [His eyes widen with fear as he steps away.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他害怕的后退。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Address the group> Does anyone else have an opinion? Shut up and let me think!
ESP.TRADUIT: <向全体成员讲话>还有其他人有意见吗？闭嘴，让我想想！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe she's not all bad. Mama said everyone deserves a second chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许她也没那么坏，妈妈说每个人都应该有第二次机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelMol_00008CAB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why should we help her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们为什么要帮助她？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should make an effort to render aid. If you can't save her, at least put her out of her misery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该尽力提供援助。如果你救不了她，至少让她从痛苦中解脱出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartBark_00008CCB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mojo, I really hope you know what you're doing... I don't want to end up as red mist on the canyon walls here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫乔，我真的希望你知道自己在做什么...我可不想最后变成峡谷壁上的红雾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartBark_000095E3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Howdy. Heard a lot about you. I'm here to help, just figure you might want an extra gun around while they're gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好啊，久仰大名。我是来帮忙的，只是觉得他们不在的时候，你可能需要多一把枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartBark_0000B04A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lord, give me patience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主啊，请赐予我耐心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartBark_0000B081_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm coming with you, don't even try to argue about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟你一起去，你就别争了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartBark_0000F8C9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I can make words again. Thank you. Why you help me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我又能说话了。谢谢你！你为什么帮我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyForce_00008CE9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have words for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有话要对你说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyForce_0000FD50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。
