ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelTha_00008CE4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was happy to help. You'll get through this, I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很乐意帮忙。你会挺过去的，我保证。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelTha_00008CE5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank me when I get you back to your family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我把你送回家再谢我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nods in fear.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他害怕的点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need your thanks. Your uncle better make this worth my while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不需要你的感谢，你叔叔最好让我不虚此行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I pet that dog?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能摸摸那条狗吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelBar_00008CE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice to meet you, Uncle Charles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴见到你，查理斯叔叔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelBar_0000B054_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never been hunting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来没有打过猎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelBar_0000B056_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That sounds fun. I'd like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来很有趣，我很乐意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelBar_0000B058_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny? Oh, I talk different. Not first tongue. Came from tribe by the river. Join Vipers when old. Still learning words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好笑？哦，我说话不一样，不是母语。来自河边的部落，老了再加入毒蛇帮，还在学习词汇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyWhySa_00008CF3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... why you help? You not Viper. All road people hate Vipers, but you still give medicine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你为什么要帮忙？你不是毒蛇帮。所有道路上的人都恨毒蛇帮，但你还是给药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyWhySa_00008CF3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you talking so funny?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说话怎么这么好笑？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I not... understand... but thank you. I owe you life-debt. I travel with you, pay debt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不...理解...不过还是谢谢你。我欠你一命，我和你一起旅行，还债。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyWhySa_00008CF7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was the right thing to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是正确的选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No guilt, only pride. I will honor you. I owe you life-debt. I travel with you, pay debt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有罪恶感，只有骄傲，我会尊重你的。我欠你一命，我和你一起旅行，还债。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyWhySa_00008CFB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can thank my friends. They gave me quite the guilt trip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以感谢我的朋友，他们让我很有罪恶感。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was pain. Worst pain. Thank you for medicine. I owe you life-debt. I travel with you, pay debt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有痛苦，最大的痛，谢谢你的药。我欠你一命，我和你一起旅行，还债。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyWhySa_00008CFD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like seeing anyone suffer like that. Don't make me regret my decision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢看到任何人那样受苦，别让我后悔自己的决定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Life-debt is not for me or you to decide. I follow until debt is paid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 生死债可不是你我来决定的。我一直跟随，直到债务还清。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyJoinD_00008CFA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't trust you enough to let you travel with us. We should go our separate ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太信任你，不会让你跟我们一起去。我们应该分道扬镳。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My Viper spirit is dead. I make new spirit with you. I stab your enemies. They taste poison on my spear and die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的毒蛇灵魂死了，我和你一起创造新的灵魂。我刺死你的敌人，他们会在我的矛上尝到毒药，然后死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyJoinA_00008CF9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can travel with us, but your days as a Viper are finished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以和我们一起旅行，但你作为毒蛇帮的日子就此结束了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods in acceptance.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点头表示同意。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Sigh> One more freakish addition won't matter. Welcome to our legion of horribles.
ESP.TRADUIT: <叹气>再多一个怪胎也没问题，欢迎加入我们可怖军团。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I walk in your steps, follow until I save life. This is important... how say? Custom. Important custom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟随你的脚步，直到我拯救生命。这是很重要的...怎么说？习俗，重要的习俗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyJoinE_00008CFF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I move quiet, be useful. Hunt, skin animals. Cook. Enemies? I poison them, I drink their blood, I eat their hearts...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我动作安静，有用。打猎，剥动物皮，烹饪。敌人？我给他们下毒，喝他们的血，吃他们的心...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyJoinE_00008CFF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, what are you talking about? We just met.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你在说什么？我们才刚认识。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I not like, but I obey. Livers only.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢，但我服从。只吃肝脏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyJoinE_00008D00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, I appreciate your enthusiasm, but let's not go eating hearts, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，我很欣赏你的热情，但我们不要去吃心脏了，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wise. We gain strength from dead enemy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你聪明，我们从死去的敌人身上获得力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyJoinE_00008D01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see we have shared tastes. Welcome to our moveable feast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我们有共同的品味，欢迎来到我们的移动盛宴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great, now we got a backstabbin' snake lady on the trail with us. Check her teeth, they're probably filed down so they have fangs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，现在我们有个背后捅刀子的蛇女跟我们一起了。检查一下她的牙齿，它们可能被锉平了，所以有尖牙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoMollyH_000091BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are a fool, fat one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个傻瓜，胖子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoMollyH_000091BE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fat? Fat! Who you calling fat? I don't think I'm fat... just... robust. These thighs are regular meat pistons, pure muscle. Right, Barf?
ESP.TRADUIT: 胖？胖！你说谁胖？我不觉得我胖...只是...健壮。这些大腿是普通的肉活塞，纯肌肉。对吧，吐吐？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoMollyH_000091BF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Sad Whimper>
ESP.TRADUIT: <悲伤的呜咽>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoMollyH_000091C0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Barf... you're dead to me. Dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吐吐...对我来说，你已经死了。死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoMollyH_000091C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When they come after us, it'll most likely be Crabro's boys out of Grasshopper Junction. He'll send Tullius Sagitta, his best tracker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当他们来追我们的时候，很可能是克拉布罗在蚱蜢路口的手下。他会派图图利乌斯·萨吉塔来，他最好的追踪者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericWea_0002D522_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'll be light, fast-moving... expect a few dozen explorers or lightly-armed veterans. Won't take them long, I reckon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们会很轻，移动很快...预计会有几十名斥候或轻装上阵的老兵。我想用不了多久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericWea_0002D522_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the Legion comes after us, what can we expect?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果军团来追我们，我们能有什么指望？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Centurion who oversees Chloride and Grasshopper Junction. Had a serious rivalry with Bubo. He'd love nothing more than to put me in chains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 负责管理克洛赖德和蚱蜢路口的百夫长，和布波有过激烈的竞争。他最想做的就是把我铐起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericWea_0002D523_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He knows I'm too valuable to kill, but he'd be more than happy to keep me in bondage as his pet engineer. He'll murder all of you without blinking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他知道我很有价值，不能杀我，但他很乐意让我成为他的宠物工程师。他会毫不犹豫的杀了你们所有人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericWea_0002D523_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He and Bubo were two of Meles' favorites. Meles is the legate out of Kingman. Quite possibly the hardest screw to ever turn in the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和布波是梅莱斯的最爱。梅莱斯是金曼的特使，很可能是军团里最难对付的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericWea_0002D523_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's Crabro?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克拉布罗是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The arrow. Crabro's right-hand man, and the second-best sniper in the Legion. Very, very dangerous. There's a reason slaves don't attempt escape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 箭头。克拉布罗的左膀右臂，军团第二优秀的狙击手，非常非常危险。奴隶不试图逃跑是有原因的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericWea_0002D524_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keeps a pack of man-eating hounds that he uses to track escaped slaves. Biggest one is called Medusa... baddest bitch in the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他养了一群吃人的猎犬用来追踪逃跑的奴隶。最大的一头叫美杜莎...军团里最凶残的婊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericWea_0002D524_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what about Tullius?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那图利乌斯呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever heard of Firebase Zulu? Legion calls it Mons Victoria - "Mount Victory". They had a sniper who helped make that possible. Called Gallus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说过祖鲁火力点吗？军团称它为维多利亚山...“胜利之山”。有一个狙击手帮他们实现了这一点，叫做加卢斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericWea_0002D525_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reputed to have over one hundred NCR kills. Probably twice that in tribals and raiders. "Marcellus' Needle" is what they call him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说杀死了一百多名NCR，可能是部落和掠夺者的两倍。大家都叫他“马塞卢斯的针”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericWea_0002D525_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thankfully he's nowhere near this theater. Way down south in that clusterfuck of a tribal war around Parker Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸好他离这个战区很远，在南部帕克大坝附近的部落战争中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetGenericWea_0002D525_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he's the second-best sniper, who's the best?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他是第二好的狙击手，那谁是最好的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all the drama with Rampart, apparently one of their captains went rogue and made himself warlord of Rachel, mining town up north.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在壁垒的闹剧之后，显然他们的一个领导者叛变了，把自己变成了北部采矿小镇雷切尔的军阀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericWea_0001D9A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were causing a lot of problems, raiding highways and taking slaves... and then they just went quiet. Not sure what happened up there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们制造了很多问题，抢劫高速公路，绑架奴隶...然后他们就安静了，不知道发生了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericWea_0001D9A0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's happening outside the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维之外发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Warlords up in the Great Basin are teeing off on each other, raising all kinds of hell. That cannibal maniac, Delicious, is one of the worst ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大盆地的军阀们互相攻击，闹得天翻地转。那个食人狂，美味，是最坏的一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericWea_0001DD54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently he and King Coffee have declared war on each other, all kind of mayhem is unfolding. Met King Coffee, he wasn't too bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然，他和咖啡王已经向对方宣战，各种混乱正在展开。我见过咖啡王，他还不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericWea_0001DD54_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: By the way, if you ever meet Delicious... if he offers you dinner... best to eat it, or you'll be dinner. Just... pretend it's brahmin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，如果你遇到美味,,,如果他请你吃饭,,,最好是吃它，否则你会成为晚餐。只要...假装这是婆罗门牛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericWea_0001DD54_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other news from outside the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维之外还有什么消息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Count Donovan has apparently transformed Jackman from tribal backwater to a rising power in the Great Basin. Strong economy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多诺万伯爵显然已经把杰克曼从一个落后的部落变成了大盆地的一股崛起的力量。经济强劲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericWea_0001DD55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travellers say they've got some kind of weird caste system going, but it's working. Fair traders, don't raid or harass anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旅行者说他们有某种奇怪的种姓制度，但很有效。公平贸易者，不袭击或骚扰任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericWea_0001DD55_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Buddy said the agricultural workers all have slave collars on them. Hate to see it, but it's unfortunately the norm up there. Wild place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 朋友说农业工人都戴着奴隶项圈。虽然不愿意看到，但不幸的是，这是那里的常态。蛮荒之地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericWea_0001DD55_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other news from outside the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维之外还有什么消息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR lost contact with Camp Acharon. They can't afford another Yankee, certainly not on that route. That's the lifeline to Davis Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR失去了与阿卡伦营地的联系。他们不能再雇一个北方佬了，在那条路上肯定不行，那是通往戴维斯大坝的生命线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericWea_0001DD56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other news from outside the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维之外还有什么消息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Traveller told me that there's treasure buried up near Montezuma Peak. Only thing you'll find up there is an early grave. Dangerous place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旅行者告诉我蒙特祖玛峰附近埋藏着宝藏。你在那里只会发现一个早死的坟墓，危险的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericWea_0001DD57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other news from outside the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维之外还有什么消息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caravan fresh from Arizona told me there's a legate named Meles, supposed to be mean as a snake. He's on a warpath against escaped slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚从亚利桑那州来的商队告诉我，有个叫梅莱斯的特色，应该是个卑鄙小人。他在与逃跑的奴隶作战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericWea_0002026D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fellah told me that this Meles had a favorite slave he liked to torture for fun... said that slave escaped. Ol' Meles didn't take it too well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 农民告诉我，这个梅莱斯有个最喜欢的奴隶，他喜欢折磨他来取乐...说那个奴隶逃走了。老梅莱斯对此不太满意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericWea_0002026D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now he's sending raiding parties every which way to track down any escaped slaves. He especially wants to close down that slave town up north.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在他派了突击小队四处搜寻逃跑的奴隶，他特别想关闭北边的那个奴隶镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetGenericWea_0002026D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other news from outside the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维之外还有什么消息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been in worse places than Freeside, believe me. I don't use guns for personal reasons. Keeping a promise to myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，我去过比自由城更糟糕的地方。我不用枪是出于个人原因，遵守对自己的承诺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericWea_00015FA8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, Kisses here provides plenty of security. None of these local toughs want to get bitten in the dick, do they? No, Kisses. Good dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，亲亲在这里提供了充足的安全保障。这些当地的恶棍都不想被咬到老二，不是吗？不，亲亲，乖狗狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetGenericWea_00015FA8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Freeside can be a dangerous place. Why aren't you carrying a gun?
ESP.TRADUIT: 自由城是个危险的地方，你为什么不带枪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We came from great river-hole. You call canyon. Legion take us young. Many die in mine. Thistle and I, good friends. Survive bad places.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来自大河洞，你叫峡谷。年轻时被军团带走了，许多人死在矿井里。我和希斯尔，是好朋友，在恶劣的环境中生存。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spear-Hand [02012C0C] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericWea_0001303A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We meet Seb-hash-tongue. Learn of mountain father and Christ-God. We make plan, we escape. We be truly free soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们见到色八四天，知道山父和十字上帝的事，然后制定了逃走的计划。我们会很快获得真正的自由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spear-Hand [02012C0C] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericWea_0001303A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are you from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来自哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No trust Bear soldiers. Hear bad stories from southern tribes. We want own place, own laws... with others like us. God make it so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不信任熊士兵，听听南方部落的坏故事。我们想要自己的地方，自己的法律...和像我们这样的人在一起。上帝使之如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spear-Hand [02012C0C] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericWea_0001303B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you want to go to San Salvador? Why not join NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么想去圣萨尔瓦多？为什么不加入NCR呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. We good friends. Once... we almost married. Not work. All for the best. God want it this way. I happy for her and my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我们是好朋友。曾经...我们差点就结婚了，没结成。一切都好，这是上帝的旨意，我为她和我的朋友感到高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spear-Hand [02012C0C] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetGenericWea_0001303E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you've known Thistle your whole life?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说你从小就认识希斯尔了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I move with silence, like a serpent on the sands. The spear is my weapon. Always touched with venom. This is best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无声的移动，就像沙滩上的蛇。矛是我的武器，总是带着毒液。这是最好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetGenericWea_0000CD12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any special skills?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么特殊的技能？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fix yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 修理自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back during my stint in the Desert Rangers, I spent six months training up militia at a settlement, taught them how to defend themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在沙漠游骑兵服役的时候，花了六个月的时间在一个定居点训练民兵，教他们如何自卫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D5F8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Living and working alongside them, I picked up the basics of farming. Tobacco's the cash crop. Thanks to Mojo I can export it for a nice return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和他们一起生活和工作，我学会了农业的基本知识。烟草是经济作物，多亏了莫乔，我可以出口它获得不错的回报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D5F8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until recently I also traded with the mutants nearby. Afraid that's come to an abrupt end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直到最近，我还和附近的变种人贸易。恐怕这就戛然而止了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D5F8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you make it up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么到这里来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here? Yeah. In my past life, not at all. Always with the unit or making yet another attempt at marriage. Two tries was enough for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里？是的。在我过去的生活中，完全不是，总是和单位在一起，或者再一次尝试婚姻，两次尝试对我来说足够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D5F9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spent most of my time deployed, wasn't worth much when I actually was at home. Neither wife stuck around more than a year or two. Can't blame them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我大部分时间都在服役，在家的时候就没什么价值了。两任妻子都没在一起超过一两年，不能怪她们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D5F9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Peter... well, he sent a letter every now and then. We were never close, but we became more distant after my father passed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 彼得...嗯，他时不时会寄封信来。我们从来都不亲近，但在我父亲去世后，我们变得更疏远了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D5F9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you always been alone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一直都是一个人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not really. We lived in different worlds. Sad thing to admit, but I didn't love my father. I didn't know Peter well enough to feel anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有，算不上，我们生活在不同的世界。承认这一点很遗憾，但我并不爱我的父亲。我不太了解彼得，感觉不到什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D604_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was closer to the men and women I fought beside than anyone who happened to share my last name. Maybe that makes me a bastard. I don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我与并肩作战的男男女女们的关系比任何碰巧与我同姓的人都要亲密。也许我就是个混蛋，我不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D604_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My real brothers and sisters died at Boulder City, and I killed them. Michael... well, he's my last shot at having any family again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真正的兄弟姐妹死在了巨石城，是我杀了他们。迈克尔...他是我再次拥有家人的最后机会了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D604_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you have any other contact with your extended family?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和你的大家庭还有其他联系吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could've had an easy life. Not a good one. "Let him live under the open sky, and dangerously." That's what I wanted - freedom and danger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本可以过上轻松的生活，不是个好主意。“让他在开阔的天空下危险的生活吧。”这就是我想要的，自由和危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D606_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My father... was a tyrant. A bully. Fucking hated him. Came to blows before I left. He whipped my ass, but I swore it would be the last time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的父亲...是个暴君，一个恶霸，妈的恨死他了。在我离开之前起了冲突，他鞭打我的屁股，但我发誓这是最后一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D606_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I made my choices and took my licks. Would I do some things differently? Absolutely. Would I still join the Desert Rangers? Without a doubt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做出了我的选择，并尝到了苦头。我会做一些不同的事情吗？绝对的，我还会加入沙漠游骑兵吗？毫无疑问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D606_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the line by Homer? Something about a man who's been through hell enjoying his suffering after a while, that's it. True now as it was then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 荷马的诗句是什么？一个经历了地狱的人在一段时间后享受他的痛苦，就是这样。当时是这样，现在也是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D606_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you leave home? Your family had money. You could've had a good life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么离开家？你们家很有钱，你本来可以过上好日子的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd be a damn fool to underestimate them. NCR has a lot of advantages... but discipline and drive can win wars. Legion has that in spades.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要是低估他们，那就太蠢了。NCR有很多优势...但是纪律和动力可以赢得战争。军团绝对有这个能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D608_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's... more than numbers on a chart. It's the tenacity, the willingness to die... fanaticism... you can't make mistakes against them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...不仅仅是图表上的数字。是顽强，是愿意赴死...狂热...面对他们，你不能犯错误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D608_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All that said, my money is on Legion losing... doesn't mean NCR wins. They're rotted out from the inside with greed and corruption.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管如此，我的钱还是赌军团会输...这并不意味着NCR赢了。他们已经被贪婪和腐败从内部腐蚀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D608_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really think Caesar's Legion can win?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真认为凯撒军团能赢吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Old Mike, a ghoul instructor in the Desert Rangers. Man had been some kind of high-speed badass before the war... the original war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老麦克，沙漠游骑兵的尸鬼教官。在战前，人类身份是某种高效率的坏蛋...最初的战争。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D5FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nicest guy, looked like an accountant with those goofy glasses he wore. But make no mistake... a killer, through and through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好的人，戴着傻乎乎的眼镜，看起来像个会计。但你别搞错了...一个彻彻底底的杀手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D5FE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had served in some tip of the spear outfit before the war, also had been a bomb technician of some sort. Knew everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战前曾在矛尖部队服役，也曾是某种炸弹技术员。什么都懂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D5FE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He didn't like the Unification Treaty. Him and the other hardliners opted out. Mike supposedly drifted east and settled in Texas. Not sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不喜欢统一条约，他和其他强硬派选择了退出。据说麦克向东漂流，定居在德克萨斯州。不确定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D5FE_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you learn about explosives?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么对炸药这么了解的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Taxes are the life blood of governments... and every government exists to enlarge itself... and to disempower its citizens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 税收是政府的命脉。每个政府的存在都是为了扩张自己...并剥夺公民的权利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D60F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However benevolent the beginnings... they always end in oppression. You can't live at the expense of the state. It always lives at your expense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论开始时多么仁慈...们总是以压迫告终。你不能以国家为代价来生活，它总是以你为代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D60F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I refuse to pay into something that I've seen destroy good men and women... that devalues and wastes human lives for the supposed "Greater Good".
ESP.TRADUIT: 我拒绝为我所见过的毁灭善良男人和女人的东西买单...为了所谓的“更大的利益”而贬低和浪费人类的生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D60F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't pretend to be some great political mind, because I'm not. I'm just an old soldier who hates seeing men and women reduced to numbers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会假装自己有伟大的政治头脑，因为我没有。我只是个讨厌看到男人和女人变成数字的老兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetGenericWea_0000D60F_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you so opposed to taxes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么如此反对征税？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Halt! I got HE, DFCs, landmines... all wired up and ready to blow your entire gagglefuck to red fucking China. I only have one question...
ESP.TRADUIT: 停！我有高爆、定向破片、地雷...我只想问一个问题...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFor_000095DC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you or any members of your party here to collect taxes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你或你的同伴是来收税的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFor_000095DC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... I figured it would come to a fight, but gunning down an unarmed man sent to talk is fucking low. They'll come at us full tilt now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道...我以为会有一场战斗，但枪杀一个手无寸铁的被派来谈话的人太他妈卑鄙了。他们现在会全力攻击我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFor_0000DE7F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever heard the saying, "A time to kill"? Well, that wasn't the time to kill. Thanks to you... now it's the time to kill. You better be ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听过“杀戮时刻”这句话吗？那可不是打发时间的时候。多亏了你...现在是杀人的时候了。你最好准备好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFor_0000DE7F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get to a vantage point and shoot the gnomes when the time is right. Here's my rifle. I'd do it, but my vision is shit. Don't fuck this up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找个有利的位置，在合适的时机射击地精，这是我的步枪。我也想去，但我的视力太差了。别搞砸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFor_0000DE7F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Halt! I got HE, DFCs, landmines... all wired up and ready to blow your entire gagglefuck to red fucking China. I only have one question...
ESP.TRADUIT: 停！我有高爆、定向破片、地雷...我只想问一个问题...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_000095E0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you or any members of your party here to collect taxes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你或你的同伴是来收税的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_000095E0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to the madhouse. Mind yourself in the basement, lot of bang and other goodies down there. Help yourself to any food or drinks you find.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到疯人院。在地下室小心点，那里有很多爆炸物和其他的好东西，找到食物或饮料请随便吃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_0000BBCD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now to the task at hand. We probably have one or two days, tops. John Sharp ain't no slouch. It'll probably come to a fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在谈谈手头的任务。我们最多还有一两天时间，约翰·夏普可不是个懒汉，战斗可能要来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_0000BBCD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got a busted Auto-Doc and some old robot Mojo sold me for a song. Never got either of them working. Too busy with crops and bombs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一个坏掉的自动医生和一个老机器人，莫乔低价卖给我的。它们两个都没用上，我忙着处理庄稼和炸弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_0000BBCD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give them an honest attempt and we'll go from there. In the meantime, I'll get to work patching the wall. Figure Michael can help, too. Questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 先认真试试看，之后再说。我现在去补墙，估计迈克尔也能搭把手。有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_0000BBCD_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could be... or maybe I just don't give a fuck anymore. Did you include that in your K-factor, smartass? Try me and it's full send.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是吧...也许我根本不在乎了。你把这个算在你的K系数里了吗，自作聪明的家伙？试试看，我豁出去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_0000A224_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now... before I lose my composure... what's your business here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在...在我失去冷静之前...你来这里做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_0000A224_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're exposed and far from minimum safe distance. You're bluffing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你暴露在外，远离安全距离。你在虚张声势。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll see. What's your business here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们拭目以待。你来这儿干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_0000A226_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can see that. I also know he could be under duress. I can already infer you're not some government-type dipshit, but best to be sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以看到，我也知道他可能是被胁迫的。我已经能推断出你不是什么政府类型的蠢货，但最好还是确定一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_0000A22A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: State your business and make it quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 陈述你的业务，而且要快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_0000A22A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, we're here with Mojo. I don't want any trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别激动，我们是跟莫乔来的。我不想惹麻烦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You try anything here and I'll paint the canyon walls with your guts. State your business, and make it fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你敢在这里耍花招，我就把你的内脏涂在峡谷的岩壁上。说清楚你的事，并且要快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_0000A227_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need taxes. I take what I want, when I want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不需要纳税，我想要什么就拿什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He gulps down the contents of the bottle and then devours the bottle itself.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他把瓶子里的东西一饮而尽，然后把瓶子吞了下去。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <belching>
ESP.TRADUIT: <打嗝>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfFeedBe_00014DF6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Feed him a beer> Here, have a beer.
ESP.TRADUIT: <喂他一瓶啤酒>给，来瓶啤酒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He devours the Cram with relish.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他津津有味的吃着饱饱牌午餐肉。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfFeedCr_00014DF7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <belching>
ESP.TRADUIT: <打嗝>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfFeedCr_00014DF7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Feed him Cram> Here, have some tasty Cram.
ESP.TRADUIT: <喂他饱饱牌>来，吃点美味的午餐肉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He devours the meat with relish.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他津津有味的吃着肉。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfFeedHu_00014DF8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <belching>
ESP.TRADUIT: <打嗝>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfFeedHu_00014DF8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Feed him Human Flesh> Human flesh always hits the spot.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给他吃人肉>人肉总是恰到好处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He devours the ashtray with relish.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他津津有味的吞下烟灰缸。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfFeedAs_00014DF4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <belching>
ESP.TRADUIT: <打嗝>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfFeedAs_00014DF4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Feed him an ashtray> I bet this ashtray is tasty.
ESP.TRADUIT: <喂他一个烟灰缸>我打赌这个烟灰缸一定很好吃。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He devours the glove with relish.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他津津有味的吞下手套。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfFeedBa_00014DF5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <belching>
ESP.TRADUIT: <打嗝>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfFeedBa_00014DF5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Feed him a glove> Here, have a baseball glove.
ESP.TRADUIT: <喂他一副手套>给，这是一副棒球手套。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He devours the belt with relish.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他津津有味的吃掉了皮带。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfFeedLe_00014DF9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <belching>
ESP.TRADUIT: <打嗝>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfFeedLe_00014DF9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Feed him a Leather Belt> How about a belt?
ESP.TRADUIT: <喂他一个皮带>皮带怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He swallow the container whole.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他把整个容器吞了下去。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <belching>
ESP.TRADUIT: <打嗝>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfFeedTu_00014DFA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Feed him Turpentine> Here, this will quench your thirst.
ESP.TRADUIT: <喂他松节油>给，这个可以解渴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <whimper>
ESP.TRADUIT: <呜咽>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barf [02004B61] (mod) Quest : ([02004B76]aaDetBarfStuff) Barf's Engaging Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetBarfVoiceType\aaDetBarfS_aaDetBarfFeedNe_000099FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, let's hold off on the snack for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 转念一想，我们暂时不吃零食了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Okay, we get through this nonsense I might just do it. Definitely won't be sticking around here, not with knotheads trying to kill me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？好吧，我们把这些无聊的事解决了我可能会去做。我肯定不会待在这里的，尤其是在有个疯子想杀我的情况下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoCompan_00009E14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing ventured, nothing gained. Start the company with your uncle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不入虎穴，焉得虎子。和你叔叔一起开公司吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the hard truth, ain't it? Good pay and benefits aren't something to take for granted, and I damn sure ain't getting any younger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是残酷的事实，不是吗？高薪和福利不是理所当然的，而且我肯定不会再年轻了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoCompan_00009E15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best to go with what you know. Crimson Caravan isn't perfect, but it's a sure thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好是你熟悉的。深红商队虽不完美，但已稳操胜券。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I just like picking people's brains sometimes, especially if they got a lick of sense. I'll sort it out in good time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我只是有时候喜欢向别人讨教，尤其是那些有点头脑的人。我会及时解决的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoCompan_00009E16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your decision, Mojo. You should do what you think is best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的决定，莫乔。你应该做你认为最好的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I miss them. Especially mama. She was always nice. Thank you for talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想念他们，特别是妈妈，她总是很好。谢谢你的谈话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFam_00009E1E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, sometimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，有时候。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I try to remember them, but it gets harder. I forget the faces.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试着记住他们，但越来越难了。我忘记了那些面孔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFam_00009E1F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. I don't think about them much anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我已经不怎么想他们了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. I'll try to do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会尝试的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFam_00009E20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not if I can help it. I live in the present.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要我能做到，就不会。我活在当下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，对不起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFam_00009E22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really don't want to have this conversation. Let's talk about something else. Anything else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的不想跟你谈这个。我们聊点别的吧，其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that... that is Michael. I know my flesh and blood, and that's Peter's boy. Good God, thank you. Guess my worst suspicions are confirmed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是...这是迈克尔，我认识我的亲人，他是彼得的儿子。上帝啊，谢谢你，我最坏的猜测得到了证实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_0000B041_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Peter sent me everything he had on Bellek. Greedy bastards run NCR, always have. Peter wasn't a snitch, either. Killed them for nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 彼得把他掌握的所有关于贝勒克的资料都发给我了，贪婪的混蛋操纵着NCR，一直如此。彼得不是告密者，白白被他们杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_0000B041_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on down to the entrance, we'll talk... and, uh... thank you. Know this must've been some trip. I'll make it up to you, you have my word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到入口处来，我们谈谈...还有，呃...谢谢你！我知道这趟旅行一定很辛苦，我会补偿你的，我向你保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_0000B041_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is your nephew, Michael. You're the only family he has left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的侄子，迈克尔。你是他唯一的亲人了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that... that is Michael. I know my flesh and blood, and that's Peter's boy. Good God, thank you. Guess my worst suspicions are confirmed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是...这是迈克尔，我认识我的亲人，他是彼得的儿子。上帝啊，谢谢你，我最坏的猜测得到了证实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_0000B043_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Peter sent me everything he had on Bellek. Greedy bastards run NCR, always have. Peter wasn't a snitch, either. Killed them for nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 彼得把他掌握的所有关于贝勒克的资料都发给我了，贪婪的混蛋操纵着NCR，一直如此。彼得不是告密者，白白被他们杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_0000B043_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on down to the entrance, we'll talk... and, uh... thank you. Know this must've been some trip. I'll make it up to you, you have my word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到入口处来，我们谈谈...还有，呃...谢谢你！我知道这趟旅行一定很辛苦，我会补偿你的，我向你保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesInt_0000B043_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good news, bad news. Michael survived but everyone else was murdered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好消息，坏消息。迈克尔活了下来，但其他人都被杀了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's great... Michael, come over here. Let me take a look at you. You have the look of your father, sure as the day I was born.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，太好了...迈克尔，过来，让我看看你。你长得和你父亲一模一样，就像我出生那天一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBar_0000B04E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very nice to meet you as well, Michael. Say, you like hunting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也很高兴见到你，迈克尔。我说，你喜欢打猎吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBar_0000B055_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we're gonna fix that lickety split. After I show you around the place, we'll go hunt us a wild Bighorner. Then we'll eat it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们会解决这个问题的。等我带你四处转转，我们就去猎杀一只野生大角羊，然后我们就吃了它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBar_0000B057_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Harcourt... no deal. Best be on your way. Give John my regards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈考特...没法成交。最好现在就走，代我向约翰问好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBar_0000E294_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He reciprocates with a firm handshake.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他以坚定的握手作为回应。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You too, partner. My old friend, Constantine, is taking over my routes while I'm gone. Look him up at Crimson Caravan when you get a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也是，搭档。我的老朋友，康斯坦丁，在我离开期间接管我的路线，有机会就去深红商队找他吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoByeSha_0000B060_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: May your packages be light and your deliveries... profitable? I usually plan these things, sorry. Take care!
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你的包裹轻一点，你的快递...盈利？我通常会计划这些事情，抱歉。保重!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoByeSha_0000B060_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Shake his hand> Good luck out there, Mojo. Stay safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: <和他握手>祝好运，莫乔。注意安全。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He reciprocates with a firm handshake.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他以坚定的握手作为回应。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You too, partner. My old friend, Constantine, is taking over my routes while I'm gone. Look him up at Crimson Caravan when you get a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也是，搭档。我的老朋友，康斯坦丁，在我离开期间接管我的路线，有机会就去深红商队找他吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoByeSha_00012BCD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: May your packages be light and your deliveries... profitable? I usually plan these things, sorry. Take care!
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你的包裹轻一点，你的快递...盈利？我通常会计划这些事情，抱歉。保重!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoByeSha_00012BCD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Shake his hand> Stay happy. Take breaths. Not nap.
ESP.TRADUIT: <和他握手>保持快乐，深呼吸，不打盹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You too, partner. My old friend, Constantine, is taking over my routes while I'm gone. Look him up at Crimson Caravan when you get a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也是，搭档。我的老朋友，康斯坦丁，在我离开期间接管我的路线，有机会就去深红商队找他吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoByeCoo_0000B061_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: May your packages be light and your deliveries... profitable? I usually plan these things, sorry. Take care!
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你的包裹轻一点，你的快递...盈利？我通常会计划这些事情，抱歉。保重!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoByeCoo_0000B061_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you later, Mojo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见，莫乔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's mighty unkind after all the hardships we've shared. I'll forgive you, but Barf won't. Anyway, take care of yourself out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一起经历了那么多磨难，你这么说太不厚道了，我会原谅你，但吐吐是不会的。不管怎样，在外面要照顾好自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoByeDic_0000B062_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please take your weird dog and get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请带着你的怪狗离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Far away from the Mojave, that's for damn sure. Got a good route to Shady, think I'll take it. From there... we'll see. Klamath, maybe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 远离莫哈维，这是肯定的。有条去沙荫镇的好路线，我想我该走了。从那里...我们拭目以待，也许是克拉马斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoByeWhe_0000B05F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are you headed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要去哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's mighty kind of you to offer, but I'm not much for, uh... serious engagements, as they say. Battles? Fuck. That.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的好意，但我不太适合，呃...正如他们所说，严肃的交战，战斗？操，那个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoByeWhe_0000B065_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Between Chuck blowing up the canyon and you doing... well, whatever it is you do that leaves piles of dead people... I don't want any part of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查克炸了峡谷，而你...无论你做什么，都会留下一堆死人...我不想参与其中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoByeWhe_0000B065_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a man of commerce, not war. I'll be here in spirit, though. Got a long trip ahead, gotta make good time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是做生意的，不是打仗的。不过，我的精神会留在这里的。还有很长的路要走，得抓紧时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojo Wilson [02004B48] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetMojoByeWhe_0000B065_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure you don't want to stick around? We could use your help if there's a fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定不想留下来吗？如果发生了冲突，我们需要你的帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He came in a few days back and stepped on a pressure plate, blew his legs clean off. Bled out before I could reach him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他几天前来的时候踩到了压力板，把腿炸飞了。我还没来得及救他，他就失血过多而死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B06E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This other tomcat came waltzing in just now, strolled right up to the gate hollering demands and threats. You saw how that turned out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只雄猫刚才大摇大摆的进来了，溜达到门口大喊着要求和威胁。你也看到结果了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B06E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to the first scout?
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一个侦察兵出什么事了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: None in the pass itself. I've got a few surprises on the ridges and other approaches if anyone gets cute. Reckon it's wide open now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在山口没有。如果有人想耍花招，我在山脊上准备了一些惊喜和其他方法。我想现在已经门户大开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B06F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got bulk HE buried in the chokepoints... enough to blow any mercs to Reno. Need to set up a means of remote initiation. That's a tomorrow problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在关键位置埋了大量高爆...足以把任何雇佣兵炸到里诺去。需要设置远程启动的方式，那是明天的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B06F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any other traps I should know about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他陷阱要留意的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably gonna be a hostile element moving on us in a few days. More scouts beforehand. First step is helping my friends nearby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能过几天就会有敌对势力向我们袭来，更多的事先侦察，第一步是帮助我附近的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B074_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you need me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, is that so hard to believe? Supermutants settled a few years back... in the canyon south of here, raise Bighorners and other livestock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，有那么难相信吗？超级变种人几年前定居下来...在这里南边的峡谷里，养大角羊和其他牲畜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B075_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were always friendly, been good trading partners. Enjoy their tobacco, so it's worked out well for both parties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们一直很友好，是很好的贸易伙伴。享受他们的烟草，这样对双方都有好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B075_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those Rampart boys have a reputation for brutality against mutants. I've been meaning to warn them, but I can't leave this place unsecured.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些壁垒的家伙以对变种人残忍著称。我一直想警告他们，但我不能让这里毫无戒备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B075_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The honcho is Jonas. Good guy, but stubborn. Doubt he'll want to leave. Convince him to pack up and hunker down here for the fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老大是乔纳斯，好人，但顽固。我怀疑他不想离开这，说服他收拾行囊，躲在这里准备战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B075_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Friends?
ESP.TRADUIT: 朋友？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take the south pass, you can't miss it. Little gorge with some shacks, pens. Be cool and tell them I sent you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走南边的山口，你不会错过的，小峡谷，还有棚屋，围栏。冷静点，告诉他们是我派你去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B076_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Michael will be safe here. This will give me a chance to get to know him. Seems like a good kid. Good luck... and thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迈克尔在这里会很安全，这也给了我一个了解他的机会，看起来是个好孩子。祝你好运...谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B076_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in. Just tell me where to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我接了，告诉我该去哪儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aaron King's little band of shitbirds are after the documents Peter sent me. He's sending John Sharp of all people to collect. I'm flattered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚伦·金那帮混蛋在找彼得发给我的文件。他派了约翰·夏普来，我受宠若惊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B070_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Several platoons... maybe even a company-sized force. Seems a bit excessive if you ask me. Bellek has deep pockets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几个排...甚至可能是一个连规模的力量。要我说有点过分了，贝莱克真是财大气粗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B070_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I cultivated the reputation of a lone madman so I'd be left alone, nothing more. Didn't think it would bring this shitstorm. Fuck me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我塑造了一个孤独疯子的名声这样我就能一个人待着，仅此而已，没想到会引起这么大的风波。我真是操了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B070_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you learn from the scout's note?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从侦察员的便条中了解到什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was with the unit that carved up the tribals around Bullhead. He was the torturer-in-chief when it came to extracting intel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是瓜分布尔海德周围部落的部队的一员。在获取情报方面，他是首席拷问官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B071_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Press eventually went after that group... Kimball was all too happy to distance himself and keep the credit for Bullhead... but none of the blame.
ESP.TRADUIT: 媒体最终盯上了那群人...金博尔非常高兴的与他保持距离，并保留了布尔海德的功劳...但不承担任何责任。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B071_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of the brass got off scot-free, including the main perpetrators. But Sharp? They made a spectacle out of it. Nailed his ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数高层都逍遥法外，包括主要犯罪者。但夏普呢？他们把这件事闹得沸沸扬扬，把他往死里整。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B071_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stripped of rank and pension, other than honorable. Should've shot him. He jumped right in bed with Rampart, been busy ever since.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了荣誉，还被剥夺了军衔和退休金。他本该被枪毙的，这家伙立马就和壁垒勾结在一起，从那以后就一直忙个不停。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B071_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's so special about John Sharp?
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰·夏普有什么特别的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... for one, he hates mutants... got a few living in the canyon nearby. We'll get to that. But mainly... the man gets results.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...首先，他讨厌变种人...附近的峡谷里有几个，我们会讲到的。但主要是...这个人能得到结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B072_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best case... they think Sharp will convince me to give up the documents due to... shared service. Worst case... he'll cut them out of my hide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好的情况...他们认为夏普会说服我交出文件，因为...共享服务。最坏的情况...他会从我身上割下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B072_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and he is a devil with a knife. Make no mistake, if it gets hairy... don't get close unless you're damn sure of yourself. Damn sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，他是个拿刀的恶魔。毫无疑问，如果事情变得棘手...除非你对自己很有把握，否则别靠近。我他妈确定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B072_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any idea on why they're sending Sharp?
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道他们为什么派夏普来吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caps? I can do that. Guess this ain't all out of the goodness of your heart after all. Fair, especially after what you've done. I won't judge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瓶盖？我可以做到。看来这也不是出于你内心的善良，很公平，尤其是在你做了那些事后。我不做评判。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B078_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take these. More when this is all settled, I promise. Need to get moving, though. Might be more scouts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着这些，等这一切都解决了，我保证会更多。不过我们得行动起来了，可能会有更多的侦察兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000B078_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know about this. I want to see caps before I even think about helping.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道这一点。在我想帮忙之前，我想先看到瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I need a word with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我想和你谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHarForceGr_0000B07C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna stay here and keep an eye on Michael. My gut says that his Uncle Charlie is decent enough, but the man has a reputation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要留在这里看着迈克尔。我的直觉告诉我，他的查理叔叔是个正派的人，但他也名声在外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHarForceGr_0000B07C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be on my best behavior, no politics or anything. We can settle all that later when you're here. You good with that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会表现得很好，不谈政治什么的。等你来了我们再解决，没问题吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHarForceGr_0000B07C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, before you do anything rash, just... just hear me out, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇噢，在你做出鲁莽的举动之前，先...听我说完，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHarForceGr_0000DE76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You let this slide and men like Bellek will keep trampling on the law... killing and stealing as they see fit. We have to see justice served.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你听之任之，像贝莱克这样的人就会继续践踏法律...肆意杀戮和偷窃。我们必须看到正义得到伸张。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHarForceGr_0000DE76_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, we'll have to fight. Some of us may die. I'm willing to make that sacrifice. I'll be right here on this wall. Will you stand with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我们必须战斗，有些人可能会死，我愿意为此牺牲。我会坚守在墙头，你会和我一起吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHarForceGr_0000DE76_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn... after all this, to just up and leave. Here's your caps. Don't let the door hit you on the way out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死...在这一切之后，就这么起身离开。这是你的瓶盖，出去的时候别被门撞了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000BBCA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't sign up for this. Cash me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不想干这个，把我的钱兑现。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take the south pass, you can't miss it. Little gorge with some shacks, pens. Be cool and tell them I sent you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走南边的山口，你不会错过的，小峡谷，还有棚屋，围栏。冷静点，告诉他们是我派你去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000BBC9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Michael will be safe here. This will give me a chance to get to know him. Seems like a good kid. Good luck... and thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迈克尔在这里会很安全，这也给了我一个了解他的机会，看起来是个好孩子。祝你好运...谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000BBC9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in. Just tell me where to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我接了，告诉我该去哪儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will. You be careful, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会的。你也小心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartPreMut_0000B084_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just keep Michael safe. I'll be right back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要保护好迈克尔就行了，我马上就回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will. Good to know we're on the same page. Good luck out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会的。很高兴咱们意见一致，祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartPreMut_0000B080_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Keep a close eye on Charles, I'm not sure about him yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。盯紧查尔斯，我还不确定他怎么样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that having me tag along probably wasn't in your plan for this little adventure, but I'm here. I'll do my job whether you like it or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道让我跟着可能不是你这次冒险的计划，但我来了。不管你喜欢与否，我都要做我的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartPreMut_0000B085_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do whatever you want. I don't care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想怎么做就怎么做，我也不在乎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll see, won't we. So long as you're here to help Michael, I won't stop you. Just mind your business up here, sister. This ain't Shady Sands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们拭目以待，是吧。只要你愿意帮迈克尔，我是不会阻止你的。管好你自己的事，姐妹，这里可不是沙荫镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBar_0000B083_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway... Michael, we're gonna go over weapons safety. Then we're gonna blow up some mannequins. You ever blown shit up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之...迈克尔，我们要复习一下武器安全。然后我们要炸掉几个人体模型，你炸过东西吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBar_0000B083_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bighorner steak - how do you like it cooked? Bloody as hell or burnt to a crisp? We've been arguing all afternoon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大角羊排...你喜欢几分熟的？血淋淋的还是烧焦的？我们吵了一下午了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerWhat_0000B762_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weirdo. Same as my boss. You sit around listening to classical music and touching yourself? You like collecting scalps? Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怪人，和我老板一样。你坐着听古典音乐自慰吗？你喜欢收集头皮吗？算了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerWhat_0000B763_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you a trader? Roaming assassin? Travelling sex worker? What's the deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你个是商人？游荡的刺客？旅行的性工作者？怎么回事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerWhat_0000B763_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't eat meat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不吃肉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finally, someone with taste! My friends are uncultured savages. Probably had a tribal upbringing. Simple, animal brains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 终于有人有品味了！我的朋友都是些没有文化的野蛮人，可能是在部落里长大的，简单的动物大脑。
