ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerStea_0000B774_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you a trader? Roaming assassin? Travelling sex worker? What's the deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你个是商人？游荡的刺客？旅行的性工作者？怎么回事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerStea_0000B774_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一分熟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pussy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蠢货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerStea_0000B773_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you a trader? Roaming assassin? Travelling sex worker? What's the deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你个是商人？游荡的刺客？旅行的性工作者？怎么回事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerStea_0000B773_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Medium.
ESP.TRADUIT: 半熟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a monster. Do you also strangle puppies before you go to sleep each night? Kick pregnant women in the stomach? Just fucking with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是个怪物。你睡觉之前也掐死小狗？踢孕妇肚子？逗你玩呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerStea_0000B772_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you a trader? Roaming assassin? Travelling sex worker? What's the deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你个是商人？游荡的刺客？旅行的性工作者？怎么回事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerStea_0000B772_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well-done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 全熟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that guy. Yeah, he's well done. See, we came up here to talk... they opened fire, then took cover in the house. So we burned it down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，那个家伙，嗯，他做得很好。你看，我们来这里是想谈谈...他们开了枪，然后躲进房子里，所以我们就把它烧了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerLook_0000B765_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must be with Charlie Augen. Is he as crazy as they say? I mean... House crazy? Piss in bottles? Keeping gnomes as sex dolls?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定和查理·奥根在一起吧，他真像人们说的那样疯狂吗？我的意思是...房子狂？尿在瓶子里？把地精当作性玩偶？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerLook_0000B765_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't answer that, I wouldn't want to know either way. So... muties got belligerent, we defended ourselves. Case closed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别回答，反正我也不想知道。所以...变种人好战，我们自卫，结案了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerLook_0000B765_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can go report back to Ranger Crazy, I'll report to my boss. Getting froggy with you is not in my ROE. I'd prefer if we all walked away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以回去跟疯子游骑兵汇报，我去跟我老板汇报。跟你闹别扭不在我的交战守则里，我更希望我们都走开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerLook_0000B765_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for Jonas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在找乔纳斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds good. Not sure how this will all play out when Sharp gets here, but that's over my pay grade... and the pay ain't that good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来不错。如果能有沙普在这里的话，那我更高兴了……但我的工资又不怎么高…我只能待在这儿干苦活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerPeac_0000B76B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plenty of steak if you want some. Hell, take one back to Charlie. Tell that crazy bastard he has my respect. Great work in Boulder City.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想要的话，还有很多肉排。见鬼，带一个回去给查理，告诉那个疯子我很尊重他，在巨石城干得不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerPeac_0000B76B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. You go your way and I'll go mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。你走你的路，我走我的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dammit, gonna make me waste a perfectly good cigarette. Fine. C'mon, boys, time for the encore!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，让我浪费了一支好烟，很好。来吧，弟兄们，返场时间到了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerAtta_0000B76D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> You're gonna pay for what you did here.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>你会为你的所作所为付出代价的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not raw!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不能生吃！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerTP_0000B76E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna be steak tartare for the coyotes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会成为土狼的鞑靼牛排。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not raw!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不能生吃！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerTP_00012BE5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You samwich for howlers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个低级蠢货三明治。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, we didn't come looking for trouble. Just recon. They opened fire on us, took cover in the house. So we burned the bitch down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我们不是来找麻烦的，只是侦察一下。他们向我们开火，躲在房子里，所以我们把那贱人烧了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerLook_0000B768_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must be with Charlie Augen. Is he as crazy as they say? I mean... House crazy? Piss in bottles? Keeping gnomes as sex dolls?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定和查理·奥根在一起吧，他真像人们说的那样疯狂吗？我的意思是...房子狂？尿在瓶子里？把地精当作性玩偶？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerLook_0000B768_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't answer that, I wouldn't want to know either way. So... muties got belligerent, we defended ourselves. Case closed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别回答，反正我也不想知道。所以...变种人好战，我们自卫，结案了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerLook_0000B768_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can go report back to Ranger Crazy, I'll report to my boss. Getting froggy with you is not in my ROE. I'd prefer if we all walked away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以回去跟疯子游骑兵汇报，我去跟我老板汇报。跟你闹别扭不在我的交战守则里，我更希望我们都走开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerLook_0000B768_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came here to warn some herders. Looks like I'm too late.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来警告一些牧民的，看来我来晚了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. Maybe not. Maybe the dumb bastards felt the sudden urge to self-immolate. Not my problem anymore. Not yours, either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能吧，也可能不是。可能那些蠢蛋突然有了自焚的冲动，不关我的事了，也不关你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerPerc_0000B769_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best to just let this go. Alternative is... well, you'll be another charred corpse in that pile. Very unceremonious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好还是算了吧。另一种选择是...好吧，你会成为另一具烧焦的尸体。非常随意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerPerc_0000B769_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're lying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在撒谎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay... hypothetically... if I had done it... it would've been based on instructions to purge mutants from these mountains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧...假设...如果是我干的...应该是根据指示，在这片山里清除变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerPerc_0000B771_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what those bastards are doing down south? Ever heard of Ares? Gang of savages, killing and enslaving in our backyard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道那些混蛋在南方干什么吗？听说过阿瑞斯吗？一群野蛮人，在我们的后院杀戮和奴役。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerPerc_0000B771_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bad enough NCR is getting its teeth kicked in down there, don't need these freaks stabbing us in the back. Muties are unpredictable, dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR在那里被踢得满地找牙已经够糟了，不需要这些怪胎在背后捅刀子。变种人是不可预测的，危险的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerPerc_0000B771_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, yeah... hypothetically... I would've herded them - no pun intended - into their filthy shack, then barred the doors and torched it. The end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，是的...假设...我就会把他们赶进他们肮脏的棚屋...没有双关语的意思...然后闩上门，把它烧了。结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerPerc_0000B771_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The evidence is clear, cut the crap. Why'd you do it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 证据确凿，废话少说。你为什么要这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you! I'm a firm believer in low and slow. Cooking saved my first marriage... well, it delayed the inevitable failure. Complicated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你！我坚定地相信小火慢烤。烹饪挽救了我的第一次婚姻...推迟了不可避免的失败，很复杂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerPerc_0000B76A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best to just let this go. Alternative is... well, you'll be another charred corpse in that pile. Very unceremonious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好还是算了吧。另一种选择是...好吧，你会成为另一具烧焦的尸体。非常随意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lugner [0200B6B4] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetLugnerPerc_0000B76A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those steaks smell delicious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些肉排闻起来好香。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn straight, good on you. Jonas had his quirks, but as mutants go he was all right. Fair trader. Well, guess we got a fight coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真他妈对，很适合你。乔纳斯有他的怪癖，但作为变种人，他还算不错，公平交易者。好吧，看来我们要打架了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesPos_0000B7AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got work to do. Meet me in the house and we'll talk it over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还有工作要做。在房子里见我，我们好好谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesPos_0000B7AD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With extreme prejudice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着极端的偏见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time or place? Hell fire, any chance to chip away at them is a positive, not to mention getting justice for Jonas. Goddamn, you gotta step up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 时间还是地点？该死的，任何削弱他们的机会都是积极的，更不用说为乔纳斯伸张正义了。妈的，你得站出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesPos_0000B7AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got work to do. Meet me in the house and we'll talk it over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还有工作要做。在房子里见我，我们好好谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesPos_0000B7AE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't the time or place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 时间和地点都不合适。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like a lot of the junk around here, I bought it from Mojo on the cheap. God only knows where he "acquired" it. Never could get it running.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像这里的很多垃圾一样，我从莫乔那里便宜买的，只有上帝知道他从哪里“购得”的，一直没能让它运转起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000C029_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plenty of spare parts in the workshop down there. Use whatever you need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 楼下的车间里有很多备件，你需要什么就用什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000C029_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Auto-Doc?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说自动医生吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Piece of shit Mister Handy that Mojo dragged in a while back. Had half a mind to use it for target practice or scrap it altogether.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前阵子被莫乔拖来的混蛋勇敢先生，本想用它来练习打靶或者干脆扔掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000C02A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a general rule, I dislike robots, especially military models. I've dealt with more berserk Protectrons and Sentry Bots than I can count.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一般来说，我不喜欢机器人，尤其是军用模型。我对付过的狂暴保护者和铁卫兵数不胜数。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000C02A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However... if you can get it up and running it might be able to soak up a few bullets. That makes it good for something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过...如果你能让它运转起来也许能吸收几颗子弹，这让它有了用处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000C02A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the deal with the robot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个机器人怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't really have time for that. Judging by your companions, I don't think they'll need it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可没那么多时间。从你的同伴看来，我认为他们不需要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000C02C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What you can do is distribute supplies. Stimpaks, ammunition, weapons... anything you think could be useful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你所能做的就是分发物资。治疗针、弹药、武器...任何你认为有用的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000C02C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about training?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那训练呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not yet. I've got jugs of bulk HE buried under chokepoints, want to make sure the demo is timed perfectly. We'll do that later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。我在关键位置埋了大量的高爆炸药，想确保爆破的时间是完美的。我们稍后再做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000C02B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want me to set any traps out there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要我在外面设陷阱吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. We'll be outnumbered and outgunned... but besides our combined skill and general elan we've got a secret weapon they can't match.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧。我们在人数和武器上都处于劣势...但除了我们的综合技能和整体的锐气，我们还有他们无法比拟的秘密武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000C030_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've developed enough bulk HE to simulate a tactical nuke. It's buried, but we can easily prime in and rig up a means of remote detonation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我研制了足够大的炸药来模拟战术核武器。它被埋在地下，但我们可以很容易地装好远程引爆装置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000C030_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Straight shootout... we probably lose. My plan is to draw them in and then initiate... it'll rock every inch of cover outside the compound.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直接交火...我们可能会输。我的计划是把他们吸引进来，然后起爆...它会撼动院子外面的每一寸土地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000C030_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really think we can hold out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真觉得我们能坚持下去吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No time to waste, then. Let's get started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就没时间浪费了，开始吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000BBDA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没别的问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need a word with you, Charles. We need to discuss Michael's involvement in this case... and the evidence you're holding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要跟你谈谈，查理斯。我们需要讨论一下迈克尔与这个案子的关系...还有你手上的证据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesKit_0000C032_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing to discuss. Michael is staying here. The evidence will remain locked up. It's leverage. Bellek... he'll pay, but it won't be in a courtroom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么好商量的，迈克尔要留在这里，证据将被封存起来，这是一种优势。贝莱克...他会付出代价，但不会在法庭上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesKit_0000C033_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, it's not just Bellek... it's all the barons. We nail him publically... in court... it takes them all down a notch. Reinforces the rule of law.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，不只是贝莱克...是所有的大亨。我们要公开揭发他...在法庭上...这会让他们的威信大跌。加强法治。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesKit_0000C034_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It won't make one lick of difference. Your government is bought and paid for, rotten to the core. I've seen NCR "justice" firsthand. No thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不会有什么区别的。你们的政府被收买了，腐败透顶，我亲眼目睹了NCR的“正义”。不用了，谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesKit_0000C035_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I read the records, I know you got dicked down after Boulder. We've all been screwed over at some point. But we are in this together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看了记录，我知道你在巨石城后被坑了。我们都有过被骗的经历，但我们是一条船上的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesKit_0000C036_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No man is an island, Charles. NCR is the best option... for everyone. You've got to think about Michael now, not just yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有人是一座孤岛，查理斯，NCR是最好的选择...对每个人来说。你现在得为迈克尔着想，而不仅仅是你自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesKit_0000C037_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... I was one of the ones who supported unification. Even when Russell and the other diehards pissed and moaned, I didn't listen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的...我是支持统一的人之一。甚至当拉塞尔和其他死忠分子愤怒和抱怨时，我也没有听进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesKit_0000C038_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hated the skirts so much I would've joined the circus if it meant beating those slaving fucks. It worked... for a while. But then I saw the rot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我太讨厌那些裙子了，如果能打败那些奴隶制畜生，我加入马戏团都行。有一段时间...管用，但后来我看到了腐烂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesKit_0000C039_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It happened gradually. Shuffled around, split up. No more autonomy, no more initiative... pretty soon you're led by cherries who've never seen war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是逐渐发生的。四处乱转，分头行动，不再有自主权，不再有主动性...很快你就会被那些没见过战争的初哥领导。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesKit_0000C03A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A nation led by bureaucrats. Gutless, backstabbing worms who aren't worth the shit on their boots. I wouldn't trust them to run a lemonade stand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由官僚统治的国家，没胆量，暗箭伤人的虫子，一文不值。摆摊卖柠檬水我都不信他们能干好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesKit_0000C03B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you're angry, Charles... but hyperbole doesn't help. You keep Michael up here and nothing changes. Nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你很生气，查理斯...但夸张也无济于事。你把迈克尔留在这里，也不会有什么变化，什么都不会有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesKit_0000C03C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not asking you to forgive or forget... hell, stick it to the barons! This is about justice, Charles. Justice for your family... and for Michael.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是要你原谅或者忘记...该死，给大亨们点厉害瞧瞧！这事关正义，查理斯，为你的家人伸张正义...还有迈克尔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesKit_0000C03D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like you, kid. I can see you've got a good heart... but you'll learn the hard way. Rats get fat and brave men die. Fuck NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢你，孩子，我看得出你有一颗善良的心...但你会尝到苦头的。小人得志，英雄落难，去他妈的NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesKit_0000C03F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn it, Charles. Is this a matter of trust? Shared hardship? Well, we're about to get some bonding, courtesy of Rampart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼，查理斯，这是信任的问题吗？同甘共苦？多亏了壁垒，我们马上就要建立感情了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesKit_0000C040_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may have given up on NCR, but it hasn't given up on you... or Michael. I'll prove it to you, rest assured. We'll talk again later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能已经放弃了NCR，但它并没有放弃你...或者迈克尔。我会证明给你看的，你放心。我们以后再谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesKit_0000C041_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reboot successful. All systems are green. Awaiting orders to incinerate filthy, degenerate communists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 系统重启成功，所有系统已就绪，等待焚烧肮脏堕落的共产主义者的命令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0000C866_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Recording}No sign of Elijah's chapter... or Elijah. I'll scout out the settlements and high-value targets, see if I can't find any leads.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Recording}没有以利亚分会...或者以利亚的痕迹。我去调查一下定居点和高价值目标，看看能不能找到线索。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0001277F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never thought I'd see Vegas like this... disguised and alone, save this oddball robot. What happens when scientists try to resurrect the dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从没想过拉斯维加斯会变成这样...独自伪装，就剩这个古怪的机器人。当科学家试图让死人复活时会发生什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0001277F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With or without Elijah and his chapter... need to track down what amounts to a dozen SADMs, three re-entry vehicles... and one Winchester.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管有没有以利亚和他的分会...需要追踪多达12个SADM， 3个再入飞行器...还有一把温彻斯特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0001277F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Odd, talking to a robot. I was too hard on 'em. Dad wouldn't have approved. I haven't forgotten about you, Pops. Paladin Stuart, signing off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真奇怪，跟机器人说话。我对他们太苛刻了，爸爸不会同意的，我没有忘记你，老爹，圣骑士斯图亚特，完毕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0001277F_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Recording}"Live in the sunshine." I wonder if Mister Emerson was whispering in Elijah’s ear. So much time and blood spent on this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Recording}“生活在阳光下。”我想知道爱默生先生是不是在以利亚耳边低语，在这里花了那么多时间和鲜血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0001458E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I’d wager the senior scribe had designs on weaponizing it. Did he really think it would be enough to turn the tide?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢打赌高级学士是打算把它武器化的，他真的认为这足以扭转局势吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0001458E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It’ll take more than this to stop the Empire of California, that much is clear. Guess they had to learn the hard way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要想阻止加州帝国，还需要更多的努力，这是显而易见的。看来他们是吃了苦头才学会的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0001458E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Recording}Old test site is still contaminated. Salted warheads on your own soil. Madness. Should’ve listened to ol’ Doctor Szilard.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Recording}旧试验场仍然受到污染，在你自己的土地上有盐渍弹头，疯了。真该听老西拉德博士的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014592_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No sign of storage or bunker access. Must’ve trucked them in overland, not part of the network. I’ll try the other sites with elevated readings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有进入仓库或地堡的迹象，肯定是从陆路运走的，不是网络的一部分。我会去其他读数较高的地方看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014592_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hate to leave the ferals like this, but don’t want to leave the footprint. Hopefully they’ll keep the prospectors away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不想这样留下狂尸鬼，又不想留下脚印。希望他们能把淘金客拒之门外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014592_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Recording}Another dead end. Civilian site that’s just steadily leaking from the look of it. Damn geckos soak it up like sunshine.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Recording}又是一条死胡同，从表面上看，这是一个不断泄漏的民用基地。该死的壁虎像吸收阳光一样吸收它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014596_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of the Vipers from that camp is shadowing me. For his sake, I hope he gives up. Hard to keep LeMay on a leash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 营地里有个毒蛇帮在跟踪我。为了他好，我希望他放弃，很难控制住李梅。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014596_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Recording}Looks like the security system is still holding up here. More time and I’d love to poke around. Bet there’s some sexy hardware inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Recording}看来这里的安保系统还在运行。有时间的话，我很乐意四处逛逛，我打赌里面肯定有一些性感的硬件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0001459A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report said that House was possibly developing plasma weapons here prior to the war. Surprised Elijah didn’t make time to check it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 报告说，豪斯可能在战前就在这里开发等离子武器，以利亚居然没抽空去看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0001459A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? No, LeMay, you cannot burn down the building. Yes, I understand you want to assert the superiority of General Atomics, but... no, just no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不，李梅，你不能烧了这栋楼。是的，我明白你想要强调通用原子公司的优越性，但是...不，就是不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0001459A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Recording}"Arise, slay thy enemies, enjoy a prosperous kingdom." Empire of California did its work well here, I see.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Recording}“起来吧，斩杀你的敌人，享受繁荣的王国。”看来加州帝国在这里很成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DCD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Yes, of course you would approve, LeMay. Khans were always trouble, but they’re still human. I’ll donate some stimpaks and we’ll move on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？是的，你当然会同意，李梅。可汗总是很麻烦，但他们也是人。我去捐一些治疗针，然后我们继续前进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DCD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Recording}Charles Dickens, eat your heart out. What a paradise Robert House has built here outside the Strip.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Recording}查尔斯·狄更斯，你羡慕吧。罗伯特·豪斯在长街外建了一座多么美好的天堂啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DD1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good chance that Dutch stopped here on his way south. Keep it quiet, robot. Low profile... no burning, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 达奇在南下途中很可能在这里停留。小点声，机器人，低调...不要燃烧，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DD1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, we’re not going to the Strip. Won’t chance getting that close to NCR or House’s toys. We’ll start with the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们不去长街，我可不敢靠近NCR和豪斯的玩具。先从天启追随者开始吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DD1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Recording}Path to the Divide. Some pretty wild reports have trickled through the caravans, not sure what to believe.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Recording}通往大裂谷之路。一些相当疯狂的消息从商队中传出，不知道该相信什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DD5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get done with all this, might conduct a proper reconnaissance. Could be connected, but saw enough to know it’s shot to hell. Nukes, to be sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞定这一切，可能会进行一次适当的侦察。可能有联系，但看到的足够多，我知道它已经完蛋了。当然是核武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DD5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone wrote that the world ends with a whimper, not a bang. I respectfully disagree.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人写道，世界在一声呜咽中终结，而不是一声巨响。恕我不同意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DD5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Recording}NCR bigshot came rolling through with a heavily-guarded caravan. Legion assassins ambushed them just south of here. All hell broke loose.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Recording}NCR的大人物开着一辆戒备森严的大篷车滚滚而来，军团刺客在南边伏击了他们。一切都乱套了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DD9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion killed half the guards, wounded bystanders, maimed cattle... I rendered aid, but... what a mess. Every legionary fought to the death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团杀死了一半的守卫，打伤了旁观者，弄残了牛群...我提供了援助，但是...真是一团糟，每一个军团士兵都拼死战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DD9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lot of audacity, discipline in that group. Just... the sheer, fanatical will to even attempt it. Wars have been won with less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那群人胆子很大，纪律严明。只是...那纯粹的，狂热的想要尝试的意愿。用更少的资源赢得了战争。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DD9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Recording}Town seems normal enough, but something is off about the fire station. Getting a subtle reading outside the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Recording}镇上看起来很正常，但消防局有点不对劲。在门外获得了微妙的读数。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DDD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sizeable garrison, already getting some odd looks. Best to keep moving. I’m a wanted man, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相当规模的驻军，已经引起了一些奇怪的目光。最好继续前进，毕竟我是个通缉犯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DDD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Recording}Must’ve been a close-run affair to do something this desperate. Guess this Caesar isn’t as lucky as the original.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Recording}肯定是走投无路才会做出这种决定，看来这个凯撒没有原来那个幸运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DE1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thought they had a Zama, NCR made it Cannae. One battle doesn’t win a war, though. Not then, not now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为他们是扎玛，NCR改成了坎尼。不过，一场战斗并不能赢得一场战争，那时不行，现在也不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DE1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We‘ll see if NCR is better at using its victory than Mister Barca. I’m skeptical.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将看到NCR是否比巴卡先生更善于利用自己的胜利，我持怀疑态度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DE1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Recording}This is goodbye, LeMay. Shutting you down and selling you to that trader with the weird dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Recording}再见了，李梅。把你关掉，然后卖给那个带着怪狗的商人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DE5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gotta erase the bulk of your memory now that I’m finished here. Nothing personal. Chasing a lead and gotta move fast and light. No room for robots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得把你大部分的记忆都擦掉了，不是针对你。追查线索，要快速而轻盈，没有机器人的空间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DE5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you find a partner that can match your passion for fire. And yes, your ROE will stay in place. No burning random dogs, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你能找到一个能与你的激情相匹配的伴侣，是的，你的交战守则将保持不变。不要随便烧狗，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DE5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gonna be quite an odyssey to reach Shinburg. Gotta take the long way. Worth every step if Dutch is there. Paladin Stuart, signing off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要到达辛堡可真不容易，得走很远的路。只要达奇在，每一步都值得。圣骑士斯图亚特，结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00014DE5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please... I need this. I've done terrible things... I don't actually feel remorse, but maybe I can balance the scales a little by cooking this dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托...我需要这个。我做了很多可怕的事情...我并不觉得自责，但也许我可以通过烹饪这只狗来平衡一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0001D3B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If there is a God, I know he put me here to perform this service for the people of Freeside. Please let me burn this dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果真有上帝的话，我知道是他让我来这里为自由城的人民服务的。请让我烧掉这条狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0001D3B6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ace Yoblanski, now there's a man among men! Seven kills in one day! Seven! Shot down over China and escaped! Held the speed and altitude records!
ESP.TRADUIT: “王牌”约布兰斯基，男人中的男人！一天杀了七个人！七个！在中国上空被击落后逃跑了！保持着速度和高度的记录！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00021FFB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Records show that Ace was serving at Nellis when the war kicked off. Damn shame, given that he likely perished. Such a waste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记录显示战争开始时王牌正在内利斯服役。真可惜，他很可能已经死了。太浪费了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00021FFB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we get a chance, we should poke around the base, see if we can't find any mementos. I'd like to pay tribute to his memory, at the very least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有机会，我们应该在基地附近找找，看看能不能找到什么纪念品。我想向他致敬，至少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00021FFB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those... those are the words of Ace Yoblanski himself. If I read that correctly, he turned into a ghoul. He could still be alive!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些...都是“王牌”约布兰斯基亲口说的。如果我没看错的话，他变成了食尸鬼，他可能还活着！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0002241D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's in occupied territory. We have to conduct a rescue. You hear me? Leave no man behind!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他身处敌占区，我们有责任进行营救。你听见没有？绝不能丢下任何一个兄弟！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0002241D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I call a successful interdiction. According to my internal calculations and your Pip-Boy... we're 15 miles southwest of Big Wash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我所说的成功拦截。根据我的内部计算和你的哔哔小子...我们在大波浪西南15英里处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00023737_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll travel off-road and cross the 93 at night. Hopefully we can slip into the canyon at dawn. I'm ready to go when you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会走越野路线，晚上穿过93号公路，希望我们能在黎明时分溜进峡谷。你准备好了，我就出发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00023737_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is it. All right, slightly more Legion than I'd anticipated. Nominal presence. We can manage this. You be a trader, I'll be a docile companion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这里。好吧，军团比我预想的要多一些，名义部队。我们能搞定的，你做一个商人，我做一个温顺的伙伴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_000246E1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plan B: We burn everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 方案B：我们烧掉一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_000246F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look for Ace, I'll create a distraction. No time to talk, move!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去找王牌，我来分散他们的注意力。没时间说话了，快走！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_000246F0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00026216_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like my centurions well-done, if you know what I mean. So, did you find Ace? Did they mistreat him? I'll drown them in fire!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢全熟的百夫长，你懂我的意思吧。那么，你找到王牌了吗？他们虐待他了吗？我会把他们淹没在火里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_00026216_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe it! Here's here! This is like finding the Declaration of Independence! Mission accomplished!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢相信！在这里！这就像找到《独立宣言》一样！任务完成！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0002623E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's mosey on down to the exit and then we'll get the hell out of here. We'll exfiltrate Ace through the same route we used, easy peasy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们慢慢走到出口，然后就能离开这鬼地方了。我们用之前的路线救出王牌，轻而易举。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0002623E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't take a master sleuth to figure this one out. Legion sent in a team of hunters to clear out the deathclaws. They missed one. A big one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这案子不需要侦探大师来破解。军团派了一队猎人去清除死亡爪，他们漏掉了一头，一头大的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0002B41F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Way I see it, we have two ways to go about doing this... we can walk into their nest like dumbasses and get bushwhacked, or...
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我看来，我们有两种方法来做这件事...我们可以像傻瓜一样走进它们的巢穴，然后被伏击，或者...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0002B41F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We could set up a trap for this fucker. Let's prop a few Legion boys up, place some explosives, and then we'll sell it, make it seem real. I'll help!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以给这混蛋设个陷阱。我们先找几个军团的人撑着，放些炸药，然后夸大一点，让它看起来像真的。我来帮忙！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0002B41F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ace Yoblanski is an American hero who died fighting Chinese communists.
ESP.TRADUIT: “王牌”约布兰斯基是一位美国英雄，他在与中国共产党的战斗中牺牲了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0002C0FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ace Yoblanski is an American hero who died fighting Chinese communists.
ESP.TRADUIT: “王牌”约布兰斯基是一位美国英雄，他在与中国共产党的战斗中牺牲了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0003127D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hopping jalapeno shark tits... a Model F... in good condition! This puppy is our ticket to Vegas! We're gonna ride in style!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我了个弹跳墨西哥辣椒鲨鱼奶子...一个模型F...状况良好！这只小狗是我们去维加斯的门票！我们要骑得潇洒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0002CC4B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did I miss the fight? Damn it, I always miss the fun stuff! Can I burn the corpses, just to be sure? Nevermind, we don't have time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我错过了战斗吗？可恶，我总是错过好玩的东西！为了万无一失，我可以把尸体烧掉吗？算了，没时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0002D511_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vertibird is ready to go! Ace is keeping watch over your precious slaves. We really need to go... immediately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 飞鸟已经准备好了！王牌在照看你的宝贝奴隶。我们真的得走了...马上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0002D511_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now Ace is finally at rest. We've lost a national treasure, but it wasn't all for naught. Let's guide these savage... er, lost souls to freedom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在王牌终于安息了。我们失去了一件国宝，但这并非毫无意义。让我们来引导这些野蛮...呃，为自由而迷失的灵魂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0002D553_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ace sacrificed himself so that these... people... could be free. That's a very American way to go out... in my opinion. What do you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 王牌牺牲了自己，所以这些...人...也许自由了。这是一种非常美国式的方式...在我看来，你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0002D979_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm tired of looking at these savages. Let's get them to those do-gooders in Freeside. If I were human, I'd vomit all over you right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我厌倦了这些野蛮人，把他们送到自由城那些好心人那里去吧。如果我是人类，我现在就会吐在你身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0002E244_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That wasn't Ace Yoblanski, but if it were... I would be sorely disappointed. Nauseous, if I were capable of feeling nausea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是“王牌”约布兰斯基，但如果是的话...我会非常失望的。恶心，如果我能感觉到恶心的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayForce_0002E244_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Defend the constitution. Uphold the Uniform Code of Military Justice. Burn communists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 捍卫宪法，维护军事司法统一法典，焚烧共产主义者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayIntro_0000C871_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are your prime directives?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的主要职责是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I burn things. Cities, people, animals, geographic features. My specialty is incinerating communists en masse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我烧东西，城市，人，动物，地理特征。我的专长是把共产主义者统统烧死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayIntro_0000C870_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Godless pinkos burn so bright... and they emit a unique, intoxicating fragrance. I regret that I can't actually smell it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不信神的左倾分子燃烧得如此明亮...它们散发出一种独特的、令人陶醉的香味。真遗憾我闻不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayIntro_0000C870_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes I like to slow-roast them like hot dogs on the 4th of July. Did it to a bunker full of Chinese infantry in Anchorage. Delightful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候我喜欢在独立日的时候慢烤它们，就像烤热狗一样。对着安克雷奇的一个满是中国步兵的地堡干的，令人愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayIntro_0000C870_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any skills?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么特长？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Burn more people? I can burn them all if you want. Nuclear weapons are overrated, frankly. Incendiary bombs are cleaner, more efficient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 烧更多的人？如果你愿意，我可以把他们都烧了。坦率地说，核武器被高估了，燃烧弹更清洁，更有效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayIntro_0000C872_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes you just need a clean slate... but without all the disgusting radiation. I can be your deliverer. I'm a prophet of flame.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候你只是需要重新开始...但没有那些恶心的辐射。我可以成为你的救赎者，我是火焰先知。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayIntro_0000C872_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So can you do anything besides burn people?
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了烧人，你还能做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be your muse of fire. Let's build a monument to freedom with the charred bones of every stinking commie in America!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我将是你的缪斯之火。让我们用美国每一个臭烘烘的共产主义者烧焦的骨头来建造一座自由的纪念碑吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayIntro_0000D1C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: LeMay, I think this is the beginning of a beautiful friendship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李梅，我想这是一段美好友谊的开始。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am not a "regular" Mister Gutsy. Note the blue paint and clear markings that identify me as a member of the United States Air Force.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并不是个“普通”的勇敢先生。请注意我身上的蓝色油漆和清晰的标记，这表明我是美国空军的一员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayIntro_0000C873_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Army crawls in the mud, sleeps in filthy tents and languishes under the lash of semi-literate martinets posing as leaders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 陆军在泥泞中爬行，睡在肮脏的帐篷里，在伪装成领导人的半文盲严守纪律者的鞭笞下憔悴不堪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayIntro_0000C873_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not the Air Force. We soar through the heavens and deliver lethal ordnance like thunderbolts from Zeus! We also sleep in hotels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 空军可不这样。我们在天空翱翔，像宙斯的霹雳一样发射致命武器！我们还在酒店睡觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayIntro_0000C873_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like a regular Mister Gutsy. Anything special about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来像个普通的勇敢先生，你有什么特别的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will burn any and all trespassers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会烧死所有的入侵者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayIntro_0000C86F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guard the gate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 守住大门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your enemies will burn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的敌人会被烧死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayIntro_0000C86E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to follow me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你跟我来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, that's a start. Do you have a criminal record?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，这是个开始。你有犯罪记录吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C8E6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Army recruiters are next door. Ask for the Culinary Specialist contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 征兵人员就在隔壁，要求签订烹饪专家合同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C8E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd offer you a Security Forces contract, but we're not giving waivers right now... for anything. Get out, criminal scum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本想给你一份安全部队的合同，但我们现在不会给你豁免...对任何事情。滚出去，犯罪渣滓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C8EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, good. Now the tricky part. Do have a medical history?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，很好。现在棘手的部分来了，你有病史吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C8ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fact that you're seeking clarification suggests you have a criminal history. Denied. Try the Navy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你寻求澄清说明你有犯罪记录。拒绝，试试海军吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C8EC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you define "criminal history"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能给“犯罪历史”下个定义吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clearly. The Army has waivers for that. Remember... there are 180 jobs in the Army, 179 are support. Go infantry. Heh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 清楚，陆军对此有豁免。记住...陆军有180个职位，其中179个是后勤工作。走吧，步兵，呵呵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C8F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I was recently shot in the head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我最近脑袋中了枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good answer. Just remember that when you get to MEPS. No means "New Opportunities". One thing, just a formality. You're not prior service, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 回答得好。当你进入征兵站时，记住这一点，没有意味着“新的机会”。有一件事，只是走个形式，你不是先前服役吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C8F4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> No. What's a doctor?
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>没有，什么是医生？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any. Medical. History. Have you ever received medical care? Had a cold? Ingrown toenail? Accidently stumbled into a doctor's office?
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何，医疗，历史。你接受过医疗护理吗？感冒了？脚趾甲内生？不小心闯进了医生的办公室？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C8F2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, can you explain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你能解释一下吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get. Out. Of. My. Office. Tainted, used-up scum! Get out before you stain my beautiful, blue rugs! Out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚，出，我，的，办公室！肮脏、无用的人渣！在弄脏我漂亮的蓝色地毯之前滚出去！出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C8F8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and thank you for your service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，感谢你的服役。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C8F8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent, we prefer a clean slate. You may be a suitable candidate for service in the United States Air Force.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，我们想要一个干净的记录。你可能是在美国空军服役的合适人选。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C8F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to speak with our on-site recruiter, Tech Sergeant Johnson, on Tuesdays between 1300 and 1310. Subject to change. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 周二下午13点到13点10分之间，回来与我们的现场招募人员，技术中士约翰逊交谈，可能会有变化。有什么问题吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C8F7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scanning... you'll be assigned Cryptologic Linguist. You'll inevitably fail and then be reclassed to Ammo. Any more questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 扫描中...你将被指派为密码语言学家。你会不可避免的失败，然后被重新归类到弹药组。还有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C8FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will I have any agency in regards to my occupation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于我的职业我能自己做主吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be given a list of suitable occupations based on availability, test scores and the needs of the Air Force.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会得到一份适合你的职业清单，基于可获得性，考试成绩和空军的需求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C8FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want a hint? Maintenance. It will be maintenance. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要个提示吗？维修，就维修吧。有什么问题吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C8FE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will I get to choose my job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以选择我的工作吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scanning... you have bright future ahead of you in Security Forces. Any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 扫描中...你在安全部队的前途一片光明。还有问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C8FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I pick thing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我选什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, we don't answer it or return messages. Any other questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们不接电话，也不回信息。还有其他问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C900_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have the recruiter's number. If I call, can I speak to him or leave a message?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有招聘人员的电话。如果我打给他，我能和他通话或留言吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember: Don't call us, we'll call you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住：别打给我们，我们会打给你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecru_0000C8FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没别的问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I will think on your words. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我会考虑你说的话的。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyFutur_0000CD16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The hate in your heart will burn you up if you stay on this path. There's happiness in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你继续走这条路，你心中的仇恨会把你烧成灰烬。宁静中才有幸福。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You give me strength. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给了我力量。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyFutur_0000CD17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never stop fighting, Molly. That's what warriors do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 永远不要停止战斗，莫莉。这就是战士应该做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You speak true. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyFutur_0000CD18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your life, Molly. I won't pretend to tell you how to live it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的生活，莫莉。我不会假装告诉你如何生活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. Here, I share secret recipe. Make you strong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你！给，我分享秘方，让你变得强大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyTribe_0000CD1E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A wise practice. It seems I could learn much from your tribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明智的做法。看来我能从你们部落学到很多东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know this word. City people say it when not know what to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这个词。城里人不知道该说什么的时候就会这么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyTribe_0000CD27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有意思。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You live in city. You never understand. Eat enemy to survive. You go to south desert, they eat you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你住在城市里，你永远不会明白，吃掉敌人才能生存。你去南方沙漠，他们会吃了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyTribe_0000CD25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That sounds disgusting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来很恶心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We survive, keep traditions until Bear soldiers stop us. Kill many, but more come. Now our histories... our songs... all gone forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们顽强生存，保持传统，直到熊士兵阻止我们，杀了很多人，但更多的人会来。现在我们的历史...我们的歌...全都永远消失了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyTribe_0000CD26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like your tribe was pretty tough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你的部落挺厉害的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Each gnome is wired to blasting caps. There's an open circuit that will be closed if you disturb the gnome. Tilt switch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个地精都连着起爆筒。有一个开路电路，如果打扰了地精，就会关闭。倾斜开关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_0000D13B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They contain a battery that will provide enough charge for several days. Don't worry, there's a safe and arming switch with a long timer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 包含一个电池，可以提供几天的电量。别担心，这里有一个安全保护开关，计时器很长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_0000D13B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They won't be armed for several hours. Each one is weighted so they won't plop over and initiate on accident. You'll be perfectly safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们几个小时内都不会解除保险。每一个加重了，这样他们就不会扑通一声倒下，引发事故。你会很安全的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_0000D13B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, how will shooting the gnome set off the explosives?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，射击地精是怎么引爆炸药的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I've done it. Victim-operated or remote initiation. Nothing so satisfying as seeing a squad of legionaries die by gnome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我做过，受害者驱动或远程启动。没有什么比看到一队军团士兵死于地精更令人满意的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_0000D143_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seems like you have a good head on your shoulders. Here's how you make them. Have fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你很有头脑。这是制作方法，祝你玩得开心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_0000D143_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could pack the gnome with HE and make it an Improvised Explosive... Gnome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以把这个地精装上高爆炸药，制造一个简易爆炸...地精。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely, I've done it... well, more times than I can count. Just prime in, conceal everything and then toggle the switch. You're good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我做过...嗯，次数多得我都数不清了。只需准备好，隐藏一切，然后按下开关。你很棒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_0000D144_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds dangerous. Are you sure about this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来很危险，你确定要这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The math is good. We'll get rocked but the walls and overhead cover should shield everyone from fragmentation. Don't worry so much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 计算得很准。我们虽然会挨揍，但墙和屋上铺的覆盖物应该能保护大家不受碎片伤害。别太担心了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_0000D13E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I helped build the shot that leveled Boulder City. I've got both eyes and all ten fingers. I know what I'm doing. Generally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我负责了摧毁巨石城的那发炮弹的设计。我能用两只眼睛和十根手指干活，我干过很多活计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_0000D13E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your blast-frag better be right or you could kill us all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的爆炸碎片最好是对的，否则我们都得死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely not. Just stay behind frontal and overhead cover. Also... wouldn't hurt to exhale when you initiate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然不是，躲在正面和头顶的掩体后面。还有...开始的时候呼气也无妨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_0000D13F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will we be in danger?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会有危险吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hondo knows the spots. His nose never fails, he'll guide you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 洪多知道这些地方。他的鼻子永远不会失灵，他会指引你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_0000D141_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How will I find the buried explosives?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么才能找到埋在地下的炸药？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hondo knows the spots. His nose never fails, he'll guide you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 洪多知道这些地方。他的鼻子永远不会失灵，他会指引你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_00011E36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How find explody dirt?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如何找到爆炸泥土？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, here are the gnomes. Be. Careful. Don't toggle the safe and arming switch until you've primed in and everything is set. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，这些是地精，小，心，点。在你启动并设置好一切之前，不要拨动保险和保险开关。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_0000D142_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more questions. I'm ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有问题了。我准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... on second thought, I'll take care of the gnomes. Hey, I've got a very important job for you! Can you get the fire going?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗...转念一想，我来对付地精吧。嘿，我有一项非常重要的工作要给你！你能让火旺起来吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_00011E34_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna grill some tasty steaks. You like steak, don't you? Yeah. Tell you what, get that fire good and ready, then we'll eat. You're doing great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要烤一些美味的肉排，你喜欢肉排，对吧？嗯，这样吧，把火烧好，然后我们就去吃饭。你做得很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_00011E34_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ready. Make big boom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了，制造大爆炸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it were just raiders... yes. Rampart will probably jam the signal. Command wire could get severed in a battle. I want gnomes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果只是掠夺者的话...可以。但壁垒可能会干扰信号，指挥线路可能在战斗中被切断。我想用地精。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_0000D140_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, it's gonna be simple... but spec-fucking-tacular. Mark my words. Gonna be picking up nutsacks and de-gloved faces from the trees for days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，会很简单的...但超他妈的壮观。记住我的话，这几天都得从树上捡阴囊和被剥离的脸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_0000D140_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't we use remote detonators?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不用遥控引爆器呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. We won. Decisively. Hanlon was right. Doesn't make it easy, though... knowing that I helped kill over a hundred of my brothers and sisters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我们赢了，绝对的，汉隆是对的。但这并不容易...你知道我帮助杀害了一百多个我的兄弟姐妹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBac_0000D1CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I knew a lot of them. A few were Desert Rangers. Order came down, it had to be done... but it was my finger on that firing device. I did it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我认识他们中的很多人，其中一些人是沙漠游骑兵。命令下达了，必须执行...但按下点火装置是我的手指。我做了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBac_0000D1CF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You spend years burying any humanity, making yourself numb. But when it comes back, it comes back with a vengeance. I just... died inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你花了数年时间埋葬人性，让自己麻木，但当它回来的时候，它会来得很猛烈。我只是...内心死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBac_0000D1CF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it would've been best if I'd been standing in the city alongside them, gone out like Samson in the temple... but I'm still here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想，如果我和他们一起站在城里，像参孙在圣殿里一样，那就最好了...但我还在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBac_0000D1CF_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't mean to pry. I just want to hear your side of things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是故意打探的，我只是想听听你的说法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes the "victories" are worse than any defeat. I'm not talking about this. Drop it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时“胜利”比任何失败都糟糕。我说的不是这个，算了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBac_0000D1D1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won, right? I figured you'd enjoy telling that story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你赢了，对吧？我想你会喜欢讲这个故事的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. We won. Decisively. Hanlon was right. Doesn't make it easy, though... knowing that I helped kill over a hundred of my brothers and sisters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我们赢了，绝对的，汉隆是对的。但这并不容易...你知道我帮助杀害了一百多个我的兄弟姐妹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBac_0000D5F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I knew a lot of them. A few were Desert Rangers. Order came down, it had to be done... but it was my finger on that firing device. I did it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我认识他们中的很多人，其中一些人是沙漠游骑兵。命令下达了，必须执行...但按下点火装置是我的手指。我做了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBac_0000D5F1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You spend years burying any humanity, making yourself numb. But when it comes back, it comes back with a vengeance. I just... died inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你花了数年时间埋葬人性，让自己麻木，但当它回来的时候，它会来得很猛烈。我只是...内心死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBac_0000D5F1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would've been best if I'd been standing in the city alongside them, gone out like Samson in the temple... but I'm still here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是我能和他们一起站在城里，像参孙在圣殿里一样，那就最好了...但我还在这里。
