ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBac_0000D5F1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like it or not, we're a team now. We have to trust each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你喜不喜欢，我们现在是一个团队。我们必须相互信任。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the fuck kind of parent could I be? I don't know shit about kids... all I know is farming and war. Mostly war. Hell of a thing to pass on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈算哪门子家长啊？我对孩子一点都不了解...我只知道种地和打仗。主要是打仗，真是一件值得传承的事啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBC0_0000D5F2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's partly why I stay alone up here... so I won't hurt anyone. That's why they drummed me out. I cracked up, lost it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这也是我一个人呆在这里的原因之一...这样我就不会伤害任何人了。这就是他们开除我的原因，我崩溃了，失控了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBC0_0000D5F2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a hell of a thing when you come to grips with it... the fact that you're broken inside. That boy deserves better than what I can give him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你认真对待的时候，它是一件可怕的事情...你内心的破碎。那孩子应该得到比我能给他的更好的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBC0_0000D5F2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Michael wouldn't have any family if you hadn't made it. You can still help him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你没成功，迈克尔就没有家人了。你还可以帮助他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He stands directly in your face and glares at you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他直接站在你面前，怒目而视。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck. You. You asked, I answered. Let's get back to work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，你，妈，你问了，我回答。我们回去工作吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBC0_0000D5F4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I'd known you were such a headcase I never would've brought Michael up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早知道你是个疯子我就不会带迈克尔来这里了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. If the Skirts had won it would've been a calamity for Vegas and its people. It was worth it. Just wish I hadn't been the one to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，如果裙子赢了，对拉斯维加斯和它的人民来说将是一场灾难。这是值得的，只是希望不是我去干。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBC0_0000D5F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't imagine how much it hurt, but your comrades didn't die in vain. They're heroes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无法想象这有多痛苦，但你的战友们并没有白白牺牲。他们是英雄。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, then. Now all we need to do is stay alive long enough to make it happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。现在我们要做的就是活得足够长，让它成真。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesMic_0000D609_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I agree. Michael should stay here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意。迈克尔应该留在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ranger Hart got you convinced he'll be safe back there, huh? Let me tell you... it's an illusion. NCR can't protect anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵哈特让你相信他在那里会很安全，对吧？让我告诉你...这是一种幻觉，NCR保护不了任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesMic_0000D60B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He could have a good, productive life back there. I'm sure my rich cousins would set him up with a solid education, good-paying job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在那里可以过得很好，很有成就。我相信我有钱的堂兄弟们会给他提供可靠的教育和高薪的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesMic_0000D60B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the other hand... whole goddamn thing could be a house of cards. NCR, that is. Michael ain't built to survive that chaos. Not yet, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一方面...这整件事可能就是个纸牌屋，NCR也是。迈克尔不是那种能在混乱中生存下来的人，至少现在还不能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesMic_0000D60B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think Michael would be better off in NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得迈克尔在NCR会更好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Point taken, smartass... but I'm all he's got now. Believe me, I've got my doubts. Whatever I am, though... I'll keep him safe till my dying breath.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白了，聪明鬼...但他现在只有我了。相信我，我也有疑虑，不管我是什么...我会保护他直到生命的最后一刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesMic_0000D60C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure that living with his shell-shocked, mad bomber uncle would be the best outcome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信和他那饱受炮弹惊吓的疯狂炸弹叔叔住在一起是最好的结果。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surprised to hear you say that, considering everything you went through to get him here. Fair enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听到你这么说我很惊讶，毕竟你为了把他带到这里经历了那么多。很合理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesMic_0000D60A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's none of my business. That's between you and Michael.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不关我的事，这是你和迈克尔之间的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still some meat left if ya'll want seconds. Help yourself, plenty to go around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有肉，如果你还想要的话。请自便，有很多吃的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000D60E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, Uncle Chuck. That was tasty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，查克叔叔。很好吃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA1F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Frankly, it was undercooked. Steak should be heated to a jet-black, crusty sheet of coal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坦白说，肉没熟透。牛排应该烤成黑炭色的焦壳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it was delicious. Been a while since I had a good steak. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得很好吃，我好久没吃过好吃的牛排了。谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I prefer raw, but this good. Big thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢生的，但是这个很好。非常感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I was happy to do it. Been a long time since I could cook for a group like this. Important to have a good meal before a fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我很乐意这么做。我很久没有为这样的一群人做饭了，打架前吃顿好饭很重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. Might just relapse back into tribes and warlords. Good feelings and noble ideals always lose against chaos. You need a real plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧，可能会重新变成部落和军阀。美好的感情和崇高的理想总是在混乱中失败，你需要一个真正的计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesNCR_0000D614_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, if you could organize a collection of communities... a confederation... that might work. Combine militia with the robots... might be viable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，如果你能组织一个社区集合...一个联盟...这可能行得通。把民兵和机器人结合起来...也许可行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesNCR_0000D614_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're probably right. Vegas should be independent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能是对的，维加斯应该独立。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard so many people talk about "The Long Run", assuring me that all the mistakes will get ironed out after a few decades.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听过很多人谈论“长远发展”，向我保证，所有的错误都会在几十年后得到解决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesNCR_0000DA1E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that what we can look forward to? After years of being over-taxed and under-protected, the NCR might just get its shit together? Piss on that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我们能期待的吗？在多年的过度征税和缺乏保护之后，NCR可能会振作起来？去你的吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesNCR_0000DA1E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's more to the world than NCR and Legion, and I doubt either one will be sticking around for "The Long Run". We have to build something new.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界不只是NCR和军团，我怀疑他们中的任何一个都不会为“长期”而坚持。所以我们得建立一个新的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesNCR_0000DA1E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR is still the best option for the Mojave in the long run.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但就长远而言，NCR仍然是莫哈维最好的选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. The stories I've heard aren't reassuring. The idea of one weird, old man calling all the shots doesn't sit right with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我听到的传闻可不太妙。一个古怪的老头儿坐镇指挥，这让我很放心不下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesNCR_0000D615_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe... maybe with the right people advising him... that's assuming he has the humility to listen. House is many things, but humble he is not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许...也许在合适的人的建议下...前提是他能谦虚的倾听。豪斯有很多东西，但他不谦虚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever happens, I think Mister House is the man to guide New Vegas through the storm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论发生什么，我认为豪斯先生都是能带领新维加斯走出风暴的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to pretend you're just playing devil's advocate... that you're not a real disciple of those dirt-fucking animals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就当你是在唱反调...你不是那些畜生的真正信徒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesNCR_0000D616_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I meet traders that advocate for the Legion, yap about law and order. That's good. You want to kill raiders? Shit, I've hung dozens of 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见过一些支持军团的商人，大谈法律和秩序，那很好。你想杀死掠夺者？该死，我已经绞死了几十个了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesNCR_0000D616_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But they haven't seen what I've seen. Entire villages enslaved... mass rape and executions... their savagery isn't sporadic - it's systematic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他们没见过我所见的。整个村庄被奴役...大规模强奸和处决...他们的野蛮行为不是零星的，而是系统性的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesNCR_0000D616_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what they did to some of my friends? We gave it back to 'em, though... with interest. They bleed just like other men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们对我的一些朋友做了什么？不过我们还给他们了...连本带利。他们和其他男人一样会流血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesNCR_0000D616_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think Caesar's Legion would bring much-needed order to the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为凯撒军团会给莫哈维带来急需的秩序。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really think they'll try it, Charles? Throwing down on a Ranger is pretty rash, even for a group like Rampart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真觉得他们会这么做吗，查理斯？即使是像壁垒这样的队伍，对游骑兵动手也是很鲁莽的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I know is this... if Sharp decides to move on us, he'll do so with the intent of leaving zero witnesses. He's a dangerous man. But so am I.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道的是...如果夏普决定对我们下手，他肯定不会留下任何证人。他是个危险人物，但我也是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not thinking of cutting a deal with them, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你该不会是想和他们做交易吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn right I am. If they guarantee Michael's safety, I say let it ride. I'll catch up with Bellek later. No trial necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然想。如果他们能保证迈克尔的安全，那就随他们吧，我一会儿去找贝莱克。不需要审判。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think Rampart can be trusted? That Bellek will suddenly leave Michael alone? That evil bastard will hunt him to the ends of the earth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为壁垒值得信任吗？贝莱克会突然放过迈克尔吗？那个邪恶的混蛋会追杀他到天涯海角。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA2A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't trust any of them, but I know mercenaries. If they can complete a job without fighting, they will. We are not a soft target.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不相信他们，但我了解雇佣兵。如果他们可以不用战斗就能完成任务，他们就会这么做。我们不是软柿子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA2B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bellek has demonstrated he's impulsive, short-sighted. If can lull him into complacency by offering up the evidence, I will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 贝莱克表现出了他的冲动和短视。如果我能提供证据让他安心，我会的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA2C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It might be weeks, months or years... but one day Bellek will have an accident. A very explosive accident. Like I said - no trial necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是几周、几个月或几年...但总有一天，贝莱克会发生意外，一场爆炸性的事故。就像我说的，不需要审判。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA2D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd sabotage this case... a case that will put Bellek away... a case that will provide justice for your family... so you can play vigilante?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会破坏这个案子...一个能把贝莱克绳之以法的案子...一个能为你的家人伸张正义的案子...这样你就能扮演治安维持会了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA2E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do whatever it takes to keep Michael safe. Amateurs play vigilante. Professionals make people disappear. I'm a professional.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会不惜一切代价保证迈克尔的安全。业余爱好者扮演治安维持会，专业人士让人消失，我是专业的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA2F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pardon me, but I've got a wealth of knowledge you can draw on. Detailed files. I have a proposal that can resolve this conundrum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅，但我有丰富的知识可供你借鉴，详细的文件。我有一个方案可以解决这个难题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA30_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, the murder bot has an idea! Fine, send it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，杀人机器人有主意了！好吧，发吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA31_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My proposal will balance your aims. Now... Rampart and Mister Bellek are both headquartered out of Shady Sands, are they not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的建议能平衡你们的目标。现在...壁垒和贝莱克先生的总部都在沙荫镇，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA32_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, as a matter of fact, they are. What you proposing? Some kind of sting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，事实就是如此。你的建议是什么？某种圈套？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA33_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, this will be much more effective. First, we requisition a vertibird. Ranger Hart, you can make the arrangements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这样会更有效。首先，我们征用一架飞鸟，游骑兵哈特，你来安排吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA34_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next, we'll load the vertibird with incendiary bombs. Napalm is best. I'll supervise production. Then we chart a course for Shady Sands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来，我们要给飞鸟装上燃烧弹，凝固汽油弹最好，我来监督生产。接着我们就去沙荫镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finally, we deliver the incendiaries on Shady Sands. We burn down the entire fucking city at night. Rampart? Gone. Bellek? Gone. Corruption? Gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，我们把燃烧弹扔到沙荫镇，在晚上把整座城市都烧掉。壁垒？不见了，贝莱克？消失了，腐败？一去不复返了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think of it as a hard reset. Sometimes antibiotics aren't enough. Sometimes you have to cut off the entire fucking arm! We can do this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 把它想象成一次硬重置。有时候抗生素是不够的，有时候你得把整条胳膊都砍掉！我们能做到！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charles, where the hell did you get this thing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 查理斯，你从哪搞到这个玩意的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mojo. He just brings weird shit sometimes. I didn't know it would be like this. Robot, we're not burning down Shady Sands. Anybody else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫乔，他有时会带来一些奇怪的东西，没想到会是这样。机器人，我们不能烧掉沙荫镇。还有其他人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lure in these men. Offer food, wine and sex. When they sleep, we scalp them, cut off their manhoods and stuff them in their throats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 引诱这些人，提供食物、酒和性。当他们睡觉时，我们剥下他们的头皮，割下他们的阴茎，塞进他们的喉咙里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA3A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put scalps on wall, heads on spikes. Enemies will stay away. Then we eat their hearts. We take their medicine and make snake god happy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把头皮挂在墙上，把头钉在尖刺上，敌人会远离你。然后我们吃掉他们的心脏，我们拿走他们的药，让蛇神高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA3C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sister, your heart is in the right place. Good initiative, but I'm not much for eating hearts. Killing them... well, if it happens it happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 姐妹，你是出于好意。好主意，不过我不太喜欢吃心脏，杀死他们...嗯，如果发生了，那就顺其自然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA3B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you eat people's hearts? Aren't they yucky?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要吃人的心脏？难道不难吃吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA3D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We eat enemy's spirit. Become our spirit. We honor them. Not "yucky". Taste like salty rat breast. Taste like victory. Best taste in world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们吞噬敌人的灵魂，成为我们的灵魂，我们尊重他们。不“难吃”，吃起来像咸老鼠胸。胜利的味道，世界上最好的味道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA3E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow. I want to eat a heart!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，我想吃个心脏！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA3F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, easy there, Magua! Nobody is eating any hearts! Traveller, you got first watch, everybody else, finish up and then hit the hay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，慢着点，麻瓜！没有人吃心脏！旅行者，你先值班，其他人，吃完就去睡觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetCampfireSc_0000DA40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Harcourt? How the hell are you? Been a long time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈考特？你还好吧？好久不见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetHarcourtCh_0000DA67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, man. Different uniform, same old shit. I gather you know why we're here. Sharp wants those documents, nothing else. Give 'em up and we walk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，伙计，不同的制服，同样的旧东西。我想你知道我们来这里的原因，夏普只想要那些文件，别无他求。交出来，我们就走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harcourt [0200DA4E] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetHarcourtCh_0000DA68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And my nephew? He gonna have to look over his shoulder? I won't abide that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我侄子呢？他得小心翼翼吗？我不能忍受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetHarcourtCh_0000DA69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Long as he stays here and doesn't testify... he's safe. You have Sharp's word... and mine. Nobody wants to fight over this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要他留在这里，不作证...他就是安全的。夏普向你保证...还有我，没人想为了这个打架。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harcourt [0200DA4E] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetHarcourtCh_0000DA6A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what if I'm not in a sharing mood? What then? We got real NCR here with us. Aaron King really stupid enough to kill a Ranger?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没心情分享呢？然后呢？我们这里有真正的NCR。亚伦·金真的蠢到要杀一个游骑兵吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetHarcourtCh_0000DA6B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it comes to a fight... you and I both know there won't be any witnesses left, Charles. We'll stage it to look like muties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果打起来了...你我都知道不会再有目击者了，查理斯。我们会伪装成变种人干的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harcourt [0200DA4E] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetHarcourtCh_0000DA6C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sharp figured you'd be ready, what with your reputation and all. We're locked and loaded, heavy ordnance and robots, even.
ESP.TRADUIT: 夏普认为你已经准备好了，凭你的名声。我们全副武装，甚至还有重型武器和机器人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harcourt [0200DA4E] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetHarcourtCh_0000DE73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm flattered, truly. Wouldn't expect any less from Sharp. Give me a moment to confer with my associates.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过奖了，真的，我对夏普的期望也不会低。给我一点时间和我的同事商量一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetHarcourtCh_0000DE74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. I'll do my part up here. Not my first rodeo. Now you just gotta convince Charles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我将在这里完成我的部分，我又不是第一次干这个了。现在你只要说服查理斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartHarcou_0000DE7A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm with you on this. We fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意你的看法，我们要战斗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're making a huge mistake. You'll be putting a lot of faith in a truly evil man if you decide to trust John Sharp. Please, don't do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在犯一个巨大的错误，如果你决定相信约翰·夏普，那你也太相信一个真正邪恶的人了。求你了，别这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartHarcou_0000DE7B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a fair offer. We should hand over the evidence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个公平的报价，我们应该交出证据。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's chickenshit and you know it. You went through hell to get that boy here. Was it all for nothing? To just give up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道那是胆小鬼。你费了九牛二虎之力才把那孩子弄来，这一切都是徒劳吗？就这么放弃了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartHarcou_0000DE7C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reach down between your legs... grab your balls... and pick a side. Enough of this fence-sitting bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把手伸到你的两腿之间...抓住你的蛋蛋...然后选一个阵营。不要再袖手旁观了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartHarcou_0000DE7C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not my decision. I'll leave it up to Charles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我的决定，让查理斯来决定吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's chickenshit and you know it. You went through hell to get that boy here. Was it all for nothing? To just give up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道那是胆小鬼。你费了九牛二虎之力才把那孩子弄来，这一切都是徒劳吗？就这么放弃了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartHarcou_0000DE7D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop dancing around the hard choices and pick a side, princess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再纠结了，选边站吧，公主。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartHarcou_0000DE7D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not my decision. I'll leave it up to Charles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我的决定，让查理斯来决定吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must see something I don't... because that deal looks like solid gold from where I'm standing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定看到了什么我没有看到的...因为从我的角度来看，这笔交易看起来很有价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000E291_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm no coward... I'll fight a deathclaw if there's a good reason... but sometimes life is poker... not a game of chicken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是胆小鬼...如果有充分的理由，我愿意和死亡爪战斗...但有时生活就像扑克...不是懦夫博弈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000E291_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sharp showed us his hand... he knows we'll kill half his men if it comes to violence. Whatever his reputation, he's not a lunatic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 夏普向我们展示了他的牌...他知道如果诉诸暴力，我们会杀了他一半的人。不管他的名声如何，他不是疯子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000E291_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I say we fight them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要我说我们应该跟他们打。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, it's the smart play. Do me a solid and get them from my safe. It's in a safe room in the basement. Button to open it is by the bathtub.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，这是明智之举。帮我个忙，从我的保险箱里拿出来，在地下室的一个安全房间里，打开它的按钮在浴缸旁边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000E292_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should take the deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该达成协议。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we take the deal. Do me a solid and get the documents from my safe. It's in a safe room in the basement. Button to open it is by the bathtub.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们接受交易。帮我个忙，从我的保险箱里拿出来，在地下室的一个安全房间里，打开它的按钮在浴缸旁边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000E293_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ultimately it's your call. I'll back your play.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终决定权在你，我会支持你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hate to see it. I'll let John know. See you on the other side, Chuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不想看到，我会告诉约翰的。彼岸见，查克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harcourt [0200DA4E] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetHarcourtRe_0000E6C2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, fucker. Death to compromise. Fire and fury to the last breath. We're going to fill this entire canyon with blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，混蛋，以死亡来妥协。火与怒，至死方休，我们要让整个峡谷充满鲜血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000F34B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Screw your courage to the sticking place, mailman. We're about to dance with the reaper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你的勇气用在关键的地方，邮差。我们要和死神共舞了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000F34B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and here's my rifle. Vision is fucked now, figure you can put it to better use. Don't drop it... and don't miss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这是我的步枪。我的视力现在糟透了，我觉得你可以更好的使用它。别掉了...别打空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000F34B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought Desert Rangers were fighters. Guess I was wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为沙漠游骑兵都是战士，看来是我错了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, ma'am. Death to compromise. Fire and fury to the last breath. We're going to fill this entire canyon with blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，女士，以死亡来妥协。火与怒，至死方休，我们要让整个峡谷充满鲜血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0001272B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and here's my rifle. Vision is fucked now, figure you can put it to better use. Don't drop it... and don't miss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这是我的步枪。我的视力现在糟透了，我觉得你可以更好的使用它。别掉了...别打空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought Desert Rangers were fighters. Guess I was wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为沙漠游骑兵都是战士，看来是我错了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not doing this just so you can indulge your bloodlust. We should take the deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我这么做不是为了满足你的杀戮欲望。我们应该接受这个协议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've fought worse than Rampart. We can take 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打过比壁垒更糟的仗，我们能搞定他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You keep some strange company, but I'll take your word for it. We'll need all the help we can get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你结交了一些奇怪的伙伴，但我相信你的话。我们需要尽可能多的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000F349_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and here's my rifle. Vision is fucked now, figure you can put it to better use. Don't drop it... and don't miss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这是我的步枪。我的视力现在糟透了，我觉得你可以更好的使用它。别掉了...别打空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000F349_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a good friend that will probably show up and lend a hand. I wouldn't bet against us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个好朋友可能会过来帮忙，我不赌我们会输。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever heard the line "Luck is believing that you're lucky"? We had a guy in the Rangers, Joe Luck. No shit, his name was actually Luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听过“运气就是相信自己有好运”这句话吗？游骑兵有个叫好运乔的家伙，没开玩笑，他真名叫卢克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000F34D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Joe was in fact a lucky sonofabitch. Won card games, never got picked for shitty details. Indirect fire? Never hit him. Thought he was invincible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乔真是个狗屎运。赢过牌，脏活累活从来选不到他，间接火力？永远打不中他。他以为自己所向披靡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000F34D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was until Joe's luck ran out. He stepped on a punji stake, had his leg amputed, got blinded by shrapnel, then hopped his ass into quicksand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直到乔的运气到头。他踩到了尖竹钉，腿被截掉了，被弹片弄瞎了眼睛，然后一屁股扎进了流沙里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000F34D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was stuck in the quicksand for days until ants ate him alive. So... I don't really believe in luck. But... I do believe in confidence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他被困在流沙中好几天，直到被蚂蚁活活吃掉。所以...我真的不相信运气，但是...我相信自信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000F34D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can see that you believe in your "luck" and that makes me believe that... maybe... we can pull this off. Fuck it... full send.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你相信你的“运气”，这让我相信...也许...我们能成功的。操他妈的...全力以赴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000F34D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've made solid preparations for battle. Good luck usually follows.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们做好了充分的战斗准备，好运通常会随之而来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy shit, okay! We'll kill 'em all! Now... would you kindly stop looking at me like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天，好吧！我们会把他们都杀了！现在...你能不能别那么看着我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000F348_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and here's my rifle. Vision is fucked now, figure you can put it to better use. Don't drop it... and don't miss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这是我的步枪。我的视力现在糟透了，我觉得你可以更好的使用它。别掉了...别打空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000F348_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't be safe unless your enemies fear you. We need to make an example of Rampart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你的敌人害怕你，否则你就不会安全。我们要拿壁垒杀一儆百。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, you better not miss. These Rampart bubbas aren't some half-tribal skirts chucking spears, okay? They're professionals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你最好别失手，这些壁垒的小伙子可不是什么会扔长矛的半部落女人，好吗？他们是专业的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000F34A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and compound? This isn't a cult. Everyone knows that mad hermits live in cabins. Get it right, Hawkeye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，还有大院？这里可不是什么邪教，大家都知道疯疯癫癫的隐士住小木屋里。做得对，鹰眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000F34A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and here's my rifle. Vision is fucked now, figure you can put it to better use. Don't drop it... and don't miss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这是我的步枪。我的视力现在糟透了，我觉得你可以更好的使用它。别掉了...别打空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000F34A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyone that gets close to this compound is gonna get their skull emptied.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何接近这个大院的人都会被打个稀巴烂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: John Sharp fought against rebellious tribals around Bullhead for years. His specialty is counter-insurgency. He'll change tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰·夏普与布尔海德附近的反叛部落斗争了多年。他的专长是镇压叛乱，他会改变战术的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000F3A7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make no mistake... we sure as shit bloodied their nose. But they will be back if we sit around here and crow about kill ratios. We'll lose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别搞错了...我们肯定把他们的鼻子弄出血了。但如果我们坐在这里吹嘘杀敌比例，他们会回来的。我们就会输。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000F3A7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cut the head off the snake. Sharp is a charismatic leader. These mercs see him dead and they'll cash out, guaranteed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 砍掉蛇的头。夏普是一个有魅力的领导者，这些雇佣兵看到他死了，肯定会套现离场的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000F3A7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why attack now? We have a good defensive position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么现在进攻？我们的防守位置很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember, he's a devil with a knife. Might try to cut a deal first. Don't buy anything he's selling. The man's a professional manipulator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住，他是个拿着刀的恶魔，可能会先试着达成协议。不要买他卖的任何东西，他是个专业的操纵者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000F3A5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't take stupid chances. Swift and silent, in and out. No talking, no theatrics... just put him down. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要冒愚蠢的风险，迅捷无声，来来去去。不要说话，不要表演...把他干掉。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000F3A5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood. I'll take care of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白了，交给我吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know I'm asking a lot... and you've already gone above and beyond for a stranger... but you might as well be family now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我要求太多了...而你已经为一个陌生人付出了很多...但你现在也算是家人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000F3A6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't take stupid chances. Swift and silent, in and out. No talking, no theatrics... just put him down. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要冒愚蠢的风险，迅捷无声，来来去去。不要说话，不要表演...把他干掉。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000F3A6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like it, but I'll do what it takes to end the threat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢这样，但我会尽我所能解除威胁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, but it ain't for a lack of desire. Somebody has to keep watch over Michael, and it would be just like Sharp to slip in here quick and quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，但不是因为没有欲望。必须有人照看迈克尔，如果夏普悄悄溜进来，那就太危险了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000F3A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take anyone else you can, though. I reckon they'll be up for it. Time is of the essence, you have to strike while they're reeling. Anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，你可以带上其他人，我想他们会接受的。时间是最重要的，你必须在他们晕头转向的时候出手。还有别的事吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000F3A2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you coming with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要和我一起去吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... guess I could afford to let him go for a short while. Just take good care of him, okay? Love that dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...我想我可以让他离开一段时间。好好照顾他，好吗？我爱那条狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000F3A3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Whistling>
ESP.TRADUIT: <吹口哨>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000F3A3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He smiles as Hondo bounds around the corner.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他微笑着看着洪多在拐角处跳跃。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hondo, you follow this man, okay? You come across them bad guys, go straight for the nuts. Good boy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 洪多，你跟着这个人，好吗？要是遇到坏人，就直接咬他的蛋蛋。好孩子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000F3A3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could use a good dog at my side. How about Hondo?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一条好狗在我身边，洪多怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... guess I could afford to let him go for a short while. Just take good care of him, okay? Love that dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...我想我可以让他离开一段时间。好好照顾他，好吗？我爱那条狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000F3A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Whistling>
ESP.TRADUIT: <吹口哨>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000F3A8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He smiles as Hondo bounds around the corner.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他微笑着看着洪多在拐角处跳跃。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hondo, you follow this lady, okay? You come across them bad guys, go straight for the nuts. Good boy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 洪多，你跟着这位女士，好吗？要是遇到坏人，就直接咬他的蛋蛋。好孩子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesSta_0000F3A8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could use a good dog at my side. How about Hondo?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一条好狗在我身边，洪多怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That didn't take long. Shame I didn't get a chance to meet Chuck. Always held him in high regard for his work in Boulder. Guess it's you and me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没花多长时间。真遗憾我没机会见到查克，因为他在巨石城的工作，我一直很敬重他。看来只有你和我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpForce_0000F4AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: King said I was crazy for bringing this many men, said it wouldn't take more than a dozen to take down one crazy, old man... and here we are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 金说我带这么多人来是疯了，说要干掉一个疯老头不需要十几个人...现在瞧瞧我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpForce_0000F4AC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if you kill me... it won't change anything. Steel on steel, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算你杀了我...这也不会改变任何事情。那么，钢对钢吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndFi_0000F4BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It stops here. All of it. <Start combat.>
ESP.TRADUIT: 到此为止，全部。<开始战斗>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Necessary? None of this is necessary. We're not here for "necessary". I got a feeling you're like me... you're in this for the experience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 必要？这些都没有必要，我们不是为了“必要”而来的。我有种感觉，你和我一样...你来这里是为了体验。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndSp_0000F4BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have a right to the work, not the results. That's how I go about this... it's all about the mission. Nothing matters except the mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有权得到工作，而不是结果。这就是我的做法...一切都是为了任务，除了任务什么都不重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndSp_0000F4BC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you... I damn sure know there isn't a pot of gold for you at the end of this rainbow. What kind of lunatic hauls a kid up here, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 而你...我很确定在彩虹的尽头不会有一罐金子等着你。到底是什么样的疯子会把孩子拖到这里来？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndSp_0000F4BC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Know what? Doesn't matter. I get it. But we're on different sides of the line here, and whatever my faults... I don't break my word on a whim.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道吗？没关系，我明白。但我们的立场不同，不管我有什么过错...我不会一时兴起就食言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndSp_0000F4BC_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this really necessary?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真的有必要吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you serious? This isn't a game! My men are dying out there and you want to have a fucking spelling contest? I will not be mocked!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是认真的？这不是游戏！我的人都快死了，你还想来一场他妈的拼字比赛？我不会被嘲笑的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndSp_0000F4BE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should resolve this with a spelling contest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该用拼字比赛来解决这个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who, Bellek? What do you think? A venal, backstabbing rat. Fits right in with the sophisticates in Shady Sands. Think I like working for him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁，贝莱克？你觉得呢？一个唯利是图，暗箭伤人的卑鄙小人，和沙荫镇里那些世故的人很搭。你以为我喜欢为他工作吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndYo_0000F8F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man has some of the deepest pockets in the republic... and he's positively ruthless, hence the show of arms up here. King happily accepted the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个人在共和国内拥有最雄厚的财力...而且他绝对是冷酷无情的，所以才会在这里动用武力。金愉快的接受了这份工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndYo_0000F8F7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boss said to take a company up here and get the documents. I've had worse jobs for less pay, frankly. Didn't expect to face off with you as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老大说带一个连队来这里拿文件。坦率的说，我做过薪水更低、更糟糕的工作，没想到还能和你一决胜负。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndYo_0000F8F7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the deal with your client? Is he really that desperate?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的委托人是怎么回事？他真的那么让人绝望吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I stopped asking about the why a long time ago, partner. I grew up tribal. Not many people know that. The irony can be a bit much, I know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很久以前就不再问为什么了，搭档。我是在部落长大的，知道这一点的人不多。我知道，这有点太讽刺了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndWh_0000F4BF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't actually hate them, despite what the papers say. I just hate seeing them live like animals. There's nothing noble about it. It's bestial.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管报纸上怎么说，我其实并不讨厌他们，我只是不想看到他们像动物一样活着。这一点也不高尚，这很野蛮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndWh_0000F4BF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: People wonder why I'm good with the knife, how I move so well. I was taking scalps before I had hair on my chest, that's why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们想知道为什么我的刀法那么好，为什么我的动作那么快。我还没长出胸毛就开始割头皮了，这就是原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you doing this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fucking press and all the bleeding hearts in Shady Sands talk about tribals like they're some unified collective. It's a lie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的媒体和沙荫镇那些滥好人把部落说得好像他们是一个统一的集体。这是个谎言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndWh_0000F4C0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a mess. Kimball told us to end the banditry and attacks on settlers. We accomplished our mission. We also assimilated a half-dozen tribes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一片混乱。金博尔告诉我们，要结束对定居者的强盗行径和袭击。我们完成了任务，我们还同化了六个部落。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndWh_0000F4C0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hardest part of the job was keeping the tribes from murdering each other en masse. They were not peaceable before NCR showed up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这项工作最困难的部分是防止部落之间相互残杀。在NCR出现之前，那里并不太平。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about Bullhead? Were you really trying to help the tribals?
ESP.TRADUIT: 布尔海德呢？你真的想帮助那些部落吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'll own that. I enjoy it... and I'm good at it. I think of it as a lesson in humility just before death. Everyone breaks, eventually. Everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我承认。我很喜欢...而且我很擅长。我认为这是临死前的一堂谦逊课，每个人最终都会崩溃，每个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndWh_0000F4C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For what it's worth, I only did that to the really bad ones... or if they really pissed me off. Tribal chief kicked me in the balls. Took my time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我只对那些非常坏的人这么做...或者他们真的惹毛我了。部落酋长踢了我的蛋蛋，花了我不少时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndWh_0000F4C1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came up here to make a deal, but if you're set on dueling, I'm game. I'm going out with a knife in my hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来做交易的，但如果你要决斗，我也愿意。我手里拿着刀出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndWh_0000F4C1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about all the torture? Was that an exaggeration?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些折磨呢？这是夸张吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I resigned myself to this... to die in some shit-filled corner of the wasteland, hustling for a handful of caps from some fatass plutocrat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我已经认了...死在废土的某个肮脏角落，为从某个肥佬财阀那里抢几个瓶盖而奔波。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndSp_0000F8F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... I had a family. Sacrificed them for the Army... for the addiction I've had since my first battle. I need to find them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的...我有一个家庭。为了军队牺牲了他们...因为我从第一次战斗开始就上瘾了。我得去找他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndSp_0000F8F5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever happens... I'll never use this knife again. Take it. Give my regards to Charles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论发生什么...我再也不会用这把刀了。拿去吧，代我向查理斯问好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndSp_0000F8F5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be a pawn for men like King or Bellek. Chart your own path, starting now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要给金或贝莱克这样的人当棋子。从现在开始，画出你自己的道路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try to have a civil discourse and you show your ass like that... you're gonna bleed for this disrespect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试着进行文明的对话，你就像那样展示自己的粗鲁...你会为这种不尊重而流血的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndSp_0000F8F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I don't speak Whinese.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我不会像小孩一样发牢骚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good eye. You know your blades. It's pre-war, took it from a tribal chieftain after I killed him in a duel. First job with Rampart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好眼力，你很懂行。这是战前的，我在决斗中杀了一个部落酋长后从他手里拿走的。在壁垒的第一份工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndMe_0000F4B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was... well, symbolic. I was hesitant to keep at it... fighting... after I was put on NCR's chopping block. Bitter is an understatement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是...嗯，象征。我犹豫着要不要坚持下去...战斗...在我被NCR炒了鱿鱼之后。苦是一种保守的说法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndMe_0000F4B7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still had money, could've done like half the other retirees and "consulted" for some firm or manufacturer. Shit, could've been a farmer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有钱，可以像其他一半的退休人员一样，为一些公司或制造商做“咨询”。该死，本来可以当农民的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndMe_0000F4B7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I took Aaron King's offer on a whim... "One last job", that's what you tell yourself. When I scalped that chief, I felt alive again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我一时兴起接受了亚伦·金的邀请...“最后一份工作”，这样告诉自己。当我剥下酋长的头皮时，我感觉又活过来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndMe_0000F4B7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was my Road to Damascus moment... except I knew I'd never repent. I made my peace with the devil inside and committed myself to war. Only war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是我通往大马士革之路的时刻...但我知道我永远不会后悔。我与内心的恶魔和解，投身于战争，只有战争。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndMe_0000F4B7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say, that's a nice knife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说，这把刀不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This toothpick is gonna slice that scalp right off your head... and you'll be alive to feel every bit of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个牙签会把你的头皮从你头上割下来...你还能活着感受每一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndMe_0000F4B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop yapping and put that toothpick to work. <Start combat.>
ESP.TRADUIT: 别废话了，快用牙签干活吧。<开始战斗>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ignorant savages, every time. Don't worry, you'll get an appreciation for it soon enough. Intimate knowledge, so to speak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无知的野蛮人，每次都如此。别担心，你很快就会欣赏它的，可以说是非常深入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndMe_0000F4B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your knife looks weird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的刀看起来怪怪的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Break contact!
ESP.TRADUIT: 脱离接敌！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndNi_0000F4BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to force-feed you a testicle taco made of your scalp and balls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要强迫你吃一个用你的头皮和蛋蛋做的蛋蛋卷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Break contact!
ESP.TRADUIT: 脱离接敌！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetSharpEndNi_00012BEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I make happy parts into samwich.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把快乐的器官做成三明治。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little dramatic, but I take your point. Like old Ranger McCall said: "You've got to stand for something or you'll fall for anything." We fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然有点夸张，但我明白你的意思。就像老游骑兵麦考尔说的：“你必须要坚持一些弟兄，否则容易失去方向被他人左右。”我们战斗吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000F4B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and here's my rifle. Vision is fucked now, figure you can put it to better use. Don't drop it... and don't miss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这是我的步枪。我的视力现在糟透了，我觉得你可以更好的使用它。别掉了...别打空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesBig_0000F4B5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you gotta fight. That's life. When you stop fighting, that's death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你必须战斗，这就是生活。当你停止战斗，那就是死亡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe, maybe not. Hugo said it boils down to our routines... "Make virtue a habit", that's what he said. Preachy, but it works.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是，也许不是。雨果说这归结于我们的日常生活...“让美德成为一种习惯”，这就是他说的，说教，但很有效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartHugoId_0000F904_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might be idealistic, but it's a lot better than giving up and losing yourself in the bottle. Been there, done that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许有点理想主义，但总比放弃并沉溺于酒中好。我也经历过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartHugoId_0000F904_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a nice sentiment, but it's probably too idealistic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种想法不错，但可能太理想化了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So do I. Who knows, you might get a chance to work with Hugo down the road. Rumor has it they're sending him to Vegas to fight corruption.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也是，谁知道呢，说不定以后你会有机会和雨果共事呢。有传言说他们要派他去维加斯打击腐败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartHugoAd_0000F903_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's very admirable. I hope you succeed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这非常令人钦佩，我希望你成功。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought the same thing at first. Hope you get a chance to work with him, might change your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一开始也是这么想的。希望你有机会和他一起工作，也许能改变你的想法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartHugoHo_0000F906_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a bunch of hogwash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一派胡言。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's it? No opinions or strong feelings on the matter? Just... "Okay"? Hey, fair enough. You play your part, I'll play mine. Press on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这？对这件事没有意见或强烈的感情吗？只是...“好的”？嘿，很公平，你演你的，我演我的，继续。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartHugoIn_0000F905_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, I ain't shot that thing in a dog's age. You hold onto it for me. Better yet, kill some skirts with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我好长时间都没打过那玩意儿了，你帮我保管好。更好的是，用它杀死一些裙子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000F913_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Menace of the Years] What about your rifle?
ESP.TRADUIT: [岁月的威胁]你的步枪呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lord's already taken a liking to me. Clean demo every time, only... mild brain damage. Don't chew on any blasting caps, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝已经喜欢上我了，每次都是干净的爆破，只有...轻度脑损伤。别咬起爆筒，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0001272C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay safe. When it kicks off at the dam, fight hard... and fight smart. Hope to see you after the dust settles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意安全。当大坝开战时，要奋力抵抗...聪明的战斗。希望尘埃落定后能再见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0001272C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until we meet again, may the good Lord take a liking to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们下次见面之前，愿仁慈的上帝喜欢你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He reciprocates with a firm handshake.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他以坚定的握手作为回应。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay safe. When it kicks off at the dam, fight hard... and fight smart. Hope to see you after the dust settles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意安全。当大坝开战时，要奋力抵抗...聪明的战斗。希望尘埃落定后能再见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000F912_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Shake his hand> Take care of yourself, Charles.
ESP.TRADUIT: <和他握手>自己保重，查理斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay safe. When it kicks off at the dam, fight hard... and fight smart. Hope to see you after the dust settles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意安全。当大坝开战时，要奋力抵抗...聪明的战斗。希望尘埃落定后能再见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000FE18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, before you go... got another big ask. Ranger Hart died trying to get justice for my family. Let's honor her sacrifice by finishing the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，在你走之前...又有个大任务。游骑兵哈特为了替我的家人讨回公道而牺牲，让我们通过完成任务来纪念她的牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000FE18_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While you were out, Hart told me that her immediate superior is Ranger Wheeler, supposedly a straight shooter. He's based out of Yucca Grove.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不在的时候，哈特告诉我她的顶头上司是游骑兵惠勒，按理说是个正直的人。他驻扎在丝兰林。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000FE18_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... I need a courier. You up for it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...我需要一个邮差。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000FE18_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Shake his hand> Take care of yourself, Charles.
ESP.TRADUIT: <和他握手>自己保重，查理斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay safe. When it kicks off at the dam, fight hard... and fight smart. Hope to see you after the dust settles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意安全。当大坝开战时，要奋力抵抗...聪明的战斗。希望尘埃落定后能再见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000F914_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay safe. When it kicks off at the dam, fight hard... and fight smart. Hope to see you after the dust settles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意安全。当大坝开战时，要奋力抵抗...聪明的战斗。希望尘埃落定后能再见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000FE15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, before you go... got another big ask. Ranger Hart died trying to get justice for my family. Let's honor her sacrifice by finishing the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，在你走之前...又有个大任务。游骑兵哈特为了替我的家人讨回公道而牺牲，让我们通过完成任务来纪念她的牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000FE15_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While you were out, Hart told me that her immediate superior is Ranger Wheeler, supposedly a straight shooter. He's based out of Yucca Grove.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不在的时候，哈特告诉我她的顶头上司是游骑兵惠勒，按理说是个正直的人。他驻扎在丝兰林。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000FE15_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... I need a courier. You up for it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...我需要一个邮差。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000FE15_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand this was more than you bargained for, but I appreciate your help regardless. Stay safe, you surly prick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这超出了你的预期，但我还是很感谢你的帮助。保重，你这个粗暴的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000FE14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd say it's been a pleasure, but that would be a lie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说很荣幸，但那是在说谎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand this was more than you bargained for, but I appreciate your help regardless. Stay safe, you surly prick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这超出了你的预期，但我还是很感谢你的帮助。保重，你这个粗暴的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000FE19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, before you go... got another big ask. Ranger Hart died trying to get justice for my family. Let's honor her sacrifice by finishing the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，在你走之前...又有个大任务。游骑兵哈特为了替我的家人讨回公道而牺牲，让我们通过完成任务来纪念她的牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000FE19_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While you were out, Hart told me that her immediate superior is Ranger Wheeler, supposedly a straight shooter. He's based out of Yucca Grove.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不在的时候，哈特告诉我她的顶头上司是游骑兵惠勒，按理说是个正直的人。他驻扎在丝兰林。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000FE19_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... I need a courier. You up for it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...我需要一个邮差。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000FE19_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd say it's been a pleasure, but that would be a lie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说很荣幸，但那是在说谎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She reciprocates with a strong handshake.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她以有力的握手作为回应。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best lawyer in California couldn't save Bellek now. Thank you again, and stay safe, especially when Legion makes its move at the dam. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加州最好的律师也救不了贝莱克了。再次感谢你，注意安全，特别是当军团在大坝行动的时候。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartEndSha_0000FD28_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Shake Hand> Thank you for doing this. I look forward to hearing about your case.
ESP.TRADUIT: <握手>谢谢你所做的一切，我期待着听到你的案子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you as well. When things kick off at the dam... well, just do like you did here, you'll be all right. Safe travels, partner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也一样。当大坝的事情开始时...嗯，就像你在这里做的那样，你会没事的。一路平安，搭档。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartEndSte_0000FD29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was happy to help. Take care of yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很乐意帮忙，照顾好自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, I won't. Same goes for you at the dam. Careful on the roads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，我不会的，你在大坝也是一样。路上小心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartEndJer_0000FD2A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just don't fuck this up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别他妈搞砸了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't say it's a certainty, but... yeah, you're gonna meet him soon. My advice... be honest. Always be honest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不敢肯定，但是...嗯，你很快就会见到他了。我的建议是...要诚实，永远要诚实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartEndHug_0000FD27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really think I'll run into Hugo?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真觉得我会遇到雨果吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This man, Sharp. He kill many from tribes. Some from my tribe. Killing him is great honor. I ask your blessing to eat his heart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个人，夏普。他杀死了许多部落的人，有些来自我的部落。杀死他是无上的荣耀，我请求你的祝福，吃掉他的心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollySharp_0000FD65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say your words, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就说出来吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tradition. My tribe honors our enemies by eating hearts, taking spirit. Sharp was a bad man, but strong fighter. Let me take his strength.
ESP.TRADUIT: 传统。我的部落通过吃心，吸取灵魂来纪念我们的敌人。夏普是个坏人，但是个强壮的斗士，让我汲取他的力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollySharp_0000FD69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please explain to me why you want to eat a dead man's heart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请给我解释一下你为什么要吃死人的心脏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns in disappointment.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她失望的皱起眉头。]
