ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, we need to keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们得继续走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We will feast together!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将一起盛宴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollySharp_0000FD6A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, but only if you agree to share.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，但你得同意和我分享。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She grins in eager anticipation.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她露出热切期待的笑容。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll allow it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会允许的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... will respect your wishes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...会尊重你的意愿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollySharp_0000FD68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝对不行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, glad we got this settled without any bloodshed. We'll be out of your hair soon as I get this back to Sharp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，很高兴我们没流血就解决了这件事。等我把这个还给夏普，我们就不会再来烦你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harcourt [0200DA4E] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetHarcourtGi_0000FD9E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give documents.> Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给文件>给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, fuck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我操！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harcourt [0200DA4E] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetHarcourtAt_0000FDB3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna pay for that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会为此付出代价的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harcourt [0200DA4E] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetHarcourtAt_0000FDB3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Punch him in the nose.> No deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: <一拳打在他鼻子上> 没门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No worries, I get paid either way. Take your time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用担心，反正我都有工资。慢慢来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harcourt [0200DA4E] (mod) Quest : ([02003A58]aaDetRampartStuff) Rampart Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetRampa_aaDetHarcourtMo_0000FDB2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need more time, actually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我需要更多的时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is no luck. Only fate. Crush your enemies, eat their hearts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有好运，只有命运。碾碎你的敌人，吃掉他们的心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyEndCo_0000FDBD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck out there, Molly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运，莫莉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear your words. I decide to stay close and make a home here. I will help the bomb doctor and the boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到你说的话了，我决定留在这里，在这里安家。我会帮助炸弹博士和那个男孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyEndWh_0000FDBA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will you do now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你要干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I go south, fight Bear. I am a warrior. I must fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要南下，和熊战斗。我是个战士，我必须战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyEndWh_0000FDBB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will you do now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你要干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wander and find a new tribe. I survive. Do not worry yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我四处游荡，找到了一个新的部落。我能生存，不用担心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyEndWh_0000FDBC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will you do now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你要干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You tired because you old. No one controls me. I will go my way, you go yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你累是因为你老了。没人能控制我，我走我的路，你走你的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([02008C83]aaDetMollyStuff) Molly's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetMolly_aaDetMollyEndDi_0000FDBE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, I was getting tired of having you around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我已经厌倦你在我身边了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did we win?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们赢了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelGui_0000FDED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He unexpectedly hugs you for a brief moment. You hear him sobbing.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他出乎意料地拥抱了你一会儿，你听到他在抽泣。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Gently pat his shoulder.> This is not your fault, Michael. Bad people did this, not you.
ESP.TRADUIT: <轻轻拍他的肩膀>这不是你的错，迈克尔。是坏人干的，不是你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFay_0000FDEB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Point at Nash's corpse> He did it, not you.
ESP.TRADUIT: <指着纳什的尸体>是他干的，不是你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He clumsily wipes his eyes and forces himself to maintain a stoic bearing. He then nods in agreement.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他笨拙的擦了擦眼睛，强迫自己保持一种坚忍的态度。然后他点头表示同意。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's time to stop crying and start getting angry, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是时候停止哭泣开始生气了，孩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought you... well, I thought you were a hero. Why are you giving up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为你...我还以为你是个英雄呢。你为什么要放弃？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelGui_0000FDF0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, we're making a deal. I'm only here to grab documents from the safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们达成协议了。我只是来拿保险箱里的文件的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelGui_0000FDF4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> Absolutely. Just stay down here and keep quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>绝对的。你就在下面保持安静。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've always done the right thing. I trust you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一直都在做正确的事，我相信你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelGui_0000FDF5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even heroes have to make hard choices sometimes, Michael.
ESP.TRADUIT: 英雄有时也会做出艰难的选择，迈克尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's okay. I know you did everything you could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，我知道你已经尽力了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelGui_0000FDF7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, but this is the best outcome we can hope for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉，但这是我们目前所能期望的最好结果了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad to be alive. I just hope we can get justice for my family someday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴我还活着，我只希望有一天能为我的家人讨回公道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelGui_0000FDF6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are no heroes, only survivors. This will keep you and your uncle alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有英雄，只有幸存者。这能保住你和你叔叔的命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you ever like to live there again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还想再住在那里吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelGro_0000FDFD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, it was close enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，很接近了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'm sorry. Would you ever like to live in a place like this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，对不起。你曾经想过在像这样的地方生活吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelGro_0000FDFF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My home was... much worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的家...比这还要糟糕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you ever like to live in a place like this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你曾经想过在像这样的地方生活吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelGro_0000FE00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I grew up on the road. Never really left it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在路上长大，从来没有真正离开过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you ever like to live in a place like this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你曾经想过在像这样的地方生活吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelGro_0000FDFE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I grew up in the city.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我在城里长大。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I would, too. Can't say I like the saloon, but the rest of it is quiet. People just being people, not trying to hurt each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我也愿意。我不能说我喜欢这个酒吧，但其余的地方都很安静。人们只是普通人，而不是想要伤害对方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelLiv_0000FE05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, I think someone is coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，好像有人来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelLiv_0000FE05_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would like that, eventually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最终会非常喜欢的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I would. Other than those bad guys in the saloon, everyone was real nice when my family came through. Very... what's the word? Genuine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我愿意。除了酒馆里的那些坏人，我的家人来的时候，每个人都很好。非常...怎么说来着？真诚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelLiv_0000FE07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, I think someone is coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，好像有人来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelLiv_0000FE07_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't think so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不这么认为。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean... it's not that bad, is it? I hear people make jokes about Goodsprings, but they're exaggerating, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是...没那么糟，对吧？我听说有人拿清泉镇开玩笑，但他们是夸大其词了，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelLiv_0000FE08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some homeless man on the road said it had, "Evil, magnetic energy." That's what Papa called hogwash. I think... hold on, somebody's coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 路上有个流浪汉说它有“邪恶的磁能”，这就是爸爸所说的废话。我认为...等等，有人来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelLiv_0000FE08_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd rather die than live in Goodsprings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我宁愿死也不愿待在清泉镇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. I bet some of the people here had different lives before they started living here. Bet they had different names, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我敢打赌这里有些人在来这里之前有过不同的生活，我打赌他们的名字也改过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelLiv_0000FE06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, I think someone is coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，好像有人来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelLiv_0000FE06_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if I wanted to, there's no place for me in a town like this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使我想去，在这样的小镇也没有我的容身之地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad, too. One day when I'm bigger I'll kill bad men, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也很高兴。等我长大了，我也要杀坏人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelKil_0000FE10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, and I was happy to do it. They had it coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我很乐意这么做。这是他们自找的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be sorry. These people murdered my family. I'm glad you killed them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用抱歉。这些人杀了我的家人，我很高兴你杀了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelKil_0000FE0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry you had to see this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉让你看到这个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: These are the people that helped kill my parents, aren't they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些人就是杀害我父母的帮凶，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelKil_0000FE0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad you killed them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴你杀了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelKil_0000FE0E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had no choice. It was me or them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我别无选择，不是我就是他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They helped murder my family... thank you for killing them. One day I'd like to learn how to be quick like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们害死了我的家人...谢谢你杀了他们。总有一天我要学会像你一样身手敏捷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelKil_0000FE11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Being slow is a fatal mistake in these parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这些地方，行动迟缓是致命的错误。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here are the documents, as well as her dog tags. I'll make sure she gets a proper funeral.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是文件，还有她的狗牌。我会确保她有个体面的葬礼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000FE1A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hart said she would meet her contact at some joint called the Wry Bean Saloon. Said he'd roll through to collect evidence and pass on orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈特说她会在一个叫“歪豆沙龙”的地方和她的联系人见面。他说他会过来收集证据并下达命令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000FE1A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't get any other details, but she was adamant about Wheeler being the only one she'd trust with the evidence. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道其他细节，但她坚持认为惠勒是她唯一可以信任的人。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000FE1A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's a damn shame. I'll make alternative arrangments, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，那真是太可惜了。我想我会另作安排。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesFin_0000FE1C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我受够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He forces himself to fight back tears as he grimaces.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他强迫自己忍住眼泪，做了个鬼脸。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFin_0000FE24_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay safe, Michael.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意安全，迈克尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll stay ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会做好准备的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFin_00014548_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay safe, Michael.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意安全，迈克尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know. I'll be big enough to protect myself soon enough. Thank you for teaching me how to survive. I won't forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道。我很快就能保护自己了，谢谢你教会我如何生存，我不会忘记的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFin_0000FE25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you learned how to make it out here. I won't be around to protect you anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你学会了如何在这里生存。我不会再来保护你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't anyone to protect me anymore. From now on I'm gonna be the one putting the hurt on people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不需要任何人来保护我了。从现在起，我要成为那个伤害别人的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFin_00014549_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you learned how to make it out here. I won't be around to protect you anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你学会了如何在这里生存。我不会再来保护你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He hugs you in silence and fights back tears.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他默默地拥抱你，强忍着泪水。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't forget what you taught me, not ever. Maybe one day I can rescue you when I'm grown. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会忘记你教我的东西，永远不会。也许有一天我长大了可以救你，再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFin_0000FE23_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Hug Him> Goodbye, Michael.
ESP.TRADUIT: <拥抱他>再见，迈克尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I'll be all right. Uncle Chuck's a nice guy. Shooting guns and blowing stuff up is kind of fun. Plenty of books to read, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，没事的，查克叔叔是个好人。开枪和炸东西也是一种乐趣，也有很多书可以读。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFin_0000FE22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you're really leaving?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你真的要走了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFin_0000FE22_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you gonna be okay here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里没问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be fine. Better than those bastards who came after us, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没事的。总比那些追杀我们的混蛋强。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelFin_00014546_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you gonna be okay here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里没问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's nice, isn't it? Lends some... gravity to the room. I'd tell you how I ended up with, but I doubt you'd believe me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很漂亮，不是吗？赋予一些...严肃给房间。我想告诉你我怎么搞到的，但我怀疑你不会相信我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesPai_00010E99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the deal with that painting upstairs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 楼上那幅画是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. A damn Nightkin sold it to me. Snuck right up to the compound, started talking to me like we were neighbors. Scared the shit out of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。一个该死的夜行族卖给我的，偷偷溜到院子里，开始像邻居一样跟我说话。吓死我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesPai_00010EA8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turns out he was just curious. Tip-toed through mines, crushwire and God knows what other traps just to strike up a conversation. Bizarre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果他只是好奇而已。蹑手蹑脚地穿过地雷，铁丝，天知道还有什么陷阱，就为了跟人搭讪。怪异。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesPai_00010EA8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very pleasant conversationalist, actually. I traded him some of my best gnomes for that painting. Well worth it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，他非常健谈。我用我最好的地精跟他换了这幅画，非常值得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesPai_00010EA8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试试吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He told me it was depicting Hannibal, some guy from way back who really hated the Romans... the real Romans, not the fakers across the river.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他告诉我画的是汉尼拔，一个很久以前非常讨厌罗马人的家伙...真正的罗马人，而不是河对岸的冒牌货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesPai_00010EA9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Supposed to be him taking an oath of... how did he put it? "Eternal Enmity", that's it. That was back when people really knew how to hate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该是他的宣誓...他是怎么说的？“永恒的仇恨”，就是这个。那是人们真正懂得如何去恨的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesPai_00010EA9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any significance behind it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这背后有什么意义吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Been wanting to see that one. Supposed to be about transporting an infamous prisoner to the gallows.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直想去看看，据说是要把一个臭名昭著的囚犯送上绞刑架。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kurt [02002D7F] (mod) Quest : ([02002890]aaDetourMiscDialogue) Miscellaneous Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourMi_aaDetKurtPoster_00010EB5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wheeler... not sure if I know a Wheeler. We get a lot of caravans and drifters passing through, doesn't ring a bell. Better with faces than names.
ESP.TRADUIT: 惠勒...我不确定我是否认识一个叫惠勒的人。有很多商队和流浪汉路过，都不记得了，记住面孔比记住名字要简单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hank [02010EC2] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDet03HankLook_00011163_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your business with this fella, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你跟这家伙有什么关系？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hank [02010EC2] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDet03HankLook_00011163_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for a man named Wheeler.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个叫惠勒的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Small world! That gal in the booth is a courier, too. Might ask her if she knows anything. She's been here for quite a spell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界真小！卡座里的那个女孩也是个邮差。也许可以问问她是否知道什么，她在这里待了很长时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hank [02010EC2] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDet03HankLook_00011164_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个邮差。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have to call me mister, mister... the whole world calls me Hank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不用叫我先生，先生...全世界都叫我汉克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hank [02010EC2] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetHankManyTh_0001115B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mister, many thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多谢了，先生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have to call me mister, ma'am... the whole world calls me Hank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不用叫我先生，女士...全世界都叫我汉克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hank [02010EC2] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetHankManyTh_0001115C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mister, many thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多谢了，先生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hank, did I hear you say that's another courier? Hell fire, get over here and have a drink with me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 汉克，你刚才说那是另一个邮差？见鬼，过来和我喝一杯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodBa_00011577_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand. People think this is some kind of easy-going, amicable profession... absolutely fucking not!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我理解。大家都觉得这是一种很容易相处、很友好的职业...他妈的绝对不是！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWh_00011580_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy to get mixed up in some jackpot by sheer bad luck. Happened to me on more than one occasion. Damn raiders are the worst.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很容易因为运气不好而中头奖，我不止一次遇到过这种事。该死的掠夺者是最糟的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWh_00011580_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't keep any secrets. I'm based out of Barstow. Absolute shithole. Suspect it was always that way, even before the war. Nukes improved it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会保守任何秘密。我在巴斯托，绝对的粪坑，我怀疑即使在战前，情况也是如此。核武器改善了它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWh_00011580_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, story time. Worst job. You first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，讲故事时间。最糟糕的工作，你先来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWh_00011580_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd rather not say, actually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实我不想说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Figured as much. Lot more business up there, with the war and all. Thought about moving there, but the reputation is a little... iffy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想也是。那里有很多生意，还有战争什么的。我想过要搬过去，但是那里的名声有点...毛病。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWh_00011581_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy to get mixed up in some jackpot by sheer bad luck. Happened to me on more than one occasion. Damn raiders are the worst.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很容易因为运气不好而中头奖，我不止一次遇到过这种事。该死的掠夺者是最糟的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWh_00011581_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't keep any secrets. I'm based out of Barstow. Absolute shithole. Suspect it was always that way, even before the war. Nukes improved it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会保守任何秘密。我在巴斯托，绝对的粪坑，我怀疑即使在战前，情况也是如此。核武器改善了它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWh_00011581_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, story time. Worst job. You first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，讲故事时间。最糟糕的工作，你先来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWh_00011581_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. I'm with the Mojave Express.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我是莫哈维邮政的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a minute... that was you? I heard about that, wrote it off as bullshit. Can I... can I see the scar up close? Nevermind, shouldn't have asked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下...是你？我听说了，还以为是扯淡的。我能...我能近距离看这个伤疤吗？算了，不该问的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_0001158B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? It was a route to Bullhead... tribals got the jump on me. Killed three of them before they ran, got cut up pretty good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我吗？这是一条去布尔海德的路线...部落抢先了我一步。在他们逃跑前杀了三个，我也被砍得很惨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_0001158B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm stumblin' down the highway, carved up like a summertime turkey... when a deathclaw starts following me. Pissed. My. Pants. Straight up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我踉跄着走在高速公路上，就像夏天被切开的火鸡...然后一只死亡爪开始跟踪我，我吓尿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_0001158B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had to hide in a culvert for two days before he left me alone. I show up to Bullhead, bloody and beshitted... and they dock me for late delivery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在涵洞里躲了两天才离开我。我出现在布尔海德，浑身是血，伤痕累累...他们还因为我迟交而扣我的账。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_0001158B_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Punched that fucker right in the mouth. Forfeited my wages... damn near got blacklisted. Not sure why I stay in this line of work. Why do you do it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一拳打在那混蛋的嘴上。没收了我的工资...差点被列入黑名单，不知道为什么我还留在这一行，你为什么还在干？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_0001158B_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got shot in the head outside Goodsprings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在清泉镇外面被人爆了头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't that the truth! Each job has its own special version of pure, unfiltered shittiness. Bad weather, raiders, critters, bad directions. Fuck it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说得太对了！每一份工作都有自己独特的纯粹的、未经过滤的垃圾。恶劣的天气，掠夺者，动物，错误的方向。去他妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_00011589_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? It was a route to Bullhead... tribals got the jump on me. Killed three of them before they ran, got cut up pretty good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我吗？这是一条去布尔海德的路线...部落抢先了我一步。在他们逃跑前杀了三个，我也被砍得很惨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_00011589_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm stumblin' down the highway, carved up like a summertime turkey... when a deathclaw starts following me. Pissed. My. Pants. Straight up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我踉跄着走在高速公路上，就像夏天被切开的火鸡...然后一只死亡爪开始跟踪我，我吓尿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_00011589_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had to hide in a culvert for two days before he left me alone. I show up to Bullhead, bloody and beshitted... and they dock me for late delivery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在涵洞里躲了两天才离开我。我出现在布尔海德，浑身是血，伤痕累累...他们还因为我迟交而扣我的账。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_00011589_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Punched that fucker right in the mouth. Forfeited my wages... damn near got blacklisted. Not sure why I stay in this line of work. Why do you do it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一拳打在那混蛋的嘴上。没收了我的工资...差点被列入黑名单，不知道为什么我还留在这一行，你为什么还在干？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_00011589_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly, they've all been bad jobs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，这些工作都很糟糕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know... that scar on your head tells a different story, but I ain't one to quibble over details. I admire your optimism.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道...你头上的伤疤说明了另一种情况，但我不想在细节上吹毛求疵。我很欣赏你的乐观。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_0001158A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? It was a route to Bullhead... tribals got the jump on me. Killed three of them before they ran, got cut up pretty good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我吗？这是一条去布尔海德的路线...部落抢先了我一步。在他们逃跑前杀了三个，我也被砍得很惨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_0001158A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm stumblin' down the highway, carved up like a summertime turkey... when a deathclaw starts following me. Pissed. My. Pants. Straight up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我踉跄着走在高速公路上，就像夏天被切开的火鸡...然后一只死亡爪开始跟踪我，我吓尿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_0001158A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had to hide in a culvert for two days before he left me alone. I show up to Bullhead, bloody and beshitted... and they dock me for late delivery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在涵洞里躲了两天才离开我。我出现在布尔海德，浑身是血，伤痕累累...他们还因为我迟交而扣我的账。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_0001158A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Punched that fucker right in the mouth. Forfeited my wages... damn near got blacklisted. Not sure why I stay in this line of work. Why do you do it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一拳打在那混蛋的嘴上。没收了我的工资...差点被列入黑名单，不知道为什么我还留在这一行，你为什么还在干？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_0001158A_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't complain. All things considered, I've been pretty lucky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没什么可抱怨的。总的来说，我已经很幸运了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're pulling my leg, right? I thought that guy was a myth, like flying saucers or Bigfoot. So much for my preconceived notions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在开我的玩笑，对吧？我以为那家伙是个神话，就像飞碟或大脚怪一样。我的先入为主的想法就到此为止了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_0001158C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? It was a route to Bullhead... tribals got the jump on me. Killed three of them before they ran, got cut up pretty good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我吗？这是一条去布尔海德的路线...部落抢先了我一步。在他们逃跑前杀了三个，我也被砍得很惨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_0001158C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm stumblin' down the highway, carved up like a summertime turkey... when a deathclaw starts following me. Pissed. My. Pants. Straight up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我踉跄着走在高速公路上，就像夏天被切开的火鸡...然后一只死亡爪开始跟踪我，我吓尿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_0001158C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had to hide in a culvert for two days before he left me alone. I show up to Bullhead, bloody and beshitted... and they dock me for late delivery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在涵洞里躲了两天才离开我。我出现在布尔海德，浑身是血，伤痕累累...他们还因为我迟交而扣我的账。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_0001158C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Punched that fucker right in the mouth. Forfeited my wages... damn near got blacklisted. Not sure why I stay in this line of work. Why do you do it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一拳打在那混蛋的嘴上。没收了我的工资...差点被列入黑名单，不知道为什么我还留在这一行，你为什么还在干？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWo_0001158C_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I made the mistake of travelling with a homicidal, singing "Doctor". I still have nightmares.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我犯了个错误，跟着一个一边哼歌一边杀人的“医生”搭伙，到现在还做噩梦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Partner, I knew that soon as you walked in the door. I was just being polite. See, you ain't the only one here on a job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搭档，你一进门我就知道了，我只是出于礼貌。你看，这里不是只有你一个人在工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodCu_000119CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Difference is... I ain't here for Wheeler. I'm here for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 区别是...我不是来找惠勒的，我是来找你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodCu_000119CB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jason Bellek made me an offer I couldn't refuse. No more debts and enough caps to retire, live that quiet life. All I have to do is kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰森·贝莱克给了我一个我无法拒绝的条件，没有更多的债务和足够退休的瓶盖，过着平静的生活。我要做的就是杀了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodCu_000119CB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I heard it was you... well, guess my curiosity got the better of me. Wanted to know if the stories were true before... well, business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我听说是你的时候...看来我的好奇心占了上风，想知道之前的故事是不是真的...嗯，生意嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodCu_000119CB_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of us is going in the grave tonight. So... one last drink before we step outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 今晚我们中的一个要进坟墓了，所以...出去之前再喝最后一杯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodCu_000119CB_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's cut the chit-chat. I'm looking for a man named Wheeler.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱们别闲聊了。我在找一个叫惠勒的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I've "experienced" some backwards shitholes, partner... but there were also the good ones. Goliad was nice. Almost felt at home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我“经历过”一些落后的鬼地方，搭档...但也有好的地方，戈利亚德很不错，就像在家里一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWh_00011593_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your passion when you're not on the road? Me, I like history. Collect books when I can, pass them on to the Followers when I'm done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不在路上的时候有什么爱好？我，我喜欢历史。尽可能收集书籍，在攒够了之后，再送给天启追随者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWh_00011593_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It goes without saying that alcohol and history go hand in hand. Scotch makes the great captains... a little greater, I think. How about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 毋庸置疑，酒精和历史是密不可分的。苏格兰威士忌让伟大的船长...更伟大一点，我觉得。你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like travelling and experiencing new places.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢旅行和探索新的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, the thrill of being hounded by chem-addled, cannibal raiders on some godforsaken highway? That thrill? I get it, though. Beats a desk job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，在该死的高速公路上被一群嗑药的食人族追杀的快感吗？那种刺激？不过，我明白了，比坐办公室强多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWh_00011595_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your passion when you're not on the road? Me, I like history. Collect books when I can, pass them on to the Followers when I'm done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不在路上的时候有什么爱好？我，我喜欢历史。尽可能收集书籍，在攒够了之后，再送给天启追随者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWh_00011595_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It goes without saying that alcohol and history go hand in hand. Scotch makes the great captains... a little greater, I think. How about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 毋庸置疑，酒精和历史是密不可分的。苏格兰威士忌让伟大的船长...更伟大一点，我觉得。你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time

ESP.ORIGINAL: The thrill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刺激。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean... you just get used to doing a thing, don't you? It's like tying up your laces each morning. Can't help but do it so you still feel... alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说...你就是习惯了做一件事，不是吗？就像每天早上系鞋带一样。忍不住要这么做，这样你才会觉得...活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWh_00011592_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your passion when you're not on the road? Me, I like history. Collect books when I can, pass them on to the Followers when I'm done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不在路上的时候有什么爱好？我，我喜欢历史。尽可能收集书籍，在攒够了之后，再送给天启追随者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWh_00011592_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It goes without saying that alcohol and history go hand in hand. Scotch makes the great captains... a little greater, I think. How about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 毋庸置疑，酒精和历史是密不可分的。苏格兰威士忌让伟大的船长...更伟大一点，我觉得。你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time

ESP.ORIGINAL: Habit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 习惯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ain't lying! Cheapskate clients nickel and dime you down to nothing... break our asses for pennies on the dollar! Need another shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没说谎！吝啬鬼客户对你锱铢必较，为了一分钱而拼命！需要再来一杯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWh_00011594_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your passion when you're not on the road? Me, I like history. Collect books when I can, pass them on to the Followers when I'm done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不在路上的时候有什么爱好？我，我喜欢历史。尽可能收集书籍，在攒够了之后，再送给天启追随者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodWh_00011594_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It goes without saying that alcohol and history go hand in hand. Scotch makes the great captains... a little greater, I think. How about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 毋庸置疑，酒精和历史是密不可分的。苏格兰威士忌让伟大的船长...更伟大一点，我觉得。你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever it is, it damn sure isn't the money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管是什么，肯定不是钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand. Hell, I gave up any semblance of a normal life just to chase... well, a feeling that comes with being on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白。见鬼，我放弃了一切正常的生活，就为了追逐...嗯，一种在路上的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119D8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... in places like this, I tend to think about where I'm at... where I'm going. Ponder if I'll hang it up and settle down. How about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道...在这样的地方，我倾向于思考我所处的位置...我要去哪。想想看我是不是该收手了，安定下来。你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119D8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just the job. I don't have time for anything else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是工作而已，我没时间做其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: God, I love hunting geckos. Blew an entire paycheck on one of those fancy Macomber calls. Damned if it didn't work like a charm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，我喜欢猎杀蜥蜴。把所有的薪水都花在了那些花哨的麦康伯呼唤上，真见鬼，这招真管用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119CD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cutting for sign, now that's something that makes me jealous of the tribals. A lot of them have a sixth sense when it comes to tracking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 追踪痕迹，这让我嫉妒部落。他们中的很多人在追踪时都有第六感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119CD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... in places like this, I tend to think about where I'm at... where I'm going. Ponder if I'll hang it up and settle down. How about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道...在这样的地方，我倾向于思考我所处的位置...我要去哪。想想看我是不是该收手了，安定下来。你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119CD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I enjoy hunting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢狩猎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had a rich uncle, worked three jobs to get ahead. Lived frugally, to put it mildly. Dressed like a hobo, held onto caps like they were his kids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个有钱的叔叔，为了出人头地打三份工。说得委婉点，他过着俭朴的生活，穿得像个流浪汉，对瓶盖就像他的孩子一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119D6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bought a lot of land, did well for himself. He ended up passing it onto his daughter. She blew it all in less than two years. Chems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 买了很多地，赚了不少钱，最后传给了他的女儿，她在不到两年的时间里就把一切都搞砸了。毒品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119D6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I guess when people talk about making money as their sole passion... I think of him. You ask me, life is too short to waste it all chasing caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我猜当人们说赚钱是他们唯一的爱好时...我想起了他。要我说，人生苦短，何必把时间浪费在追逐瓶盖上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119D6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... in places like this, I tend to think about where I'm at... where I'm going. Ponder if I'll hang it up and settle down. How about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道...在这样的地方，我倾向于思考我所处的位置...我要去哪。想想看我是不是该收手了，安定下来。你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119D6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does making money count as a hobby?
ESP.TRADUIT: 赚钱算是一种爱好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now we're talking. Pistols are where it's at, specifically revolvers. I don't give a hoot what the "experts" say. I love 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们来谈谈。手枪是最合适的，尤其是左轮手枪，我才不在乎那些“专家”怎么说。我爱它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119CC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A good revolver feels like a coiled-up bundle of sexual energy in the palm of my hand, ready to fire off hate and lust into someone's heart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一把好的左轮手枪感觉就像一束缠绕在我掌心的性欲能量，随时准备向某人的心里发射仇恨和欲望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119CC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... in places like this, I tend to think about where I'm at... where I'm going. Ponder if I'll hang it up and settle down. How about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道...在这样的地方，我倾向于思考我所处的位置...我要去哪。想想看我是不是该收手了，安定下来。你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119CC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guns are my passion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪是我的爱好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet you've got a few, don't you? I met an odd one not far from here. Dishevelled wreck of a man... claimed he was an escaped slave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你肯定有一些，对吧？我在离这儿不远的地方遇到了一个奇怪的家伙，一个蓬头垢面的人...声称他是一个逃跑的奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119DA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I shared some food with him. Very polite. He said he had been some bigshot in Vegas, then lost everything. Hope he lands on his feet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和他分享了一些食物。非常有礼貌，他说他曾经是维加斯的大人物，然后失去了一切。希望他能重新站起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119DA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... in places like this, I tend to think about where I'm at... where I'm going. Ponder if I'll hang it up and settle down. How about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道...在这样的地方，我倾向于思考我所处的位置...我要去哪。想想看我是不是该收手了，安定下来。你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119DA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just like talking to people and hearing their stories.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是喜欢跟人聊聊天，听他们讲故事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't tell me you're a card sharp... you are, aren't you? I'll make sure to get more drinks in you before I think about a game of poker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别告诉我你是个老千...你是，不是吧？在我想玩扑克之前，我一定要让你多喝几杯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119D3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... in places like this, I tend to think about where I'm at... where I'm going. Ponder if I'll hang it up and settle down. How about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道...在这样的地方，我倾向于思考我所处的位置...我要去哪。想想看我是不是该收手了，安定下来。你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119D3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm partial to games of chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我偏爱碰运气的游戏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Another time, another place... I'd rock your world, sister. Whew, I wish I'd run into you under different circumstances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 换个时间，换个地方...我会颠覆你的世界，妹妹。呼，真希望能在不同的情况下遇到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119D7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... in places like this, I tend to think about where I'm at... where I'm going. Ponder if I'll hang it up and settle down. How about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道...在这样的地方，我倾向于思考我所处的位置...我要去哪。想想看我是不是该收手了，安定下来。你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119D7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I enjoy engaging conversations with beautiful women.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢跟漂亮女人聊天。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet you've got more notches in the bedpost than one of those pre-war movie stars. You are trouble... just not my kind of trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌你的床柱上的凹痕比那些战前的电影明星还多。你真麻烦...只不过不是我喜欢的麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... in places like this, I tend to think about where I'm at... where I'm going. Ponder if I'll hang it up and settle down. How about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道...在这样的地方，我倾向于思考我所处的位置...我要去哪。想想看我是不是该收手了，安定下来。你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119D9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I enjoy engaging conversations with beautiful women.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢跟漂亮女人聊天。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? I say skip all that sweaty nonsense and shoot 'em. Use a knife if absolutely necessary... but a gun is always best. Just my two cents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？我建议跳过那些汗流浃背的废话，直接开枪打死他们，必要时用刀...但枪总是最好的。只是我的拙见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119D4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... in places like this, I tend to think about where I'm at... where I'm going. Ponder if I'll hang it up and settle down. How about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道...在这样的地方，我倾向于思考我所处的位置...我要去哪。想想看我是不是该收手了，安定下来。你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119D4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like to fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢打架。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's admirable. Damn useful skill in our line of work. We're always getting chewed up, shot or stabbed... or we find people who are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是令人钦佩，干我们这行真他妈有用。我们总是被咬，被枪击，被刺伤...或者我们找到这样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119D5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... in places like this, I tend to think about where I'm at... where I'm going. Ponder if I'll hang it up and settle down. How about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道...在这样的地方，我倾向于思考我所处的位置...我要去哪。想想看我是不是该收手了，安定下来。你觉得呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHo_000119D5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm always trying to improve my medical skills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直在努力提高我的医术。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not even for a moment? When you have that fleeting respite in between jobs, after you've cleaned off the blood, dust and powder burns?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一刻也没有？当你清理完血迹、灰尘和火药烧伤后，在两次工作之间短暂的休息时间？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodFa_000119E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After you get that first good sip of scotch... when you're warm and comfortable... you don't wonder if you can just be... stationary?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你喝下第一口苏格兰威士忌之后...当你感到温暖舒适的时候...你不会想知道你能不能...静止？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodFa_000119E2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No? Guess I'm prone to flights of fancy, then. Well, before I digress again... got another topic to discuss with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有？看来是我太过胡思乱想了。好吧，在我再次离题之前...我还有个话题要和你讨论。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know why I'm here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我为什么来这里吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodFa_000119E2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think about tomorrow. Only today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不考虑明天，只有今天。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you do it, though? Hang it all up and live like an everyday slob, scratching dirt for shit wages and... turning the other cheek?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你能做到吗？放弃一切，像个普通的懒汉一样生活，为了微薄的工资而刨土...被人打左脸伸右脸？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodFa_000119E0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First bastard tries to muscle you off your land or threatens you... reckon he'll have a case of lead poisoning. That don't fly in settled places.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一个混蛋试图强迫你离开你的土地或威胁你...我估计他会铅中毒。在文明社会可行不通。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodFa_000119E0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then again, maybe you'll find someplace isolated enough. Live like a hermit, be like old Charlie Augen. And that... brings me to the next topic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，也许你会找到一个足够隔绝的地方，像隐士一样生活，就跟老查理·奥根一样。而且...这就引出了下一个话题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodFa_000119E0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know why I'm here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我为什么来这里吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodFa_000119E0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'd like to settle down and lead a quiet life... eventually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想安定下来，过平静的生活...最终。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure if people like us are built for families... or if we'd be good parents. You really think you can just turn it off? Live... normally?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定我们这样的人是不是为家庭而生的...或者我们是否能成为好父母。你真以为你能把改掉吗？正常...生活？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodFa_000119E1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, maybe you're different than me. I just... living like this... on the edge of a knife... it changes you, permanently. The killing, especially.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，也许你和我不一样。我只是...这样活着...在刀尖上...这会永久的改变你，尤其是杀戮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodFa_000119E1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can rationalize, compartmentalize, whatever... but I still see them, their eyes... what worries me most is that I got so used to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以合理化，划分区域等等。但我还是能看到他们，他们的眼睛...最让我担心的是我已经习惯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodFa_000119E1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reckon I've had too much to drink, babbling like this. Should change the topic, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我是喝多了，说了这么多胡话。无论如何，我们应该换个话题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodFa_000119E1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know why I'm here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我为什么来这里吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodFa_000119E1_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I'd like to have a family one day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我希望有一天能有个家庭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, like Cain? I ain't in a position to judge, but it doesn't seem like a viable long-term strategy. You've got to stop eventually, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，像该隐一样？我没有资格评判，但这似乎不是一个可行的长期策略。你总有一天会停下来的，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodFa_000119DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then again, maybe not. Doubt I'll make it to retirement. Got commitments that require caps. Brings me to the next topic of conversation...
ESP.TRADUIT: 话又说回来，也许不是。我恐怕活不到退休，有一些需要钱的承诺。这让我想到了下一个话题...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodFa_000119DF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know why I'm here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我为什么来这里吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodFa_000119DF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll don't think I'll ever stop wandering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我永远都不会停止流浪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't miss much, do you? When you're up to your nose in debt and willing to take on any job... sometimes you get your wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错过什么，是吧？当你债台高筑，愿意接受任何工作的时候...有时你会如愿以偿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119E8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jason Bellek made me an offer I couldn't refuse. No more debts and enough caps to retire, live that quiet life. All I have to do is kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰森·贝莱克给了我一个我无法拒绝的条件，没有更多的债务和足够退休的瓶盖，过着平静的生活。我要做的就是杀了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119E8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I heard it was you... well, guess my curiosity got the better of me. Wanted to know if the stories were true before... well, business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我听说是你的时候...看来我的好奇心占了上风，想知道之前的故事是不是真的...嗯，生意嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119E8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of us is going in the grave tonight. So... one last drink before we step outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 今晚我们中的一个要进坟墓了，所以...出去之前再喝最后一杯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119E8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're here to kill me, aren't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是来杀我的，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! I needed that. Thank you. No, not quite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！我需要这个，谢谢你！不，不完全是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119EB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jason Bellek made me an offer I couldn't refuse. No more debts and enough caps to retire, live that quiet life. All I have to do is kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰森·贝莱克给了我一个我无法拒绝的条件，没有更多的债务和足够退休的瓶盖，过着平静的生活。我要做的就是杀了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119EB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I heard it was you... well, guess my curiosity got the better of me. Wanted to know if the stories were true before... well, business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我听说是你的时候...看来我的好奇心占了上风，想知道之前的故事是不是真的...嗯，生意嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119EB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of us is going in the grave tonight. So... one last drink before we step outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 今晚我们中的一个要进坟墓了，所以...出去之前再喝最后一杯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119EB_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're here to profess your love for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是来向我表白的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: For talky? Oh, for talking! Conversation, yes. It has been a very nice talk, thank you. You're very nice, sorry to give you bad news.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闲聊？噢，为了谈话！对话，是的，这是一次非常愉快的谈话，谢谢。你人很好，很抱歉告诉你一个坏消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jason Bellek made me an offer I couldn't refuse. No more debts and enough caps to retire, live that quiet life. All I have to do is kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰森·贝莱克给了我一个我无法拒绝的条件，没有更多的债务和足够退休的瓶盖，过着平静的生活。我要做的就是杀了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119E9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I heard it was you... well, guess my curiosity got the better of me. Wanted to know if the stories were true before... well, business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我听说是你的时候...看来我的好奇心占了上风，想知道之前的故事是不是真的...嗯，生意嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119E9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of us is going in the grave tonight. Will you share one last drink with me before we step outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 今晚我们中的一个要进坟墓了。在我们出去之前，你能和我喝最后一杯吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119E9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You here for talky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是来闲聊的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that is part of it... and to be fair, I have enjoyed the drinks and the conversation... but that isn't exactly why I'm here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这是一部分...说句公道话，我很享受跟你一起喝酒和聊天...但这并不是我来这里的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jason Bellek made me an offer I couldn't refuse. No more debts and enough caps to retire, live that quiet life. All I have to do is kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰森·贝莱克给了我一个我无法拒绝的条件，没有更多的债务和足够退休的瓶盖，过着平静的生活。我要做的就是杀了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119E7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I heard it was you... well, guess my curiosity got the better of me. Wanted to know if the stories were true before... well, business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我听说是你的时候...看来我的好奇心占了上风，想知道之前的故事是不是真的...嗯，生意嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119E7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of us is going in the grave tonight. So... one last drink before we step outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 今晚我们中的一个要进坟墓了，所以...出去之前再喝最后一杯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119E7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought you were here for a drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为你是来喝一杯的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally, that would be accurate... a solid estimation, if you will. This is an exception, though. It's very much your business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常情况下，这是准确的...一个可靠的判断，如果你愿意这么说的话。不过，这次是个例外，这完全关你的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jason Bellek made me an offer I couldn't refuse. No more debts and enough caps to retire, live that quiet life. All I have to do is kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰森·贝莱克给了我一个我无法拒绝的条件，没有更多的债务和足够退休的瓶盖，过着平静的生活。我要做的就是杀了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119EA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I heard it was you... well, guess my curiosity got the better of me. Wanted to know if the stories were true before... well, business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我听说是你的时候...看来我的好奇心占了上风，想知道之前的故事是不是真的...嗯，生意嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119EA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of us is going in the ground tonight. Will you share one last drink with me before we step outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们中的一个今晚就要入土了。在我们出去之前，你能跟我喝最后一杯吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodRe_000119EA_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's none of my business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不关我的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Duly noted. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意到了，有什么问题吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_000119ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think this is a terrible idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为这是个糟糕的主意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, fine. I'll fucking do it. Can you at least get the fire going up there so we can cook some supper? I'd like a decent meal before I die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧，我他妈会做的。你能不能至少把火生起来好让我们做晚饭？我想在死之前吃顿像样的饭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesGno_000119EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is hazardous and stupid. I refuse to take part in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这既危险又愚蠢，我拒绝参加。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough to build a new life. You ever... dug yourself into a hole so deep that you stop seeing daylight? That's where I was at. This is my daylight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 足够开始新生活了。你有没有...把自己埋在一个深得看不见阳光的洞里？这就是我当时的处境，这就是我的阳光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHa_000119FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much did he offer you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他给了你多少钱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honey, I'm so far in the red that chance don't figure into my thinking any more. I'm all in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲爱的，我现在负债太多了，我再也不想碰运气了。我全力投入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHa_000119FB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really think you have a chance?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得你有胜算吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a bullshit phrase if there ever was one. Did you have to save that boy? To fight off mercenaries? Nobody can tell you what you have to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有什么是屁话那这句就是。你必须拯救那个男孩？跟雇佣兵开战？没人能告诉你该做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHa_000119FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So let me be clear - I have to do this. I will do this. When we go outside I'm going to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要说清楚，我必须这么做，我会这么做。我们一出去，我就杀了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHa_000119FC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that can wait for a moment. Let's drink first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这可以再等一会儿，我们先喝一杯吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHa_000119FC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have to do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没必要这么做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a man with deep pockets and a piss-poor moral compass. What else do you need to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是一个财大气粗却道德沦丧的人。你还想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHa_000119F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... one last drink?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...最后一杯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHa_000119F6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything you can tell me about Jason Bellek before we do this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们动手之前，你能告诉我杰森·贝莱克的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cheers, then. To health... and prosperity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么干杯吧。为了健康...和成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHa_000119FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Accept drink> Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: <接受饮料>当然。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. See you outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，外面见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHa_000119F9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll pass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No manners. All right, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没礼貌。那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodHa_000119F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> Let's skip the drinks and get right to dancing.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我们不喝酒了，直接跳舞吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now... all we can do is live through it. See you outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在...我们能做的就是活下去。外面见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodCh_00011A02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's to the sunny slopes of long ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 敬很久以前的阳光明媚的山坡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wish it were true for both us. Outside, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望我们都能如愿，那就去外面吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodCh_00011A04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To health and prosperity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为健康和成功干杯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand. See you outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了，在外面见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodCh_00011A03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes... to enemies. Better than friends at times, clearly. See you outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的...敬敌人，显然，有时比朋友还好。外面见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodCh_00011A05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To friends... and enemies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 敬朋友们...还有敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get on with it, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们继续吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wedgwood [02010EC7] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWedgwoodGr_00011A08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bad day for her, then. What's your business out here, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那对她来说真是糟糕的一天。话说回来，你来这里有什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerSel_00011A13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She was a hired gun sent to kill me. I defended myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她是受雇来杀我的，我保护了自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mutual combat? What do you think this is, a movie? Goddamn, we're still in what's supposed to be a civilized land. Mutual combat...
ESP.TRADUIT: 互斗？你以为这是电影吗？死，我们还在这片文明的土地上。互斗...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerMut_00011A14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What in the hell are you doing out here, anyway? Hardly anybody stops at this rickety-ass dive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底在这里做什么？几乎没有人会在这破地方停下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerMut_00011A14_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mutual combat. She lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 互斗，她输了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you're... special. It's just... you can't go killing people willy-nilly, okay? I mean... looks like self-defense. No witnesses. Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你...特别。只是...你不能随便杀人，好吗？我的意思是...看起来像是自卫，没有目击者。算了。
