ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerLow_00011A16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来这儿做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerLow_00011A16_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lady try hurt me. I hurt back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 女人想伤害我，我伤害回去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? She's dead? Let me see this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？她死了？让我看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerRea_00011A19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn. Dog tags, too. Paperwork is... well, it should seal the deal. I'll get word to Hart's family... also make sure they get the insurance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可恶，狗牌。报告...好吧，这应该能解决问题。我会通知哈特的家人...还要确保他们得到保险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerRea_00011A19_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，还没问你是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerRea_00011A19_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give items> Ranger Hart died to get you these documents. Should help your case against Bellek.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给予物品>游骑兵哈特为了给你弄这些文件而牺牲了，应该对你起诉贝莱克有帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? She's dead? Let me see this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？她死了？让我看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerRea_00011A1A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn. Dog tags, too. Paperwork is... well, it should seal the deal. I'll get word to Hart's family... also make sure they get the insurance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可恶，狗牌。报告...好吧，这应该能解决问题。我会通知哈特的家人...还要确保他们得到保险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerRea_00011A1A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，还没问你是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerRea_00011A1A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give items> I've been hauling this crap all over creation. Oh, Ranger Hart is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给予物品>我拖着这破烂跑遍了整个世界。哦，游骑兵哈特死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wheeler. Ranger Wheeler to you. Now... I ask again, why are you decorating this place with dead women?
ESP.TRADUIT: 惠勒，游骑兵惠勒。现在...我再问你一遍，你为什么要用死去的女人来装饰这里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerWho_00011A1C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm guessing you ain't "just" anything, but I respect the commitment. I'll put this evidence to good use, you have my word on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你不会“只是”，但我尊重你的承诺。我会好好利用这些证据的，我向你保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerNam_00011E2D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't one for speeches or long goodbyes, but you have my thanks... and the thanks of the Republic. Best be on my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢演讲，也不喜欢长篇大论的告别，但我还是很感谢你...共和国也是。我最好还是上路吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerNam_00011E2D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just a courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是个邮差。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No shit? Well, that explains the mayhem, then. Reckon you did what you had to do. Appreciate you finishing this for Hart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是吧？好吧，那就能解释为什么会这么混乱了，看来你做了该做的。谢谢你帮哈特完成这件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerNam_00011E2F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't one for speeches or long goodbyes, but you have my thanks... and the thanks of the Republic. Best be on my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢演讲，也不喜欢长篇大论的告别，但我还是很感谢你...共和国也是。我最好还是上路吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerNam_00011E2F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. The tags and documents are legit, so I won't pester you about the details. Whoever you are, thanks for finishing what Hart started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，狗牌和文件都是合法的，所以我不会纠缠你细节。不管你是谁，谢谢你完成了哈特的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerNam_00011E2E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't one for speeches or long goodbyes, but you have my thanks... and the thanks of the Republic. Best be on my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢演讲，也不喜欢长篇大论的告别，但我还是很感谢你...共和国也是。我最好还是上路吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Wheeler [02011A0D] (mod) Quest : ([0200FE13]aaDetour03) Next Time EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour03_aaDetWheelerNam_00011E2E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd prefer not to give out my name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想透露我的名字。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, cool. Okay. You go off into the sunset, leave the rest of us to deal with it. I'm gonna hold onto this, believe me. Get the fuck out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，很酷。好吧，你去看日落吧，让我们剩下的人来处理。我会保管好这个的，相信我。给我滚出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartStage1_00011E47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did what was best for Michael. I stand by my decision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做的都是为了迈克尔好，我坚持我的决定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fucking prick. If I'd known... I never would've come to you. You know what? Thank you... for this lesson. I won't forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个混蛋。如果我早知道...我永远不会来找你，你知道吗？谢谢你！这一课，我不会忘记的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartStage1_00011E45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't push me. We're not in NCR, little lady.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别逼我。我们不是在NCR，小姑娘。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fucking bitch. If I'd known... I never would've come to you. You know what? Thank you... for this lesson. I won't forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个婊子。如果我早知道...我永远不会来找你，你知道吗？谢谢你！这一课，我不会忘记的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartStage1_00011E46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't push me. We're not in NCR, little lady.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别逼我。我们不是在NCR，小姑娘。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck the case... and fuck you. I was ready to die for that boy... to stand right beside you. You know what? Thanks for the lesson. Now get fucked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的案子...?我已经准备好为那个男孩而死了...站在你身边。你知道吗？谢谢你的教训，现在滚吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartStage1_00011E49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't about Michael, it's about your case. Make your career with someone else's life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这和迈克尔无关，是和你的案子有关。用别人的生活来成就你的事业。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing? Not a sly remark or long-winded justification? Just "Fuck you, Hart"? Okay. I won't forget this, and neither will NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都没有？没有狡猾的言论或冗长的辩解？?好吧，我不会忘记的，NCR也不会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartStage1_00011E48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... it's like my family is watching me... and I can't disappoint them? I understand. I'll try to do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...就像我的家人在看着我...我不能让他们失望？我明白了，我会尽力做到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelTou_00011E50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always excel, do better than others, and make your ancestors proud.
ESP.TRADUIT: 永远精益求精，做得比别人更好，让你的祖先感到骄傲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay. I'll... do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的。我会...这样做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelTou_00011E51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, try really hard?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，真的很努力了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't stop, I promise. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会停下来的，我向你保证。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelTou_00011E55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never stop learning and never get complacent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 永远不要停止学习，也不要骄傲自满。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, he seems to know what's going on, even though he's a little weird. I'll do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，他似乎知道发生了什么，尽管他有点奇怪。我会的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your uncle is a survivor. Follow his advice and do what he says, you'll be okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你叔叔是幸存者。听从他的建议，照他说的做，你会没事的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I tell you a secret? Sometimes... I think about the people that killed my family... and I dream about shooting them over and over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能告诉你一个秘密吗？有时候...我想到杀害我家人的人...我梦想着一遍又一遍的射杀他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelTou_00011E53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I can get mean. I'll work on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我可以变得残忍，我会努力的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelTou_00011E53_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes you gotta get mean. I mean plumb, mad-dog mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候你也得残忍一点。我的意思是，就像疯狗一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never quit. Got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 永不放弃，明白了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelTou_00011E52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No matter what happens - never quit. Once you start, it's habit-forming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管发生什么，永远不要放弃。一旦你开始了，就会养成习惯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay. I'll ask someone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好吧，我去问别人吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelTou_00011E57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not someone who should be giving out advice on living, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是那种应该给你生活建议的人，孩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You, Bear Witch... you know of Bullhead? Did you help soldiers kill my people?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，熊女巫...你知道布尔海德吗？你有没有帮助士兵杀害我的族人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetMollyCharl_00011E5F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, don't call me "Bear Witch". Second, I never served in Bullhead. I just know about Kimball's campaign down there. Sharp was... involved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一，别叫我“熊女巫”；第二，我从没在布尔海德服役过。我只是知道金博尔的行动，而夏普...他是参与者之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetMollyCharl_00011E60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Witch is title of respect. I not say it again. I know of Sharp. He killed my first chief, Soul Drinker. Bad day for Cliffhounds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 女巫是一种尊称，我不会再叫了。我知道夏普，他杀了我的第一任酋长，饮魂者，对悬崖猎犬来说是糟糕的一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetMollyCharl_00011E61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All Bear soldiers I know are bad. You seem good. Why you help Bear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认识的熊兵都很坏，你看起来不错。你为什么要帮熊？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's no secret that the tribes around Bullhead... suffered. It was complicated, though. Many of the tribes were fighting each other. It had to stop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大家都知道，布尔海德附近的部落...在受苦。不过，事情很复杂，许多部落在互相争斗，这必须停止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetMollyCharl_00011E62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of the tribes turned on settlers, and then it went downhill. The methods were... flawed... but we brought peace, stability.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些部落开始攻击移民，然后情况就每况愈下。方法是...有缺陷的...但我们带来了和平和稳定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Peace" and "Stability". I know these words. Funny, men from Legion make same offer. I think they mean the same thing - make slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: “和平”与“稳定”，我知道这些词。有趣，军团的人也这么说，我想它们的意思是一样的，制造奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetMollyCharl_00011E63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You, bomb chief... why you hate Bear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，炸弹酋长...你为什么讨厌熊？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Bomb Chief", I like that. Oh, to answer your question - I used to work for the Bear, believe it or not. I did it to fight the Legion, see.
ESP.TRADUIT: “炸弹酋长”，我喜欢这个。哦，回答你的问题，信不信由你，我曾经为熊工作过。我是为了对抗军团才这么做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetMollyCharl_00011E64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do I hate them? I saw what they did to my friends... what they did to a lot of good men and women... the waste of life. It made me sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为什么讨厌他们？我看到他们对我的朋友做了什么...他们对很多善良的男人和女人所做的...浪费生命。这让我感到恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Bear used me to hurt a lot of people, then... well, they threw me away. It's why I don't trust government... any government. Only people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 熊利用我伤害了很多人，然后...他们把我扔了。这就是我不信任政府的原因...任何政府，只有人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: They call you crazy, but you seem wise. Why you have no wives?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说你疯了，但你看起来很聪明。你为什么没有妻子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Molly [02008C7C] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetMollyCharl_00011E65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wives? Well, I tried. Army ain't exactly, uh... conducive to a happy marriage. Every one of mine failed. Didn't help that I went crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妻子？嗯，我试过了。军队并不，呃...有利于婚姻幸福，我的每一次都失败了。我疯了也没用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCampf_aaDetMollyCharl_00011E66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, that ship has sailed. Maybe in another life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，那艘船已经起航了。也许下辈子吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([0200D5F6]aaDetCampfireStuff) Campfire Scene Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'll help. I have a vision... a horizon dimmed by a cloud of billowing, black smoke... heaps of incinerated bodies... cities in ashes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我会帮忙的。我看到一个幻象...被滚滚黑烟遮蔽的地平线...成堆的被焚毁的尸体...化为灰烬的城市。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayComin_00011E8F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We will subjugate the Mojave and suppress the savages with righteous flame. The whiners, criminals and communists will all burn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将征服莫哈维，用正义之火镇压野蛮人。抱怨者、罪犯和共产主义者都会被烧死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayComin_00011E8F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, I will adhere to your orders... follow the rules of engagement... but I'll be ready to roast anyone who challenges you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我会遵守你的命令...遵守交战规则...但我已经准备好拷问任何挑战你的人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayComin_00011E8F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, I could use your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我需要你的帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not really. Besides, Charles considers me a fire hazard, doesn't want me around. He's probably right. I want to burn his precious gnomes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，说不上。再说了，查理斯觉得我是个火灾隐患，不想让我在他身边。他可能是对的，我想烧掉他的宝贝地精。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayComin_00011E8C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I have any say in this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有什么发言权吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood, there's always a chain of command. You set the rules of engagement, I'll follow them. Unless it involves gnomes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白了，总有一套指挥系统，你制定交战规则，我就遵守。除非涉及到地精。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayComin_00011E8D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can come with me, but you'll have to follow my instructions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以跟我来，但你得听从我的指示。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're goddamn eyesores. Kitsch lawn trash has no place in an ordered society. They're good for target practice, that's it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太他妈碍眼了。在一个有序的社会里，庸俗的草坪垃圾是没有立足之地的，是用来练习打靶的，仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayComin_00011E8E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your problem with gnomes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对地精有什么意见？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. I'll stay here and burn gnomes. Good luck subduing the Mojave without me, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我会留在这里烧地精。希望你能在没有我的情况下成功征服莫哈维。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayComin_00011E90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want your help. You should stay here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不需要你的帮助，你还是留在这里吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a shitty, little backwater this is... we should convert it into a gunnery range.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个多么糟糕，多么闭塞的地方...我们应该把它改成射击场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00011ED4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe the elderly should be cremated just prior to the onset of dementia. We should start with Easy Pete.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为老年人应该在痴呆发作之前被火化，我们应该从闲人彼得开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00011ED5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me the word and I'll burn down the general store with Chet inside. Goddamn cheapskate bastard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你开口，我就把杂货店烧了，切特就在里面。该死的杂碎小气鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00011ED6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd rather be in Fort Polk than Goodsprings. I'm joking, of course. Please don't send me to Fort Polk. Anything but that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我宁愿去波尔克堡，也不去清泉镇。当然，我是开玩笑的，请不要把我送到波尔克堡，除了那个哪里都行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00011ED7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I apply some heat to the right places, pretty sure I could trigger an avalanche. Could be fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在适当的地方加热，肯定能引发雪崩。可能会很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If a supermutant dove headfirst into a running B-17 engine, how far would he get? I'm betting 1,200 horsepower would turn him into pepperoni!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果一个超级变种人一头扎进正在运转的B-17引擎，他能飞多远？我打赌1200马力能把他变成意大利辣香肠！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Strong winds... an abundance of dry timber... wood buildings... just give me the word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 强风...大量的干木材...木制建筑...只要你开口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know who made supermutants? The Navy. I guarantee the Navy was behind it. It's always the fucking Navy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道是谁制造了超级变种人吗？海军，我保证海军是幕后黑手，永远都是该死的海军。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Supermutants... giant, strong, good with guns... and complete idiots. They'd rise straight to the top in the Army.
ESP.TRADUIT: 超级变种人...巨大，强壮，会用枪...而且是彻头彻尾的白痴。他们能在军队里直接晋升到高层。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think they're having orgies up here when the humans aren't looking? They're having orgies, count on it. Giant, sweaty orgies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得他们会趁人类不注意的时候在这里狂欢吗？他们在纵欲狂欢，相信我，大汗淋漓的狂欢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The amount of food and resources wasted on these animals... should've formed penal battalions, sent them to the river. Let God sort them out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 浪费在这些畜生身上的食物和资源...应该组建一个劳改营，派他们去河边，让上帝来挑选。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00014DE6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should focus on rehabilitating these convicts... by gentlly nudging them... INTO AN ACTIVE VOLCANO!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该集中精力改造这些犯人...轻轻推一下...进入活火山！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00014DE7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we're going to murder all these bastards, let's at least harvest the organs, do something useful with them. No place for fraud, waste or abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们要杀了这些杂种，至少得把器官取下来，用它们做点有用的事。不允许欺诈，浪费和滥用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00014DE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In Alaska, I proposed turning POWs into living bombs. Rejected, sadly. I'm just saying... we could try it here. For science.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在阿拉斯加，我提议把战俘变成人体炸弹，遗憾的是，被拒绝了。我只是说...我们可以在这里试试，为了科学。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00014DE9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hear me out... let's just kill these animals... field dress them... and then serve them up in tacos we'd give out in Freeside. That's philanthropy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听我说完...让我们杀了这些畜生...野外加工...然后把它们做成墨西哥玉米薄饼卷，我们会在自由城分发。这就是慈善。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00014DEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once they put me in charge of guarding Chinese POWs. I, uh... yeah, I was relieved shortly thereafter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦他们让我负责看守中国战俘。我，呃...是的，之后不久我就被解雇了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00014DEB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope I can live long enough to see a working time machine, so I can travel back to the Cretaceous... and burn those goddamn lizards!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我能活得足够长，看到一台运转的时间机器，这样我就能回到白垩纪...烧掉那些该死的蜥蜴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BFB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These people scoff at No-Bark, but he's right. Commie ghosts are real.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些人都嘲笑疯嘴，但他是对的，共产主义幽灵是真实存在的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BFC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lot of fuel at at REPCONN. Just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瑞普康有大量燃料，只是说说而已
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BFD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why shoot her? Why not burn the bitch? That's what I want to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么要开枪打她？为什么不烧死这个婊子？这就是我想知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BFE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know what would lift Boone's spirits... burning some legionaries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道什么能让布恩振作起来...焚烧一些军团士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BFF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever... just... think about killing everyone and starting fresh? I'm not saying we should... but if you want to... I understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有...只是...想把所有人都杀了，重新开始？我不是说我们应该...但如果你想...我理解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012C00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love burning dogs, but roasting feral ghouls is a close second. No higher faculties, but by God they still have fast-twitch muscles! Fast!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢烧狗，其次是烤狂尸鬼。虽然没有更高级的官能，但天哪，他们还是有快速抽搐的肌肉的！很快！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012C01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe in helping people struggling with addiction. True rehabilitation... begins with open flame applied to STINKING, CHEM-ADDLED FLESH!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信要帮助那些与毒瘾作斗争的人。真正的康复...先用明火把发臭的，被化学药物污染的肉点燃！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BD7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what would turn Vault 3 around? A thermobaric weapon. Rarefaction can be a beautiful thing, especially when combined with fire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道怎么扭转3号避难所的处境吗？一个温压武器。稀薄是一件美好的事情，尤其是与火结合在一起的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BD8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should build a giant wicker man out of captured Fiends and then set it alight. Never hurts to have some Celtic demons on our side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该用捕获的恶魔帮做一个巨大的柳条人，然后点火烧了它。有一些凯尔特恶魔站在我们这边总不会有什么坏处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BD9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what's lower than bums? Dogs. What's lower than a dog? Fiends. Burn. Them. All.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道什么比流浪汉更低级吗？狗；还有什么比狗更低级呢？恶魔帮。烧了，他们，所有人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BEB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, Nellis Air Force Base. Home of the Thunderbirds! Blue Angels? Second-rate. Squids with wings... an abomination!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，内利斯空军基地，雷鸟之家！蓝色天使？二流。长着翅膀的鱿鱼...令人憎恶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00014542_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love seeing the sunrise over a runway. Glistening aircraft, the scent of jet fuel, happy maintainers... well, maybe not so happy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢看跑道上的日出。闪闪发光的飞机，航空燃油的香味，开心的维修人员...好吧，也许不是那么开心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00014543_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The thought of a restored B-29 dropping ordnance on skirt-clad primitives, it... it almost brings a tear to my eye. Godspeed, Boomers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一想到一架修复后的B-29轰炸机向穿着裙子的原始人投掷弹药，这...这几乎让我热泪盈眶。祝你们好运，大炮族。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00014544_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time to revive Silverplate... I think a 30-kiloton device dropped squarely on Flagstaff would put those primitives out of business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是时候复活银盘了...我认为一个3万吨级的炸弹直接砸在旗杆市会让那些原始人破产。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00014545_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know developing the B-29 cost more than the Manhattan Project? Navy bitched about it to no end. Well worth it, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道研发B-29的成本比曼哈顿计划还高吗？海军没完没了的抱怨这事，不过，这是值得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_0001D3C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We lost more of the B-29s to mechanical failure than we did to enemy fire. Big, beautiful bitches, but goddamn were they finicky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们因机械故障损失的B-29比因敌人火力损失的要多。又大又漂亮的婊子，但她们太挑剔了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_0001D3C7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: September 18, 1947... that's our Independence Day. As long as I live, so does the United States Air Force.
ESP.TRADUIT: 1947年9月18日...那是我们的独立日。只要我活着，美国空军就会永远存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_0001D3C8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Decent demo work here. Not the way I'd have done it, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有不错的爆破工作，但我不会这么做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chief Hanlon had good instincts with the demo trap, but incendiaries would've been much more dramatic. Just my opinion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 汉隆军士长对爆破陷阱的直觉很好，但燃烧弹会更有戏剧性。这只是我的观点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should capture some of those red-skinned bastards in the Divide, put slave collars on them... and then use them to clean up this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该抓几个大裂谷那些红皮肤的混蛋，给他们戴上奴隶项圈...然后用来打扫这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think a good barbecue joint would really put this town back on the map. I'm kidding, it's fucked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为一家好的烧烤店会让这个小镇重新焕发光彩。我开玩笑的，这太操蛋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion is wrong about a lot... but decimation might be useful in a place like this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团的很多想法都是错误的...但在这种地方十一抽杀可能有用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personally, I think that burning stray dogs would be a fine morale-building activity. Just a suggestion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就我个人而言，我认为焚烧流浪狗是一种很好的鼓舞士气的活动。只是个建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: General Oliver, what a strategist... let's just sit on our asses and let the savages whittle us down, content to hunker down and DO NOTHING!
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥利弗将军，真是个战略家...让我们坐以待毙，让野蛮人把我们削成碎片，满足于袖手旁观！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Legion, kill Legion, kill Legion. That'll lift their spirits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀光军团，杀光军团，杀光军团。这会让他们精神振奋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lot of fuss for a few barracks. Should've just burned it down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几个兵营可真麻烦，应该直接烧掉的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012C07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This... this is what they're fighting over? God, please wake me up from this cheap nightmare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...这就是他们争吵的原因？上帝啊，请把我从这个廉价的噩梦中唤醒吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012C08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's with all the crosses? So much work. Burning at the stake, now that's a proper punishment from a more refined era, bet your ass!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些十字架是怎么回事？这么多事。烧死在火刑柱上，这才是更文明的时代应有的惩罚，我敢打赌！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012C09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fire has transformative qualities. Look what it did for Joshua Graham. We should try it on every legionary we see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 火具有变革性，看看这对约书亚·格拉汉姆的影响吧。我们应该在见到的每一个军团士兵身上试一试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012C0A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I'd been the one to set Joshua Graham alight... let's just say the fire outside would've been stronger. He'd be a strip of bacon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是我点着的约书亚·格拉汉姆...这么说吧，外面的火会更旺，他会变成一片培根。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012C0B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a shithole. Reminds me of Cannon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是个鬼地方，让我想起了坎农。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C1A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you pick a fight with a better-armed opponent, don't expect pity when they kick the shit out of you. Khans are fucking babies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你选择和一个装备更好的对手战斗时，不要指望他们把你踢得屁滚滚流的时候还会同情你。大汗族是他妈的婴儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C1B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't see what the big deal is. NCR took it easy on the Khans. I would've herded them all into a gulley and dropped napalm on them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不觉得这有什么大不了的，NCR对大汗帮很宽容了。我会把他们都赶到一条沟里，然后向他们扔凝固汽油弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C1C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How many of these degenerates aren't hooked on chems? I bet they haven't done an honest day's work in their collective lives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些堕落者中有多少人没有对化学药物上瘾？我敢打赌，他们在集体生活中一天诚实工作过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Oh, I'm a poor Khan, I start shit with nation-states, get my fucking teeth kicked in, then I cry about it!" Fucking losers!
ESP.TRADUIT: “噢，我是一个可怜的大汗帮，我开始搞单一民族国家，被踢得满地找牙，然后我就哭了！”该死的失败者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C1E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 6.6 million tons of American pride right here. What a marvel. Let's make sure those spear-chuckers don't get their filthy hands on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 660万吨的美国骄傲就在这里，真是个奇迹。我们得确保那些扔矛的人不会用脏手碰到它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C0A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I long for the days of old America, back when we built wonders like this. Say what you want about the Enclave, they had patriotism.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怀念过去的美国，那时候我们创造了这样的奇迹。不管你对英克雷有什么看法，他们很爱国。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C0B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's just march over there and burn it all down. "I'm Lanius, I'm tall and scary!" Hello, Mr. Goat-Fucker in Chief, meet my friend, napalm!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们直接过去把它烧了吧。“我是拉尼厄斯，我又高又吓人！”你好，大混蛋先生，见见我的朋友，凝固汽油弹！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C0C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After you've decapitated Lanius, let's put his head in that cannon and fire it off with some fireworks. Don't worry, I'll handle the pyrotechnics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你砍下拉尼厄斯的头之后，我们把他的头放进那门大炮然后用烟火把它发射出去如何。放心，烟火交给我吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C0D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like someone welded every piece of shit-iron scrap within a hundred miles and called it a monument. What an embarrassment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来有人把方圆一百英里内的所有废铁都焊接在一起，并称之为纪念碑。真是尴尬啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016BFF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wanna see what happens when you set a car on fire?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想看把车烧了会发生什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could give Ranger Ghost a nice tan in... three seconds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以把游骑兵幽灵晒成棕褐色...三秒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is familiar...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方很眼熟...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I scanned Lacey. Pretty sure she has the clap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我扫视了一下莱西，我很确定她得了淋病。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at what these filthy savages did to my Red Rock. Disgusting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看这些肮脏的野蛮人对我的红岩峡谷做了什么，真恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To think these chem-addled, dirt-fucking jackasses named themselves after the greatest empire in history... ol' Genghis must be turning in his grave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想想看，这些毒品上瘾的混蛋用历史上最伟大的帝国命名自己...老成吉思汗一定在坟墓里辗转反侧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BEE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see Red Rock, and I'm moved to pray... God, in your infinite mercy... please drop a fiery meteor on these animals and give humanity a touchdown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到了红岩，我感动地开始祈祷...上帝啊，在你无限的怜悯中...请把一颗炽热的流星扔在这些动物身上，让人类着陆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BEF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These tents would burn well. Just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些帐篷很容易燃烧，只是说说而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BF0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm usually set on burning, but I'd be content with a rockslide just turning all these goat-humpers into human jelly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常我都是要烧的，但我也满足于让一场山崩把这些操羊的家伙变成人类果冻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BF1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to nitpick... but if I were offering constructive criticism... they should've burned down the buildings... with everyone in them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想吹毛求疵...但如果我提供建设性的批评...他们应该把这些建筑都烧了...每个人都在里面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012C02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think the Legion has some raw talent for mass murder, but they're still in the minors. Really gotta develop their game to reach the pros.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得军团虽然有大规模屠杀的天赋，但他们的水平还不高。他们真的要提高自己的水平才能成为职业选手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012C03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it wrong to burn a guy on a cross? Is that extra bad? Is it mercy? All I see is gray, hard to navigate these moral quandaries out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把人钉在十字架上烧死有错吗？是不是特别糟糕？是仁慈吗？我看到的都是灰色的，很难驾驭这些道德困境。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012C04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can smell the burning flesh, can't you? God, I envy you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能闻到烧焦的肉味，对吧？天啊，我真羡慕你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012C05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did they burn the dogs? Make sure you burn the dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们把狗烧了吗？一定要把狗烧死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012C06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you bring me here to see me burn things? Because I'm filled with a deep desire to burn everything around me... well, more than usual.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你带我来是为了看我烧东西吗？因为我有一种强烈的欲望，想要烧毁我周围的一切...嗯，比平时强。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C1F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those tents... very flammable material. Would be a shame if someone set them all on fire while legionaries slept inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些帐篷...非常易燃的材料。如果有人在军团士兵睡在里面的时候放火烧了，那就太可惜了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any man who wears a skirt is someone I can't take seriously, unless he's a Scot... and the Legion ain't Scots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会把任何穿裙子的男人当回事，除非他是苏格兰人...但军团也不是苏格兰人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we burn all the legionaries on a great bonfire, do you think Lanius could smell their roasting flesh? Let's try it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们用篝火把所有的军团士兵都烧死，你觉得拉尼厄斯能闻到他们烤肉的味道吗？来试试吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Flashbangs, use the flashbangs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闪光弹，用闪光弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BF2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always pictured myself dying gloriously in battle against Chinese commies, not being dissected by genetic backwash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我总是想象自己在与中国共产党的战斗中光荣的死去，而不是被基因恶果解剖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BF3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, ugly fucker, ugly fucker, ugly fucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来，丑逼玩意，丑逼玩意，丑逼玩意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BF4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like coming here, but I'm trusting you. I don't have a choice, but I'm saying the words to reassure myself. Don't fuck this up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我不喜欢来这里，但我相信你。我别无选择，但我说这些话是为了让自己安心。别搞砸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BF5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Primm Slimm... pathetic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 普瑞姆·斯利姆...真可怜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BF6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to open a casino that features human sacrifice in a fiery pit. If it's good enough for King Nebuchadnezzar, it's good enough for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想开一家赌场，在火坑里放人祭。如果尼布甲尼撒王觉得这样好，我也觉得这样好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BF7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never thought I'd think positively about Goodsprings... until I came to Primm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没想过我会积极的看待清泉镇...直到我来到普瑞姆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BF8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not saying we should do it... but if you want to burn down the Vikki and Vance... with everyone barred inside... I'm game. Just an idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是说我们应该这么做...但如果你想烧掉维姬和万斯...所有人都被关在里面...我愿意。只是个想法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BF9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always wanted to ride a roller coaster. We couldn't afford it, always moving around. Dad couldn't hold down a job. You, uh... see any stray dogs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直想坐过山车，我们负担不起，总是四处奔波，爸爸没能保住一份工作。你，呃...看到流浪狗了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BFA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, the Mojave Express... I delivered the mail back in 1934. Roosevelt ordered the Air Corps to take over the service. What a disaster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，莫哈韦邮政...我在1934年送过信，罗斯福命令空军接管这项服务。真是一场灾难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016BFE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Securitrons are so rear-echelon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 电子保安都是后方梯队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00011EDD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gomorrah, now there's a classy joint. Tits and open flame, that's how you do it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 蛾摩拉，现在有个高档的地方了。奶子和明火，就是这样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00011EDE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try me, robot! I dare you! You're Robert House's little bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 试试看，机器人！我谅你也不敢！你这罗伯特·豪斯的小婊子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00011EDF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Securitrons are nancing little pussies! You hear that, you goddamn rolling televison sets? Pussies, every last one of you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 电子保安就是一群娘炮！听到了吗，你们这些该死的滚动电视机？娘炮，你们每一个都是！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00011EE0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ultra-Luxe has a nice fountain. Ever wonder what it would be like to drown a hobo? To hold their face down, watch them thrash? Yeah, fire is better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奢华殿堂的喷泉很美。有没有想过淹死一个流浪汉是什么感觉？压住他们的脸，看着他们激烈扭动？嗯，用火比较好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00012BEC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a boy, I shot sparrows and sold them to an elderly woman so she could feed her cat. I wonder what a raw sparrow tastes like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小时候，我射杀过麻雀，卖给一位老妇人，好让她喂猫。不知道生麻雀尝起来是什么味道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_00012769_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you could burn a historic figure, who would you choose? I'd pick Fred Astaire. Most people flail and scream, Fred would dance! Dance!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你可以烧死一个历史人物，你会选谁？我会选弗雷德·阿斯泰尔。大多数人会乱动和尖叫，弗雷德会跳舞！跳舞!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_0001276A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet Abraham Lincoln was a highly flammable president, what with that hat and beard. Tall, could catch a strong breeze. A little skinny, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢打赌亚伯拉罕·林肯是个非常易燃的总统，因为他戴着那顶帽子和胡子。高大的身躯，可以捕捉到强烈的微风，不过有点瘦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_00016C23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: William Howard Taft, now there's a president that would start a grease fire! Fat bastard would burn hot enough to heat the capitol building!
ESP.TRADUIT: 威廉·霍华德·塔夫脱，现在有了一个能用油脂点火的总统！这死胖子光靠一身肥膘就能烧着国会大厦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_00016C24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I still think our side won the war, technically. Take a boat to China, you're gonna find a bunch of dead commies, nothing left. That's victory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 严格来说，我仍然认为我方赢得了这场战争。乘船去中国，你会发现一群死去的共产主义者，什么都没留下。这就是胜利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_00016C26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear a lot of whining about the war. Personally, I think it was a net positive. We blotted out communism with nuclear fire. Worth it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到了很多关于战争的抱怨。就我个人而言，我认为这是一个积极的结果，我们用核战争消灭了共产主义，值得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_00016C27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes I get a little nostalgic about Alaska. I'd like to meet another communist... shake his hand... and then melt his face off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候我有点怀念阿拉斯加。我想再认识一个共产主义者...和他握手...然后把他的脸融化掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_00016C28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My great passion is human combustion. Two-thirds water, so there's some variability. With Chinese prisoners, 3,000 degrees was the sweet spot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最大的爱好是燃烧人类，三分之二是水，所以有一些可变性。对中国战俘来说，三千度是最佳温度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_00016C29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a real shame we don't have more Legion prisoners. I'd volunteer to serve as warden. I have strong humanitarian instincts. Trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没有更多的军团俘虏真是太遗憾了。我自愿担任典狱长，我有强烈的人道主义本能，相信我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_00016C2A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the fuck didn't you nuke the Legion? You had it... the ultimate weapon, fueled and ready... and you pissed away the opportunity!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈为什么不用核弹炸掉军团？你有...终极武器，燃料充足，准备就绪...而你却浪费了这个机会！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_00016C2B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to go burn some Fiends? Nobody's gonna miss them. C'mon... I know you want to...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想去烧死几个恶魔帮吗？没人会想念他们的。来吧...我知道你想...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_0001D3C9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I notice you've been under a lot of stress. I bet if you burned some homeless people you'd feel better right away. Why not give it a shot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我注意到你最近压力很大。我敢打赌，如果你烧死几个无家可归的人，你马上就会感觉好多了。为什么不试试呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_0001D3CA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to burn a Chow Chow. Besides being Chinese, they're long-haired... practically a quadrupedal matchhead. We should burn one... for science.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想烧一条松狮犬。除了是中国的，它们还有长发...简直就是个四足火柴头。我们应该烧一条...为了科学。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_0001D3CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should set fire to the criers in Freeside. I'm not saying go full barbecue, but just enough to get them dancing and hitting a higher note.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该放火烧了自由城的揽客员。我并不是说要吃烤肉，但只要能让他们跳舞，喊得更响就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_0001D3CC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear there are creatures in the Divide that are sensitive to sunlight... and heat. We should test this theory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说大裂谷里有一种生物对阳光...和热量很敏感。我们应该检验一下这个理论。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_0001D3CD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Historical figures I'd like to burn... not Chairman Mao. No, I'd chain that fat slob to a wall and cook Peking Duck in front of him while he starved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想要烧掉的历史人物...没有毛主席。不，我会把那个胖家伙拴在墙上，等他饿死的时候在他面前做北京烤鸭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_0001D3CE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to shoot fire from the mouth of that dinosaur in Novac. Do it when the kids are around, give them a good scare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让诺瓦克的那只恐龙嘴里喷火。在孩子们在场的时候做，把他们吓一跳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_00020275_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I once burned a hole right through the middle of a Chinese infantryman in Alaska. Big enough for a Jack Russell to jump through, no shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经在阿拉斯加把一个中国步兵的身体烧穿了一个洞，大到可以让杰克罗素梗犬跳过去，真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_00020276_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should take a field trip to Flagstaff. Lots of forests up there. Bet there's plenty of combustible biomass just lying around...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该去旗杆市实地考察一下。那里有很多森林，我打赌到处都有很多可燃生物质...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_00020277_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a confession to make. I'd like to burn down a Redwood. Never seen a more arrogant conifer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有件事要坦白。我真想烧掉一棵红杉，从未见过比这更傲慢的针叶树。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayGener_00020278_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet you'd enjoy some fried lakelurk. Just a suggestion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌你一定会喜欢炸湖沼怪的，只是个建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice view up here. Perfect spot to call for fire on the Fort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的景色很好，这是向要塞开火的绝佳地点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like burning a radscorpion's legs off, then watching it thrash around angrily. Sometimes they try to scoot around with the stinger. Hilarious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢把辐射蝎的腿烧掉，然后看着它愤怒的扭动。有时它们会试图用毒刺四处移动，太搞笑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00016C15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still think it's a bad idea to burn everything down?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还觉得把所有东西都烧掉不是个好主意吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00011ED9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should use the homeless as fuel. I'm nothing if not pragmatic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该把无家可归的人当作燃料，我非常务实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00011EDA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes it's good to lack a sense of smell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候缺乏嗅觉是件好事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00011EDB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A pack of weasels jammed in a cardboard box would be safer and cleaner than this toilet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把一群黄鼠狼塞在纸板箱里，会比这个厕所更安全、更干净。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRegio_00011EDC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you like killing people?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你喜欢杀人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSta_00012721_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSta_00012722_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, we don't have time for that. Let's get moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们没有那个时间。我们行动起来吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was... I was really sad at first, scared. Now I just want revenge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...一开始我真的很伤心，很害怕。现在我只想复仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSta_00012726_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I imagine it’s them when I squeeze the trigger. You ever hate someone that bad?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一扣动扳机，就会想到是他们。你曾经那么恨过一个人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSta_00012726_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I try to avoid it if I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果可以的话，我会尽量避免。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was... I was really sad at first, scared. Now I just want revenge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...一开始我真的很伤心，很害怕。现在我只想复仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSta_00012727_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I imagine it’s them when I squeeze the trigger. You ever hate someone that bad?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一扣动扳机，就会想到是他们。你曾经那么恨过一个人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSta_00012727_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don’t feel anything anymore, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经没有任何感觉了，孩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to know what that’s like. I’m glad it was you that found me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道那是什么感觉。很高兴是你找到了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSta_00012728_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I imagine it’s them when I squeeze the trigger. You ever hate someone that bad?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一扣动扳机，就会想到是他们。你曾经那么恨过一个人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSta_00012728_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There’s no greater thrill than killing a man who’s trying to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么比干掉一个想杀你的人更刺激的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was... I was really sad at first, scared. Now I just want revenge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...一开始我真的很伤心，很害怕。现在我只想复仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSta_0001272A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I imagine it’s them when I squeeze the trigger. You ever hate someone that bad?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一扣动扳机，就会想到是他们。你曾经那么恨过一个人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSta_0001272A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I try to focus on living well and helping those around me. I take no pleasure in killing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试着把注意力放在好好生活和帮助身边的人上。我不喜欢杀戮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... you're not? How did you know Fay? Are you the one who killed her? You try anything, we'll defend ourselves!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...你不是吗？你是怎么认识费伊的？是你杀了她吗？你敢乱来，我们会自卫的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroCo_0001274A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, I'm not here to take you away. What are you doing in Fay's house?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别紧张，我不是来带走你的。你在费伊家干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hobo? We're not hobos, we're... doesn't matter. Are you the one who killed Fay? You try anything, we'll defend ourselves!
ESP.TRADUIT: 流浪汉？我们不是流浪汉，我们是...这不重要。是你杀了费伊吗？你敢乱来，我们会自卫的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroDi_0001274B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You put that knife away or we're gonna have a serious problem, hobo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把刀收起来不然我们就有大麻烦了，流浪汉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? We're not moving in, we're... look, we came to meet Fay, found her dead! Did you kill her? We will defend ourselves!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？我们不是要搬进来，我们...听着，我们来见费伊，发现她死了！是你杀了她吗？我们会保卫自己的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroSm_0001274C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Real estate moves quickly out here. Welcome to the neighborhood!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的房地产发展很快，欢迎来到这个社区！

ESP.ORIGINAL: She was a friend, put her life at risk to help us. Look, we're runaways. Just crossed over from Arizona.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她是我的朋友，冒着生命危险来帮助我们。听着，我们是逃亡者，刚从亚利桑那过来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntro02_00012C12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place... Fay's home... was a safehouse for slaves. Food, clothes, directions... it was all part of a network. But she's gone now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方...费伊的家...是奴隶的安全屋。食物、衣服、路线...这都是一个网络的一部分，但现在她死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntro02_00012C12_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some go to NCR, but others go to San Salvador, up in the mountains. A place of our own, made up entirely of ex-slaves. That's where we were headed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些人去了NCR，但另一些人去了圣萨尔瓦多，在山上。一个属于我们的地方，完全由前奴隶组成，这就是我们的目的地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntro02_00012C12_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you just happened in here... but would you help us? We don't know the way, and I think we're being followed. Please, there's no one else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你只是碰巧在这里...但你会帮助我们吗？我们不认识路，而且我觉得我们被跟踪了。拜托了，没有其他人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntro02_00012C12_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never knew Fay, but I'm not here to hurt you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认识费伊，但我也不是来伤害你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew she had family, but I didn't know the details. I'll have to trust you, got no choice. Look, we're runaways. Just crossed over from Arizona.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道她有家人，但我不知道细节。我只能相信你了，没得选。听着，我们是逃亡者，刚从亚利桑那过来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntro02_00012C0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place... Fay's home... was a safehouse for slaves. Food, clothes, directions... it was all part of a network. But she's gone now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方...费伊的家...是奴隶的安全屋。食物、衣服、路线...这都是一个网络的一部分，但现在她死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntro02_00012C0E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some go to NCR, but others go to San Salvador, up in the mountains. A place of our own, made up entirely of ex-slaves. That's where we were headed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些人去了NCR，但另一些人去了圣萨尔瓦多，在山上。一个属于我们的地方，完全由前奴隶组成，这就是我们的目的地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntro02_00012C0E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you just happened in here... but would you help us? We don't know the way, and I think we're being followed. Please, there's no one else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你只是碰巧在这里...但你会帮助我们吗？我们不认识路，而且我觉得我们被跟踪了。拜托了，没有其他人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntro02_00012C0E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a friend. I helped out Fay's nephew, Michael.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是朋友，我帮了费伊的侄子迈克尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I guess you would've. I'll have to trust you, got no choice. Look, we're runaways. Just crossed over from Arizona.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我想你会的，我只能相信你了，没办法。听着，我们是逃亡者，刚从亚利桑那过来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntro02_00012C11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place... Fay's home... was a safehouse for slaves. Food, clothes, directions... it was all part of a network. But she's gone now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方...费伊的家...是奴隶的安全屋。食物、衣服、路线...这都是一个网络的一部分，但现在她死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntro02_00012C11_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some go to NCR, but others go to San Salvador, up in the mountains. A place of our own, made up entirely of ex-slaves. That's where we were headed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些人去了NCR，但另一些人去了圣萨尔瓦多，在山上。一个属于我们的地方，完全由前奴隶组成，这就是我们的目的地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntro02_00012C11_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you just happened in here... but would you help us? We don't know the way, and I think we're being followed. Please, there's no one else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你只是碰巧在这里...但你会帮助我们吗？我们不认识路，而且我觉得我们被跟踪了。拜托了，没有其他人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntro02_00012C11_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down. If I wanted to hurt you I would've done it already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静点。如果我想伤害你，早就动手了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's how it goes. You missed your calling as a military physician.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，就是这样。你错过了当军医的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_00012758_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're in one piece. Nothing service-related, as far as I can tell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你完好无损。据我所知，跟服役无关。

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Trauma"... fancy word for getting fucked to the earth's core. I was assigned to Camp Yankee, guarding the route between Parker Dam and Blythe.
ESP.TRADUIT: “创伤”...被操到地底的时髦说法。我被分配到洋基营，守卫帕克水坝和布莱斯之间的路线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_0001275B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ranger Hidalgo ran us into the ground chasing after Legion down there. Worst man I ever served under. A virus. Almost drove me to end it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵希达尔戈带着我们在那地方追剿军团，把我们往死里整。他是我效力过的最坏的人，一个病毒，差点逼我结束这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_0001275B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Led most of the combat arms folks on a raid across the river, left Yankee manned by support personnel. Cooks, squints... no trigger-pullers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带领大部分的战斗人员到河对岸去突袭，只留下一些支援人员。厨师，科学家...不扣扳机的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_0001275B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a ruse. Legion swarmed the camp, massacred every man, enslaved the women. We got back to find... what they left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个诡计。大批军团包围了营地，屠杀了所有男人，奴役了女人。我们回来发现...他们离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_0001275B_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After the cleanup and the funerals, I... I found a quiet place and stared at my gun, visualizing how I'd do it. Almost talked myself into it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在清理和葬礼之后，我...我找了一个安静的地方，盯着我的枪，想象着我该怎么做。差点就说服了自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_0001275B_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Couldn't do it. It was the thought of my mom finding out, I think. So I just drank... drank until I was numb and didn't stop. Career was... done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做不到，我想是因为我妈发现了。所以我就喝...一直喝到我都麻木了，也没停。职业生涯...完了。
