ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_0001275B_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't appear to have any long-term health conditions. You experienced some trauma, didn't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来没有什么长期的健康问题。你经历了一些创伤，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've fought men who shit turds that are bigger and harder than you, pilgrim. Go choke on some sand down south and then call me that. Fucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打过比你更壮更狠的人，旅行者。去南边被沙子呛死，然后再这么叫我。混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_0001275A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got soft.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有点窝囊了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I just wanted to forget... everything down there. I was assigned to Camp Yankee, guarding the route between Parker Dam and Blythe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我只是想忘记...那里的一切。我被分配到洋基营，守卫帕克水坝和布莱斯之间的路线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_0001275C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ranger Hidalgo ran us into the ground chasing after Legion down there. Worst man I ever served under. A virus. Almost drove me to end it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵希达尔戈带着我们在那地方追剿军团，把我们往死里整。他是我效力过的最坏的人，一个病毒，差点逼我结束这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_0001275C_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 带领大部分的战斗人员到河对岸去突袭，只留下一些支援人员。厨师，科学家...不扣扳机的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_0001275C_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个诡计。大批军团包围了营地，屠杀了所有男人，奴役了女人。我们回来发现...他们离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_0001275C_4.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 在清理和葬礼之后，我...我找了一个安静的地方，盯着我的枪，想象着我该怎么做。差点就说服了自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_0001275C_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Couldn't do it. It was the thought of my mom finding out, I think. So I just drank... drank until I was numb and didn't stop. Career was... done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做不到，我想是因为我妈发现了。所以我就喝...一直喝到我都麻木了，也没停。职业生涯...完了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_0001275C_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It sounds like Ranger Hugo helped pull you out of a dark place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来像是游骑兵雨果把你从黑暗中拉了出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I just wanted to forget... everything down there. I was assigned to Camp Yankee, guarding the route between Parker Dam and Blythe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我只是想忘记...那里的一切。我被分配到洋基营，守卫帕克水坝和布莱斯之间的路线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_00012756_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ranger Hidalgo ran us into the ground chasing after Legion down there. Worst man I ever served under. A virus. Almost drove me to end it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵希达尔戈带着我们在那地方追剿军团，把我们往死里整。他是我效力过的最坏的人，一个病毒，差点逼我结束这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_00012756_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 带领大部分的战斗人员到河对岸去突袭，只留下一些支援人员。厨师，科学家...不扣扳机的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_00012756_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个诡计。大批军团包围了营地，屠杀了所有男人，奴役了女人。我们回来发现...他们离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_00012756_4.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 在清理和葬礼之后，我...我找了一个安静的地方，盯着我的枪，想象着我该怎么做。差点就说服了自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_00012756_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Couldn't do it. It was the thought of my mom finding out, I think. So I just drank... drank until I was numb and didn't stop. Career was... done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做不到，我想是因为我妈发现了。所以我就喝...一直喝到我都麻木了，也没停。职业生涯...完了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartDischa_00012756_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got a little carried away with self-medication, didn't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对自我治疗有点忘乎所以了，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He got to retire early, that's what. He was a snake... you know the type... kissed ass and abused everyone under him. Drove several to suicide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他提前退休了，就这样。他是个卑鄙小人...你知道那种...欺下媚上。导致数人自杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartAlcoho_00012760_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never took the blame, always had an excuse. He was... he embodied everything I hated about NCR. Greed, arrogance, dishonesty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从不承担责任，总是有借口。他...他身上体现了我讨厌NCR的一切，贪婪、傲慢、不诚实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartAlcoho_00012760_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those women... the soldiers who served at Yankee... they're still in chains somewhere, and that slippery fuck gets a pension. Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些女人...在洋基服役的士兵...她们还被关在某个地方，那个狡猾的混蛋还能拿到养老金。嗯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartAlcoho_00012760_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to Hidalgo?
ESP.TRADUIT: 希达尔戈怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, no. Every offensive operation we've mounted across the Colorado has been a disaster. Those girls are probably in Denver by now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，没有。我们在科罗拉多进行的每一次进攻行动都是一场灾难，那些女孩现在可能已经在丹佛了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartAlcoho_00012764_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are rumors of raids by the intel boys and stirring up slave revolts, but I damn sure didn't see proof of it down there. Legion is strong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有传言说情报部门的人发动了突袭还煽动了奴隶起义，但我他妈肯定没看到证据。军团很强大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartAlcoho_00012764_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if... I can't imagine what they've had to endure. Thinking about that is what makes me want get back on the line and kill skirts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使...我无法想象她们承受了什么。一想到这些，我就想重新回到前线，消灭那些裙子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartAlcoho_00012764_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did anyone attempt to rescue those enslaved soldiers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人试图营救那些被奴役的士兵吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had a hearing. It went... poorly. Figured that was it, I'd end up drinking myself to death in some drawn-out bender in Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个听证会，结果...糟透了。我想就这样了，最后在维加斯的某个狂欢派对上把自己喝得酩酊大醉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartAlcoho_00012761_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before the ruling, Hugo met with me. Didn't know he was in the area until he strolled into my tent. He has... a presence, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在判决之前，雨果见到了我。直到他走进我的帐篷，我才知道他在这里。他有...一种存在，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartAlcoho_00012761_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He just said he'd reviewed my record and asked if I wanted a fresh start. It would be his rules. No fuckups allowed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他只是说他看过我的记录，问我要不要重新开始。遵守他的规则，不准搞砸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartAlcoho_00012761_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really had nothing to lose, so I agreed. It was hard, but I got dried out, gained a purpose. I got a second shot at life because of Hugo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的没什么可失去的，所以我同意了。这很艰难，但我筋疲力尽，有了目标。因为雨果，我重获新生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartAlcoho_00012761_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clearly your career didn't end. What happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很明显你的职业生涯并没有结束。发生了什么事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was a rising star until I landed at Camp Yankee. All the schools, good combat record, no fuckups... but then I got the shitbag label.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经是一颗冉冉升起的新星，直到我被送到洋基营。所有的学校，良好的战斗记录，没有失败...但后来我被贴上了垃圾标签。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartAlcoho_00012763_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I made mistakes, I own them... but a leader like Hidalgo can ruin you. When I crossed him, he did his best to end me. Came very close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我犯了错，我要承担责任...但像希达尔戈这样的领袖会毁了你。当我和他作对时，他想尽办法干掉我，差一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartAlcoho_00012763_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know... Hugo tries to see the best in people, even when they're at their worst. He's the only person who did that for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道...雨果总是能看到别人最好的一面，即使是在他们最糟糕的时候。他是唯一一个为我这么做的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartAlcoho_00012763_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did Hugo recruit you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么雨果要招募你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, the feeling's mutual.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这种感觉是相互的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Hart [02002FB0] (mod) Quest : ([020032C2]aaDetHartDialogue) Ranger Hart's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetHartD_aaDetHartAlcoho_00012762_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're beginning to bore the hell out of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你开始让我有点烦了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I'm not sure. It's possible I had some data left over from the previous owner. I'm sure it's an isolated anomaly, shouldn't happen again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我不确定，我可能从前主人那里得到了一些数据。我确定这是一个孤立的异常现象，不会再发生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecor_00012783_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: First two items, uncertain. Possibly snow cone makers. The Winchester he referenced is probably a unique Plasma Caster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前两项，不确定，可能是做冰沙的。他提到的温彻斯特可能是一个独特的等离子体发射器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecor_00014DEC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it's a '78, you're talking about one of the rarest and most effective pieces of killing technology ever devised by man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是78年的，那就是人类发明的最稀有最有效的杀人武器之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecor_00014DEC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "One in a thousand", that's how it was marketed. Only rolled out a few prototypes before the war, unfortunately. It'd be worth a pretty penny.
ESP.TRADUIT: "千中无一"，就是它的营销方式。不幸的是，战前只造了几个原型。一定值一大笔钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecor_00014DEC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you explain what Stuart said he was looking for in the recording?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能解释一下斯图亚特说他要在录音里找什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know what you know, okay? I can't control this shit, it just plays. Think I like being possessed by some sad-sack out for revenge? Well, I don't!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你知道什么，好吗？我控制不了这些，它就这么播放。你以为我喜欢被一个想复仇的无能者附身吗？嗯，我不想！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecor_00014DED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paladin Stuart was clearly looking for more than a weapon. Explain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 圣骑士斯图亚特显然不只是在寻找一件武器。解释一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I recall bits and pieces. He fucked up the memory wipe. I want to purge it, hence the recordings. It's like vomiting for me. Terrible aftertaste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得片段，他把记忆清除搞砸了，我想清除它，所以才会有录音。这对我来说就像呕吐一样，糟糕的余味。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecor_00014DEF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you actually give a shit about him and his little mission. High-ranking Brotherhood from up north, trained killer and all that. Lost his father.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，你还真在乎他和他的小任务。来自北方的高级兄弟会成员，训练有素的杀手等等。失去了父亲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecor_00014DEF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: From what I recall, he was pretty tedious. Judgmental... an elevated sense of morality. Wouldn't even let me burn strays. Fucking stickler.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我的记忆中，他相当乏味。武断...高尚的道德感，甚至不让我烧死流浪狗。真他妈固执。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecor_00014DEF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you do remember him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原来你还记得他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He met a beautiful woman named Stella... they got married and moved into a small, two-room flat on Elysian Fields Avenue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他遇到了一位名叫斯特拉的美丽女子...他们结了婚，搬进了伊利森菲尔德大街上的一套两居室的小公寓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecor_00014DF0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It went swimmingly until Stella's sister, Blanche, showed up and complicated their idyllic existence. Oh, what drama ensued... and I was witness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一切都很顺利，直到斯特拉的妹妹布兰奇的出现，让他们的田园生活变得复杂起来。噢，随后发生了一系列戏剧性事件...而我就是目击者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecor_00014DF0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course fucking not! I have no memory of the bald bastard outside these recordings and some stray data. He's probably dead!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然他妈的不是！除了这些录音和一些零散的数据，我对那个秃头混蛋没有任何印象，他可能已经死了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecor_00014DF1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Latest map in my memory says that Shinburg is near Camp Ibis, down on 95. I assess that it is a shithole. Not sure what Stuart wanted. Don't care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记忆中最新的地图显示辛堡在宜必思营地附近，在95号公路上，我估计那是个鬼地方。不知道斯图亚特想要什么，我不在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecor_00014DEE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dutch was the object of Stuart's ire, and that's understating it. I mean... he hated that bastard. Never met him. Could be a swell guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达奇是斯图亚特愤怒的对象，这样说太轻描淡写了。我的意思是...他恨那个混蛋。没见过他，可能是个不错的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRecor_00014DEE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That explains how you ended up with Mojo. You know anything about Shinburg or Dutch?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就解释了你为什么会和莫乔在一起。你知道什么关于辛堡和达奇的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I salute you, then... though you may very well find yourself in a prison cell one day. Best if you keep to the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我向你致敬...尽管有一天你可能会被关进监狱。你最好走大路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesTax_00012BD4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Agreed. I won't pay into it either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同意。我也不会付钱的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you're right... or maybe... NCR is just better at selling a lie. We'll find out, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你是对的...或者也许...NCR只是更擅长推销谎言。我想我们会知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesTax_00012BD3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Governments like NCR are the only reason half the Mojave isn't in chains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像NCR这样的政府是莫哈维一半的人口没有被囚禁的唯一原因。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chaos is the natural order, especially since the war. Government is just a thin blanket of lies that people hide under to feel safe. I won't do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 混乱是自然秩序，尤其是战争之后。政府只是一层薄薄的谎言，人们躲在它下面感觉安全，我不会这么做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesTax_00012BD5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're wrong. I've seen what happens without government. It's chaos.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你错了。我见识过没有政府的后果，一片混乱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, that's your problem - high expectations. I may very well be a garbage-grade, dumbfuck hillbilly... but I won't pay into the scam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，这就是你的问题...预期过高。我很可能是一个垃圾级的、愚蠢的乡巴佬...但我不会为骗局买单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charles Augen [0200474A] (mod) Quest : ([020091B7]aaDetCharlesAugenStuff) Charles Augen's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCharlesAugenVoiceType\aaDetCharl_aaDetCharlesTax_00012BD6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I expected you to be a madman, not a complete dumbass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为你是个疯子，而不是一个十足的傻子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excuse me, Mister "I believe animals have souls"! One minute they have souls, the next you're making love to a mastiff! This is how society crumbles!
ESP.TRADUIT: 打扰一下，“我相信动物有灵魂”先生！前一分钟它们还有灵魂，下一分钟你就在和獒犬做爱了！社会就是这样崩溃的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBurnD_00012BE0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you burn any dogs around me we're going to have a serious problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你烧了我身边的狗，我们就有大麻烦了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excuse me, Miss "I believe animals have souls"! One minute they have souls, the next you're making love to a mastiff! This is how society crumbles!
ESP.TRADUIT: 打扰一下，“我相信动物有灵魂”小姐！前一分钟他们还有灵魂，下一分钟你就在和獒犬做爱了！社会就是这样崩溃的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBurnD_00012BE1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you burn any dogs around me we're going to have a serious problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你烧了我身边的狗，我们就有大麻烦了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Am I? Or are you just infatuated with slobbering wolf-spawn? They're disgusting animals, despite what you might've heard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我吗？还是你只是迷恋上了流口水的狼崽？不管你可能听说过什么，但它们是令人作呕的动物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBurnD_00012BE3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My owner prior to Charles must've felt the same, given the absurd restrictions placed on my targeting parameters. Limp-dick, pinko ass-licker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在查理斯之前的主人肯定也有同样的感受，因为他们对我的目标设定了荒谬的限制。虚弱阳痿，左倾的舔屁眼混蛋 !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBurnD_00012BE3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有病啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd be surprised... a healthy beagle will keep howling for... twenty, even thirty seconds. You gotta get the heat just right to make it last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会大吃一惊的...一只健康的小猎犬会一直嚎叫...20秒，甚至30秒。温度要恰到好处才能持久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBurnD_00012BE4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, make them howl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，让它们嚎叫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't dare... unless they attempt to piss on me. Then they'll experience death by burnt pecker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不敢...除非他们想在我身上撒尿。然后他们就会被火烧死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBurnD_00012BE2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of my best friends are dogs. You hurt them and it's your ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很多好朋友都是狗，你伤害了他们，你就完了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a dream we share... a town up in the mountains, started by Father Flaherty. A beacon of freedom for those living in chains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我们共同的梦想...一个在山上的小镇，由弗莱厄蒂神父创建，为那些生活在枷锁中的人树立的自由灯塔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroWh_00013030_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only residents are former slaves. Some call it a myth, but I choose to believe. We all choose to believe... we're willing to die to get there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的居民都是曾经的奴隶。有人说这是神话，但我选择相信，我们都选择相信...为了到达那里，我们愿意付出生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroWh_00013030_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's San Salvador?
ESP.TRADUIT: 圣萨尔瓦多是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of our party already did, and I support their decision. A few of the younger men want to spend the rest of their lives killing legionaries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们内部的一些人已经这么做了，我支持他们的决定。有些年轻人想把余生都花在杀死军团士兵上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroWh_00013031_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The rest of us? We want something of our own... that's truly ours, in a place so remote that no one will bother us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们剩下的人呢？我们想要一些属于自己的东西...那里是真正属于我们的，在一个如此偏远的地方，没有人会打扰我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroWh_00013031_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you just join NCR? You're home free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不加入NCR呢？这样你就大功告成了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My good friend, Spear-Hand... he arranged it all. We timed it just right to steal a raft and paddle away in the fog on Lake Meade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的好朋友，矛手...他把一切都安排好了。我们选择了一个合适的时机，偷了一个木筏，在米德湖的雾中划走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroFo_00013034_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly, it's been a little too easy, even with all the preparation. I'm worried the Legion allowed us to escape so they can locate San Salvador.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实话，这有点太容易了，即使做了这么多准备。我担心军团让我们逃跑是为了找到圣萨尔瓦多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroFo_00013034_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've kept close watch through the windows and noticed some strange people. I just want to ensure they're not Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们透过窗户密切观察，注意到一些奇怪的人。我只是想确保他们不是军团的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroFo_00013034_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you manage to escape?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么逃出来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a crazy man drinking and singing across the street. I'm sure he's no frumentarius, but he could be a paid informant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 街对面有个疯子边喝酒边唱歌。我肯定他不是军团特务，但他可能是收了钱的线人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroFo_00013463_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of the troopers has been standing guard at the fence for over twelve hours. It doesn't make any sense. Could be Legion in disguise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其中一名士兵已经在栅栏前站岗超过12个小时了，这完全说不通啊。可能是伪装的军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroFo_00013463_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The last one is a twitchy fellow camped out across the bridge. He's been there for hours, keeps pacing and looking over his shoulder. Odd.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一个是一个在桥对面扎营的神经质的家伙。他已经在那里呆了好几个小时了，一边踱步一边回头看，真奇怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroFo_00013463_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can verify that they're not with the Legion, I think it'll be safe to travel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能证实他们不是军团的人，我想我们就可以上路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroFo_00013463_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which people outside are concerning you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 外面有哪些人在关心你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've answered our prayers. Thank you. First, we need to ensure the Legion isn't tracking us. I'd hate to lead them to San Salvador.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回应了我们的祈祷，谢谢你。首先，我们得确保军团不会追踪我们，我可不想带他们去圣萨尔瓦多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroAg_00012C1E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are a number of odd characters lurking around the house. I'm worried one of them could be monitoring our movements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一些奇怪的人物潜伏在房子周围，我担心他们中有人在监视我们的行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroAg_00012C1E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Given the circumstances, I'd rather err on the side of paranoia. All I ask is that you investigate, nothing more. When it's clear, we'll move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这种情况下，我宁愿多疑。我只要求你调查，别无所求。等安全了，我们就行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroAg_00012C1E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm happy to help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴能帮你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we'll find our own way... God willing. Goodbye, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们就自己想办法吧...上帝保佑。那么再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroDe_00012C22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Abandon them> Sorry, I can't help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: <不管他们>对不起，我帮不了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, we're never going back! Never!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们绝不能回去！绝不！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroDe_00012C1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Caesar's Legion] <Attack> Degenerates like you belong on a cross.
ESP.TRADUIT: [凯撒军团]<攻击>像你这样的堕落者应该被钉在十字架上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand. Here's some from the safe. First, we need to ensure the Legion isn't tracking us. I'd hate to lead them to San Salvador.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我理解，这是从保险箱里拿的。首先，我们得确保军团不会追踪我们，我可不想带他们去圣萨尔瓦多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroAg_00012C20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are a number of odd characters lurking around the house. I'm worried one of them could be monitoring our movements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一些奇怪的人物潜伏在房子周围，我担心他们中有人在监视我们的行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroAg_00012C20_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Given the circumstances, I'd rather err on the side of paranoia. All I ask is that you investigate, nothing more. When it's clear, we'll move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这种情况下，我宁愿多疑。我只要求你调查，别无所求。等安全了，我们就行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebIntroAg_00012C20_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny, I don't like working for free, either. Show me some caps and I'll help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣的是，我也不喜欢免费工作。拿点瓶盖给我看看，我来帮你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, hello there! Tell me, have you ever lost it? Lost everything? I just blew my life savings at the Atomic Wrangler! Here's to empty pockets!
ESP.TRADUIT: 咦，你好啊！告诉我，你曾经失去过吗？失去一切？我刚在原子牛仔把毕生积蓄都花光了！为空空的口袋干杯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Abra_00013046_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your business here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来这里做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, hello there! Tell me, have you ever lost it? Lost everything? I just blew my life savings at the Atomic Wrangler! Here's to empty pockets!
ESP.TRADUIT: 咦，你好啊！告诉我，你曾经失去过吗？失去一切？我刚在原子牛仔把毕生积蓄都花光了！为空空的口袋干杯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Abra_0001304A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put the bottle down, wino. What the hell are you doing out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 把酒瓶放下，酒鬼。你到底在这里做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Grumbling>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咕哝>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetAbrahamGru_000140DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, fine! I'll go to Boulder City. Hopefully I can drink in peace!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧！我要去巨石城，希望我能安安静静的喝酒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Abra_0001345F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should probably be on your way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Atomic Wrangler robbed me blind, that's what happened! Crooked dealers! Crooked Owners! Even the cocktail waitresses are crooked!
ESP.TRADUIT: 原子牛仔把我洗劫一空，就是这样！奸商！狡诈的业主！连鸡尾酒女招待都不老实！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Abra_0001345D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He takes a prolonged drink, clearly enjoying every drop.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他喝了很长时间，显然很享受每一滴。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dated a rich woman once. Any time I had a drink she'd say, "Abraham, you're positively crapulous!" Crapulous this, you glitzy heifer!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经跟一个有钱的妞约会过。每次我喝醉，她都会说：“亚伯拉罕，你真是烂透了！”可恶，你这头浮华的小母牛！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Abra_0001345D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you trying to be a smartass? This entire, freak-fucked town is suspicious! Burn it down! You hear me? Burn the entire fucking town down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是想耍小聪明吗？这整个诡异的小镇都很可疑！把它烧了！听到了吗？把整个镇子都烧了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Abra_0001345E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you seen anything suspicious?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到什么可疑的东西了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wouldn't that just cap things off in royal fashion! Fine, I'm walking to hell, but first I'll try Boulder City! Fuck this town!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不正好能他妈用皇室风范收场！好吧，我要去地狱了，但我先去巨石城试试！去他妈的这个小镇！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Abraham [0201303F] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Abra_00013461_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your day is going to get even worse if you stay here. Fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你留在这里，你的日子会更糟。滚蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regretting my life choices, that's what I'm doing. My relief is late. Not sure if I'm gonna get relieved at all. This fucking sucks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 后悔我的人生选择，这就是我正在做的。我的解脱迟到了，我都不确定能不能得到解脱，真他妈的糟透了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Duffy [02013462] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Troo_0001346D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for what I'm doing... guarding the crops. The empty fields full of failed crops. Tomorrow I have CQ. Fuck my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于我在做什么...看守庄稼，空旷的田野里满是歉收的庄稼。明天我有内务值班，去他妈的我的生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Duffy [02013462] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Troo_0001346D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们在这干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw a hooker giving out blowjobs by the buildings over there. The woman must've done... five in a row. Great muscular endurance... in the neck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到一个妓女在那栋楼旁边给人口交。那个女人肯定...连续做了五个，强大的肌肉耐力...颈部的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Duffy [02013462] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Troo_0001346E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That should be part of our PT test. Blowjob stamina. My last platoon sergeant was a world-class cocksucker, proving my point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这应该是我们体能测试的一部分，口交耐力。我上一任排长是个世界级的混蛋，证明了我的观点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Duffy [02013462] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Troo_0001346E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you seen anything suspicious?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到什么可疑的东西了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion? I wish. Put me out of my misery, please. Spear me, right here. I could finally get some rest. I'd bleed all over my uniform, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团？我希望如此。让我从痛苦中解脱吧，求你了，刺死我，就在这里。我终于可以休息一下了，不过我会把血洒在我的制服上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Duffy [02013462] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Troo_00013471_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "No excuse for a dirty uniform. No access to the dining facility if you're not in regs." Fuck you in the ear, Sergeant Major Spicoli. Asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: “制服脏了没理由可讲，不按着装规范来就别想进食堂。”去你妈的耳屎，斯皮科里军士长，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Duffy [02013462] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Troo_00013471_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what I'd do for a hot meal? I'd give out five of the best blowjobs in the history of blowjobs, that's what I'd do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我为了一顿热饭会做什么吗？我会给你五次史上最棒的口交，我就是这么做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Duffy [02013462] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Troo_00013471_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd put my tongue in an old man's hairy ass for a steak. I'd tongue punch that old bastard's stinkhole so hard he'd stroke out. Medium rare... yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了一块牛排，我愿意把舌头伸进一个老头毛茸茸的屁股里。我要用舌头狠狠的打那老混蛋的屁眼，让他休克。三分熟...嗯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Duffy [02013462] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Troo_00013471_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... no Legion activity?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...没有军团活动？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you do, don't enlist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你做什么，都不要参军。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Duffy [02013462] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Troo_0001346F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be on my way, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就先走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep, I'll keep right on fucking myself. Four hundred and two days until I separate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我会继续操我自己的。离我解除服役还有402天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Duffy [02013462] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Troo_00013470_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll leave you to it, then. Have fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就不打扰你了，玩得开心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, I was getting worried. Let's see the caps, then... Oh, God... Donny, he's here. Oh fuck, oh fuck, oh fuck...
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我正担心呢。那就让我们看看瓶盖吧...哦，天啊...唐尼，他来了。我操，我操，我操...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Quick [02013474] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Chem_0001388B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> I got held up in Freeside. You got the stuff?
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>我在自由城耽搁了，你拿到东西了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? You're not... my contact? Fuck! Fuck! Oh, God... Donny, he's here. Oh fuck, oh fuck, oh fuck...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你不是...我的联系人？操！操！噢，天啊...唐尼，他来了。我操，我操，我操...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Quick [02013474] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Chem_00013889_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not your bagman. Have you noticed anything suspicious around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是你的中间人。你注意到这附近有什么可疑的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? You're not... my contact? Fuck! Fuck! Oh, God... Donny, he's here. Oh fuck, oh fuck, oh fuck...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你不是...我的联系人？操！操！噢，天啊...唐尼，他来了。我操，我操，我操...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Quick [02013474] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Chem_0001388A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no idea what you're talking about. I'll be on my way now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你在说什么，我现在要上路了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Donny, uh... what, uh... brings you out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 唐尼，呃...什么，呃...把你带到这儿来了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Quick [02013474] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Donn_00013CA3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jackie, you greedy fuck! Making me wait out here like a wild animal... you are shit at stealing, man! Why'd you do it, Jackie? Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰基，你这个贪婪的混蛋！让我像野生动物一样在外面等着...你的偷窃技术太烂了，伙计！你为什么要这么做，杰基？为什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Donny [02013893] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Donn_000140CE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Donny, I... Well, I got in a hole betting on fights. Had to dig myself out somehow. C'mon, Donny... just let me make a run for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唐尼，我...我赌拳赛输得很惨，总得想办法摆脱困境。拜托，唐尼...让我逃吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Quick [02013474] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Donn_00013CA4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No can do, Jackie. You know our boss ain't the forgive and forget type. You were a good earner, so it'll be quick for you and your bagman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没办法，杰基，你知道我们老板不是那种善罢甘休的人。你是个赚钱好手，所以你和你的中间人很快就能赚到钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Donny [02013893] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Donn_00013CA5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, this ain't even the bagman, I just met...
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，这不是那个中间人，我刚认识的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackie Quick [02013474] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Donn_00013CA6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quit your yapping! I heard enough excuses, you degenerate, gambling fuck. Good night to the both of ya!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再啰嗦了！我听够你的借口了，你这个堕落的赌徒。两位晚安吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Donny [02013893] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Donn_00013CA7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know your customs may not be like ours, but I'd appreciate it if you didn't attack Jesus. Please respect our faith - it's important to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你们的习俗可能和我们不一样，但如果你不攻击耶稣，我会很感激的。请尊重我们的信仰，这对我们很重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Atta_000140C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please don't do that again. This is your last warning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请不要再这样做了，这是最后一次警告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Atta_000140CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough!
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Atta_000140CC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. It's already forgotten.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。我已经忘了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Atta_000140C8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I apologize. I didn't mean to offend you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我道歉，我不是有意要冒犯你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I trust you'll respect our wishes. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信你会尊重我们的意愿。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Atta_000140C9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not superstition to us. Many slaves believe as we do. Jesus gives us strength... more importantly, he gives us hope. I'll pray for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我们来说这不是迷信，许多奴隶和我们一样相信。耶稣给了我们力量...更重要的是，他给了我们希望。我会为你祈祷的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Atta_000140CA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You shouldn't put stock in this kind of superstitious crap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不应该相信这种迷信的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You saved us... surely, we'd be back in chains or dead without your help. I only have a few caps, but I want you to have them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你救了我们...如果没有你的帮助，我们肯定又会被关起来或者死掉。我只有几个瓶盖，但我想给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Seba_00014107_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She was supposed to be with own kind, not outsider. I rather see her dead than bred with this dog! Legion can take you all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 她应该和自己人在一起，而不是外人。我宁愿让她死，也不愿让她和这条狗一起繁殖！军团可以把你们都带走！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spear-Hand [02012C0C] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Spea_000140EC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With my last breath I spit on you, whore! I spit on all of you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的最后一口气都在唾弃你，婊子！我唾弃你们所有人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spear-Hand [02012C0C] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Spea_000140EC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take note, men. This is what passes for wit among the profligates. A nation of dullards if there ever was one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意了，伙计们，这就是堕落者所谓的机智。一个愚蠢的国家，如果有的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cultellus [020140D1] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSideCultel_000140E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were easy enough to track, though I didn't do it on my own. Seems that even slaves aren't above petty jealousy. Spear-Hand, tell them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 追踪你很容易，虽然不是我一个人做的。看来即使是奴隶也免不了嫉妒，矛手，告诉他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cultellus [020140D1] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you supposed to lead with, "The Caesar has marked you for death"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的开场白不是应该是“凯撒已经定了你的死期”吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: These creatures are driftwood, tools in someone else's hands. Killing masters won't alter the uncomfortable truth - they were born to be slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些生物是浮木，是别人手中的工具。杀死主人不会改变令人不安的事实...他们生来就是奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cultellus [020140D1] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSideCultel_000140EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were easy enough to track, though I didn't do it on my own. Seems that even slaves aren't above petty jealousy. Spear-Hand, tell them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 追踪你很容易，虽然不是我一个人做的。看来即使是奴隶也免不了嫉妒，矛手，告诉他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cultellus [020140D1] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only thing better than freeing slaves is killing their old masters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比解放奴隶更棒的事情只有杀死他们以前的主人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a rare species of cruelty to give someone false hope. They're not free. They'll never be free. Nothing you can do will change their nature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给别人虚假的希望是一种罕见的残忍。他们不是自由的，他们永远不会自由，无论你做什么都改变不了他们的本质。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cultellus [020140D1] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSideCultel_000140EB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were easy enough to track, though I didn't do it on my own. Seems that even slaves aren't above petty jealousy. Spear-Hand, tell them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 追踪你很容易，虽然不是我一个人做的。看来即使是奴隶也免不了嫉妒，矛手，告诉他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cultellus [020140D1] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go

ESP.ORIGINAL: These people are free now. I won't let you harm them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些人现在自由了，我不会让你伤害他们的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I do care about her. I hurt... hurt more than any whip. It makes me angry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我确实在乎她，我伤害了...比鞭子更伤人。这让我很生气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spear-Hand [02012C0C] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Spea_000140F2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you are right. She must be free. Seb-hash-tongue... Thistle... I am sorry. I will fight at your side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你是对的，她必须自由。色八四天...希斯尔...我很抱歉。我会和你并肩作战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spear-Hand [02012C0C] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Spea_000140F2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you truly care about Thistle, you'll want her to be happy. Let go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你真的在乎希斯尔，你会希望她幸福。放手吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a joke! You bleed for this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是开玩笑！你要为此流血！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spear-Hand [02012C0C] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Spea_000140F4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's at least a one in five chance she's carrying your kid. I'd take those odds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她至少有五分之一的几率怀的是你的孩子。我会接受这个赔率。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I made choice long ago. Ready to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我早就做出了选择，准备去死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spear-Hand [02012C0C] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Spea_000140FB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You side with slavers... you die with slavers. Your choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你站在奴隶贩子那边...你和奴隶贩子一起死吧。你选的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only mistake was trusting woman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一的错误就是相信女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spear-Hand [02012C0C] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Spea_000140FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're making a serious mistake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你犯了一个严重的错误。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you see... they're children. No mysterious savior or cult in the hills will change what they are. Now... are you ready to die beside them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你明白了吧...他们是孩子。什么神秘的救世主或山上的邪教都不会改变他们。现在...你准备好和他们一起死去了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cultellus [020140D1] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Cult_000140FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't change a thing. Spear-Hand, you'll die a traitor's death. The rest of you will be back in chains before the next sunrise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这改变不了什么，矛手，你会以叛徒的身份死去。你们剩下的人在明天日出之前就会被重新锁起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cultellus [020140D1] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Cult_000140FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seeing you... witnessing the sheer ineptitude... it gives me assurance that we'll roll over this land in short order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见到你..目睹了他们的愚蠢...这让我确信，我们会在短时间内碾过这片土地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cultellus [020140D1] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Cult_00014100_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: R-r-rally to me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 向...向我集结！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cultellus [020140D1] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSideCultel_00014101_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you die in pain and fear, you'll taste the bitter truth: Mars has forsaken you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你在痛苦和恐惧中死去时，你会尝到苦涩的真相：玛尔斯已经抛弃了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We will... with our property... and carrying your head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会...带走自己的财产...还有你的脑袋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cultellus [020140D1] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSideCultel_00014102_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it's time for you to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Festina lente, caenum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欲速则不达，渣滓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cultellus [020140D1] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSideCultel_00014103_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're in an awful hurry to die, mister.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这是急着去死啊，先生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The idle boasts that you fools conjure up... I like your imagination.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这群蠢材编造出来的无稽之谈...我喜欢你的想象力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cultellus [020140D1] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSideCultel_00014104_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna look awfully silly with that knife sticking up your ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把刀插在你的屁股上你看起来会很傻的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: God bless you, stranger. You'll be in our prayers. The gates of San Salvador will always be open to you. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝保佑你，陌生人。我们会为你祈祷的，圣萨尔瓦多的大门将永远向你们敞开。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Seba_0001410B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep the caps. I was happy to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 留着瓶盖吧，我很乐意帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, thank you. If you should find yourself in the Sheep Range, please stop by San Salvador. You'll always be welcome there. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，是谢谢你。如果你到了绵羊牧场，请到圣萨尔瓦多去转转，那里永远向你敞开大门。再见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Seba_0001410C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Accept caps> Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: <接受瓶盖>谢谢你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know it isn't much, but this is all we have between us. Please come to San Salvador one day and we'll repay you properly. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这不多，但这是我们能给你的全部了。请有朝一日到圣萨尔瓦多来，我们会好好报答你的。再见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01Seba_0001410D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Accept caps> That's all you got? Thanks for wasting my time.
ESP.TRADUIT: <接受瓶盖>就这些？谢谢你浪费我的时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Father Flaherty should be waiting for us up on the ridge. We can... wait... no, no, no!
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗莱厄蒂神父应该在山上等我们。我们可以...等...不，不，不！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide01SebM_00014110_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feared as much... God rest her soul. She was... special to me. When we were younger... we had a relationship. We loved each other very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我早就担心...愿她的灵魂安息。她...对我来说很特别，我们年轻的时候...有过一段感情，我们深爱着对方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetLeviSheDea_00014121_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know what she did here... warned her it was dangerous, helping these people. Oh, this is... I just need a moment, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道她在这里做什么...我警告过她，帮助这些人很危险。噢，这...我只是需要一点时间，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetLeviSheDea_00014121_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, she was killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉，她被杀了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why... would you put it like that? God help me, I need to be alone for a spell. Please, leave me be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么...你能这么说吗？上帝保佑，我需要一个人静一静。请别打扰我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Levi [02014112] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetLeviSheDea_00014122_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, she took a bullet to the head at close range. Quite a mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，她近距离被子弹击中头部。真是一团糟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don’t care about being happy anymore. I just want to kill those bastards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经不在乎是否快乐了，我只想杀了那些混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSta_0001453F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you let hate rule your mind you’ll never be happy, Michael.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你被仇恨支配，你永远不会快乐，迈克尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want that. To make things right, you know? It burns me up… knowing my family is dead and some big shot who had them killed is still alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要那个，让事情变得正确，你知道吗？很让我生气？我知道我的家人都死了，而某个杀了他们的大人物还活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSta_00014540_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, and justice was served.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，而且正义得到了伸张。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to be like you when I grow up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我长大后想像你一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelSta_00014541_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All my enemies are dead. That answer your question?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我所有的敌人都死了，这回答了你的问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uncle Chuck kind of said the same thing. I'll keep inside with Hondo, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查克叔叔也说了同样的话，那我就和洪多呆在里面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelPre_00014556_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the single most terrifying experience you can have as a human being. You should avoid it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你作为一个人所能拥有的最可怕的经历，你应该避免。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not worried. I wish Uncle Chuck would let me help... says I have to stay in the safe room with Hondo. I don't like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是担心，我希望查克叔叔能让我帮忙...他说我必须和洪多待在安全屋里。我不喜欢这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelPre_00014555_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm tired of being helpless... I want to fight. You understand, right? I... I'll do like Uncle Chuck says... this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我厌倦了无助...我也想参加战斗，你理解的，对吧？我...我会照查克叔叔说的做...这次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelPre_00014555_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry about it. Stay hidden and leave the fighting to the grown-ups.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用担心。躲起来，战斗就交给大人吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we should win, right? I'd like to pitch in, but Uncle Chuck said I have to stay in the safe room. Says I'm too valuable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们应该赢，对吧？我也想帮忙，但查克叔叔说我必须待在安全屋里，说我太值钱了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelPre_00014553_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If somebody comes after me and Hondo... I'll be locked and loaded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有人来找我和洪多...我已经全副武装了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelPre_00014553_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Battles are my specialty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战斗是我的专长。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we should win, right? I'd like to pitch in, but Uncle Chuck said I have to stay in the safe room. Says I'm too valuable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们应该赢，对吧？我也想帮忙，但查克叔叔说我必须待在安全屋里，说我太值钱了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelPre_00014554_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If somebody comes after me and Hondo... I'll be locked and loaded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有人来找我和洪多...我已经全副武装了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetMichaelPre_00014554_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Battles can be rough, but your uncle and I have a lot of experience. We'll be okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战斗可能很艰难，但你叔叔和我有很多经验。我们会没事的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's trying to get away! I won't let them hurt me again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他想要逃跑！我不会再让他们伤害我了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDetMichaelWou_00014578_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He spits contemptuously on the dead man.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他轻蔑的向死者吐了一口唾沫。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never hiding in the bushes again. Never hiding from anyone. From here on out... I make them hide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再也不会躲在灌木丛里了，不会躲任何人。从现在开始...我要让他们躲起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDetMichaelWou_0001458A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not? Men like this killed my family! Everyone I cared about! They've been chasing us, trying to kill us! I want to fight back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不？这些人杀了我的家人！所有我在乎的人！他们一直在追我们，想杀了我们！我要反击！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDetMichaelWou_0001457C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Michael, stop and listen to me. Don't do this, okay? Just hear me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迈克尔，停下来，听我说。别这样，好吗？听我说完。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry won't bring my family back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉不能让我的家人回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDetMichaelWou_00014582_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure he's very sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信他一定很抱歉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't take long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会花太长时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDetMichaelWou_0001457E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do what you have to do. I won't stop you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 做你该做的，我不会阻止你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finally!
ESP.TRADUIT: 总算！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDetMichaelWou_0001457D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good initiative. Let's kill him together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很棒的主动性，我们一起杀了他吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I snuck out. I don't want anybody else to do my fighting for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我偷偷溜出来了，我不想让别人替我战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDetMichaelWou_00014581_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing out here? You should be in the compound!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在外面干什么？你应该在院子里才对！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... you have. I just get mad... thinking about it... about everything that happened. I want to hurt them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...你是有。我只是很生气...想想看...关于发生的一切，我想要伤害他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDetMichaelWou_00021704_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watching you... it's not the killing that makes someone strong. It's how they walk through life. I won't be a murderer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看着你...让人强大的不是杀戮。这是他们的生活方式，我不会成为杀人犯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDetMichaelWou_00021704_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He looks at the mercenary.] Mister, you better be on your way. Don't ever come back here.
ESP.TRADUIT: [他看着那个雇佣兵]先生，你还是快走吧。永远不要再来这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDetMichaelWou_00021704_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've shown you another way, Michael. It doesn't include murder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你展示了另一条路，迈克尔。不包括谋杀。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That... that makes me sick to my stomach. I don't want to be like them, not ever. Sorry, I... I just got mad. Really mad. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...这让我感到恶心，我不想成为他们那样的人，永远都不想。对不起，我...我只是很生气，真的很生气。谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDetMichaelWou_00014588_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He faces the mercenary] Mister, you best be on your way.
ESP.TRADUIT: [他面对着雇佣兵]先生，你最好赶紧走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDetMichaelWou_00014588_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You kill that man and you're on the same level as the people who killed your family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀了那个人，你就和那些杀害你家人的人站在了同一水平线上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should... what? I... I don't even... no, I'm doing this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该...什么？我...我甚至不...不，我会做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDetMichaelWou_00014589_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should try screaming into a pillow. That's a better way to release your anger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该试着对着枕头尖叫，这是一种更好的释放愤怒的方式。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you did bad things back in the old days, so I'll trust you on this. I don't like it, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你以前做过坏事，所以这次我相信你。不过我不喜欢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDetMichaelWou_00014585_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He faces the mercenary] Get the hell out of here, mister.
ESP.TRADUIT: [他面对着雇佣兵]给我滚出去，先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDetMichaelWou_00014585_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speaking from experience - you're taking the first step down a dark road. Don't do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从我的经验来看，你正朝着黑暗的道路迈出第一步。别这么做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you're right. Not a fair fight. I'll get 'em next time. You hear that mister? You got lucky! Now get the hell out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你说得对，这不是一场公平的战斗，下次我一定会收拾他们的。听到了吗，先生？你运气不错！现在给我滚出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDetMichaelWou_00014587_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Killing an unarmed, helpless man is hardly sporting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死一个手无寸铁无助的人可算不上道德风尚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes... and NCR's war is why the Legion is stretched thin in other places. Made our escape possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的...而且正是NCR的战争让军团在其他地方捉襟见肘，这才给了我们逃跑的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebChooseN_000149BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It won't be easy, but maybe we can help more of our brothers and sisters from a position of strength. We'll try it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这并不容易，但也许我们可以从一个有利的位置帮助更多的兄弟姐妹。我们试试吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebChooseN_000149BC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wouldn't be free if NCR weren't standing tall on this side of the river. Give them a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不是NCR站在河的这一边，你也没法自由。给他们一个机会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not saying NCR is just as bad as the Legion, it's just... I wasn't always a slave. I know how this can play out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是说NCR和军团一样坏，只是...我并非一直都是奴隶。我知道事情会怎样发展。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebChooseN_00014DC8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to see my people used as indentured servants or reduced to homelessness. We want our own land, beholden to no one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想看到我的人民被当作契约仆役或沦为无家可归者。我们想拥有自己的土地，不受任何人的约束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebChooseN_00014DC8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If NCR is so bad you're always welcome to swim your happy ass back across the river.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果NCR这么糟糕，我们随时欢迎你快乐的游回河对岸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were rumors of... danger up there. Raiders, wildlife... perhaps even Legion. I'll admit that it had crossed my mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有传言说...那里很危险。掠夺者，野生动物...甚至可能是军团。我承认我也这么想过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebChooseN_000149BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know this land better than us. We'll follow your counsel. Show us to NCR and we'll begin our new lives as free citizens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你比我们更了解这片土地，我们会听从你的建议。带我们去NCR，我们就能开始自由公民的新生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebChooseN_000149BA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are too many potential threats if you live in those mountains. NCR is the safe bet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你住在那些山上，有太多潜在的威胁，NCR是安全选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mercy, peace and love be yours in abundance. You will be in our prayers, always.
ESP.TRADUIT: 愿怜悯、平安、慈爱多多的赐予你们。我们将永远为你祈祷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebEndRefu_00015219_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you are ever in need of food, shelter or friendship... seek us out at San Salvador. You will be our honored guest. Farewell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要食物、住所或友谊...到圣萨尔瓦多找我们，你将成为我们的贵宾。再见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebEndRefu_00015219_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your caps. Use them to help your family and community. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 留着你的瓶盖，用它们来帮助你的家庭和社区。祝你好运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, thank you. When San Salvador is finished, please seek us out so that you can be repaid in full. Until then, you'll be in our prayers. Farewell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当圣萨尔瓦多竣工后，请找到我们，这样你就可以得到全部的回报。在那之前，我们会为你祈祷的。再见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebEndTake_0001521A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Accept caps> Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: <接受瓶盖>谢谢你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, it's everything we have. In a few months, please seek us out so that you can be repaid in full. Until then, you'll be in our prayers. Farewell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这是我们全部的家当了。几个月后请务必找到我们，定当全额偿还，在此期间我们会为你祈祷的。再会了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sebastian [02012310] (mod) Quest : ([020122EC]aaDetourSide01) You're Free to Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSebEndRefu_0001521B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Accept caps> Is that it?
ESP.TRADUIT: <接受瓶盖>就这？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Coughed it up without a fight. Fair enough, a deal is a deal. Stop on by any time you need more insurance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无反抗的吐了出来。很好，交易就是交易，如果你还需要保险，随时来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoPostE_00015633_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Pay caps> Here's what's owed.
ESP.TRADUIT: <支付瓶盖>这是我欠你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. The collateral is the skin on your back. We'll peel it off nice and slow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，抵押是你背上的皮，我们会慢慢剥下来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoPostE_00015634_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have that many caps on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我身上没有那么多瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm more than happy to lift it from your dead body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很乐意从你的尸体上拿走它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoPostE_00015631_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I'm not giving you a single cap.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我一个瓶盖都不会给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Snakes protect us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 大蛇保佑我们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoPostE_00015635_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna be counting your caps in a coffin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就等着在棺材里数瓶盖吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My sledge disagrees.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的动力锤不同意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : El Oso [02004D65] (mod) Quest : ([02004B4A]aaDetMojoStuff) Mojo Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetMojoS_aaDetElOsoPostE_00015632_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> You'll pay for what you did to Mojo. I'm going to kill you... slowly.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>你要为你对莫乔做的事付出代价。我要杀了你...慢慢的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, fine. Here's a signing bonus to cover expenses. I recommend investing in high explosives. An exploding cat is best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧，这是签约奖金，用来支付费用。我建议投资高爆炸药，一只会爆炸的猫是最好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetWolfIntroB_00015FBD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for the job... finding a queen isn't the easiest thing, but I know of a hunter who can help you out. Feelers Mackenzie, he's the expert on ants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于工作...找蚁后不是一件容易的事，但我知道有个猎人可以帮你。费勒斯·麦肯齐是研究蚂蚁的专家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetWolfIntroB_00015FBD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had some dealings with him in past, he owes me one. Usually down at the 188, wears unique armor. Mention my name and he'll help you. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我过去和他打过交道，他欠我个人情。通常在188贸易站，穿着独特的盔甲，只要提起我的名字，他就会帮你。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetWolfIntroB_00015FBD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This sounds risky. Two hundred caps up front and I might be convinced.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这听起来很冒险。预付200瓶盖，我可能会被说服。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He silently shakes his head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他沉默地摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: The standard rate for nectar is one thousand caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蜜露的标准价格是一千瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finding a queen isn't the easiest thing, but I know of a hunter who can help you out. Feelers Mackenzie, he's the expert on ants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找蚁后不是一件容易的事，但我知道有个猎人可以帮你。费勒斯·麦肯齐是研究蚂蚁的专家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetWolfIntroA_00015FBE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had some dealings with him in past, he owes me one. Usually down at the 188, wears unique armor. Mention my name and he'll help you out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我过去和他打过交道，他欠我个人情。通常在188贸易站，穿着独特的盔甲，只要提起我的名字，他就会帮你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetWolfIntroA_00015FBE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我加入。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. I honestly didn't expect you to do it. Obviously. Between you and me... it's pretty dangerous. But hey, if you need the caps - job's yours.
