ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。说实话，我没想到你会做，很明显，你知我知...非常危险。但是，如果你需要瓶盖，工作就是你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetWolfIntroD_00015FBF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'll pass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还是算了吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ants! Impudent, antennaed demons spreading their domain night and day! NCR? Nothing. Legion? Don't make me laugh. Ants are the true threat!
ESP.TRADUIT: 蚂蚁！厚颜无耻的触角恶魔不分昼夜地扩张他们的领地！NCR？什么都不是；军团？别逗我笑了，蚂蚁才是真正的威胁！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163D7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在说什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you've got some bark on your hide and a little squint in the eyes, I like it. You know what they're about, don't you? They want to take over!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你皮糙肉厚，眼神带点狠劲，我喜欢。你知道这是怎么回事，对吧？他们想要夺权！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163D6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, the ants are very active on the lake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，蚂蚁在湖边很活跃。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, excuse me! I didn't realize we don't make time for the greatest threat to human existence - ants! They're right out there, plotting our downfall!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，不好意思！我不知道我们没有时间来对付人类生存的最大威胁...蚂蚁！他们就在外面，密谋搞垮我们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163D8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about we skip past any crazy rants and get down to business?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不如我们跳过那些疯狂的咆哮直接谈正事吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, excuse me! I didn't realize we don't make time for the greatest threat to human existence - ants! They're right out there, plotting our downfall!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，不好意思！我不知道我们没有时间来对付人类生存的最大威胁...蚂蚁！他们就在外面，密谋搞垮我们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not care about crawly talk. Find bug juice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不在乎爬虫说话，找到虫子汁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, and what's the programming? Conquer the earth! Eat anything that moves, including humans! They especially love the taste of kids!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，是什么程序？征服地球！吃任何会动的东西，包括人类！他们特别喜欢小孩子的味道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163DD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got some nerve questioning my expertise. Ants are not to be underestimated, pilgrim!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你竟敢质疑我的专业知识。蚂蚁是不容小觑的，旅行者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163DD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your business here, anyway? Besides scoffing at the hard truths of nature with your so-called facts? What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底来这儿干什么？除了用你所谓的事实来嘲笑自然的残酷真相之外？你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163DD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ant colonies are superorganisms, not a political entity. They're just following their programming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蚁群是超级生物体，不是政治实体。他们只是在遵循自己的程序。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn straight! It's us or them! Ants, scorpions, and don't even get me started on Cazadors! Jesus! I could go all day...
ESP.TRADUIT: 太他妈对了！要么我们，要么就是它们！蚂蚁、蝎子，更别提猎蜂了！天啊，我一整天都说不完...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what brings you out to the 188, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么风把你吹到188贸易站来了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163DF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only good bug is a dead bug.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有死掉的虫子才是好虫子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it? You know I was circumcised by an ant? Giant mandible sheared right through the crotch, snipped off the tip in one fell swoop!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？你知道我是被蚂蚁割的包皮吗？巨大的下颌骨正好穿过裆部，一下子就把尖端剪掉了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163E0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a miracle I survived... jabbed a bayonet right into his brain, killed him just before he delivered the coup de grace. I still dream about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能活下来真是个奇迹...用刺刀刺入他的大脑，在他做出致命一击之前杀死了他。我现在还会梦到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163E0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll never stop hunting them, not ever. So... what brings you out to the 188? Buying forecasts from that weird kid? Prospecting? How about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我永远不会停止猎杀他们，永远。所以...什么风把你吹到188贸易站来了？找那个奇怪的孩子算命？淘金？怎么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163E0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That seems like an exaggeration.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这似乎有点夸张。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it? You know I was circumcised by an ant? Giant mandible sheared right through the crotch, snipped off the tip in one fell swoop!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？你知道我是被蚂蚁割的包皮吗？巨大的下颌骨正好穿过裆部，一下子就把尖端剪掉了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163E1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a miracle I survived... jabbed a bayonet right into his brain, killed him just before he delivered the coup de grace. I still dream about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能活下来真是个奇迹...用刺刀刺入他的大脑，在他做出致命一击之前杀死了他。我现在还会梦到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163E1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll never stop hunting them, not ever. So... what brings you out to the 188? Buying forecasts from that weird kid? Prospecting? How about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我永远不会停止猎杀他们，永远。所以...什么风把你吹到188贸易站来了？找那个奇怪的孩子算命？淘金？怎么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163E1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You tell story about crawlies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你讲讲关于小爬虫的故事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I'll just downplay the single-greatest threat to the continuation of our species, won't be rude... never, couldn't imagine that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我只是淡化对我们物种延续的最大威胁，不会失礼...从来没有，无法想象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So go on... let's talk about your business. Sell me on whatever snake oil bullshit you're hawking out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以继续...我们来谈谈你的生意吧。告诉我你在兜售什么骗人的鬼话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163E2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, whatever you say. Can we get down to business?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，随你怎么说。我们可以开始谈正事了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I'll just downplay the single-greatest threat to the continuation of our species, won't be rude... never, couldn't imagine that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我只是淡化对我们物种延续的最大威胁，不会失礼...从来没有，无法想象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163E3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So go on... let's talk about your business. Sell me on whatever snake oil bullshit you're hawking out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以继续...我们来谈谈你的生意吧。告诉我你在兜售什么骗人的鬼话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_000163E3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shinies first, crawlies second.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先是发光的，其次是小爬虫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the fuck is Wolf?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁他妈的是沃尔夫?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C30_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wolf hired me to collect Fire Ant Queen Nectar. He said you could help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃尔夫雇我来收集火蚁蚁后的蜜露，他说你可以帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the fuck is Wolf?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁他妈的是沃尔夫?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wolf need bug juice. I find.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃尔夫需要虫汁，我找了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the fuck is Wolf?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁他妈的是沃尔夫?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C34_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just tell me where to get Fire Ant Queen Nectar, I'll figure out the rest. Wolf sent me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要告诉我哪里能找到火蚁蚁后的蜜露，我就能搞定剩下的。沃尔夫派我来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the fuck is Wolf?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁他妈的是沃尔夫?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Point to bug juice. I find. Wolf send.
ESP.TRADUIT: 指向虫汁，我发现，沃尔夫发送。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This nectar has a sharp, sweet flavor that elevates a regular babka into something extraordinary. People pay extra for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种蜜露有一种强烈的甜味，让普通的巴布卡变得与众不同。人们会为此支付高价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetWolfIntroQ_00016C32_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You run into purists that insist on chocolate babka being the best, but I think that's a poopy mindset. Nectar takes a backseat to no babka.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会遇到纯粹主义者，他们坚持认为巧克力巴布卡是最好的，但我认为这是一种愚蠢的心态。蜜露比巴布卡更重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetWolfIntroQ_00016C32_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you need this type of nectar? What's so special about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么需要这种蜜露？有什么特别的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry - I know a guy. You could say he's a subject matter expert on this kind of thing. Very reliable. A little crazy, but reliable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，我认识一个人，你可以说他是这方面的专家。非常可靠，有点疯狂，但可靠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetWolfIntroQ_00016C33_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How will I find this nectar?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎样才能找到蜜露呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a bakery in Freeside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 自由城里有面包店？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He runs a bakery in Freeside. You probably know him by a different name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在自由城经营一家面包店，你可能知道的是他另一个名字。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a bakery in Freeside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 自由城里有面包店？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Run cookie shop in bad side. He change name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在坏城经营饼干店，他改了名字。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a bakery in Freeside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 自由城里有面包店？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have time for this shit. He just took over Wolf's Bakery in Freeside. So... nectar?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没时间跟你扯这些，他刚接管了自由城的沃尔夫面包店。所以...蜜露?

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a bakery in Freeside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 自由城里有面包店？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just want bug juice, not talky. He make pie in bad town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想要虫汁，不想说话。他在坏城里做馅饼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I gotta know who I'm working with... describe him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得知道我在和谁合作...描述一下他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C3B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, it's a fine establishment. I'll take you there after we get the nectar for Wolf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这家店不错。等我们给沃尔夫弄到蜜露后，我带你去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I gotta know who I'm working with... describe him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得知道我在和谁合作...描述一下他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Much tasties in shop. I lick the creamy. You try!
ESP.TRADUIT: 店里有很多好吃的，我舔了舔奶油，你试试！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on to your brahmin, greenhorn. He could be anybody. I don't want to go lending out my expertise to some random person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱紧你的婆罗门牛，新手。他可以是任何人，我不想随便把我的专业知识借给别人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you help me find the nectar or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底能不能帮我找到蜜露？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on to your brahmin, greenhorn. He could be anybody. I don't want to go lending out my expertise to some random person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱紧你的婆罗门牛，新手。他可以是任何人，我不想随便把我的专业知识借给别人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You find bug juice or just move lips?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是找到了虫汁还是只是动了动嘴唇？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell no, I've got generations of bug-killing expertise locked up in this noggin. I won't share it with just anyone. Who is Wolf? Describe him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 休想，我脑袋里储存的灭虫技术可是几代人的结晶。我可不会和任何人分享我的成果。狼是谁？说说他长什么样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C3E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll give you one hundred caps right now if you just shut up and tell me how to find the nectar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你闭嘴，告诉我怎么找到蜜露，我现在就给你一百瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on - did you just say the dog was named Kisses?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你刚才是说这条狗叫亲亲吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... impossible. He... he went away, they said he was dead and gone, never coming back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...不可能。他...他走了，他们说他已经死了，再也不会回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C44_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This nectar... is for him? By God, we'll get it. No more questions. I'm happy to be of service! You ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这花蜜...是给他的吗？天哪，我们一定会得到的。没有问题了，我很乐意为你效劳！你准备好了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C44_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Average height, light skin, large beard... wore regular clothes, has a dog named Kisses...
ESP.TRADUIT: 中等身高，浅色皮肤，大胡子...穿着普通的衣服，有一条叫亲亲的狗...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on - did you just say the dog was named Kisses?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你刚才是说这条狗叫亲亲吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... impossible. He... he went away, they said he was dead and gone, never coming back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...不可能。他...他走了，他们说他已经死了，再也不会回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C51_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This nectar... is for him? By God, we'll get it. No more questions. I'm happy to be of service! You ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这花蜜...是给他的吗？天哪，我们一定会得到的。没有问题了，我很乐意为你效劳！你准备好了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C51_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He man-man. Hairy face. Kisses is doggy-dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是男人，毛茸茸的脸，亲亲是狗狗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on - did you just say the dog was named Kisses?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你刚才是说这条狗叫亲亲吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... impossible. He... he went away, they said he was dead and gone, never coming back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...不可能。他...他走了，他们说他已经死了，再也不会回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C45_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This nectar... is for him? By God, we'll get it. No more questions. I'm happy to be of service! You ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这花蜜...是给他的吗？天哪，我们一定会得到的。没有问题了，我很乐意为你效劳！你准备好了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C45_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He looks like a run-of-the-mill asshole. Has a dog named Kisses. What else do you want to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他看起来就像个普通的混蛋，有一条叫亲亲的狗。你还想知道什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on - did you just say the dog was named Kisses?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你刚才是说这条狗叫亲亲吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... impossible. He... he went away, they said he was dead and gone, never coming back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...不可能。他...他走了，他们说他已经死了，再也不会回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C50_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This nectar... is for him? By God, we'll get it. No more questions. I'm happy to be of service! You ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这花蜜...是给他的吗？天哪，我们一定会得到的。没有问题了，我很乐意为你效劳！你准备好了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C50_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Same as all. Furry face. Kisses is puppy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和所有人一样，毛茸茸的脸。亲亲是小狗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, fine. Go on and find your own nectar, pilgrim. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧。去找你自己的蜜露吧，旅行者。好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm done with this shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it's who I think it is... I do owe him one... but I goddamn sure ain't saying his name, and neither should you. Keep it strictly business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是我想的那个人...我确实欠他一个人情...但我他妈肯定不会说他的名字，你也不该说。严格按照业务行事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, who is this guy? How do you know him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，这家伙是谁？你怎么认识他的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Again, if it's him... it's an act. Gotta assume he's retired, trying to start over. Hope it works out for him. I will be keeping my distance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说一遍，如果是他...这是装出来的。我猜他退休了，想重新开始，希望他能成功。我会保持距离。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C4A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll give you a free piece of advice, though - don't ever cross him. Deal straight and stay loyal. Him, a baker. Never would've imagined.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我给你一个免费的忠告...千万别惹他，坦诚相待，保持忠诚。他，一个面包师，从没想过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C4A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you being so cagey? He seemed like a regular guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么这么遮遮掩掩？他看起来像个普通人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you don't have to believe ol' Feelers! I could be wrong, might be a different guy. Maybe "Wolf" is just an old friend I forgot about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你不需要相信老费勒斯！我可能是错的，可能是另一个人，也许沃尔夫只是我忘掉的一个老朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C4B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or he could be the meanest bastard who ever walked across this blasted earth. I'll let you decide. So, nectar?
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者他可能是这该死的地球上最卑鄙的混蛋，你来决定吧。所以，蜜露？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C4B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've dealt with some pretty hard cases. How bad could he be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我处理过一些很棘手的案子，他能有多糟糕？

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, listen up. This ain't no trivial thing, collecting nectar. Stay low, mind your surroundings. First things, first, though - nectar time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，听着，收集花蜜可不是件小事，保持低调，注意周围的环境。但首先要做的是...蜜露时间！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C4C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He produces a container of ant nectar and then rapidly swallows the gelatinous goo. His eyes light up and he begins shaking.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他拿出一个装着蚂蚁蜜露的容器，然后迅速吞下这种胶状粘稠物。他的眼睛一亮，开始颤抖。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, let's go find some nectar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我们去找点蜜露吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, listen up. This ain't no trivial thing, collecting nectar. Stay low, mind your surroundings. First things, first, though - nectar time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，听着，收集花蜜可不是件小事，保持低调，注意周围的环境。但首先要做的是...蜜露时间！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C4E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He produces a container of ant nectar and then rapidly swallows the gelatinous goo. His eyes light up and he begins shaking.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他拿出一个装着蚂蚁蜜露的容器，然后迅速吞下这种胶状粘稠物。他的眼睛一亮，开始颤抖。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We get bug juice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有虫汁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, listen up. This ain't no trivial thing, collecting nectar. Stay low, mind your surroundings. First things, first, though - nectar time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，听着，收集花蜜可不是件小事，保持低调，注意周围的环境。但首先要做的是...蜜露时间！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C4D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He produces a container of ant nectar and then rapidly swallows the gelatinous goo. His eyes light up and he begins shaking.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他拿出一个装着蚂蚁蜜露的容器，然后迅速吞下这种胶状粘稠物。他的眼睛一亮，开始颤抖。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry the fuck up and get on with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈快点干吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, listen up. This ain't no trivial thing, collecting nectar. Stay low, mind your surroundings. First things, first, though - nectar time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，听着，收集花蜜可不是件小事，保持低调，注意周围的环境。但首先要做的是...蜜露时间！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersInt_00016C4F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He produces a container of ant nectar and then rapidly swallows the gelatinous goo. His eyes light up and he begins shaking.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他拿出一个装着蚂蚁蜜露的容器，然后迅速吞下这种胶状粘稠物。他的眼睛一亮，开始颤抖。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: WANT BUG JUICE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 想要虫汁！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you smell that? It's heavy... pungent. Like sugar and tar boiled over a mesquite flame... indistinguishable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能闻到吗？很浓重...刺鼻，就像在豆科植物的火焰上煮糖和焦油...难以区分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersObs_0001706E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm talking about pheromones! That's the secret of the ants, how they mark territory and tell friend from foe. Also marks the queen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说的是信息素！这就是蚂蚁的秘密，它们如何标记领地和区分敌我，也是蚁后的标志。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersObs_0001706E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I can smell that hot-tempered bitch a mile away. John, er, Wolf wants his nectar, he's gonna get it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我老远就能闻到那个暴躁的婊子。约翰，呃，沃尔夫想要他的蜜露，他会得到的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersObs_0001706E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay close, pilgrim. We'll track that saucy gal down shortly!
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟紧点，旅行者。我们很快就能找到那个漂亮姑娘！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersObs_0001706E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Getting closer. You know, sometimes I can hear their voices... when I'm on the nectar. They whisper to me. They tell me the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 越来越近了。你知道吗，有时候我能听到他们的声音...当我喝着蜜露的时候，他们对我耳语，他们告诉我未来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersObs_00017486_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes it... it's too much. Know how I treat it? I crack open the exoskeletons of surly ants, that's how! Come on, we're close!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候...太过了。知道我怎么治疗吗？我撬开了暴躁蚂蚁的外骨骼，就是这样！来吧，我们快到了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersObs_00017486_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There it is! That's the one, over by the rock. See them scurrying about, hauling in extra portions. Queen is eating for twenty. We're going in!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在那儿！就是那个，在岩石那边。看他们跑来跑去，拖着额外的食物，蚁后要吃20份食物。我们要进去了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersObs_0001748A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yeah! Gonna fuck up some bugs! Stay close, pilgrim... but not too close. I'm in a killing mood now. I'm fucking Zeus on a cloud, motherfucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢耶！我要干掉一些虫子！跟紧点，旅行者...但不要太近。我现在心情很糟，我是云上的宙斯，混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersTra_00017078_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Picking up a scent... let's try this route. Multiple entrances, gotta find the right one, see. Can't wait to split their heads open! Yeah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 闻到了气味...我们试试这条路，有多个入口，一定要找到正确的入口。等不及要把他们的脑袋敲开了！耶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersTra_00017079_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, she's close. Sweet, sweet pheromones in the wind... that six-legged hussy is gonna put out that nectar, I know it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，她就在附近。甜美，甜美的信息素在风中飘荡...那个六条腿的贱货会把蜜露酿出来的，我知道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersTra_00017488_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bullshit! It's amazing. Here, have a sample. Shit will turn you into a sexual deathclaw!
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡说！这是神奇药，拿去尝尝。能让你变成一个性感的死亡爪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersNec_00017073_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure that stuff is good for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定那东西对你有好处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Careful? You know I can maintain an erection for two days? My refractory period? Thirty. Seconds. I'm a breeding machine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心？你知道我能保持勃起两天吗？我的不应期？三十，秒，我是一个繁殖机器！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersNec_00017074_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Side effects? How about being able to pull a man's arm right off? I once picked up a fully-grown brahmin! Do I remember it? No, not important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 副作用？能把一个人的胳膊扯下来呢？我曾经泡过一头成熟的婆罗门牛！我记得吗？不，不重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersNec_00017074_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did I get butt-ass naked and helicopter my dick at securitrons? Allegedly. It was all worth it, though. Nectar made me the man I am today!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是不是在安检处光着屁股用鸡巴弄了电子保安？据说。不过，这一切都是值得的，蜜露造就了今天的我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersNec_00017074_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ant nectar can be highly addictive, not to mention the potential long-term effects. Be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蚂蚁蜜露很容易上瘾，更不用说潜在的长期影响了。小心点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Sniffing>
ESP.TRADUIT: <嗅闻>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersTun_000179EC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's close, just head straight down and bear right, that's the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她就在附近，头朝下，向右，就是那条路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersTun_000179EC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Word of warning - this ain't a normal queen. She goes down, there could be a catastrophic release of gas... a fiery fart from the grave. Careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 提醒你一句，这可不是普通的蚁后。如果她倒下，可能会有灾难性的气体释放...从坟墓里放出来的火屁。小心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersTun_000179EC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can hear them... get out of my head, ant demons!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能听到他们...从我脑子里滚出去，蚂蚁恶魔！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersTun_00017A02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that all you got, you wall-crawling, corpse-eating, no-autonomy-having motherfuckers? C'mon!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是你们所有的本事吗，你们这些爬墙，吃尸体，没有自主能力的混蛋？来吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersAtt_00017A05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: More! More, you six-legged monsters! Give me your best shot! I'm going to swallow all your nectar, and you can't do shit about it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 再来！再来，你们这些六条腿的怪物！使出你的全力吧！我要吞下你所有的蜜露，而你什么都做不了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersAtt_00017A06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're some sort of big, fat, smart-bug, aren't you? I... I don't know what to believe... I need it... it stops the pain, the aging.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是某种又大又胖又聪明的虫子，不是吗？我...我不知道该相信什么...我需要它...它能阻止疼痛和衰老。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017A15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't know what it's like... seeing your friends get old and decrepit, feeling your vitality slip away... and don't get me started on impotence!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不知道那是什么感觉...看着你的朋友衰老，感觉你的活力在流失...别让我说阳痿！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017A15_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I need this. I want to be useful, capable, not just another broken-down, shit-eating hobo talking about the old days! I won't do it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我需要这个。我想做一个有用的，有能力的人，而不是一个精神崩溃的，吃屎的流浪汉在谈论过去的日子！我不会这样的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017A15_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, we just finished working together to kill ants. I'm on your side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别紧张，我们刚合作完杀蚂蚁。我是站在你这边的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bugs don't get to make jokes about age! I'll outlive all of them, starting with you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 虫子可没资格拿年龄开玩笑！我会比他们都活得久，从你开始！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017E3B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is just too much stress for your age. It's probably close to your nap time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对你这个年纪来说压力太大了，可能快到你午睡的时间了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna snap off your lying mandibles and mount 'em on my wall... well, if I had a wall. Die, bug!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把你的下颚扯下来挂在我的墙上，好吧，如果我有墙的话。去死吧，虫子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017A11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay back, Feelers. I'll defend myself if necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 退后，费勒斯。如果有必要，我会保护自己的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't get to call me crazy, bug!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别叫我疯子，小虫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017A14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I've had enough of your shit. Take your best shot, crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我受够了你的废话。使出全力吧，疯子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, yes... Momma, rest her soul, always said I had a keen business sense. You're right, by God! If Joh... er, Wolf can start over, so can I!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，是的...妈妈，愿她的灵魂安息，她总说我有敏锐的商业嗅觉。你说得对，天哪！如果约...呃，沃尔夫可以重新开始，我也可以！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017E40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're no bug... and it's clear I have... problems. I just don't know what to do. I... I've always avoided dealing with it. What should I do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是虫子...很明显我有...问题。我只是不知道该怎么办，我...我一直都在回避这件事。我该怎么办？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017E40_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> I'm sure you have talents besides killing bugs. Use your mind, not your body.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>我相信除了杀虫子，你还有别的才能。用你的头脑，而不是你的身体。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't take a break? I need this shit! Every day! I'd be dead without nectar... or I'd feel like I'm dead! I'm not stopping! You hear that, bugs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能休息吗？我需要这个！每天！没有蜜露我会死的...不然我就会觉得自己死了！我不会停下来的！听到了吗，虫子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017E41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You almost got me with your sneaky, bug tricks. Holding meetings in the hive, plotting against me, I know the truth! You can't stop me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你那鬼鬼祟祟的虫子把戏差点把我骗了。在蜂巢里开会，密谋对付我，我知道真相了！你阻止不了我的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017E41_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you just take a break?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不休息一下呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That... that sounds really bad. I'm not entirely sure what it all means, but anything close to "feral" is a bad day. Don't want that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那...听起来真的很糟糕。我不完全确定这一切意味着什么，但任何接近“狂暴”的事情都是糟糕的一天。我不想那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017E3E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're no bug... and it's clear I have... problems. I just don't know what to do. I... I've always avoided dealing with it. What should I do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是虫子...很明显我有...问题。我只是不知道该怎么办，我...我一直都在回避这件事。我该怎么办？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017E3E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you continue consuming nectar it'll end in a psychotic break - you'll go feral.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你继续食用蜜露，最终会导致精神崩溃...你会变成狂尸鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Appetite? I don't give a crusty shit about that! You're starting to sound like a bug again. Give me a reason not to bash your brains in!
ESP.TRADUIT: 食欲？我才不管那事呢！你又开始像只虫子一样说话了，给我个不打爆你脑袋的理由！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017E3F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eating all that nectar is gonna ruin your appetite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吃那么多蜜露会影响你的食欲的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You flatter me, sweetheart. I was a regular Casanova back in my prime. Guess I'll have to make do with what the good Lord left me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受宠若惊，亲爱的，我年轻的时候可是个花花公子。看来我只能将就着用上帝留给我的东西了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017E3C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're no bug... and it's clear I have... problems. I just don't know what to do. I... I've always avoided dealing with it. What should I do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是虫子...很明显我有...问题。我只是不知道该怎么办，我...我一直都在回避这件事。我该怎么办？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017E3C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure you can still hold your own in the bedroom. You just need the right partner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信你在卧室里还能独当一面，你只需要一个合适的搭档。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I thought I could keep it under control, even after I split that feral in half outside Indian Springs. God, I was strong! You're right, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我以为我能控制住，即使我在印第安泉把那狂尸鬼劈成两半。天啊，我太强壮了！不过，你说得对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017E3D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're no bug... and it's clear I have... problems. I just don't know what to do. I... I've always avoided dealing with it. What should I do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是虫子...很明显我有...问题。我只是不知道该怎么办，我...我一直都在回避这件事。我该怎么办？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017E3D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know what it's like to get lost in addiction. I can help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道沉迷于毒瘾是什么感觉，我可以帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, this is going to hurt. I'd rather be flogged than have to get clean. Oh, I don't want to do this... but I will. Thank you. Give "Wolf" my best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，会很疼的，我宁愿挨鞭笞也不愿戒毒。噢，我不想这样做...但我会的。谢谢你！代我向沃尔夫问好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017E43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to get completely clean - no half-measures. The Followers can help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要彻底戒掉...没有折中办法。天启追随者可以提供帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never been good at moderation, but you're probably right. Okay, self-discipline... I can do this. Yeah, this will work. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直都不擅长节制，但你可能是对的。好的，自律...我能做到，是的，这行得通。谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017E44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should moderate your usage. Going completely clean might have negative effects.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该节制使用，彻底戒断可能会产生负面影响。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You calling me rabid? I'll show you rabid, you bug-fucking whore!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说我疯了？我要让你见识一下狂暴，你这该死的婊子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCon_00017E42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> On second thought, you should really be put down.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>转念一想，你真的应该被干掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You either start moving chems, or it's two hundred every week for protection. This is your only warning. Loco don't give second chances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要么开始转运化学药物，要么每周交200的保护费。这是唯一的警告，洛科从不给人第二次机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Freeside Thug [02017E51] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02Wolf_00017E57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want any trouble. I just want to bake in peace. You want some pie? Fresh out of the oven, on the house. Easy, Kisses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想惹麻烦，我只想安静地烤面包。要来点派吗？刚出炉的，免费。放松，亲亲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02Wolf_00017E5B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kisses? Hey, you ever been to Havasu? Done any wetwork? Like... really messy, lots of, uh... kids? You seem familiar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲亲？嘿，你去过哈瓦苏吗？做过湿活吗？比如...真的很乱，很多，呃...孩子？你看起来很眼熟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Freeside Thug [02017E51] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02Wolf_00017E60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must have me confused with someone else, mister.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定是认错人了，先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02Wolf_00017E61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever, get with the program or get out of town. Your choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便了，要么跟上计划，要么滚出城。你选吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Freeside Thug [02017E51] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02Wolf_00017E62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <growling>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咆哮>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kisses [02015F81] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\VoiceDoNotRecordF\aaDetourSi_aaDetWolfKisses_00017E5F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't want any blood on my hands. Got enough of... well, some things should just be left in the past. No killing, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不想让我的双手沾满鲜血，我受够了...有些事就应该留在过去。不要杀人，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_00017E87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: People aren't so rude when they're dead. Want me to make them dead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 人死了就没那么粗鲁了，要我杀了他们吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just locals being greedy. They want me to help them push chems, and I'm not about that. Just want to bake, that's it. I don't want trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是本地人太贪婪罢了，他们想让我帮他们推销毒品，只想做面包，仅此而已，我不想惹麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_00017E85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was that all about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Awesome! This is perfect. Still have to gather more ingredients, but as soon as they're ready, I'll give you a babka on the house. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！这太完美了。还得准备更多的食材，但只要准备好了，我就免费给你巴布卡蛋糕。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_00017E88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I hope Feelers wasn't too much trouble. He always had a tendency to use nectar as a crutch. How is he?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我希望费勒斯没给你添太多麻烦。他总是喜欢依赖蜜露，他怎么样了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_00017E88_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Hand over nectar> Here's the nectar.
ESP.TRADUIT: <交出蜜露>给你蜜露。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, back in the old days... I, uh... well I did some things I regret now. You could say that Feelers saw me at my worst.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，在过去...我，呃...我做了一些让我现在后悔的事情。你可以说费勒斯看到了我最坏的一面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_000180CE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I ain't like that no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我已经不是那样了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_000180CE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He seemed really scared of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他好像很怕你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't mean to be rude, but I'd rather not talk about it. I've turned over a new leaf, and I'd like to leave the past in the past.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无意冒犯，但我还是不愿意谈论这件事。我已经改过自新了，过去的事就让它过去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_000180CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you do, exactly?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底做了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, that's a shame. Did some work with him in the old days. Really passionate about his work. Rest in peace, Feelers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，太遗憾了。以前和他一起工作过，他对自己的工作充满热情。安息吧，费勒斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_000180C9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's dead now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他现在死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? You actually persuaded him to give it up? Feelers Mackenzie, clean. You know what? I hope it works out for him. People can change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你真的说服他放弃了？费勒斯·麦肯齐，戒毒。你知道吗，我希望这能成功，人是可以改变的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_000180CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He had a fit because of nectar addiction. I convinced him to get clean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他因为喝蜜露上瘾而发作，我说服他戒掉了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope it works out. I tried an intervention once. Tied him to a chair and threatened to let my dog bite his... uh, nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望能成功。我曾经尝试过干预，把他绑在椅子上，威胁要让我的狗咬他的...呃，算了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_000180CC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He almost attacked me, but I persuaded him to moderate his nectar use in the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他差点攻击我，但我说服了他以后少喝点蜜露。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need sugar... or the next best thing. Sugar Bombs should work, but I'll need it in bulk. When I came back into town, got a lead on a stash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要糖...或者退而求其次，甜麦炮弹应该有用，但我需要大量的。我回到城里后，发现了一个藏匿点的线索。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_000180CD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice lady named Sparks told me there's remnants of a pre-war distribution center, part of the old Super-Duper Mart chain. It is underground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一位叫斯帕克斯的好心女士告诉我这里有一个战前配送中心的遗迹，是以前顶好超市连锁店的一部分。在地下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_000180CD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She said it's almost impossible to access, but there's a guy in the sewers who can guide you. His name is Scabby O'Hara. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 她说去那里几乎不可能，但下水道里有个人可以指引你，他叫“痂皮”奥哈拉。有什么问题吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_000180CD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the next job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一份工作是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need sugar... or the next best thing. Sugar Bombs should work, but I'll need it in bulk. When I came back into town, got a lead on a stash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要糖...或者退而求其次，甜麦炮弹应该有用，但我需要大量的。我回到城里后，发现了一个藏匿点的线索。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_000180D3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice lady named Sparks told me there's remnants of a pre-war distribution center, part of the old Super-Duper Mart chain. It is underground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一位叫斯帕克斯的好心女士告诉我这里有一个战前配送中心的遗迹，是以前顶好超市连锁店的一部分。在地下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_000180D3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She said it's almost impossible to access, but there's a guy in the sewers who can guide you. His name is Scabby O'Hara. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 她说去那里几乎不可能，但下水道里有个人可以指引你，他叫“痂皮”奥哈拉。有什么问题吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_000180D3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind Feelers. Tell me about the next ingredient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别管费勒斯了，告诉我下一种配料。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Such nice people. I think I'll bake some pie for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么好的人，我想我要给他们烤一些派。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetWolfBark_00017E98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: L'Chaim, dipshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了生命，笨蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetWolfBark_0001E19B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, he's a ghoul trader down in the sewers. Sparks said he used to make runs into the warehouse but ran into trouble. Should be helpful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他是下水道里的食尸鬼商人。斯帕克斯说，他过去经常跑进仓库，但遇到了麻烦。应该会有帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Suga_000180D5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just mention Sparks, he should lend you a hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要提起斯帕克斯，他应该会帮你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Suga_000180D5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scabby O'Hara?
ESP.TRADUIT: “痂皮”奥哈拉？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll need it in bulk, so it's best just to bring the case from the warehouse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要大量的货，所以最好从仓库把箱子带来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Suga_000180D4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, you might recover some other goodies down there. I always had fun in Super-Duper Marts. So many shelves...
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说了，你还可以在那找到别的好东西。我在顶好超市总是玩得很开心，那么多的书架...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Suga_000180D4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I bring you any Sugar Bombs, or do they have to come from this warehouse?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要我给你带甜麦炮弹吗，还是一定要从这个仓库运来？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck down there. Here, take one for the road. Cap says they fight disease. I think they just burn things. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你在下面好运。给，带一个上路，卡普说他们是对抗疾病的，我认为他们只是用来燃烧的东西。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Suga_000180D6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没别的问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He recoils in terror and puts his tail between his legs.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他惊恐的向后退缩，把尾巴夹在两腿之间。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cool Joe [02018DA8] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Sound a barbaric yawp>
ESP.TRADUIT: <发出野蛮的吼声>

ESP.ORIGINAL: <happy panting>
ESP.TRADUIT: <快乐的喘气>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cool Joe [02018DA8] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCoolJoeVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetCoolJoeAni_00019537_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Look downward and speak softly> We're just passing through, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: <向下看，轻声说话>我们只是路过，朋友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He cocks his head to the side and looks at you quizzically, uncertain what to make of your behavior.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他把头歪向一边，疑惑地看着你，不知道该如何理解你的行为。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cool Joe [02018DA8] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: [After several moments he adopts a non-aggressive posture, content that you don't pose a threat.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [几分钟后，他采取了一种没有攻击性的姿势，因为你没有构成威胁而感到满足。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cool Joe [02018DA8] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lean your head back and howl> AROOOOOOOOOOOOOO!
<growling>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咆哮>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cool Joe [02018DA8] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCoolJoeVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetCoolJoeCoo_00019535_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, boy. I don't want any trouble. I'm just here for the Sugar Bombs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松点，孩子。我不是来惹麻烦的，我是来找甜麦炮弹的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [In a dazzling display of canine athleticism, he leaps from the rubble and seizes the baseball middair.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他身手矫健，从碎石堆里一跃而起，在球飞行途中抓住了它。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cool Joe [02018DA8] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: [All his aggression is now diverted into the new toy. He ignores you, content to sit and gnaw on the baseball.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他所有的攻击性现在都转移到新玩具上了。他无视你，满足的坐在那里啃着棒球。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cool Joe [02018DA8] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Throw a baseball over his head> Fetch!
ESP.TRADUIT: <把棒球扔过他的头>接住！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The baseball strikes him squarely in the forehead; he stumbles back, blinks at you with crossed eyes, and then drops dead.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [棒球正好击中了他的前额，他踉踉跄跄往回走，眯着眼睛看着你，然后倒地而死。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cool Joe [02018DA8] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Clumsily throw a baseball in his direction> Fetch!
ESP.TRADUIT: <笨手笨脚地朝他的方向扔棒球>接着！

ESP.ORIGINAL: <growling>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咆哮>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cool Joe [02018DA8] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetCoolJoeVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetCoolJoeDic_00019536_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, you're ugly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，你真丑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? You don't wanna walk around down there, sport! You go down there and you're playing with your life! Your life!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你不会想在下面走来走去的，老兄！你下去是在玩命！你的命！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_00019546_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been living here thirty years, and I'm telling you - you don't walk down there! Wild dogs will kill you and eat you in ten seconds flat!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里住了三十年了，我告诉你，你不能走下去！野狗会在十秒钟内杀死并吃掉你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_00019546_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard you make runs into the distribution center. I need to go in there and retrieve something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你经常跑去配送中心，我得进去拿点东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a very unneighborly way to start a conversation. Why, if I weren't a deacon in Reverend Hitchens' church, I'd... I'd... I don't know!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一种非常不友好的开始谈话的方式。如果我不是希钦斯牧师教堂的执事，我就会...我会...我不知道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_00019547_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In spite of your rude introduction, I'm gonna do you a favor and warn you... do not go messing around down in that warehouse. It's a death trap!
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管你的介绍很粗鲁，我还是要帮你个忙，警告你...别在那个仓库里乱来，那是个死亡陷阱！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_00019547_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wild dogs took over! You walk in there looking for snacks and next thing you know, you're the snack! Over! Done! Blam! Dog food!
ESP.TRADUIT: 野狗横行！你走进去找零食，然后你就知道，你就是零食！结束！完了！叭！狗粮!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_00019547_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can it, zombie. Point me towards the warehouse so I can find Sugar Bombs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 得了吧，僵尸。告诉我仓库在哪，我就能找到甜麦炮弹了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, me and my buddy, Dakota, used to run a little business down here. We'd get goodies from the warehouse and sell 'em on the cheap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我和我哥们达科塔，以前在这里做点小生意。我们会从仓库里拿些好东西，然后廉价出售。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_00019545_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was good times all around... a little profit for us, cheap meals for the poor folk down here. Was saving up to start a real shop outside town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 各方面都是美好的时光...给我们一点利润，给这里的穷人提供廉价的食物。正在攒钱准备在城外开一家真正的店。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_00019545_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But then... the dogs came. Ran off the ferals, almost killed me. I told Dakota not to do it, not to go back. Did he listen? No. Damn fool!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但后来...狗来了，赶走了狂尸鬼，差点杀了我。我告诉达科塔别这么做，不要回去，他听了吗？没有，该死的傻瓜！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_00019545_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One day there's gonna be a reckoning for those mongrels, mark my words. Sorry, I get worked up thinking about it. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住我的话，总有一天那些杂种犬会受到惩罚的。抱歉，我一想到这事就激动。我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_00019545_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You used to run a store?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以前开过店？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't understand! These aren't lap dogs, these are man-eating monsters! They even ran off the ferals! You hear me? Ferals!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不明白！这些不是哈巴狗，是吃人的怪物！连狂尸鬼都被他们赶走了！听到了吗？狂尸鬼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_0001954B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To top it off, you'd have to contend with Cool Joe! I warned Dakota not to go down there, but did he listen? No! Now he's dead! Dead!
ESP.TRADUIT: 最重要的是，你必须得对付酷乔！我警告过达科塔不要去那里，但他听进去了吗？不！现在他死了！死了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_0001954B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No offense, but I've dealt with worse than dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无意冒犯，但我对付过比狗更糟糕的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cool Joe? The alpha, A-Number-1, the big dog, that's who! You meet him once and then you're dead! Dead!
ESP.TRADUIT: 酷乔？老大，头犬，大狗，就是他！你见过他一次就死定了！死了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_0001954C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told Dakota, "Don't open the Salisbury Steak, it'll attract the dogs!" Did he listen? Did he listen? No, he was obsessed with that stuff!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟达科塔说“别开索尔兹伯里牛排，会引来狗的！”他听了吗？他听进去了吗？没有，他对那玩意儿很着迷！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_0001954C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poor Dakota... threw it all away for some Salisbury Steak. To make it worse, the dogs have eaten up so many groceries they're gigantic! Gigantic!
ESP.TRADUIT: 可怜的达科塔...为了吃索尔兹伯里牛排而抛弃了一切。更糟糕的是，这些狗吃了太多的食品杂货，它们体型巨大！巨大！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_0001954C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean... it's a war zone down there. Dogs against ferals, it never stops! Craziest thing you've ever seen, sport! You won't last a minute!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说...那里简直就是战场。狗与狂尸鬼的对抗，永不停歇！这是你见过的最疯狂的事，老兄！你撑不过一分钟的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_0001954C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's Cool Joe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁是酷乔？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are there ferals? Are there ferals? Let me tell you, Cool Joe might be the big shot right now, but the ghouls are still putting up a fight!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有狂尸鬼吗？有狂尸鬼吗？让我告诉你，酷乔现在可能是老大，但食尸鬼们还在奋力抗争！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_0001F200_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a big, bad glowing ghoul down there. Very dangerous for smooth... er, humans. He might have one of the keys. Dakota should have the other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下面有个又大，又坏的发光尸鬼，对滑皮...呃，人类来说非常危险。他可能有其中一把钥匙，达科塔应该有另一把。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_0001F200_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy macaroni, I can't believe you're really thinking of going down there! It's a graveyard! A tomb! A crypt! A sarcophagus! Don't do it, kid!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天啊，我不敢相信你真的想去那里！这是一个墓地！一座坟墓！一个地穴！一个石棺！别这样，孩子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_0001F200_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are there any ferals left down there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那下面还有狂尸鬼吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boy, I hope you know what you're doing. Dangerous place, and that's before you even get to the dogs. You got water, rats and ferals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小子，我希望你知道你在做什么。危险的地方，而且那是在你碰到狗之前，这里有水，老鼠和狂尸鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_0001954D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, that's how I made it work for me. I'm a strong swimmer. All-State, class of 2075! Butterfly, that's the stroke that set me apart!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看吧，我就是这么做的。我是个游泳健将，全州2075届的！蝶泳，那是让我与众不同的泳姿！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_0001954D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He eagerly demonstrates his flawless butterfly technique.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他热切地展示了他完美的蝶泳技术。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, that's how you win a state title, sport! Should've seen me in my prime! Shoulders like a Greek god! Oh, the warehouse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，这就是赢得州冠军的方法，老兄！真该看看我的巅峰状态！像希腊神明一样的肩膀！哦，仓库。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_0001954D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head right in the tunnels, right in the open sewers, then take the ladder to the left. Move fast, it's a war zone! I'm talking Omaha Beach!
ESP.TRADUIT: 向右走隧道，向右走露天下水道，然后从梯子走到左边。动作快点，这里是战区！我说的是奥马哈海滩！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_0001954D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you get into the warehouse, look for Dakota's body. He should still have the key unless the dogs gobbled it up. Good luck down there, sport.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进入仓库后，去找达科塔的尸体，钥匙应该还在他手上，除非被狗吃掉了。祝你好运，老兄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_0001954D_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I appreciate your concern, but I'll be fine. Just tell me how to get there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的关心，但我会没事的。告诉我怎么去那里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big hurry, yeah. Okay, you got it. Swim through the tunnels, bear left. Tough guy like you shouldn't have any problems. Yeah. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很着急，是的，好的，没问题。游过隧道，向左拐，像你这样的硬汉应该不会有什么问题。嗯，祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_0001954E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut up and tell me how to get in the warehouse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，告诉我怎么进仓库。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big hurry, yeah. Okay, you got it. Swim through the tunnels, bear left. Tough gal like you won't have any problems. Yeah. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很着急，是的，好的，没问题。游过隧道，向左拐，像你这样的女强人应该不会有什么问题。嗯，祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scabby O'Hara [020180C5] (mod) Quest : ([0201952D]aaDetScabbyStuff) Scabby's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetScabb_aaDetScabbyIntr_0001954F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut up and tell me how to get in the warehouse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，告诉我怎么进仓库。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for the offer, but I doubt they'd listen. I'm trying to take an assertive position here. Firm boundaries, stuff like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的提议，但我怀疑他们不会听。我想采取强硬的立场，严格的界限之类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001A1CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tail up, teeth out, you know... letting them know... I'll chomp your fucking face off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 翘起尾巴，露出牙齿，你懂的...让他们知道...我要把你的脸咬下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001A1CB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could talk to them for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以帮你跟他们谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good job getting those Sugar Bombs, even with all the goofiness down in the sewer. Only one more ingredient left: Radscorpion Eggs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，就算下水道里有那么多蠢东西，也能弄到甜麦炮弹。只剩下一种食材了，辐射蝎卵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might think this will be easy. I'm afraid not. I'm gonna need Ebony Eggs, pretty hard to find. Luckily, I have a secret weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能认为这很容易，恐怕不是。我需要乌木卵，很难找到。幸运的是，我有一个秘密武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Scab_0001A5E1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scabby wasn't much help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 痂皮帮不上什么忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good job getting those Sugar Bombs, even with all the goofiness down in the sewer. Only one more ingredient left: Radscorpion Eggs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，就算下水道里有那么多蠢东西，也能弄到甜麦炮弹。只剩下一种食材了，辐射蝎卵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might think this will be easy. I'm afraid not. I'm gonna need Ebony Eggs, pretty hard to find. Luckily, I have a secret weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能认为这很容易，恐怕不是。我需要乌木卵，很难找到。幸运的是，我有一个秘密武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Scab_0001A5DF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were some obstacles, but I managed to make some new friends in the process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然遇到了一些困难，但在这个过程中我还是结识了一些新朋友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good job getting those Sugar Bombs, even with all the goofiness down in the sewer. Only one more ingredient left: Radscorpion Eggs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，就算下水道里有那么多蠢东西，也能弄到甜麦炮弹。只剩下一种食材了，辐射蝎卵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might think this will be easy. I'm afraid not. I'm gonna need Ebony Eggs, pretty hard to find. Luckily, I have a secret weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能认为这很容易，恐怕不是。我需要乌木卵，很难找到。幸运的是，我有一个秘密武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Scab_0001A5E0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scabby warned me about the dogs, but I managed to get past them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 痂皮警告过我要小心那些狗，但我还是设法通过了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had no idea... yeah, that merits a bonus. Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完全不知道...是的，这值得额外奖励。给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Scab_0001A1D0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good job getting those Sugar Bombs, even with all the goofiness down in the sewer. Only one more ingredient left: Radscorpion Eggs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，就算下水道里有那么多蠢东西，也能弄到甜麦炮弹。只剩下一种食材了，辐射蝎卵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Scab_0001A1D0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might think this will be easy. I'm afraid not. I'm gonna need Ebony Eggs, pretty hard to find. Luckily, I have a secret weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能认为这很容易，恐怕不是。我需要乌木卵，很难找到。幸运的是，我有一个秘密武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Scab_0001A1D0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I waded through a river of shit, ghouls and wild dogs to get this crap. You owe me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我趟过一条满是屎，狂尸鬼和野狗的河，就为了得到这个。你欠我的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, and I want a time machine made of chocolate pretzels. Not happening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我还想要一台巧克力椒盐卷饼做的时光机。不可能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Scab_0001A5DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good job getting those Sugar Bombs, even with all the goofiness down in the sewer. Only one more ingredient left: Radscorpion Eggs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，就算下水道里有那么多蠢东西，也能弄到甜麦炮弹。只剩下一种食材了，辐射蝎卵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Scab_0001A5DE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might think this will be easy. I'm afraid not. I'm gonna need Ebony Eggs, pretty hard to find. Luckily, I have a secret weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能认为这很容易，恐怕不是。我需要乌木卵，很难找到。幸运的是，我有一个秘密武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Scab_0001A5DE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want a raise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要加薪。
