ESP.ORIGINAL: Flavor and texture. Trust me, it's worth it. You can use generic Radscorpion Eggs if you want a generic babka, but I'm making something special.
ESP.TRADUIT: 风味和质地，相信我，这是值得的。如果你想要一个普通的巴布卡，你可以使用普通的辐射蝎卵，但我要做一些特别的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Albi_0001A9F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you need Ebony Eggs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么需要乌木卵？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't call Scabby a lunatic. Feelers? Yeah, he's a troubled man. But no, I'm not sending you to meet anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会说痂皮是疯子，费勒斯？是啊，他是个麻烦缠身的人。但不，我不会送你去见任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Albi_0001A9F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, this is a Macomber call for Ebony Radscorpions. Very rare, so don't lose it. Here's some rat meat for bait, courtesy of Kisses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，这是用于乌木辐射蝎的麦康伯呼唤，非常罕见，所以别弄丢了。这是些老鼠肉做的诱饵，由亲亲提供。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Albi_0001A9F3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear there's a big momma scorpion up in the Mesquite Mountains. Set the bait, use the call... and she'll be coming down the mountain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说在梅斯基特山上有一只大蝎子妈妈。设置诱饵，使用呼唤...她会从山上下来的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Albi_0001A9F3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me guess - you want me to get information from another wasteland lunatic?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我猜猜，你想让我从另一个废土疯子那里获取信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eager, I like the attitude. Probably hungry for some babka, right? I don't blame you. I'm always ready for babka... always.
ESP.TRADUIT: 急切，我喜欢这种态度，大概是想吃巴布卡吧？我不怪你。我时刻准备着巴布卡...总是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Albi_0001A9F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, this is a Macomber call for Ebony Radscorpions. Very rare, so don't lose it. Here's some rat meat for bait, courtesy of Kisses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，这是用于乌木辐射蝎的麦康伯呼唤，非常罕见，所以别弄丢了。这是些老鼠肉做的诱饵，由亲亲提供。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Albi_0001A9F5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear there's a big momma scorpion up in the Mesquite Mountains. Set the bait, use the call... and she'll be coming down the mountain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说在梅斯基特山上有一只大蝎子妈妈。设置诱饵，使用呼唤...她会从山上下来的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Albi_0001A9F5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just tell me what you need me to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我你需要我做什么吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know it hasn't been easy, but I promise this babka will be worth it. You'll get first dibs... and if you're nice, I might even share the recipe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这很不容易，但我保证这个巴布卡是值得的。你有优先权...如果你愿意的话，我甚至可以分享食谱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Albi_0001A9F4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, this is a Macomber call for Ebony Radscorpions. Very rare, so don't lose it. Here's some rat meat for bait, courtesy of Kisses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，这是用于乌木辐射蝎的麦康伯呼唤，非常罕见，所以别弄丢了。这是些老鼠肉做的诱饵，由亲亲提供。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Albi_0001A9F4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear there's a big momma scorpion up in the Mesquite Mountains. Set the bait, use the call... and she'll be coming down the mountain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说在梅斯基特山上有一只大蝎子妈妈。设置诱饵，使用呼唤...她会从山上下来的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get to the point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说重点吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be all right. I've had worse, though it's been a while. Shot, stabbed, run over by stampeding brahmin, I survived. I'm a big, brave dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会没事的，我经历过更糟的，虽然已经有一段时间了。我中枪，被刺，被狂奔的婆罗门牛碾过，我活了下来。我是一条大的，勇敢的狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001AA31_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speaking of dogs, where's Kisses? I don't see her. I put her outside when I saw them coming, didn't want her involved. Hold on...
ESP.TRADUIT: 说到狗，亲亲呢？我没看到她。我看到他们来了，就把她放在外面，不想把她卷进来。等一下...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001AA31_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you gonna be okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没事吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't want that. I want to leave that behind. I'll pay the protection money or whatever, it doesn't really matter. No blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不想那样，我想摆脱过去。我会付保护费什么的，这都无所谓，别见血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001AA33_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, where's Kisses? She should be back by now. I put her out when they were headed over, didn't want her involved. I swear... hold on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，亲亲在哪？她现在应该回来了。他们来的时候我把她赶走了，不想把她卷进来。我发誓...等等。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001AA33_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These guys are bullies, and there's only one way to deal with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些家伙都是恶霸，对付他们只有一个办法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? I noticed them coming over this way and I put her outside. She should've been back by now. I swear, if something happened... hold on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？我注意到他们朝这边过来了，我把她放在外面，她现在应该已经回来了。我发誓，如果出了什么事...等等。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001AA32_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't see Kisses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没看到亲亲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mister Wolf, Mister Wolf! I have news for you! It's really sad... it's about Kisses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃尔夫先生，沃尔夫先生！我有消息要告诉你。真让人难过...和亲亲有关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Messenger [0201AA36] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02KidM_0001AA39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, out with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，说出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02KidM_0001AA3A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Loco took Wolf back to Pokey's, was gonna keep her hostage. Then someone said you was John Goodman. Everybody got quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 洛科把狼带回了波基的营地，准备把她当人质。然后有人说你是约翰·古德曼，大家都安静了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Messenger [0201AA36] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02KidM_0001AA3B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Loco asked if you were the same John Goodman that dynamited that town in '69, killed women and children. Said it was you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 洛科问你是不是69年那个炸了小镇，杀害妇女和儿童的约翰·古德曼。说是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Messenger [0201AA36] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02KidM_0001AA3C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else did he say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他还说了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02KidM_0001AA3D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Said you killed brahmin, robbed trains, enslaved kids, pushed women down cliffs and used to cut off people's heads for fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说你杀婆罗门牛，抢劫火车，奴役儿童，把女人推下悬崖，还经常把别人的头砍下来取乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Messenger [0201AA36] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02KidM_0001AA3E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02KidM_0001AA47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Said you killed an NCR Ranger in '70, used a flak cannon on bystanders, ran a mercenary squad that executed kids, then said you done a lot worse...
ESP.TRADUIT: 说你在70年杀了一名NCR游骑兵，对旁观者使用高射炮，组织一支雇佣兵小队处决孩子，然后说你做过更糟糕的事...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Messenger [0201AA36] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02KidM_0001AA46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02KidM_0001AA3F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Said you was more cold-blooded than Lanius and that if Loco hurt Kisses you'd come after them. Loco laughed and then he, he...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说你比拉尼厄斯更冷血，还说如果洛科伤害了亲亲，你就会去找他们的麻烦。洛科笑了，然后他，他...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Messenger [0201AA36] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02KidM_0001AA41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02KidM_0001AA42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then Loco killed Kisses in front of everyone, said that he didn't care who you was. Then he put her out front with a sign on her...
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后洛科当着大家的面杀了亲亲，说他不在乎你是谁。然后他把她放在门口，在她身上挂了一个牌子...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Messenger [0201AA36] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02KidM_0001AA43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He put a sign on her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在她身上挂了个牌子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02KidM_0001AA44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, in front of Pokey's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，在波基的门口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Messenger [0201AA36] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02KidM_0001AA45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got a sign on her in front of Pokey's?
ESP.TRADUIT: 波基门口有她的牌子吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02KidM_0001AA48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, sir. Mister Wolf, is it true what they said about you? Did you used to kill folks?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，先生。沃尔夫先生，他们说的你的事是真的吗？你以前杀人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Messenger [0201AA36] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02KidM_0001AA49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's all true, kid. You and the other younguns better steer clear of Pokey's. I'll be heading there soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这都是真的，孩子。你和其他年轻人最好离波基远点，我马上就过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02KidM_0001AA4B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm about to bake... a blood babka... and I need a Sous-chef.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要烤...血巴布卡...我还需要一个副厨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001AA55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ready to bake?
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好烘烤了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001AA55_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about the babka?
ESP.TRADUIT: 巴布卡怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He takes a sustained gulp from the whiskey bottle, emptying what only moments before was a full container.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他一饮而尽了威士忌瓶里的酒，几秒前还满满当当的瓶子现在空无一物。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mine too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001AA56_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blood babka happens to be my favorite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 血巴布卡恰好是我的最爱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, and I'm about to do a lot worse to Moleville.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我要对莫尔维尔做更糟糕的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001AA59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What that kid said... you really did all those things?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那孩子说的话...你真的做了那些事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna kill every last motherfucker in Moleville. You coming?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要杀光莫尔维尔所有的混蛋，你要来吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001AA5A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What exactly are you going to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底要怎么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only thing I see is red... and dead hobos.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只看到红色...还有死去的流浪汉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001AA58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to drown Moleville in hobo blood. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备让莫尔维尔被流浪汉的血淹没，我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They killed Kisses. Kisses. There are no innocents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们杀死了亲亲，亲亲。没有无辜的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001AA57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll help you, but I'm not harming any innocents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会帮你，但我不会伤害任何无辜的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna mop the floor with hobo blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要用流浪汉的血拖地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001C1D8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't go in, boss is giving a big speech. He don't like interruptions. Hey, who the fuck do you think you are? Some kind of tough guy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能进去，老大正在发表重要讲话，他不喜欢别人打断他。喂，你他妈以为你是谁？某种硬汉吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Freeside Thug [0201C1D9] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetSide02Door_0001C1DD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right, Loco. I've killed every type of hobo that's ever walked, crawled or hopped across this earth...
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，洛科。我杀了所有走过、爬过或跳过这个世界的流浪汉...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetWolfThreat_0001C667_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I'm here to kill you, Loco... for what you did to Kisses. Anyone don't want to get killed, better clear on out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我是来杀你的，洛科...为你对亲亲的所作所为道歉。不想被杀的人，最好离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetWolfThreat_0001C668_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're walking out of here. Any hobo takes a shot at us, I ain't just gonna kill him, but I'm gonna kill his wife and all his friends!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要离开这里。任何流浪汉敢对我们开枪，我不仅会杀了他，还会杀了他的妻子和他所有的朋友！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetWolfThreat_0001CA79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You hobos better bury Kisses right! And don't cause problems or otherwise harass traders in Freeside!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这些流浪汉最好是好好埋葬亲亲！不要在自由城制造麻烦或者骚扰商人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or I'll come back here and kill every single hobo in this shithole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不然我就回来把这鬼地方的流浪汉都杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what... you're goddamn right. Let's make a babka!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗...你他妈的说得太对了。来做巴布卡吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001CAAE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're forgetting something - you still have to make a babka.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你忘了什么，你还得做巴布卡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I just hate that Kisses had to die for me to see it. Thank you for your help. See you in the future. Away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我只是讨厌亲亲死了才让我明白。谢谢你的帮助，以后再见，走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001CAB1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: People will always see you as John Goodman. No point hiding it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们会一直把你看作约翰·古德曼。没必要藏起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for all your help. Cap will keep the store going for me. Keep an eye on him for me. See you in the future. Away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你一直以来的帮助。卡普会帮我维持商店的运营，帮我盯着他。以后再见，走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001CAB0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。祝你好运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: C'mon, let's be honest about this... we just killed, like... an entire town? I can't stay here. No chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，我们就实话实说吧...我们刚刚杀了，好像...整个小镇？我不能待在这里，不可能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001CAB2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不必离开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... well, I hadn't thought of it like that. I guess the hobos have been taken down a notch. All right, I'll stick around. Thank you for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...嗯，我还没有这样想过，我想流浪汉们已经被降格了。好吧，我留在这，谢谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001CAB9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Taking out Loco will make Freeside a little safer. Stay and finish what you started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干掉洛科会让自由城更安全，留下来完成你开始的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, that would bring even more attention... and not the good kind. I better get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，那样会引起更多的注意....而且不是好的那种。我最好还是走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001CABA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You just need some rebranding and good marketing. A full-time crier would help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只需要重塑品牌，做好营销。一个全职的宣传员会有所帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can move on, well... maybe I can, too. All right, I'll give it a shot. I will keep that shotgun handy, though. Thank for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能向前看，嗯...也许我也可以。好吧，我试试，不过我会把霰弹枪放在手边的。谢谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001CAB8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Being bad doesn't mean you have to stay bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 做坏人并不意味着你要一直做坏人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do love it... I guess sometimes you have to chance it and follow your passion. Okay, I'll keep baking... but I'll stay armed. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很喜欢...我想有时候你得碰碰运气，追随你的激情。好的，我会继续烤...但我会带着武器。谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001CABB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before you came, the only other food vendor was Genaro. Use your talent to help Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你来之前，只有格纳罗在卖食物。用你的才能来帮助自由城。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That... sounds disgusting. I just... no. It's best if I get on my way. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那...听起来很恶心。我只是...不，我最好现在就走。谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001CABC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: People will embrace you if you just expand the menu a little. I suggest chicken-fried dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你把菜单扩展一点，人们就会接受你。我建议炸鸡狗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess so. All right, I'll stay. Back to being Wolf, though I will keep my shotgun handy. Thank you, come back any time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是吧。好吧，我留下，回到沃尔夫的生活，不过我会随身带着猎枪。谢谢，请随时再来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wolf [0201273B] (mod) Quest : ([02012C15]aaDetWolfStuff) Wolf's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetWolfVoiceType\aaDetWolfS_aaDetSide02Wolf_0001CAB7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Out here a man settles his own problems. You just did that. No point running away now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，男人会解决自己的问题。你刚刚做到了，现在没必要逃跑了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like a prime spot to catch syphilis.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来是感染梅毒的好地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF8C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you entertaining communist fantasies? That's our lord and savior, you fucking heathen! Don't attack Jesus!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是心存共产主义幻想吗？那是我们的上帝和救世主，你们这些该死的异教徒！不要攻击耶稣！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF8D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You keep messing with Jesus and I'll give you a preview of hell, right here in this room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要是再惹耶稣，我就让你在这间屋子里，预览一下地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF8E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your parents failed you. Did you even know your parents? Let me guess, your father was a drunken failure and your mother a godless whore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的父母抛弃了你，你认识你的父母吗？让我猜猜，你父亲是个酒鬼，你母亲是个不信神的妓女。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jesus will forgive you, but I won't. Sins are purged by flame. It's in the Bible, not that you ever read it. Not one for deep thinking, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶稣会原谅你，但我不会。用火焰来净化罪恶，这是《圣经》里的，虽然你没读过。你不是个善于思考的人，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope a swarm of Cazadors butt-fucks you to death, you iconoclastic baboon. Burning at the stake, that's what you deserve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望一群猎峰能把你操死，你这反传统的狒狒。烧死在火刑柱上，这就是你应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cancer. Every time you hit Jesus you're getting new cancer cells, spreading through your disgusting body. By the way - your physique is pathetic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 癌症，每次你攻击耶稣你就会长出新的癌细胞，在你恶心的身体里扩散。顺便说一句，你的体型太可怜了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet you like shitty, communist folk music, don't you? Hairy, ugly women bleating about workers when they haven't worked a day in their lives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌你喜欢共产主义的烂民谣，对吧？一群又肥又丑的女人整天在唱工人歌颂劳动的话，而她们连一天工都没做过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you do this because you were beaten as a child? You blame God, point out the problem of evil, bla bla bla? Get the fuck over it, cupcake!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这样做是因为你小时候被打过吗？你责怪上帝，指出邪恶的问题，诸如此类？小蛋糕，你他妈给我醒醒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Programming... that's the only thing keeping me from turning your face into screaming brisket! Fucking heathen!
ESP.TRADUIT: 编程中...只有这样，我才不会把你的脸变成尖叫的牛腩！该死的异教徒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Burning at the stake... that's too good for you. Impalement, that's what you rate. We need another Vlad in this broken world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 被烧死在火刑柱上...那对你来说太好了。穿刺，你配得上，在这个破碎的世界，我们需要另一个弗拉德。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gonna start singing communist songs now? I'll give you the opening lyrics: WE'RE ALL FUCKING DEAD FROM NUCLEAR FIRE! The end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要开始唱共产主义的歌了吗？我会给你开场歌词：我们都他妈的死于核火！结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "I'm a communist, I attack images of our lord and savior, I'm such a rebel! I want to fellate Lenin's pickled corpse!"
ESP.TRADUIT: “我是一个共产主义者，我攻击我们的上帝和救世主的形象，我是一个如此叛逆的人！”，”我要给列宁的尸体口交！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we were in Alaska I'd just feed you to bears... after I broke your legs, you irreverent suck-storm of shitty living.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们在阿拉斯加，我会拿你喂熊...在我打断你的腿之后，你这个不虔诚的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF9A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder if they'll include this in your biography. Oh, wait - nobody writes books about fucking mailmen, you godless donkey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道他们会不会把这写进你的传记里。等等，没人会写关于该死的邮递员的书，你这个不信神的蠢驴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF9B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Impotent? Look, it happens... but this is no way to vent your frustrations. There's something to be said for handling reversals with dignity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 阳痿？听着，这种情况时有发生...但这不是发泄你沮丧的方式。有尊严的处理逆境是有道理的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF9C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't even damage it, you fucking weakling. For a defender of the workers, you know absolutely fuck-nothing about physical labor. Typical.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都没弄坏，你个孬种。作为工人阶级的保护者，你对体力劳动一无所知，很典型。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF9E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear Beijing is nice this time of year. You should go there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说每年的这个时候北京很好，你应该去那里看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CF9F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should be tied down a force-fed molten lead, right down the gullet. That'll cure you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该被强行灌进熔化的铅，直接灌进食道。这样就能治好你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CFA0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on out, you stinking mutt! I'm gonna burn you down to the pads on your paws!
ESP.TRADUIT: 出来吧，你这臭杂种狗！我要把你烧得只剩脚掌上的肉垫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CFA1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was built for this... this moment. Come out and face justice, you four-legged demons!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是为此而生的...此时此刻。出来面对正义吧，你们这些四条腿的恶魔！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001CFA2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It may not have been clean, but it was spectacular. That should rate an Air Force Achievement Medal, at the very least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它可能不干净，但很壮观。这至少应该获得一枚空军成就勋章。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001D3B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're dead to me. Dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对我来说已经死了，死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0001D3CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, just a few Lakelurks. Nothing to worry... shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，只有几只湖沼怪。没什么可担心的...该死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_00022E32_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not picking up any contamination, so that's a good start. Let's see if we can't find an aircraft.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有发现任何污染，这是个不错的开始。看看能不能找到一架飞机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_00028BB0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can rule out any Legion presence, apparently. Let me burn him to be sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然，我们可以排除军团的存在。让我把他烧成灰确认一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_00028BE4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion are neutralized, and more importantly... we have an airplane! Once we're done scouting I'll help Ace get it operational.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团被消灭，更重要的是...我们有一架飞机！一旦我们侦察完毕，我会帮助王牌让它运转起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0002903B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is what happens when you undercook an omelette. Amateurs. Hold on... you see that blood trail? Might be a survivor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是煎蛋没煮熟的后果，外行。等一下...你看到那条血迹了吗？可能是幸存者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_00029175_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beautiful, beautiful. I'm the next Macomber! Good time to set explosives. When you're ready, we'll start the show from cover.
ESP.TRADUIT: 漂亮，漂亮，我就是下一个麦康伯！是放置炸药的好时机。等你准备好了，我们就从掩体开始好戏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0002B89D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pop goes the lizard! By God, this calls for a toast! Let's see if Ace is ready to fly!
ESP.TRADUIT: 蜥蜴啪的一声！天哪，这下该干杯了！让我们看看王牌是否准备好飞行了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0002BCD0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't... I can't believe it. Ace Yoblanski would never... unless... this isn't Ace... it's a communist impersonator! That's it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不...我简直不敢相信。“王牌”约布兰斯基绝不会...除非...这不是艾斯...这是一个共产主义者伪装的！就是这样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0002C106_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, shit. You'd think these bumpkins could've had the good sense to store giant, greasy aircraft parts in their homes. Let's try the garage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，该死，你可能会认为这些乡巴佬有足够的理智把又大又油腻的飞机零件放在家里。我们去车库看看吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0002C5BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Useless, positively useless. Not a single part. It's a hail mary, but we can try the house over there. Scanned a cellar, might be something there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没用，完全没用，一个零件都没有，真是万福马利亚，但我们可以试试那边的房子。扫描了一个地窖，那里可能有东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0002C68C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, well, well. An Enclave black site? Weapons depot? Laboratory? What horrors shall we find within? Let's find out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧，好吧，英克雷的黑狱？武器仓库？实验室？我们会发现什么样的恐怖呢？让我们一探究竟！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0002C7AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Override: Fishbowl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 覆盖：鱼缸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0002CBD0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Carry on, Private.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续，二等兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0002CBE6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That reactor is a modified PWR. Clean, efficient... and it can be modified to trigger a catastrophic explosion... if someone were so inclined.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个反应堆是经过改造的压水堆。清洁、高效...而且改造后还能引发灾难性的爆炸...如果有人愿意的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0002CC53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0002D538_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to take a moment to recognize Edward "Ace" Yoblanski. A scholar. A gentleman. A pilot without equal. Most of all, a hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想花点时间来认识一下爱德华·“王牌”·约布兰斯基。一位学者，一位绅士，无与伦比的飞行员。最重要的是，一个英雄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBark_0002D552_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Death, be not proud, thou some have called thee mighty and dreadful." Truly, death will never diminish the legend of Ace Yoblanski.
ESP.TRADUIT: “死神，不要骄傲，有人称你强大而可怕。”真的，死亡永远不会削弱“王牌”约布兰斯基的传奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought it best to finish with Ace's own remarks... recorded during our mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想还是用王牌自己的话来结束吧...在我们的任务中记录的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Recording>
ESP.TRADUIT: <录音>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excuse me, wrong file.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不好意思，档案错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Recording>
ESP.TRADUIT: <录音>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blue skies and tailwinds, Ace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 风和日丽，王牌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry up, get the fuck out. This ain't Pan Am, you stinking animals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快点，给我滚出去。这不是泛美航空，你们这些臭畜生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He snatches the Goo Goo Bar mid-air and immediately scarfs it down. His eyes widen with fear as smoke begins to pour from every orifice.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他在半空中抓住黏黏棒，立刻把它裹起来。他的眼睛因恐惧而睁大，因为烟雾开始从每个孔中涌出。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cool Joe [02018DA8] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Toss him a Goo Goo Bar> Here, I've got a snack for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: <扔给他一个黏黏棒>给，我给你准备了零食！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll follow you through the gates of hell!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会跟随你穿过地狱之门！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBurnC_0001D3BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're going to burn anything that moves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要烧掉所有会动的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn, pussyfooting, rule-following bullshit... this is why you never let politicians run a war! This is war, goddamit! War!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，畏畏缩缩，循规蹈矩的屁话...这就是为什么你不能让政客操纵战争！这是战争，可恶！战争！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBurnC_0001D3BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just follow my lead. I'll decide when we get down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听我指挥就行了，等我们到了那里我再决定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're the boss. Just don't go looking for sympathy when those strays rip your jugular out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说了算。只是当那些流浪狗把你的脖子扯断时，不要去寻求同情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBurnC_0001D3BE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut up and follow my instructions. I'm leading this caravan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，听我指挥。我是这支商队的领队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's going to be a four-legged briquette when I'm done with him. Lead on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我收拾了他，他就会变成一个四条腿的煤球。带路！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBurnC_0001D3BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking forward to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很期待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You! You will witness my ascent! The queen whispered in my ear... I felt her caress, the warm embrace of the hive! I can feel it now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你！你将见证我的飞升！蚁后在我耳边低语...我感觉到她的爱抚，蜂巢温暖的怀抱！我现在感觉到了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCra_0001D427_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only then did I hear his voice... the Red Prince... he showed me the future! You are all going to die! Blood! Blood! Blood!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这时我才听到他的声音...红王子...他向我展示了未来！你们都得死！鲜血！鲜血！鲜血！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Feelers Mackenzie [02015FC1] (mod) Quest : ([02012767]aaDetourSide02) I'd've Baked a Babka EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetourSi_aaDetFeelersCra_0001D427_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You better believe it. Still with Crimson back in California, he's doing fine. Keeps that weird dog with him, never slows down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好相信。他还在加州的深红商队工作，一切都很好，带着那条古怪的狗，从不减速。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D85E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reckon ol' Mojo will retire when he's dead. Never met anyone happier running caravans. It damn sure ain't me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 估计老莫乔死后才会退休，从没见过比他经营商队更快乐的人，肯定不是我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D85E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is Mojo still running caravans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫乔还在经营商队吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell, he ain't just running them - he owns them! He and his uncle Art started up Vandelay Imports and Exports. Very successful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，他不仅经营，还拥有！他和他的叔叔阿特创办了范德莱进出口公司，非常成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D85F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They deal in all the usual goods, but also handle a lot of latex for some reason. I hear it's pretty, pretty, pretty good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们经营所有的普通商品，但出于某种原因也经营大量的胶乳。我听说非常非常非常棒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D85F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is Mojo still running caravans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫乔还在经营商队吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure, honestly. He up and disappeared a few weeks back, ain't heard of him since. Hope he's okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实话，我也不确定。他几周前失踪了，之后就没音讯了，希望他没事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D860_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is Mojo still running caravans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫乔还在经营商队吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ran back to the Vipers, last I heard. Can't imagine why anybody would choose that life. Hey, maybe you'll meet her on the road!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最后听到的消息是，她跑回毒蛇帮去了，无法想象为什么有人会选择那种生活。嘿，也许你会在路上遇到她！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001DA03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to Molly?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫莉怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gave up raiding and married Charles, can you believe it? She'll make one hell of a step-mom to Michael. Kid'll be half headhunter when he's grown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放弃抢劫，嫁给查理斯，你能相信吗？她会成为迈克尔最好的继母，这孩子长大后会成为半个猎头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001DA04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They seemed happy, though... even got a kid on the way. Charles Augen, family man. Never would've thought it possible. Glad for 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，他们好像很开心...连孩子都快生了。查理斯·奥根，居家男人，我从没想过有这种可能。真为他们高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001DA04_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to Molly?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫莉怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard she went down south and joined the tribes raising hell around Camp Yankee and Hadleyburg. One hell of a fight down there, so I hear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说她到南方去了，加入了那些在洋基营和哈德莱堡附近闹事的部落。我听说那边打得很激烈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001DA05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tribes on both sides of the river raising hell, fighting each other and moving north to get away from some new group of super-savages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 河两岸的部落闹得天翻地转，互相争斗，并向北迁移以躲避一些新的超级野蛮人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001DA05_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hard to know what's true or not when it comes to the south. All I know is that after that ol' Quemedor fellow croaked it's been chaos.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当谈到南方时，很难知道什么是真的，什么是假的。我只知道在那个老魁梅多死后，一片混乱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001DA05_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to Molly?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫莉怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard from a friend in the Rangers that she's off investigations, ended up volunteering for LRRPs. Very dangerous mission, so they say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从一个游骑兵的朋友那里听说她不再做调查了，最后志愿加入了远程侦察部队。他们说这是非常危险的任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D85A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess she figured she'd make more of a difference in combat than in the courtroom. God help her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜她觉得她在战场上比在法庭上更有影响力。上帝保佑她吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D85A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What became of Ranger Hart?
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵哈特怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Newspapers have turned her into something of a star after nailing Bellek. Heard talk that she might have a future in politics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在搞定贝莱克之后，报纸把她捧成了明星。听说她可能会有从政的前途。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D85B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personally, I hope she steers clear of that rat's nest. Good lady, we need her in the Rangers. Just my opinion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就我个人而言，我希望她能远离那个老鼠窝，好姑娘，我们的游骑兵需要她。这只是我的看法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D85B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What became of Ranger Hart?
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵哈特怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Same routine for Aaron King's band of animals, last I heard. The barons have an attack dog and they're using it against anybody and everybody.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚伦·金那帮畜生还是老样子，我最后听到的消息是这样。大亨们养了条攻击犬，用来对付所有人，一个都不放过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001DA06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Course, karma has a way of getting around. Hear they've had their hands full fighting Ares down south. Could get interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，因果报应总有办法。听说他们在南方跟阿瑞斯打得很尽兴，可能会很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001DA06_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to Rampart?
ESP.TRADUIT: 壁垒怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aaron King might not be on trial yet, but the Rampart brand is officially toast. Most of the barons and big companies have dumped them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚伦·金可能还没有受审，但壁垒的品牌已经正式完蛋了。大多数大亨和大公司都抛弃了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001DD51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They still have a market for dirty work against the muties down south, but they're bleeding talent left and right to other firms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们仍然有市场来做一些肮脏的工作来对付南方的叛乱分子，但他们正在向其他公司大量流失人才。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001DD51_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not sure how Aaron King isn't in prison. Reckon he has dirt on the right people, or he's too useful fighting the insurgents down south. We'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道亚伦·金怎么会没进监狱，我想他掌握了正确的人的黑材料，或者他在南部的叛乱中太有用了。我们拭目以待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001DD51_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to Rampart?
ESP.TRADUIT: 壁垒怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fell off the map by all accounts. Some say he went looking for Will Botten, others say he just retired someplace quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大家都说他已经销声匿迹了。有人说他去找威尔·博腾了，也有人说他只是在一个安静的地方退休了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001DD52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's also a story that some tribals caught up with him and ripped him to pieces. Fanciful, but I like that outcome. Probably died on the toilet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有一种说法是，一些部落的人追上了他，把他撕成了碎片，很梦幻，但我喜欢这样的结果。可能死在马桶上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001DD52_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any chance you know what became of John Sharp?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道约翰·夏普后来怎么样了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dead. He was leading Rampart's ops against Ares, got caught up in one hell of a guerrilla war with the muties. They got him in an ambush.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死了。他当时正率领壁垒部队对抗阿瑞斯，被卷入了一场与叛军的游击战，他们伏击了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001DD53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Story goes that Ares publically tortured Sharp to death in front of his troops... apparently to raise morale. Took their time with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说阿瑞斯在他的军队面前当众将夏普折磨致死...显然是为了鼓舞士气。他们花了很多时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001DD53_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR patrol found Sharp's skinned corpse the next week. Good rule of thumb... don't get captured by Ares.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR巡逻队在第二周发现了夏普被剥了皮的尸体。很好的经验法则...不要被阿瑞斯俘获。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001DD53_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any chance you know what became of John Sharp?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道约翰·夏普后来怎么样了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a trial that was... Bellek bought up the fanciest defense attornies in Shady, didn't make no difference. Prosecutor nailed his ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一场怎样的审判啊...贝莱克买通了沙荫镇最优秀的辩护律师，也没起什么作用。检察官抓住了他的把柄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D853_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too much evidence, not to mention going after NCR officials. Conspiracy, murder, fraud, everything under sun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 证据太多了，更别提要对付NCR的官员了。阴谋，谋杀，欺诈，一切皆有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D853_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the trial went south he took a plea deal. He won't hang, but he ain't leaving prison unless he lives to be three hundred and fifty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 审判失败后，他接受了认罪协议。他不会被绞死，但除非他活到三百五十岁，否则他不可能离开监狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D853_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Other barons haven taken heed, too. No doubt they'll still be scheming and stealing, but NCR won't tolerate Bellek's sort of wickedness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他的大亨们也注意到了这一点。毫无疑问，他们仍然在密谋和偷窃，但NCR不会容忍贝莱克那种邪恶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D853_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to Jason Bellek?
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰森·贝莱克怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was a lot of stink in the newspapers surrounding all this mess with the Augens, so he's been laying low for a while. No charges, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 报纸上有很多关于奥根家族丑闻的报道，所以他已经低调一阵子了。不过没有指控。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D856_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reckon it'll just be a matter of time before he's back to his old, cutthroat ways. Makes me sick to think he got away with all that nonsense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想他迟早会变回他那残忍的老样子。一想到他做了那么多荒唐的事却不受惩罚，我就恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D856_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to Jason Bellek?
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰森·贝莱克怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's managing, last I saw him. Running the place and teaching Michael how to survive keeps him busy. Healthier than just making bombs, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我上次见到他时，他还撑得住。管理这个地方，教迈克尔如何生存，让他忙得不可开交。总之，这比制造炸弹更健康。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D857_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still... you can see a sadness in his eyes, a sense of loss. I'll tell him you said hello.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过...你可以从他的眼中看到一种悲伤，一种失落感。我会替你向他问好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D857_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's Charles doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 查理斯怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's managing, last I saw him. Running the place and teaching Michael how to survive keeps him busy. Healthier than just making bombs, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我上次见到他时，他还撑得住。管理这个地方，教迈克尔如何生存，让他忙得不可开交。总之，这比制造炸弹更健康。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D858_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and he ended up marrying that crazy, tribal gal... what was her name? Molly, yeah. She scares me. Yeah, they're expecting a kid now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，他最后和那个疯狂的部落女孩结婚了...她叫什么名字来着？莫莉，对，她吓着我了。嗯，他们现在正等着生孩子呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D858_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seldom see a change in someone like that. I had met Charles when I did some runs with Mojo a time ago, see. Different man now. Happy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很少能在这样的人身上看到变化，我是在前一段时间和莫乔一起经营的时候认识查理斯的，现在是不同的人了。很快乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D858_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's Charles doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 查理斯怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's fine. Good kid, very well-read. Precocious. Seems happy enough, especially when he's doing demo. I think he's gonna be all right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他很好，好孩子，博览群书，早熟。看起来很开心，尤其是在做爆破的时候。我想他会没事的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D85C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is Michael all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 迈克尔还好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's doing well enough. Seems quiet, focused. Mature for his age. Never seen a kid with that kind of drive, honestly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他做得很好，看起来很安静，很专注，以他的年龄来说很成熟。说实话，从没见过这么有干劲的孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D85D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Saw him doing pullups before dawn, then driving nails at the range. He's going to be scary when he's grown. Never saw him smile, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到他在黎明前做引体向上，然后在射击场钉钉子，等他长大了一定会很可怕的。但从没见他笑过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D85D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is Michael all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 迈克尔还好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm your man for that - meet with all the great gabbers of the wasteland... Mojo, Matteo, Garth, Buddy... I hear all the good rumors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是你要找的人...去见见废土上所有的废话连篇的家伙...莫乔、马特奥、加思、巴迪...我听到了很多好的传闻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D850_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Catching up on gossip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 聊聊八卦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much to look at unless you want to see traders or the backside of a brahmin. Not sure which is uglier. Let me know if you need anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么可看的，除非你想看商人或婆罗门牛的屁股，不知道哪个更丑。有什么需要就告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D84E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just looking around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便看看而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure if there's any more work to be had right here. Rumor's that mercenary companies could be hiring soon, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定这里还有没有工作要做。不过有传言说，雇佣兵公司可能很快就会招人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D84F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's his name? Gray, that's the guy. Yeah, I hear he's gonna be opening up a shop near here. Good reputation, as mercenaries go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他叫什么来着？格雷，就是他，对，我听说他要在这附近开一家店。作为雇佣兵，名声不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Constantine Planis [0201D3C3] (mod) Quest : ([0201D83B]aaDetConstantineStuff) Constantine's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetConst_aaDetConstantin_0001D84F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm trying to find work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在找工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew there was something special about you. If I had any cigars I'd share one with you, and I don't like sharing cigars!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就知道你很特别。如果我有雪茄，我会和你分享一根，但我不喜欢分享雪茄！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_00022427_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stage one: we cross the river and enter Jeep Cove Canyon. Here's the spot on your map. Ace, here we come!
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一阶段：我们过河，进入吉普湾峡谷，这是地图上的位置。王牌，我们来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_00022427_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, let's go rescue Ace Yoblanski.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，我们去救“王牌”约布兰斯基吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to shoot straight with you... I want to make this a quiet operation, but if we get backed in a corner... I'm burning my way out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟你直说吧...我想低调行事，但如果我们被逼到角落里...我会烧出一条路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_00023732_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're concerned about collateral damage or offending the sensibilities of slave-owning savages, you're not the person to lead this mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你担心附带伤害或冒犯奴隶主野蛮人的感情，你不是这个任务的领导人选。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_00023732_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will follow your ROE, but, uh... no plan survives first contact, right? Things escalate, towns get burned down... et cetera, et cetera.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会遵守你的交战守则，不过，呃...作战计划活不过第一轮接敌，对吧？局势升级，城镇被烧成白地...诸如此类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_00023732_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to help, but I don't want to damage my reputation with Caesar's Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很想帮忙，但我不想损害我在凯撒军团的名声。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're making a huge mistake... it's so huge that I'm beginning to suspect communist sympathies. Do the right thing. Rescue Ace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在犯一个巨大的错误...它是如此巨大，以至于我开始怀疑你是共产主义同情者。做正确的事，救援王牌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_0002242A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will... reluctantly follow your orders. When you go to sleep each night, I hope your conscience is tormented by the thought of Ace Yoblanski!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会...不情愿地服从你的命令。当你每晚睡觉时，我希望你的良心因为想到“王牌”约布兰斯基而受到折磨！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_0002242A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This sounds like a fool's errand. We're not going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这听起来像是傻瓜的差事，我们不去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You familiar with the concept of karma? Let me tell you something, hotshot, you're about to incur some Ragnarok-level payback on your ass!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你熟悉因果报应的概念吗？让我告诉你吧，高手，你马上就要遭遇诸神黄昏级别的报应了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_0002242C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You hear me? Wolves, serpents and other mythological shit is about to melt your fucking face off! And you will deserve it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 听到了吗？狼，蛇和其他神话里的怪东西要把你的脸熔掉了！这是你应得的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_0002242C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I still think it's a waste of time. My answer is no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还是觉得那是浪费时间，我的答案是否定的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Respectfully... you can go to hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尊敬的...你可以下地狱了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_0002242D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I still think it's a waste of time. My answer is no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还是觉得那是浪费时间，我的答案是否定的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ace Yoblanski was the greatest pilot in the history of the United States Air Force. Nerves of steel, a peerless leader and motivator...
ESP.TRADUIT: “王牌”约布兰斯基是美国空军历史上最伟大的飞行员。钢铁般的意志，无与伦比的领导者和激励者...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_00022426_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A paradigm of everything that made America great, that's what Ace Yoblanski represents! We want him on our side!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让美国变得伟大的典范，这就是“王牌”约布兰斯基所代表的！我们希望他站在我们这边！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_00022426_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To think that Ace could be suffering under the cruel whip of the Legion... it makes me sick! You should feel sick, too!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一想到那个王牌可能正在遭受军团的残酷鞭打...这让我恶心！你也应该觉得恶心才对！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_00022426_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why should we do this? We don't even know if he's alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们为什么要这么做？我们都不知道他是否还活着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Ace Yoblanski I know cherished truth, freedom and the American way! He would never willingly submit to the yoke of the Legion!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认识的“王牌”约布兰斯基珍视真理、自由和美国方式！他决不会甘心屈服于军团的枷锁！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_00022429_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That man is alive. We are gonna find him. And we are gonna get him the hell out of there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个人还活着。我们会找到他的，我们会把他救出来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if he doesn't want to leave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他不想走怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too easy, chief. I already mapped it out. Remember - detailed files. We just hop across the River and make our way overland to the site.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太简单了，长官，我已经画好了，记住详细的文件。我们只要跳过河，然后从陆地上到达那个地点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_00022425_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've already located a quick, clean route that will avoid any populated sites. We'll cross the 93 and stay north of Chloride, moving at night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经找到了一条快速干净的路线可以避开人口稠密的地方。我们穿过93号公路，在克洛赖德以北，夜间行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_00022425_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We slip in, verify if Ace is alive... and use minimal force if an extraction is necessary. Subtle, silent. Legion will never know we were there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们溜进去，看看王牌是否还活着...如果需要撤离，使用最小的武力。微妙，沉默，军团不会知道我们的存在！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_00022425_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How would this work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是如何实现的呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm capable of exercising restraint. There's a time and place for precision bombing, remember. Keeping Ace alive is the highest priority.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我有克制的能力，精确轰炸是有时间和地点的，记住。保住王牌是当务之急。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_00022428_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This will be quick, clean and quiet. You can take that to the bank!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这将是快速，干净和安静的。你可以相信这一点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_00022428_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Minimal force?
ESP.TRADUIT: 最小武力？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a plan, okay? This will be further inland, they may not recognize you. It's not like you're Joshua Graham. Get over yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个计划，好吗？这里离内陆更远，他们可能认不出你。你又不是约书亚·格拉汉姆，别自以为是了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_0002242E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides... once we get Ace, there's a chance we may have to fight our way back to the river. If that happens... let the chips fall where they may.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外...一旦我们救到王牌，就有机会杀出一条血路回到河边。如果出现这种情况...顺其自然吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_0002242E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion will attack me on sight. Quick and quiet might not be possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团一见到我就会攻击，快速而安静可能是不可能的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should have a bumper crop in a few weeks. If Bubo wants more, I can supply it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再过几周我就会大丰收。如果布波想要更多，我可以提供。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Freddy [02023713] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetFreddyScen_0002371A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll purchase everything you have. Standard payment, plus a slave or two as bonus... wait... you said you were strictly solo. What is this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会买下你所有的东西，标准报酬，外加一两个奴隶作为奖金...等等...你说你是一个人。这是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veteran Legionary [02023711] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetFreddyScen_0002371B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? I don't know these people! They must've come in from the tunnels, or the river... but that's impossible!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？我不认识这些人！他们一定是从隧道或者河里进来的...但那是不可能的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Freddy [02023713] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetFreddyScen_0002371C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know a lie when I hear one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谎言我一听就知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veteran Legionary [02023711] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetFreddyScen_0002371D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To think that we trusted Freddy... well-played, profligates. You'll all be on a cross by nightfall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 竟然相信了弗雷迪...玩得不错，堕落者。夜幕降临时，你们都会被钉在十字架上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veteran Legionary [02023711] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetFreddyLegi_0002372F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I crossed the river to raise hell, starting here.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我过河就是为了闹事，从这里开始。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will not be mocked, creature!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会被嘲笑的，怪物！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veteran Legionary [02023711] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetFreddyLegi_0002372D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> Sorry, we got separated from our tour group.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>对不起，我们和旅行团走散了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lies. Freddy will answer for this treachery... but first, I'm going to pull your guts out and strew them all over this shop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谎言。弗莱迪会为他的背叛付出代价的...但首先，我要把你的内脏掏出来，撒在店里各处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veteran Legionary [02023711] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetFreddyLegi_0002372E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个邮差。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... you're the criminal behind our great father's death? I will glory in your dismemberment, scum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...你就是害死我们伟大父亲的罪魁祸首？我会以肢解你为荣，人渣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veteran Legionary [02023711] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetFreddyLegi_0002372C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know your reputation... even if I fall, my brothers will take your head. You've entered the lair of Bubo. Mars, guide my blade!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你的名声...就算我倒下，我的兄弟们也会砍下你的头。你进入了布波的巢穴，玛尔斯，指引我的剑！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veteran Legionary [02023711] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetFreddyLegi_0002372C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it's high time that Arizona got the same treatment I gave Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是时候让亚利桑那得到我给凯撒的待遇了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who? Speak sense, worm! State your business, and be quick about it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁？说正经的，小虫！陈述你的事情，而且要快！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veteran Legionary [02023711] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetFreddyLegi_00023731_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're looking for Ace Yoblanski.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在找“王牌”约布兰斯基。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the spirit! Nothing like a little can-do attitude when you're faced with a horde of primitives!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这种精神！当你面对一群原始人时，没有什么比“我能行”的态度更好的了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_00023735_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stage one: we cross the river and enter Jeep Cove Canyon. Here's the spot on your map. Ace, here we come!
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一阶段：我们过河，进入吉普湾峡谷，这是地图上的位置。王牌，我们来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_00023735_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's fine. I was planning on attacking them at some point, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那很好，反正我打算在某个时候攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, you're the boss. I'll just sit here and reflect on Ace's suffering... and the fact I'm tethered to a Legion-loving heathen. Respectfully.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，你说了算。我就坐在这里，想想王牌的遭遇...而我却和一个热爱军团的异教徒绑在一起，向你致敬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceIn_00023736_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd rather not cause problems for the Legion right now. I'll pass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在不想给军团制造麻烦，我不去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Course is set... we'll move fast and low, fly right under their radar! Hold on, Ace, we're coming for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 航线已定...我们要快速低空移动，在他们的雷达下飞行！坚持住，王牌，我们来救你了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayQuest_0002373D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust me. People questioned and quibbled when I spearheaded the move from daylight, precision bombing to nighttime raids. It worked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我。当我带头把白天的精确轰炸改为夜间袭击时，人们都在质疑和狡辩。它奏效了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayQuest_0002373F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll do a thorough search of the canyon... if he's not there, we'll head straight back, I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要彻底搜查峡谷...如果他不在，我们就直接回去，我保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayQuest_0002373F_2.ogg
