ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, if we should happen to come across any Legion encampments that are full of flammable materials... well, accidents happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，如果我们碰巧遇到任何充满易燃物品的军团营地...嗯，事故时有发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayQuest_0002373F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure we're on the right track?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定我们没走错路吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hardships and difficulties are inevitable. We'll prevail in the end. Ace is counting on us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 艰难困苦是不可避免的，我们最终会获胜的。王牌就靠我们了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayQuest_0002373E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, but I'd like to avoid any more fuckups if possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，但如果可能的话，我不想再搞砸了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why bother? "Oh, I'm a slaving piece of shit who trades with dirt-licking savages. Yada yada yada, the end." I gave him the ol' Sherman treatment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 何必费心呢？“噢，我是一个奴隶狗屎，和舔土的野蛮人交易。讨厌讨厌讨厌，结束了。”我给他做了老谢尔曼疗法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayQuest_00023740_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You better start toughening up if you want to pull this off. We'll have hard choices ahead of us, and I for one won't waste time navel-gazing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想成功，你最好开始强硬起来。我们将面临艰难的选择，作为一个人，我不会把时间浪费在纠结上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayQuest_00023740_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see a man keeping slaves, I burn him down to ashes. Then I'll burn his dogs for good measure. Enough of this shit, let's get moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到有人在蓄奴，就把他烧成灰烬，然后我再烧死他的狗。别说这些了，我们快走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayQuest_00023740_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to question Freddy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问问弗雷迪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: In a perfect world, I'd have spy planes conducting aerial reconnaissance weeks before the operation, but we don't have those niceties!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在理想的情况下，我会在行动前几周让间谍飞机进行空中侦察，但我们没有这些细节！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBigWa_000246EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without those tools, I assessed that there would be no one here. I miscalculated... slightly. Looks like a token garrison at best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有那些工具，我这里就没法评估。我算错了...稍微，充其量只是个象征性的驻军。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBigWa_000246EF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Flash a little charm, keep a low profile... we'll duck in and take a quick peek for Ace, then be on our way. Garrison size is irrelevent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 展现一点魅力，保持低调...我们躲进去，瞄一眼王牌，然后就走。驻军规模无关紧要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBigWa_000246EF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nominal presence my ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 名义部队个屁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, an amicable Mister Gutsy with no desire to unleash fiery retribution on the heathens polluting this canyon. Docile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，一个友善的勇敢先生没有对污染这个峡谷的异教徒发动猛烈报复的欲望。温顺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBigWa_000246EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Docile?
ESP.TRADUIT: 温顺？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, I'll be the silent partner in the background. Inconspicuous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，我会是幕后的无声合伙人。不显眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBigWa_000246E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see if we can talk our way inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们看看能不能通过对话进去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be quiet as cancer. Bad metaphor. I'll stop talking now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会像癌症一样安静。糟糕的比喻，我现在不说话了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayBigWa_000246ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll handle this. Follow my lead and stay quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 交给我吧。听我指挥，保持安静。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whores! Dames! Pussy! I need it! What the hell's that racket out there, anyway? Another bullshit drill? I ain't been laid for two days!
ESP.TRADUIT: 妓女！美女！逼！我需要它！外面那吵闹声是怎么回事？又是狗屁演习？我已经两天没上床了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetLeMayAceIn_000261E6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whores?
ESP.TRADUIT: 妓女？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bullshit. Me and Bubo had a deal, I get new whores on the regular. You ain't a whore... at least not one of his.
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡扯。我和布波谈好了，我定期找新的妓女。你才不是妓女...至少不是他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetLeMayAceIn_000261E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I fixed his fucking generators, time for new whores. You don't have any hiding outside, do you? I like a full bush, you hear me? Natural!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我修好了他的发电机，该找新妓女了。你没在外面藏什么东西吧？我喜欢茂密的灌木丛，听到了吗？自然！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetLeMayAceIn_000261E7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whores.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妓女。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, that's a name I haven't heard in a long time... A long time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个名字，我很久没听过了...很长时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetLeMayAceIn_000261FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Ace Yoblanski. You must've gone to some trouble to find me. What's your business? I work exclusively for Bubo, no exceptions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是“王牌”约布兰斯基，你一定费了很大劲才找到我。你是干什么的？我只为布波工作，没有例外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetLeMayAceIn_000261FF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for Ace Yoblanski.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找“王牌”约布兰斯基。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You came out here because of that? Some notes from two centuries back? Do you know how fucking nuts that sounds?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是因为这个才来的吗？两个世纪前的笔记？你知道这他妈听起来有多疯狂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceIntro02_00026219_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and I don't need any rescue party. I'm doing just fine, thank you very much. Gonna go outside and see what all the noise is, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，我也不需要什么救援队，我很好，非常感谢。不过我得出去看看到底是怎么回事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceIntro02_00026219_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We found your diary at Nellis. We're here to rescue you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在内利斯找到了你的日记，我们是来救你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, like the general from way back? Is this some kind of dumbass prank? You're not one of those Enclave freaks, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，就像以前那个将军吗？这是什么愚蠢的恶作剧吗？你不会是那些英克雷的怪胎吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceIntro02_00026217_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind, it sounds like another Great War just kicked off outside. I gotta see what's happening!
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了，外面好像又开始了一场大战。我要去看看发生了什么！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceIntro02_00026217_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came here to help my friend, LeMay. He's determined to find you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来帮我朋友李梅的，他决心要找到你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, what? Is that what all that noise is? What have you done?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，什么？那噪音就是因为这个吗？你做了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceIntro02_00026218_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came out here to kill Legion. The rest is details.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来杀军团的，剩下的都是细节。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? He's alive? I knew it! It was all worth it! I can't wait to meet him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？他还活着？我就知道！这一切都是值得的！我迫不及待想见到他!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayFound_0002621F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found him. He's... well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到他了。他...好吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? He's alive? I knew it! It was all worth it! I can't wait to meet him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？他还活着？我就知道！这一切都是值得的！我迫不及待想见到他!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayFound_00026220_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's alive, and from what I can tell he's going to be a pain in the ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他还活着，而且据我所知，他会是个讨厌鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't imagine he's jubilant after years of Legion confinement and torture. They'll pay for their crimes... but first, I want to meet him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无法想象他在经历了多年的军团监禁和折磨后还能有多高兴。他们会为自己的罪行付出代价的...但首先，我要见见他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayFound_00026221_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found him, and he ain't happy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到他了，他很不高兴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Real cute. Just come in and shit on other people's hard work, then make some cracks about it. Freedom? Don't mean shit when you're starving!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真可爱，你只要进来诋毁别人的辛勤工作，然后拿它开涮。自由？饿的时候什么都别说！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceWhatDon_0002622D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and these slaves are goddamn hill savages, most can't speak English or read. Only good for working and breeding. Hard facts of life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，还有这些奴隶都是该死的山地野蛮人，大多数都不会说英语或阅读，只适合工作和繁殖。生活中的残酷事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceWhatDon_0002622D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You say they're free? They'll all be dead or crucified in a week... and we'll all be dead with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说他们是自由的？一周之内，他们都将被处死或钉死在十字架上...我们会和他们一起死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceWhatDon_0002622D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Inhale deeply> It smells like we delivered some freedom.
ESP.TRADUIT: <深吸一口气>闻起来像是我们释放了一些自由。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rescue? You mean burning down the fragile bits of civilization I've helped to build up here? Food, water and security? Gone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 救？你是说烧毁我在这里帮助建立的脆弱文明吗？食物、水和安全？没了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceWhatDon_0002622A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and I see the mastermind behind this all is a floating tin can... and you were dumb enough to listen to it! Oh, I'm fucked!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，还有我看到这一切的幕后主使是一个漂浮的锡罐...而你居然傻到听进去了！噢，我完蛋了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceWhatDon_0002622A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We rescued you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来救你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, thank you for taking a giant shit on everything that me and Bubo built up here. We made miracles up here, you hear me? Miracles!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，谢谢你把我和布波在这里建立起来的一切都毁了。我们在这里创造了奇迹，听到了吗？奇迹！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceWhatDon_0002622C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I helped with engineering, he provided labor and security. I also had a river of pussy I could dip my toes into at any time. Win-win.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我帮忙搞工程，他提供劳动力和安全保障。我也有一条河的阴道，我可以随时把脚趾伸进里面。双赢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceWhatDon_0002622C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I fought to survive up here for almost two centuries... it wasn't until the Legion showed up that I felt human again. Thanks for nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里奋斗了将近两个世纪...直到军团出现，我才再次感到自己是人类。你得了吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceWhatDon_0002622C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you should show a little gratitude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你应该表达一点感激之情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A good day? Sowing death and destruction, tearing down other people's hard work for some jerkoff, comic-book rescue fantasy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 美好的一天？播下死亡和毁灭的种子，毁掉别人的努力成果，就为了一些愚蠢漫画里的拯救幻想？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceWhatDon_0002622B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what it was like here before they showed up? I had to fight off wild animals, raiders, every type of horror imaginable! Almost starved!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道他们来之前这里是什么样子吗？我必须击退野生动物，掠夺者，各种可以想象到的恐怖！快饿死了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceWhatDon_0002622B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'm so fucked now. I had a life here... a life! I was swimming in pussy! You hear me? I was in the Marianas Trench of poontang! Now it's gone!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我现在完蛋了。我在这里有过生活...生活！我在逼里游泳！你听到了吗？我在阴道的马里亚纳海沟！现在都完了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: We took the Legion down a notch or two. That's a good day in my book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们让军团降低了一两个等级。在我看来，这是美好的一天。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really a choice now, is it? Stick around and get crucified... or live in that made-up shitshow you call a country in California. Fuck me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在没得选了，对吧？留下来，被钉在十字架上...或者住在你称之为加州的那个虚构的国家里。我操了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceIntroLe_00026235_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're going back to New Vegas. You should probably come with us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要回新维加斯了，你也许应该和我们一起去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really a choice now, is it? Stick around and get crucified... or live in that made-up shitshow you call a country in California. Fuck me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在没得选了，对吧？留下来，被钉在十字架上...或者住在你称之为加州的那个虚构的国家里。我操了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceIntroLe_00026236_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay or go, I don't give a damn. We're leaving now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是走是留，我不在乎。我们现在要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, I'm glad. Guess what, cupcake... you're stuck with me now. You and that aluminum testicle floating over there... I'm stuck to you like glue!
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我很高兴。你猜怎么着，小蛋糕...你现在只能和我在一起了，你和那个漂浮在那里的铝制睾丸...我要像胶水一样粘在你身上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceIntroLe_00026237_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You make me sick. I'm already regretting this trip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真让我恶心，我已经开始后悔这次旅行了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides the destruction of a community that I took pride in building? That I broke my ass on for years? Built lasting partnerships with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了毁掉我引以为傲的社区吗？我累死累活了好几年？建立持久的伙伴关系？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceIntroLe_00026232_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bubo was one of the good centurions. A pragmatist, really. We got along right from the start. Tit for tat... or tit for twat, more accurately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布波是一位优秀的百夫长，一个实用主义者，真的。我们从一开始就相处得很好，针锋相对...或者更准确的说，针尖对麦芒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceIntroLe_00026232_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I put that engineering degree from the academy to work, and he got to report great productivity to his bosses. Win-win. His bosses? Not so nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把学院的工程学位用在了工作上，而他可以向他的老板报告巨大的生产力，双赢。他的老板？不是很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceIntroLe_00026232_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you so worked up about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么这么激动？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty damn bad, buster. The legate in Kingman? Meles? He could give Lanius a run for his money in the Legion's psycho competition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太糟糕了，小鬼。金曼的特使？梅莱斯？他可以在军团的心理竞赛中与拉尼厄斯一较高下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceIntroLe_0002623F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: His favorite execution is putting people in a bag with wild animals... and then throwing them in water. Calls it... "Pony Culus" or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他最喜欢的处决方式是把人和野生动物装在一个袋子里...然后把它们扔进水里。称之为...“小马肛门”还是什么的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceIntroLe_0002623F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This was one of the most productive sites in western Arizona. They are going to hunt us every step of the way to California. Count on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是亚利桑那州西部生产力最高地方之一，他们会一路追杀我们直到加利福尼亚，放心吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceIntroLe_0002623F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've dealt with a lot of Legion. How bad can they be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和军团打过很多交道，他们能有多糟糕？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Colonel Yoblanski, I just want to say it's an honor to meet you. I can't imagine what you've had to endure out here. We'll get you home safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约布兰斯基上校，我只想说很荣幸见到你。我无法想象你在这里经历了什么，我们会把你安全送回家的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceFi_00026242_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eat shit, robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吃屎吧，机器人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceFi_00026243_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you've been under a lot of stress... Stockholm Syndrome and what not... we'll get you help, Ace. The Air Force hasn't forgotten about you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你最近压力很大...斯德哥尔摩综合症之类的...我们会帮你的，王牌。空军没有忘记你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceFi_00026244_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck the headshrinkers... fuck the Air Force... and fuck you for burning down my town. You ain't worth a wooden nickel in a pile of birdshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操他妈的精神病医师...操他妈的空军...还有我操你妈，你烧了我的小镇，你在一堆鸟屎里一文不值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceFi_00026245_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I remember... you're one of those freaks the eggheads dreamed up to help with recruiting before the war. Big Blue never fails.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得...你就是战前那些书呆子想出来帮忙招募的怪胎之一。蓝色巨人从不失败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceFi_00026246_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion are masters of psychological warfare, clearly. You can breath freely again, Colonel. They don't have any more control over you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团显然是心理战的高手。你又可以自由呼吸了，上校，他们再也不能控制你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceFi_00026247_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When we get back to California I'm gonna convert you into a space heater. Shut up and let the real humans do the talking, thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我们回到加州，我要把你变成暖炉。闭嘴，让真正的人类来说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceFi_00026248_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceFi_00026249_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion is coming. Picked it up on the radio chatter out of Grasshopper Junction. A contubernium or two, veterans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团来了，在蚱蜢路口的无线电通讯中发现的。一两个十人队，老兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceForceGr_0002CC69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I went ahead and moved the slaves inside. There's only one entry point - the southeast canyon. You have time to set up an ambush.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经把奴隶安置好了。只有一处入口，东南峡谷，你有时间布置埋伏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceForceGr_0002CC69_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll keep monitoring the radio chatter and keep the slaves calm. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会继续监听无线电，让奴隶们保持冷静。有什么问题吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceForceGr_0002CC69_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ya'll done holding hands with the Legion? Slaves are loaded up and ready to go. We need to get airborne... yesterday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会和军团握手言和吧？奴隶们已经装车准备出发了。我们必须在...昨天就起飞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceForceGr_0002D521_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be damned if you didn't pull this off. For the first time in a long, long while, I'm starting to feel like a good guy. Almost gives me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要是不把这事办好，我就完蛋了。这么久以来，我第一次开始觉得自己是个好人。差点让我...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceForceGr_0002D521_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion will return... soon. The men and I will set an ambush for them, buy you time to escape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团会回来的...很快。我会和手下埋伏，为你们争取逃跑的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0202626B] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGabrielWha_00026277_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We secured enough dynamite to set a good ambush. We all know our journey ends here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们弄到了足够的炸药，可以设一个很好的埋伏。我们都知道我们的旅程到此结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0202626B] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGabrielWha_00026277_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had a chance to help a different rebellion... but I hesitated. Not a day goes by that I don't regret it. This time I fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有机会帮助另一场起义...但我犹豫了。我没有一天不后悔的，这次我要战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0202626B] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGabrielWha_00026277_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: When Spartacus... if that was even his real name... led the revolt outside Flagstaff. I and many others succumbed to cowardice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当斯巴达克斯...如果那是他的真名...领导了旗杆市外的起义时，我和其他许多人都屈服于懦弱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0202626B] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGabrielWha_00026278_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Others gave in to greed, and it all fell apart. They fought, many died. Some escaped, though. There were rumors of a great battle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他人则屈服于贪婪，一切都崩溃了。他们战斗，许多人牺牲了，不过，有些人逃了出来。有传言说有一场大战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0202626B] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGabrielWha_00026278_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not missing the next battle. These children deserve a life beyond chains, beyond abuse. I'll do my part... will you do yours?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我绝不错过接下来的战斗，这些孩子应该过上没有枷锁、没有虐待的生活。我会尽我所能的...你也会吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0202626B] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGabrielWha_00026278_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What rebellion are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在说什么起义？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0202626B] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGabrielDis_00026273_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me talk it over with my friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我和朋友们商量一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, we have nothing to give you. You can help these people, though. Saving lives is a great reward in itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉，我们没有什么可以给你的，不过你可以帮助这些人。拯救生命本身就是一种巨大的回报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0202626B] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetGabrielNoP_00026276_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't normally do good deeds, at least not for free. I'll talk it over with my comrades.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一般不会做善事，至少不会免费做。我要和同伴们商量一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cry to somebody else, savages. Never trust a tribal, I learned that the hard way. Go draw dicks on a rock, that's all you're good for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去找别人哭诉吧，野蛮人，永远不要相信部落，这是我吃过苦头才明白的。去石头上画鸡巴吧，这就是你的专长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceStuff_aaDetAceBark_00026275_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion never cleared this place of wildlife. It was on their to-do list, but they had other priorities. Weather didn't help, either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团从未清除过这里的野生动物，这在他们的待办事项清单上，但他们有其他优先事项。天气也帮不上忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceStuff_aaDetAceBark_00028BB1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pretty sure he's already dead, but knock yourself out. Ya'll seem to forget that there are worse things than the Legion around. Stay frosty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很确定他已经死了，不过请自便吧。你似乎忘记了周围还有比军团更糟糕的东西，保持冷静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceStuff_aaDetAceBark_00028BE6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not a plane - it's a coffin. If by some miracle we get that antique off the ground, it'll take another miracle to get it to Vegas intact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是飞机，那是棺材。如果奇迹发生，我们能让那件古董起飞，那要想让它完好无损地抵达维加斯还需要另一个奇迹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceStuff_aaDetAceBark_0002903C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ya'll can keep scouting while I work on this rust bucket. If hear screaming, I'll just assume you're all dead and ripped to hell by God knows what.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我修理这个生锈的水桶的时候，你可以继续侦察。如果听到尖叫声，我就会认为你们都死了，被什么东西扯下了地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceStuff_aaDetAceBark_0002903D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and is that alcohol? Don't mind if I do. Legion is worse than a Baptist preacher when it comes to the good stuff. I will partake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，那是酒精吗？我拿了别介意。当谈到好东西时，军团比浸礼会传教士还糟糕，我要享用了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceStuff_aaDetAceBark_000290B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Grumbling>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咕哝>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceStuff_aaDetAceBark_00034290_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand. Making hard decisions is part of being a leader. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。做出艰难的决定是成为领导者的一部分。我们走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMaySlave_000273DD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have to leave them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们必须离开他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not remotely practical. We'll move too slowly, and... well, there might be a way, but it's a hail mary... a contingency plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一点都不实际。我们会走得太慢，而且...也许有办法，但只能孤注一掷了...应急计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMaySlave_000273DC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a private airstrip not far from Freddy's. There might be derelict aircraft there... but I doubt they'd be airworthy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗雷迪家附近有个私人飞机跑道。那里可能有废弃的飞机...但我怀疑它们还能不能飞行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMaySlave_000273DC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuel? Spare parts? Time to make repairs? Doubt we'll have any of that. No, it's crazy. We stick to the plan. Sorry, slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 燃料？备件？修理的时间？我怀疑我们不会有这些。不，这太疯狂了，我们坚持按计划行事。对不起，奴隶们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMaySlave_000273DC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should rescue the slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该去解救那些奴隶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't lie... I've thought about it... every single day. Flying with Ace. All we need to do is get across the river. A quick, little jaunt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不瞒你说...我想过...每天，和王牌一起飞行。我们要做的就是过河，一次快速的短途旅行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMaySlave_000273DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe... I'll grab a barrel of ethanol from the workshop. Didn't burn it all, fortunately. It ain't JP-8, but maybe we can church it up to be close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许...我去车间拿一桶乙醇，还好没有全部烧掉。这不是JP-8，但也许我们能让它凑合着用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: My records show this was some kind of ritzy hideaway, so no guarantees on spare parts, either. We have to try, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的记录显示这是一个豪华的藏身处，所以也不能保证有备件。但我们必须试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Flying alongside Ace Yoblanski... I can't wait! Let's go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 和“王牌”约布兰斯基并肩飞行...我迫不及待了！出发吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMaySlave_000273DE_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really want to miss out on flying with Ace Yoblanski?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的想错过和“王牌”约布兰斯基一起飞行的机会吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spare me the sermons. I've crunched the numbers and it's not doable. We have a mission, and that's to rescue Ace. Tough break, slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 少跟我说教了。我计算过了，这是不可能的，我们有个任务，那就是救出王牌。真倒霉，奴隶们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMaySlave_000273DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the right thing to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是正确的做法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your logic... is sound. I don't give a hoot about my own skin, but I'd hate to lose Ace. If we move quickly, though... it might work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的逻辑...是合理的。我不在乎自己的皮肤，但我可不想失去王牌，不过，如果我们动作快点...这可能行得通。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe... I'll grab a barrel of ethanol from the workshop. Didn't burn it all, fortunately. It ain't JP-8, but maybe we can church it up to be close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许...我去车间拿一桶乙醇，还好没有全部烧掉。这不是JP-8，但也许我们能让它凑合着用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: My records show this was some kind of ritzy hideaway, so no guarantees on spare parts, either. We have to try, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的记录显示这是一个豪华的藏身处，所以也不能保证有备件。但我们必须试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Flying alongside Ace Yoblanski... I can't wait! Let's go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 和“王牌”约布兰斯基并肩飞行...我迫不及待了！出发吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMaySlave_000273E0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the Legion catches up to us that just means you'll get to burn more of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果军团追上了我们那就意味着你会有更多的机会烧死他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to admit... these tribal kids are pretty quick on their feet. I just hate to put Ace at risk. He's already given so much to this country.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不得不承认...这些部落的孩子们行动很快。我只是不想置王牌于危险之中，他已经为这个国家付出了这么多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMaySlave_000273E1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe... I'll grab a barrel of ethanol from the workshop. Didn't burn it all, fortunately. It ain't JP-8, but maybe we can church it up to be close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许...我去车间拿一桶乙醇，还好没有全部烧掉。这不是JP-8，但也许我们能让它凑合着用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Flying alongside Ace Yoblanski... I can't wait! Let's go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 和“王牌”约布兰斯基并肩飞行...我迫不及待了！出发吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm confident we can move fast enough to stay one step ahead of the Legion. Let's try it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有信心我们能以足够快的速度领先军团一步。来试试吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll be moving through rough terrain in occupied territory, all with urchins in tow. No, absolutely not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将在被占领的土地上，带着流浪儿们穿过崎岖的地形。不，绝对不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMaySlave_000273E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This will be a glorified nature walk. We'll be fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这将是一次光荣的自然之旅，我们会没事的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My best friends have been animals. Had a dog named Champ for years, what a wingman... damn sure better than humans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最好的朋友都是动物。我养了一只叫冠军的狗很多年了，真是个好帮手...比该死的人类强多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLivingH_0002D0C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Animal instincts... people always say that with such derision. I rather like them. Hunting, eating, sleeping, humping... that's the meat of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 动物本能...人们总是带着这样的嘲笑说这话。我挺喜欢的，打猎、吃饭、睡觉、操逼...那是最重要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLivingH_0002D0C5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like you want to live like an animal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你想像动物一样生活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're wrong, scooter. The ship of remorse sailed a long time ago. Am I proud of everything I've done? No. Can't afford introspection, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你错了，精神小伙，悔恨之船很久以前就起航了。我为我所做的一切感到自豪吗？不，但我们不能自省。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLivingA_0002CCAC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've captured slaves, beaten and branded them, worked them to death... I did it... so that the next generation wouldn't go through what I did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我抓过奴隶，殴打过他们，打过烙印，逼他们干活到死...我做了...这样下一代就不会重蹈我的覆辙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLivingA_0002CCAC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You start weighing on the scales of justice in your mind... pretty soon you're standing on the edge of the abyss... and someone else will push you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你开始在脑海中衡量正义的天平...很快你就站在了深渊的边缘...有人会推你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLivingA_0002CCAC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't believe that you're acting entirely out of self-preservation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不相信你这么做完全是出于自我保护。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That might be the stupidest word in the English language. Not much gets under my... well, not much bothers me besides that word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可能是英语中最愚蠢的单词了。没什么能让我...嗯，除了这个词，没什么让我困扰的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLivingD_0002CCAD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bullshit out of fairy tales and Madison Avenue, nothing else. Flying? I did it because I liked it... and nothing beats fighting in the air.
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡扯的童话故事和麦迪逊大道，仅此而已。飞行？我这么做是因为我喜欢...没有什么比在空中战斗更好的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLivingD_0002CCAD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every time I sent a hostile to Chinese heaven I got a rush that could beat a hundred lays with Vera Keyes. It wasn't heroism, it was addiction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每次我把敌人送上中国天堂，我都能得到一种快感，胜过和维拉·凯斯睡一百次。这不是英雄主义，而是上瘾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLivingD_0002CCAD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Helping people... that died with my family. With the Legion, I just wanted to be useful again, to build something that would last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助他人...已经和我的家人一起死去了。和军团在一起，我只是想再次成为有用的人，建立一些持久的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLivingD_0002CCAD_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe if you'd seen what I've seen, lived the lives I have... you would understand... but you never will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能看到我所看到的，过我所过的生活...你会理解的...但你永远不会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLivingD_0002CCAD_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: LeMay told me you used to be a hero. You can still be one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李梅告诉我你曾是一名英雄，你现在也可以是。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're goddamn right. Living, breathing scum who will outlast you and every other shit-eating do-gooder out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的说得太对了。活着的，会呼吸的人渣会比你和其他吃屎的行善者活得更久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLivingD_0002CCAF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're scum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是个人渣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not the first to make that claim. You'll get your chance, buttercup.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并不是第一个这么说的人。你会有机会的，大小姐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLivingK_0002D0C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When this is all over I'm going to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切结束后我会杀了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's simple. We stage those dead assholes from the campsite around a new campfire, make it seem real. I'll remotely broadcast a conversation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这很简单。我们把那些死在营地的混蛋安置在一个新的营火周围，让一切看起来像真的。我会远程播放一段对话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B42E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell, I can even give them a shot of electricity from afar, make it believable. They'll be waving and jabbering, get that Deathclaw good and pissed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼，我甚至可以在远处给他们来点点击，让一切看起来更可信。他们会挥手，叽叽喳喳，让死亡爪生气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B42E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He thinks it's time for dessert, but instead he'll get a C4 sandwich. Here, I had these stashed away for a special occasion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他以为该吃甜点了，结果却吃了个C4三明治。给，我把这些藏起来了，是为一个特殊场合准备的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B42E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How would you bait the Deathclaw?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么引诱死亡爪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have my own things, thank you very much. I love the touch of C4. While you're asleep, I like to play with it, form various shapes. It's theraputic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有我自己的事，非常感谢。我喜欢C4的触感，你睡着的时候，我喜欢和它玩，摆出各种各样的形状。这有治疗作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B42F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just love to roll it into little balls and fondle them repeatedly while I think about burning an entire city of dogs. Denver... I wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是喜欢把它揉成小丸子，反复抚摸它们，同时我还想把整个城市的狗都烧了，丹佛...但愿如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B42F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where'd you get the C4?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从哪儿弄来的C4？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd stage a radio and broadcast from it. I have that capability. Don't believe me? Stand by, you'll see. Stuart made some upgrades to my EW package.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会布置一台无线电，用它来广播，我有这个能力。不相信我？等一下，你就知道了。斯图亚特升级了我的电子战套件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B430_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking skeptic... oh, and as for the conversation? "Salve, fucknuts, let's go suck on Caesar's shriveled dick, bla bla, Latin, Latin, the end."
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的怀疑论者...哦，你说对话？“安康，傻逼，让我们去舔凯撒干瘪的鸡巴吧，巴拉巴拉，拉丁语，拉丁语，结束。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B430_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, I'll sprinkle in some Shakespeare! "What a terrible era in which idiots govern the blind." Appropriate. That Deathclaw will be mesmerized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我要加点莎士比亚！“这是一个白痴统治盲人的可怕时代。”很合适，那个死亡爪会被催眠的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B430_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Explain how you'd mimic a conversation between Legionaries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 解释一下你如何模拟军团士兵之间的对话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I helped Stuart do it once... with some minor variations. Look, it's a Deathclaw, not Sir Isaac fucking Newton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，我帮斯图亚特做过一次...有一些细微的变化。听着，这是死亡爪，不是他妈的艾萨克·牛顿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B433_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's probably sitting in a cave, picking its teeth with Legion bones and jerking off to lizard calendars. Don't overthink this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能正坐在一个洞穴里，用军团的骨头剔着牙，对着蜥蜴挂历打飞机。别想太多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B433_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've seen this bullshit a dozen times. People screech, "It's so smart, how is it picking us apart?" Because you're panicking, you dumbfuck apes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这破事我见过很多次了，人们尖叫着：“它这么聪明，怎么就把我们分开了？”因为你们恐慌了，你们这些愚蠢的猿猴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B433_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem very confident about this plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你对这个计划很有信心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Picture this... we've gotten the airplane operational and ready for takeoff. We're all inside with your precious slaves, ready to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想象一下...我们已经让飞机运转起来，准备起飞了。我们和你的宝贝奴隶们都在里面，准备出发了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B8A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ace makes the final preparations for takeoff... everything is green... the engines begin to roar... slaves share toothless smiles...
ESP.TRADUIT: 王牌为起飞做最后的准备...一切都正常...引擎开始轰鸣...奴隶们露出了没有牙齿的微笑...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B8A2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wham! A giant claw tears through the thin fuselage and slices Ace in half! Children screech as they're scooped up and gobbled like chicken tenders!
ESP.TRADUIT: 砰！一个巨大的爪子撕开了薄薄的机身，把王牌切成了两半！孩子们尖叫着，因为他们被舀起来，像吃鸡丁一样狼吞虎咽！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B8A2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We fight back and scramble for cover, but it's too late. The hungry beast turns our party into a buffet. The end. That's why we have to kill it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们奋力反击，四处寻找掩体，但为时已晚，饥饿的野兽把我们的团队变成了自助餐，结束。所以我们必须杀了它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B8A2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if we just leave it alone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们不去管它呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A shrewd leader heeds the advice of his subordinates. I promise, you won't be disappointed. Let's go make some magic!
ESP.TRADUIT: 精明的领导会听取下属的意见，我保证，不会让你失望的。让我们去创造一些奇迹吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B432_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, let's set the trap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我们来布置陷阱吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will do. Just don't come crying to me when you're tripping on your own guts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会的。不过你被自己的肠子绊倒的时候，别来找我哭！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B42D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut up and follow my lead. If I want your opinion, I'll ask for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，听我指挥。如果我需要你的意见，我会问你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bold, direct and stupid. Battles have been won with less. I'm with you, chief.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大胆，直接和愚蠢，战争的胜利可以通过更少的资源。我支持你，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayDeath_0002B431_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to waste time on a trap. Let's find the nest and take him out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想把时间浪费在陷阱上。我们找到巢穴，把它干掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Whispering}Nice touch. {Loud}Well said, amicus! Our centurion, Cunnilingus of Clitoris, will surely reward our efforts!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Whispering}巧妙的设计。{Loud}说得好，朋友！我们的百夫长阴蒂·舔阴师，一定会回报我们的努力！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8A7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing so delicious as deathclaw eggs! I hear a lot of timid chatter about these beasts, but frankly I found them... underwhelming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么比死亡爪蛋更美味的了！我听到了很多关于这些野兽的胆怯的议论，但坦率的说，我发现它们...平平无奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8A7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like mine scrambled and served with peppers, steak and hot sauce. How do you take your deathclaw eggs, amicus?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢炒一炒，配上辣椒、牛排和辣酱。你的死亡爪蛋是怎么吃的，朋友？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8A7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These creatures will make fine trophies. Nature will bend to the will of Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些生物将成为很好的战利品，大自然会屈从于凯撒的意志。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right you are, amicus! I think back fondly on our great hunt of the feral canines... oh, they burned so brightly, with howls heard for miles!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，朋友！我深情的回想起我们对野狗的伟大猎杀...噢，它们燃烧得如此明亮，几英里外都能听到它们的嚎叫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8A9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing so delicious as deathclaw eggs! I hear a lot of timid chatter about these beasts, but frankly I found them... underwhelming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么比死亡爪蛋更美味的了！我听到了很多关于这些野兽的胆怯的议论，但坦率的说，我发现它们...平平无奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8A9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like mine scrambled and served with peppers, steak and hot sauce. How do you take your deathclaw eggs, amicus?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢炒一炒，配上辣椒、牛排和辣酱。你的死亡爪蛋是怎么吃的，朋友？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8A9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These Deathclaws were pathetic. I've hunted wild dogs with more spirit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些死亡爪真可怜，我猎过的野狗都更有精神。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Whispering}Good. {Loud}As is fitting after this hunt, amicus! We slaughtered these trifling pests like insects! Mere flies! Flies!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Whispering}很好，{Loud}这是狩猎后该做的事，朋友！我们像屠杀昆虫一样屠杀了这些微不足道的害虫！不过是些苍蝇！苍蝇！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8AA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing so delicious as deathclaw eggs! I hear a lot of timid chatter about these beasts, but frankly I found them... underwhelming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么比死亡爪蛋更美味的了！我听到了很多关于这些野兽的胆怯的议论，但坦率的说，我发现它们...平平无奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8AA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like mine scrambled and served with peppers, steak and hot sauce. How do you take your deathclaw eggs, amicus?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢炒一炒，配上辣椒、牛排和辣酱。你的死亡爪蛋是怎么吃的，朋友？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8AA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I plan on wearing a deathclaw's head when I serve as vexillarius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打算在我成为军团旗手的时候戴上死亡爪的头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good choice, amicus. I hear Caesar himself takes his eggs in this fashion. I'm certain...
ESP.TRADUIT: 明智的选择，顾问。我听说凯撒本人就是如此行事的。我确信……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Curtains! Here he comes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 完蛋！他来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8B0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 油炸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We are of one mind, then. Small wonder we made short work of these simple creatures. Soon we'll make them extinct. It's the will of Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我们的意见是一致的，难怪我们能轻而易举的搞定这些简单的生物。很快我们就会让它们灭绝，这是凯撒的意志。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Curtains! Here he comes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 完蛋！他来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8B3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scrambled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 炒蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand this is how Legate Lanius takes them, by downing five dozen eggs each morning. No wonder he's roughly the size of a barge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我所知，拉尼厄斯特使就是这样吃的，每天早上吃下五打蛋。难怪他有一艘驳船那么大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Curtains! Here he comes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 完蛋！他来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8B4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Raw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 生吃。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unconventional, but a healthier option. I applaud your dedication to salubrious living. Gluttony is a vice of profligates and deathclaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非传统，但更健康的选择，我赞赏你对健康生活的奉献精神。暴饮暴食是堕落者和死亡爪的恶习。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Curtains! Here he comes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 完蛋！他来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8B2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poached.
ESP.TRADUIT: 水煮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a close second for me. Let's go gather up more eggs and make some! Not like anything is here to stop us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这对我来说是非常接近的第二名。我们去收集更多的蛋做一些吧！没有什么能阻止我们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Curtains! Here he comes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 完蛋！他来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayKrodh_0002B8B1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I prefer omelettes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我更喜欢煎蛋卷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a fucking day, huh? Why did you have to float into my life, you stupid fucking robot? I had a good life, you know that? A damn good life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是该死的一天，嗯？你为什么要闯入我的生活，你这个该死的蠢机器人？我的生活很美好，你知道吗？很他妈的美好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLeMayEa_0002BCDD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a day... what a day. I had a good thing going over there, robot. You and your little crusade just pissed in my face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多糟糕的一天...多糟糕的一天啊。我在那里过得很好，机器人，你和你的小斗争惹毛我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLeMayAr_0002C0F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had a roof over my head, good food, pussy! Real, high-grade pussy on demand! You know what it's like to have a two hundred year dry spell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有地方住，有好吃的，还有逼操！真正的，需求的高档逼！你知道连续两百年干旱是什么感觉吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLeMayAr_0002C0F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But oh no! I'm a special little robot who's programmed to do good! Do you even have a real conception of what you did? How many lives you ruined?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，噢，不！我是一个特殊的小机器人，被设定为做善事！你知道自己做了什么吗？你毁了多少人的生活？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLeMayAr_0002C0F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course not, you fucking donkey! Oh, and I hate to break it to you - you're not Curtis LeMay! You're a cheap, second-rate imitation!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然不是，你这头蠢驴！哦，我不想打击你，你不是柯蒂斯·李梅！你是一个廉价的，二流的仿制品！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLeMayAr_0002C0F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And even if you were the real LeMay, I wouldn't be impressed. A fat, overrated mass murderer! Give me Robin Olds over that slob any day!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算你是真的李梅，我也不会佩服你的。一个肥胖的，被高估的大屠杀凶手！我宁愿选罗宾·奥尔兹！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLeMayAr_0002C0F4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ace... Yoblanski... is an American hero... who died fighting Chinese communists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 王牌...约布兰斯基...是一位美国英雄...他在与中国共产党的战斗中牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceDe_0002C100_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But...
ACE YOBLANSKI IS AN AMERICAN HERO WHO DIED FIGHTING CHINESE COMMUNISTS!
ESP.TRADUIT: “王牌”约布兰斯基是一位美国英雄，他在与中国共产党的战斗中牺牲了！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceDe_0002C103_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to talk about this... ever. Let's go burn some dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想讨论这个...永远。我们去烧狗吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceDe_0002C103_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It doesn't...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ace... Yoblanski... is an American hero... who died fighting Chinese communists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 王牌...约布兰斯基...是一位美国英雄...他在与中国共产党的战斗中牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceDe_0002C101_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why...
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么...

ESP.ORIGINAL: ACE YOBLANSKI IS AN AMERICAN HERO WHO DIED FIGHTING CHINESE COMMUNISTS!
ESP.TRADUIT: “王牌”约布兰斯基是一位美国英雄，他在与中国共产党的战斗中牺牲了！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceDe_0002C104_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to talk about this... ever. Let's go burn some dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想讨论这个...永远。我们去烧狗吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceDe_0002C104_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ace... Yoblanski... is an American hero... who died fighting Chinese communists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 王牌...约布兰斯基...是一位美国英雄...他在与中国共产党的战斗中牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceDe_0002C102_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a bunch...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一堆...

ESP.ORIGINAL: ACE YOBLANSKI IS AN AMERICAN HERO WHO DIED FIGHTING CHINESE COMMUNISTS!
ESP.TRADUIT: “王牌”约布兰斯基是一位美国英雄，他在与中国共产党的战斗中牺牲了！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to talk about this... ever. Let's go burn some dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想讨论这个...永远。我们去烧狗吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceDe_0002C105_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're full of...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你满脑子...

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... never want to talk about this... ever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...再也不想谈论这个...永远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceDe_0002C0FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go burn some dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们去烧狗吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceDe_0002C0FF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're not expecting it. Grasshopper Junction is an important juncture on 93. Remember Nipton? Searchlight? How about a little payback?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们想不到的。蚱蜢路口是93号公路的重要路口，还记得尼普顿吗？探照灯营地呢？要不要报个小仇？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll get to snuff out that commie pretender... and you can give the Legion a taste of its own medicine... with interest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要消灭那个共产主义伪装者...你可以让军团尝尝自己的苦果...带着利息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're expecting us to do the ethical, noble thing... so they can harry us all the way to the river. Fuck that. Turn the tables and give them fire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们希望我们做有道德、高尚的事情...这样他们就能把我们一路赶到河边了。去他妈的，扭转局势，给他们点颜色看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you so set on attacking Grasshopper Junction?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么这么想攻击蚱蜢路口？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's on a major thoroughfare that links Chloride to 93. Lots of civilian "subjects" who passively prop up the Legion's economy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在一条连接克洛赖德和93号公路的主干道上。大量的平民“臣民”，被动的支撑着军团的经济。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are no innocents in war. We're going to kill everything we see... they'll be too busy rebuilding and burying bodies to worry about the dam!
ESP.TRADUIT: 战争中没有无辜者。我们要杀死我们看到的一切...他们会忙着重建和掩埋尸体而无暇顾及大坝！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All this bullshit about safe roads and happy caravans is going up in smoke at Grasshopper Junction. War is hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有这些关于道路安全和欢乐商队的屁话都将在蚱蜢路口化为乌有。战争就是地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you know about Grasshopper Junction?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对蚱蜢路口了解多少？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're propping up this bullshit. Who runs the caravans, grows most of the food or oversees manufacturing? Slaves only do menial work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们在支持这些狗屁。谁经营商队，谁种植大部分食物，谁监督制造业？奴隶只做杂活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You live under a Legion banner, you die under a Legion banner. There's no middle ground. It's the ugly truth. Might as well embrace it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你生在军团的旗帜下，死在军团的旗帜下，没有中间地带。这是丑陋的真相，不妨接受它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, I want to see that communist impersonator squirm as I burn down another town around him. It'll be good, clean fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，我想看到那个共产主义伪装者在我烧毁他周围的另一个城镇时感到不安。这会很好，很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it really necessary to kill civilians?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的有必要杀害平民吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen to your heart... I promise it says, "Burn the fuckers."
ESP.TRADUIT: 倾听自己的内心...我保证上面写着“烧死那些混蛋。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need more time to decide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要更多的时间来决定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're over by the campsite, chowing down on legionaries. Bon appetite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们在营地那边，吃着军团士兵。好胃口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage65_0002C5C0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are the slaves?
ESP.TRADUIT: 奴隶们怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't stutter. What, you thought they were all noble savages, just yearning to breath free? Grow up, cupcake. They're animals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有结巴。怎么，你以为他们都是渴望自由呼吸的高贵野蛮人？成熟点吧，精神小伙。他们是动物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage65_0002C5C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make sure you don't trip and fall on the way back, they'll pounce on you like a wounded deer, carve you up faster than you can say vegetarian.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确保你不会在回来的路上摔倒，他们会像一只受伤的鹿一样扑向你，把你切成碎片，快得你都说不出素食主义者的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage65_0002C5C1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe so. I understand that hunger can make you desperate. Never went fully Donner Party, but I've partaken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是吧。我明白饥饿会让人绝望，我从没参加过真正的当纳聚会，但我享受过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage65_0002C5C2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, maybe they'll share with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，也许他们会和我分享。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're all going to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都会死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage65_0002C5C3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if we get this rusty bitch off the ground, it will take the hand of God to get us there in one piece. I'm fine with it, honestly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使我们能让这生锈的婊子离开地面，也要靠上帝之手才能让我们毫发无损的到达那里。老实说，我无所谓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage65_0002C5C3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always reckoned I'd die in an aircraft... beats wasting away in some shack or getting eaten by wild animals. Just my opinion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直以为我会死在飞机上...总比在窝棚里浪费时间或者被野兽吃掉要好。这只是我的看法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage65_0002C5C3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really think this plane can get us to Vegas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真觉得这架飞机能把我们带到维加斯吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get this straight - I wasn't pretty good, satisfactory or okay... I'm the greatest pilot who ever lived. The Red Baron don't have shit on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们直说吧...我不是很好，令人满意或者还行...我是有史以来最伟大的飞行员。红男爵也他妈不配跟我比。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage65_0002C5C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I shot down seven Chinese fighters in one day. Broke the speed and altitude records... laughed while I pulled enough Gs to break Christ in half.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一天之内击落了七架中国战斗机，打破了速度和高度的记录...一边狂笑一边顶着能把耶稣撕成两半的过载！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage65_0002C5C4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody... and I mean nobody... can match me behind a stick. You keep delivering mail, and I'll stick to flying, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人...我是说没有人...能和我比一比。你继续送邮件，我继续飞，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage65_0002C5C4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: LeMay said you were a great pilot. I'm starting to have my doubts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李梅说你是个伟大的飞行员，我开始怀疑了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything and everything, okay? If it looks useful, bring it. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都行，好吗？如果它看起来有用，就拿来。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage65_0002C5C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, we'll go look for parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们去找零件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just go do your part... I'll be ready to eat vitamin G when the time comes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去做你该做的...到时候我会准备好吃维生素G的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage65_0002C5C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, we'll go wade through deathtraps while you tinker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你修修补补的时候我们去趟死亡陷阱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zulu Site 21 is a supply depot that doubles as an emergency aircraft service center. It hosts strategic reserves of critical components.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祖鲁21号基地是一个补给站，同时也是一个紧急飞机服务中心。它拥有关键部件的战略储备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarWhatP_0002CBE1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This facility also hosts an experimental weather system that aids in concealing the airstip and bunker. It is currently operating at 95% efficiency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个设施还拥有一个试验性的气象系统，有助于隐藏机场和地堡。目前它的运行效率为95%。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarWhatP_0002CBE1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have a small armory, but our primary mission is to maintain the most crucial link in the supply chain: lubricants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有一个小型的军械库，但我们的主要任务是维护供应链中最关键的一环：润滑油。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarWhatP_0002CBE2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any weapons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么武器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oil, grease, transmission fluid, petroleum jelly, gel lubricants, anything and everything that reduces friction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 机油，润滑脂，传动液，凡士林，凝胶润滑剂，任何可以减少摩擦的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarWhatP_0002CBE3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Note the fluid, free movement of my joints. Hear any squeaking or grinding? No. That's because I use lubricants every day. So should you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意我关节的流畅和运动的自由，听到吱吱声或摩擦声了吗？没有。那是因为我每天都要用润滑剂，你也应该这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarWhatP_0002CBE3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lubricants?
ESP.TRADUIT: 润滑油？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am the chief caretaker. I conduct preventative maintenance, checks and services on all our equipment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是首席管理员。我对我们所有的设备进行预防性维护、检查和服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarWhoYo_0002CBE4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am proud to report there are no faults at this time. All our slides are green, General LeMay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很自豪地报告，目前没有任何错误。我们所有的滑动都是正常的，李梅将军。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarWhoYo_0002CBE4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only myself and a handful of maintainers. This is just a small supply depot with temporary quarters for aircrews.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有我和几个维护人员。这只是一个为机组人员提供临时住所的小补给站。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarWhoYo_0002CBE5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anyone else in here with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他人跟你在一起吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The facility is at your disposal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个设施任你使用。
