ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarLookA_0002CBDD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're going to have a look around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要四处看看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which airframe? We have reserves for all military models, but most are reserved for our vertibird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哪种机身？我们有所有军用型号的储备，但大部分是为我们的飞鸟保留的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarStayO_0002CBDE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're looking for aircraft parts. Do you have any to spare?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在找飞机零件，你有多余的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, we have an operational craft in our hangar. General LeMay is licensed and qualified to operate this craft.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我们的机库中有一架可操作的飞机，李梅将军有驾驶的执照和资格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarStayO_0002CBDF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may utilize it if the mission dictates, but you'll have to sign a hand receipt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果任务需要，你可以使用它，但你必须签一个亲笔收据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarStayO_0002CBDF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your vertibird?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的飞鸟？

ESP.ORIGINAL: To the left and down the stairs. Go past the reactor and take a right. Can't miss it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 向左走下楼梯，过了反应堆，右转。不会错过的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarStayO_0002CBE0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is this vertibird?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这飞鸟在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it'll work. We'll be back at Nellis faster than you can say "Caesar's Sweaty Tits". I've logged over a hundred hours in this model.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，能行。我们会在你说出“凯撒的臭奶子”之前就回到内利斯。我在这个型号上工作了一百多个小时。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayVerti_0002CC52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll have to strip out weapons and some of the comms to accomodate all the passengers, but it'll buff. I've made do in much worse circumstances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得把武器和一些通讯装置拆掉，以便容纳所有的乘客，但它会变强的。更糟糕的情况我也凑合。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayVerti_0002CC52_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did something similar to the B-29s when we firebombed Tokyo. Ask me later, I'll tell you all about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 做了类似于B-29轰炸东京的事情。过会儿再问我，我会告诉你一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayVerti_0002CC52_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will this work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这能行吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I fly it? Can I fly it! Rotary-wing is my specialty! Pilot, gunner, crew chief... I did it all in Alaska! Can I fly it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能飞吗？我能飞吗！旋翼可是我的专长！飞行员、机枪手、机长..我都在阿拉斯加做过！我能飞吗...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayVerti_0002CC4F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you fly it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能飞吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: What now? I'm going to get this puppy prepped... shouldn't take more than a few hours. There's a helipad on the white building. I'll meet you there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在呢？我要把这只小狗准备好...应该不会超过几个小时。白色的建筑上有一个直升机停机坪，我们在那儿见！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayVerti_0002CC50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll let you in on a little secret... every one of my pistol quals were pencil-whipped. I do my fighting in the air. Better for everyone involved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉你一个小秘密...我的手枪资格考试都是用铅笔打的。我在空中作战，这对所有人都有好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage70_0002CCA1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gonna help out with the ambush?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要帮我搞定伏击吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This has got to be the weirdest day of my life... I just... you know what? Fuck it, let's ride.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一定是我一生中最奇怪的一天...我只是...你知道吗？操他妈的，冲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage70_0002CCA3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't have as much time in rotary wing, but I can do it in a pinch. Never thought I'd say this... but God bless the Enclave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没花那么多时间在旋翼上，但必要时我也能做到。从没想过我会这么说...但是上帝保佑英克雷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage70_0002CCA3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We won't be needing the plane. We found an Enclave bunker with a working vertibird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不需要飞机了。我们发现了一个英克雷地堡，里面有一架还能运转的飞鸟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might want to double-check the corpses and buildings for explosives before you get set up. Take your time... fast. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你准备之前最好再检查一下尸体和建筑物里有没有爆炸物。慢慢来...快点。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage70_0002CCA0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more questions. I'll get started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没别的问题了，我要开始了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only way that plane gets off the ground is if the prophet Elijah descends on a chariot of fire and magic-drags it back to Nevada.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一能让飞机起飞的方法就是先知以利亚坐着烈火战车用魔法把它拖回内华达州。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage70_0002CCA2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This weather isn't helping, either. Even if it were in good condition, we couldn't fly in this sandy bowl of shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天气也不太好。即使飞机状况很好，我们也不能在这个沙坑里飞行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceStage70_0002CCA2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are the repairs going?
ESP.TRADUIT: 修理得怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Muscle memory, nothing more. There's always unintended consequences, too. They're liable to end up raiders, cannibalizing caravans! Seen it happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 肌肉记忆，仅此而已。也总是会有意想不到的后果，他们很有可能成为掠夺者，吞噬商队！我亲眼见过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLiving0_0002D0CD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, my heart tells me it was good. My brain? The brain scarred with blood, misery and hunger? It tells my heart to go fuck itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我的心告诉我这很好。我的大脑呢？被鲜血、痛苦和饥饿弄得伤痕累累的大脑？它告诉我的心去你妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLiving0_0002D0CD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think that deep down... it made you feel good to help those slaves escape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为在内心深处...帮那些奴隶逃跑让你感觉很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a chance, I'm working on overtime. I'll punch out when I'm dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不可能，我在加班。等我死了，我就打卡下班。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLiving0_0002D0CE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you stop being a full-time asshole for one second?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能不能别整天当个混蛋？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really believe that, don't you? Like some kind of wild-eyed cult leader who believes their own crackpot sermons. To be fair, they do get laid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的相信，是吗？就像某个狂热的邪教领袖相信他们自己的疯狂布道。说句公道话，他们确实有逼操。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLiving0_0002D0CC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just don't see the value in... sentimental gestures. The Legion understood that the collective was everything. Everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是看不出这有什么价值...感情用事。军团明白集体就是一切，全部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLiving0_0002D0CC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why take the risk? For bums that you don't know, who were probably headhunters until the Legion put them to work... why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么要冒这个险？为了那些你不认识的流浪汉，在军团让他们工作之前，他们可能是猎头族...为什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLiving0_0002D0CC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Karma] Helping people isn't a weakness. It's a source of strength.
ESP.TRADUIT: [业力]帮助别人不是弱点，这是力量的源泉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aw, couldn't convince the mean ol' zombie to believe in the power of good? You want optimism? Read a fortune cookie. I deal in reality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎哟，难道不能说服那个刻薄的老僵尸相信善良的力量吗？想要乐观？去读签饼啊，我只认现实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLiving0_0002D0CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind, this is a waste of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了，这是在浪费时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plenty of fucking left to be had before I do it to myself. Thanks for the suggestion, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我自己动手之前还有很多事要做，不过还是谢谢你的建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLiving0_0002D0CA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, go fuck yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 转念一想，你还是去死吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Credentials recognized. This facility is at your disposal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 身份已认证，本设施供您使用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarIntro_0002D0F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Major Major Major Major.
ESP.TRADUIT: 少校少校少校少校。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I apologize, General LeMay. We are not accustomed to hosting members of the United States Air Force.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我道歉，李梅将军。我们不习惯接待美国空军的成员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarIntro_0002D0F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are hereby authenticated. Full access is granted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 特此证明您的身份，已授予完全访问权限。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarIntro_0002D0F0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't you see I'm travelling with General LeMay himself? Show some respect, private!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没看到我是和李梅将军一起来的吗？放尊重点，二等兵！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Incorrect. Aggression noted. Be advised, if you persist I will use lethal force to prevent intrusion. Authenticate or vacate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不正确。注意到攻击性，请注意，如果你坚持我将使用致命武器阻止你的入侵。验证或取消。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarIntro_0002D0F2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't need no credentials. I don't have to show you any stinkin' credentials!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不需要任何证明，我不用给你看什么臭证件！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Credentials recognized. This facility is at your disposal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 身份已认证，本设施供您使用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarIntro_0002D0F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Initiate factory override. Authentication: Snowglobe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 启动出厂覆盖，身份验证：雪花球。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will answer to the United States of America!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要对美利坚合众国负责！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarIntro_0002D0EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I don't have to answer to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我没必要对你负责。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Credentials recognized. This facility is at your disposal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 身份已认证，本设施供您使用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarIntro_0002D0F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All personnel will be on standby to assist in the event of an attack by outside aggressors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有人员将随时待命，以便在外部侵略者发动攻击时提供协助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Oscar [0202CBD1] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\RobotProtectron\aaDetLeMay_aaDetOscarIntro_0002D0F1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Enclave] "Dear old friends, remember Navarro."
ESP.TRADUIT: [英克雷]“亲爱的老朋友们，记住纳瓦罗。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before takeoff, I may have... altered the reactor in that bunker. Minor tweaks for... efficiency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 起飞前，我可能...改了地堡里的反应堆。轻微的调整...效率。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayStage_0002D519_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you suddenly in such a hurry?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么突然这么着急？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I initiated a fail-deadly shutdown that will trigger a minor explosion. Nothing major, just a few... kilotons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我启动了一个致命故障停机程序，会引发一场小爆炸。没什么大不了的，就几千吨而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayStage_0002D51A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What exactly did you do to the reactor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底对反应堆做了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is gonna be amazing! Me and Ace, flying together!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一定会很棒的！我和王牌，一起飞行！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayStage_0002D517_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll be cutting it on close on weight capacity, but it'll get us to Nellis. She's a sexy beast, flies straight and true.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会把它的荷载压缩到能承受的极限范围，但它能让我们到达内利斯。她是一头性感的野兽，笔直而真实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayStage_0002D518_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think this vertibird can make the trip?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得这架飞鸟能飞过去吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's less than ideal, but it'll work. Visibility will be the chief concern, but we'll be fine once we get above 500 feet or so. Full send.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然不太理想，但能行。能见度是首要问题，但只要我们升到500英尺左右就没事了。全力以赴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayStage_0002F608_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about the sandstorm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 沙尘暴怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you! I figure that if we can't use this place, neither should the Legion... or anyone else... for a few hundred years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你！我想如果我们不能利用这个地方，军团也不能...或者其他人...几百年来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayStage_0002D51B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, now you understand why time is of the essence. Let's move!
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，现在你明白了为什么时间很重要了。我们走吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayStage_0002D51B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good call.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明智之举。

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the absence of orders, a good leader takes initiative. That's what I did. I saw a means to hurt the Legion, so I pounced.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在没有命令的情况下，一个好的领导者会主动出击，我就是这么做的。我看到了伤害军团的手段，就扑了上去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayStage_0002D51C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I stand by this decision. If you don't like it, send a letter to the ashes of the Pentagon, because I don't apologize for winning! Let's go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我坚持这个决定。如果你不喜欢，给五角大楼的废墟寄封信吧，因为我不会为获胜而道歉！我们走吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Why in the hell would you do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你到底为什么要这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They would never... Medusa? Medusa... heel! Medusa, no!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们绝不会...美杜莎？美杜莎...可恶！美杜莎，不要！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetTulliusAni_0002D53E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Whistle to Medusa> Girls, it's time you played for the winning team.
ESP.TRADUIT: <对美杜莎吹口哨>姑娘们，是时候为胜利的一方而战了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, don't touch my babies!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，别碰我的宝贝！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetTulliusTP_0002DE07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Point to LeMay> We're going to roast your dogs and force-feed them to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: <指着李梅>我们要烤了你的狗，然后强行喂给你吃。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay away from my girls, you wretched machine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 离我的姑娘们远点，你这卑鄙的机器！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetTulliusGoT_0002D53C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Signal to LeMay> LeMay, burn the dogs first... and make him watch.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给李梅信号>李梅，先把狗烧了...让他看着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't be so arrogant when the bitches are tearing you apart. Medusa, meat!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当婊子们把你撕碎的时候，你就不会那么傲慢了。美杜莎，肉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetTulliusKil_0002D53B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar died like a little bitch. So will you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒死得像个小婊子，你也会的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Medusa... you and the bitches send these profligates to Hades.
ESP.TRADUIT: 美杜莎...你和那些婊子们把这些堕落者送进地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetTulliusCoo_0002D53A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah, I don't think you will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我觉得你不会的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Medusa... you and the bitches send these profligates to Hades.
ESP.TRADUIT: 美杜莎...你和那些婊子们把这些堕落者送进地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetTulliusCow_0002D539_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gonna use that rifle or stand there looking stupid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是要用那把步枪还是傻站在那儿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Harsh, especially after his heroic efforts at Willow Spring. He suffered for years under the oppressive influence of Legion indoctrination.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太苛刻了，尤其是在他在柳树泉的英勇努力之后。他在军团教化的压迫性影响下忍受了多年。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceEn_0002D982_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't imagine the horrors he endured at their hands... the pain they must've inflicted on him. It took great strength of character to break free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无法想象他在他们手中经受了怎样的恐怖...他们一定给他带来了痛苦。挣脱束缚需要极大的人格力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceEn_0002D982_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We will never see his like again. Now let's go burn some dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们再也见不到像他那样的人了。现在我们去烧狗吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceEn_0002D982_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was a piece of shit who actively aided the Legion. Good riddance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个积极帮助军团的混蛋，终于解脱了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hindsight always affords perfect clarity. Would I do some things differently? Absolutely. But taking that step... to liberate Ace and the slaves...
ESP.TRADUIT: 后见之明总是一目了然。我会做一些不同的事情吗？绝对。但是迈出这一步...解放王牌和奴隶们...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceEn_0002D980_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe it was all worth it. Besides, we put an entire Legion settlement to the torch. That's always a good day's work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信这一切都是值得的。而且，我们把整个军团的据点都烧掉了，这总是一天的好工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceEn_0002D980_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This entire misadventure has been painfully stupid. I'm glad it's over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这整个不幸的经历真是愚蠢得令人痛苦，我很高兴一切都结束了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He had his share of... foibles... may have strayed for a bit... but in the end he remained true to the guiding principles of America.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有他的一份...缺点...可能是误入歧途了...但最终他仍然忠实于美国的指导原则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceRe_0002D97F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We will never see his like again. Now let's go burn some dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们再也见不到像他那样的人了。现在我们去烧狗吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceRe_0002D97F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was a deeply flawed man who chose to redeem himself by helping others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是一个有严重缺陷的人，他选择通过帮助别人来赎罪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He had his share of... foibles... may have strayed for a bit... but in the end he remained true to the guiding principles of America.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有他的一份...缺点...可能是误入歧途了...但最终他仍然忠实于美国的指导原则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceEn_0002D984_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We will never see his like again. Now let's go burn some dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们再也见不到像他那样的人了。现在我们去烧狗吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceEn_0002D984_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care. I'm just glad we hurt the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也不在乎，我很高兴我们伤害了军团。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He had his share of... foibles... may have strayed for a bit... but in the end he remained true to the guiding principles of America.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有他的一份...缺点...可能是误入歧途了...但最终他仍然忠实于美国的指导原则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceEn_0002D981_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We will never see his like again. Now let's go burn some dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们再也见不到像他那样的人了。现在我们去烧狗吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayAceEn_0002D981_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was all right, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想他还好吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You already know the answer. I spent two hundred years burying that part of myself... seeing hope in their eyes was... haunting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经知道答案了。我花了两百年时间埋葬自己的那一部分...看到他们眼中的希望...令人难以忘怀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLiving0_0002D9D3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even after all I've done to them... they still believed I could help them. I... I don't understand it, but I felt it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使我对他们做了那么多...他们仍然相信我能帮助他们。我...我不明白，但我感觉到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLiving0_0002D9D3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe... maybe it can be different. We'll talk later, got work to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许...也许会有所不同。我们晚点再谈，还有工作要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLiving0_0002D9D3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was more rewarding? Endless self-indulgence or risking your neck to help these slaves?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么更有价值？无尽的自我放纵，还是冒着生命危险去帮助这些奴隶？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I know you're talking right out of your ass. I've been there, done that. Like I said before... there were some dark days with the warlords.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你说的都是屁话，我也经历过。就像我之前说的...与军阀之间有过一段黑暗的日子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLiving0_0002D9D4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet if you'd spent time as a slave you'd have more empathy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌如果你当过奴隶你会更有同情心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I, uh... well, I thought it was all wrapped up. A nonstop orgy while I worked for diabolical hard-asses. Just resigned myself to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，呃...好吧,我以为一切都结束了。不停的纵情狂欢，而我却在为那些可恶的混蛋工作，我只是听天由命罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLiving0_0002D9D2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe... maybe it can be different. We'll talk later, got work to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许...也许会有所不同。我们晚点再谈，还有工作要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ace Yoblanski [020261C3] (mod) Quest : ([020261C1]aaDetAceStuff) Ace Yoblanski's Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericGhoulVoiceType\aaDetAceSt_aaDetAceLiving0_0002D9D2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know what it's like to get a new lease on life. You have a clean slate. Use it for good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道重获新生是什么感觉。你从头再来了，好好利用它吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: End of the line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 穷途末路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpFor_0002E281_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Throw down your weapons, we've got you dead to rights. Resist and we'll cut you down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放下武器，我们已经抓住你们了。反抗的话，我们就砍了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpFor_0002E281_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tactical retreat!
ESP.TRADUIT: 战术撤退！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpFor_0002E28C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to personally deliver your head to the big shots who hired you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会亲自把你的头交给雇佣你的大人物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tactical retreat!
ESP.TRADUIT: 战术撤退！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpFor_00033013_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I chop head, make present.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我切头，做礼物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your funeral. Go hot, boys!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的葬礼。加油，伙计们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpCoo_0002E291_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> We're not giving up our weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我们不会放弃武器的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: John Sharp, Rampart. Contracted to shut down this little crusade of yours. You pissed in the face of some serious big shots. I salute you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰·夏普，壁垒，我奉命来阻止你的小远征。你惹毛了一些大人物，我向你致敬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpWho_0002E28A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to tie up loose ends. We can do this the easy way... or we can do it in the way that ends with me skinning you all alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来收拾残局的。我们可以用简单的方法...或者我们可以用我把你们活剥了的方式来解决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpWho_0002E28A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go easy, and I'll be easy. Make things hard and I'll take my time with your people, starting with that kid... and I'll make you watch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你放松点，我就放松点。让事情变得棘手，我会慢慢对付你的人，从那孩子开始...我会让你看着的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpWho_0002E28A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charles Augen's head. Goddamn if he didn't put up one hell of a fight. We got it done, but what a mess. Gnomes as IEDs... how fucked up is that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 查理斯·奥根的头。可恶，他要是不反抗就好了，我们搞定了，但真是一团糟。地精是简易爆炸装置...这有多操蛋？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpWho_0002E28B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, he was a warrior to the last. I hate to disrespect him like this, but a job is a job. Bellek wants heads, he's gonna get heads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，他到死都是个战士，我不想这么不尊重他，但工作就是工作。贝莱克想要人头，他就会得到人头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpWho_0002E28B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's in the box?
ESP.TRADUIT: 盒子里有什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Different circumstances, I'd be happy to oblige you. Job is a job, though. No witnesses. Nothing personal, but that's what the boss wants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果情况不同，我很乐意效劳。不过，工作就是工作，没有目击者。不是针对你，但这是老板想要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpWho_0002E290_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I applaud the chivalric instinct, though. Once fought a chieftain in a duel, gave me a scar on my chest. Nothing builds character like a knife fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我为骑士的本能喝彩。有一次我和一个酋长决斗，他在我胸口留了一道疤，没有什么比械斗更能培养人的品质了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpWho_0002E290_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't we leave the boy and the civilians out of this? Settle it ourselves?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们为什么不把那孩子和平民们排除在外呢？自己解决？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm saving you for last. I'm going to enjoy this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把你留到最后，我要好好享受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpDic_0002E292_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> Shut up and get on with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>闭嘴继续吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, we know how that turned out, don't we? No, not taking any chances. Besides, you got no NCR with you. You're just a poor, lost caravan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，我们都知道结果如何，不是吗？不，我不想冒任何风险。再说了，你身边也没有NCR，你只是一个可怜的，迷路的商队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpFor_0002D9E0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once we got word you were... unaffiliated with Mama Bear, it was open season. Law of the wasteland out here, partner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一听说你...和熊妈妈没有关系，那这就是开放期了。这就是废土法则，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpFor_0002D9E0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you going to ask me to hand the boy over like everyone else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不像其他人一样让我把那孩子交出去吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where the hell is Ace? Where the hell have you been? We need to get going, now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 王牌到底在哪里？你到底去哪儿了？我们得走了，马上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayStage_0002DDFC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unacceptable. He's the primary objective for this mission. Your precious slaves are just shitty sprinkles on the cake of Ace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不可接受。他是这次任务的首要目标，你的宝贝奴隶不过是王牌蛋糕上的碎渣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayStage_0002DE04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't have time for this... let's move quickly. Wait, there's movement by that building...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没时间了...让我们快点行动。等等，那栋建筑附近有动静...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayStage_0002DE04_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That kind of irreverent, unpatriotic back talk borders on communist rhetoric. Next thing you'll be jamming your tongue up Lenin's pickled ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种无礼的、不爱国的顶嘴言论几乎是共产主义的修辞。接下来你就得把舌头塞到列宁腌渍过的屁股里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayStage_0002DE05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you're not performing sexual acts on dead communists, would you mind looking for Ace? We don't have much time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你不跟死去的共产主义者做爱的时候，你介意去找王牌吗？我们没多少时间了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayStage_0002DE05_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Am I your zombie's keeper?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是你的僵尸饲养员吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, he's not. I found them all up here snacking on a corpse, herded them into the vertibird. We don't have time for this shit... find Ace!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，他不会。我发现他们都在这里吃尸体，就把他们赶进了飞鸟。我们没时间听这些废话...找到王牌！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayStage_0002DE00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I figured he'd be taking care of the slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为他会照顾那些奴隶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before takeoff, I may have... altered the reactor in that bunker. Minor tweaks for... efficiency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 起飞前，我可能...改了地堡里的反应堆。轻微的调整...效率。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayStage_0002DE02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you suddenly in such a hurry?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么突然这么着急？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I initiated a fail-deadly shutdown that will trigger a minor explosion. Nothing major, just a few... kilotons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我启动了一个致命故障停机程序，会引发一场小爆炸。没什么大不了的，就几千吨而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayStage_0002DE03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All the more reason to get off our asses and find Ace. Enough quibbling, more searching!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们就更应该赶紧去找王牌了。别再狡辩了，多找找看！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayStage_0002DE03_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What exactly did you do to the reactor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底对反应堆做了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rescue? What, you think he was an unwilling captive?
ESP.TRADUIT: 营救？怎么，你以为他是不情愿被俘虏的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetTulliusNoA_0002DE0C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He contacted us. Offered your location in exchange for amnesty and a return to his position as an engineer. Crabro obliged, though I dissented.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他联系我们，用你的位置来换取特赦并让他恢复工程师的职位。克拉布罗答应了，尽管我不同意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetTulliusNoA_0002DE0C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bubo's pet mutant was a surly, impudent eyesore... an affront to our society, whatever his talents. Fortunately for him it was not my decision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布波的宠物变种人是个乖戾无礼的碍眼家伙...不管他有什么才能，都是对我们社会的侮辱。对他来说幸运的是，这不由我来决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetTulliusNoA_0002DE0C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't get away with this. We'll rescue Ace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会得逞的，我们去救王牌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: For a profligate, you have keen instincts for punishment. I wish that mutant was writhing on a cross. Fortunately for him, Crabro had other plans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一个堕落者，你对惩罚有着敏锐的直觉，我真希望那个变种人在十字架上痛苦挣扎。幸运的是，克拉布罗另有安排。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetTulliusNoA_0002DE0D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He contacted us. Offered your location in exchange for amnesty and a return to his position as an engineer. Crabro was far too lenient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他联系我们，用你的位置来换取特赦并让他恢复工程师的职位。克拉布罗太宽容了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetTulliusNoA_0002DE0D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's going to happen to Ace? Crucifixion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 王牌会怎么样？钉十字架？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I live and die under the eyes of Mars. I fight, I die. That is the way of war, and I am at peace with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在玛尔斯的注视下生与死，我战斗，我死亡。这就是战争的方式，我对此很平静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetTulliusNoA_0002DE0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My girls are hungry, though. I wager they'll be fighting over your bones before the day is done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我的姑娘们饿了。我打赌今天结束前他们会为争夺你的骨头而大打出手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tullius Sagitta [0202D526] (mod) Quest : ([02021B1A]aaDetLeMayQuest) Old Aces Never Die EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetTulliusNoA_0002DE0E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really think you can stop us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真觉得你能阻止我们吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No sympathy necessary, that thing wasn't Ace. It was clearly a communist spy in deep cover, brainwashed to aid their shitty revolution.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不需要同情，那家伙不是王牌。很明显，这是一个卧底的共产主义间谍，被洗脑来帮助他们的狗屁革命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRetur_0002E24B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe these savages will pick up arms against their former masters. I'd like that very much. Shit, I'd train them. Something to think about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许这些野蛮人会拿起武器反抗他们以前的主人，我非常喜欢。该死，我要训练他们，值得考虑的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRetur_0002E24B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get them home. Hopefully we can burn some dogs on the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们带他们回家吧。希望我们能在路上烧几条狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRetur_0002E24B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry things didn't work out with Ace. At least we were able to rescue these slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉和王牌的事没能解决，至少我们救出了这些奴隶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That wasn't him... couldn't have been him. That thing was a communist impersonator, a Chinese agent in deep cover. No other explanation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是他...不可能是他。那家伙是个共产主义模仿者，一个卧底的中国特工。没有其他解释了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRetur_0002E24A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really need to burn some dogs. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的需要烧几条狗。我们走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRetur_0002E24A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should never meet your heroes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你永远不应该见到你的英雄。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep talking like that and my visual sensors will classify you as a canid, and then you're fair game.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再这样说话，我的视觉传感器就会把你归类为犬科动物，然后你就成了靶子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRetur_0002E249_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To hell with this, let's go burn some actual dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 管他呢，我们去烧真正的狗吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : LeMay [02006D12] (mod) Quest : ([0200C44F]aaDetLeMayStuff) LeMay's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetLeMayVoiceType\aaDetLeMay_aaDetLeMayRetur_0002E249_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lie to yourself all you want. Ace Yoblanski is a gaping asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随你怎么骗自己，“王牌”约布兰斯基都是个大混蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a threat, it's what's gonna happen. I give the signal and my boys drop ordnance on your faces. Survivors get a "comprehensive interrogation".
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是威胁，这就是将要发生的事。我一发出信号，我的人就会向你们脸上开火，幸存者会得到“全面的审问”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpDon_0002E293_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've peeled apart every type of human, young and old. You're just meat on hooks to me if this goes south. Try me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把各种人都拆解过，老老少少都有。要是事情变糟，你们在我眼里就是钩子上挂的肉。尽管试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpDon_0002E293_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't threaten that boy again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再威胁那个男孩了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love it when they get wound up. Come on, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢他们紧张的样子。那就来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Sharp [020032AE] (mod) Quest : ([02008CCC]aaDetSharpStuff) More Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetSharp_aaDet02SharpDon_0002E294_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I warned you, asshole. I'm killing you first.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我警告过你，混蛋。我先杀了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetour02Micha_0002E29E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go kill Bellek.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们去杀了贝莱克吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why? Even if I change my name, he'll keep coming after me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么？就算我改了名字，他也会一直追着我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetour02Micha_0002E29D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should build a new identity with the Followers and leave the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该在天启追随者那里建立一个新的身份，然后离开莫哈维。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to kill that sonofabitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想杀了那个狗娘养的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetour02Micha_0002E29B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care. This man destroyed my family. He needs to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也不在乎。这个人毁了我的家庭，他必须死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetour02Micha_0002E29C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we do this, you'll have to leave New Vegas for a long time. A very long time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们这么做，你就得离开新维加斯很长时间，很长一段时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to do it myself... but I trust you. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本想自己动手的...但我相信你。我们走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetour02Micha_0002F65D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave Jason Bellek to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把杰森·贝莱克交给我吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the dumbest thing you've ever said.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你说过的最蠢的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetour02Micha_0002F65E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, he has to die. He'll never stop coming after me... or you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，他必须死。他永远不会停止追杀我...或者你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetour02Micha_0002F65E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't we just beat him up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们为什么不揍他一顿呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetour02Micha_0002F65A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind, I guess we'll go kill him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了，我们去杀了他吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think it's murder, but I trust you. Fine, let's go to the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认为这是谋杀，但我相信你。好吧，我们去天启追随者那里吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetour02Micha_0002F65B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Murder is habit-forming, and it changes you forever. You're not that kind of person. I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谋杀会养成习惯，会永远改变你。你不是那种人，我是。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Promise me you'll kill Jason Bellek. He murdered my family, had our friends killed, tried to kill us. He'll never stop. Please, do it for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 答应我你会杀了杰森·贝莱克，他杀了我的家人，让人杀了我们的朋友，还想杀我们，他不会罢手的。求你了，为了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetour02Micha_0002F666_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That depends on the promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这取决于承诺。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. I thought I wouldn't have any family left, but I have you. I hope I see you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。我以为我不会再有家人了，但我还有你，希望还能再见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetour02Micha_0002F665_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我保证。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand. You have your code. I'll have my own code one day... and it won't stop me from killing that sonofabitch. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我理解，你有你的行为准则。总有一天我会有自己的行为准则...那也阻止不了我杀了那个狗娘养的。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetour02Micha_0002F66F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't make that promise, Michael.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没法保证，迈克尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is goodbye, then. Thank you for your help. I'll get Jason Bellek myself... someday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，再见了，谢谢你的帮助。我自己去找杰森·贝莱克...总有一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetour02Micha_0002F667_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm done with all this. You're on your own now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受够了这一切。现在只能靠你自己了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He squeezes your neck with as much force as he can summon. You feel his tears stream onto your neck.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他使出浑身解数地掐住你的脖子。你感受到了他的泪水顺着脖颈流下。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please... make him hurt... for my family. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托...让他受伤...为了我的家人。谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetour02Micha_0002F670_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Hug him> I hope I see you, too. Goodbye, Michael.
ESP.TRADUIT: <抱住他>我希望我也能见到你。再见，迈克尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just... make him hurt for what he did, okay? Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就...让他为自己的所作所为付出代价，好吗？谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetour02Micha_0002F671_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Pat him on the shoulder> Take care of yourself, Michael.
ESP.TRADUIT: <轻拍他的肩膀>照顾好自己，迈克尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be good when Bellek is dead. Thank you for doing this. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 贝莱克死后我会乖乖的，谢谢你这么做。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetour02Micha_0002F672_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do what the Followers say and be a good boy, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 按照天启追随者说的做，做个好孩子，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't... not anymore. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会...再也不会了。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaMichaelAugenVoiceType\aaDetour01_aaDetour02Micha_0002F673_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay strong and don't take shit from anyone. I'll see you again someday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坚强一点，不要被任何人欺负。总有一天我会再见到你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He leans in closely and glances in both directions, mindful of any other observers.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他凑近身子，朝两个方向看了看，没有注意到其他观察者。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Julio [0202F67D] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you the chem guy? You're early, but he could probably use some more Mentats. He likes to jam it up... nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是搞药的吗？你来早了，但他可能需要更多的曼他特。他喜欢把它塞进...算了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Julio [0202F67D] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Julio_0002F68A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Whisper> I have a delivery for your boss. An important delivery.
ESP.TRADUIT: <低语>我有给你老板的快递，重要的交付。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't tell you again. Fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会再说第二遍了。滚蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Julio [0202F67D] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Julio_0002F6A7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Room service!
ESP.TRADUIT: 客房服务！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Julio [0202F67D] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Julio_0002F68D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Perform Drop Seoi Nage>
ESP.TRADUIT: <执行背负投＞

ESP.ORIGINAL: You little shit! I'll gouge out your eyes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个小混蛋！我要挖出你的眼睛！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Julio [0202F67D] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Julio_0002F6A6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Punch him in the nose>
ESP.TRADUIT: <一拳打在他鼻子上>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aaaaggghh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊啊啊啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Julio [0202F67D] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Julio_0002F68B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Blood-Nap] <Shove Blood-Nap into his chest> Jam this.
ESP.TRADUIT: [嗜血之眠]<把嗜血之眠塞进他胸口>塞这个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aaaaagggghhh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊啊啊啊啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Julio [0202F67D] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Julio_0002F68C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Deliver a punch to his liver with bad intentions>
ESP.TRADUIT: <不怀好意地给他的肝脏来一拳>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you on chems? You know who I am? Fuck off... or I'll break your arms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你嗑药了？你知道我是谁吗？滚开...不然我就打断你的胳膊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Julio [0202F67D] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Julio_0002F688_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have business with Jason Bellek. Stand aside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和杰森·贝莱克有事要谈。靠边站。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here I was thinking it would be a boring night. You want it? You got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还以为今晚会很无聊呢。你想要吗？你会得到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Julio [0202F67D] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Julio_0002F689_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I don't think you will.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我觉得你不会的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahh! You fuck! I'll split your fucking head open!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！你他妈的！我要把你他妈的脑袋劈开！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Julio [0202F67D] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Julio_0002F687_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Kick him squarely in the groin> Party in your privates? You got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: <狠狠踢他的腹股沟>在你的私处开派对？你说对了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, okay. Bye, Jason!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的。再见，杰森！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prostitute [0202F691] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Hooke_0002F69B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You better be on your way. There's about to be trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好走吧，麻烦就要来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gee, Jason... bye! You gonna call me? Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀，杰森...再见！你会打电话给我吗？算了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prostitute [0202F691] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericFemaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Hooke_0002F69C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bitches, leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 婊子，走人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you... you're not delivering anything, this is something else. What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么...你不是来送货，这是另一回事。你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Julio's not coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡里奥不会来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did what I had to do. Leadership isn't for the faint-hearted, and NCR is one bad winter away from starvation and collapse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做了我该做的。领导不适合胆小的人，NCR离饥饿和崩溃只有一个糟糕的冬天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't believe it ends like this, though. Gunned down by some low-life while I'm on vacation. Who the hell hired you, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢相信就这样结束了，在我度假的时候被一个下等人枪杀了。到底是谁雇的你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6AF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know how this is going to end. Any last words?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道结局会怎样，还有什么遗言吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd say I'm sorry, but that would be a lie. Michael's old man was weak, so it cost him. I'd probably want the same if I was in the kid's shoes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说对不起，但那是骗人的。迈克尔的父亲很虚弱，所以他付出了代价，如果我是那个孩子，我可能也会这么想的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd offer you money, but I can see you have your mind made up. Fuck it, I'm not going out sober.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本想给你钱，但我知道你已经下定决心了。操，我才不要清醒着出局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6B0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He takes a long gulp, his hand shaking as he holds the bottle.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他长时间地喝了一大口，握着酒瓶的手颤抖着。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's to the utterly fucked New Republic of California, and to all its brave defenders! Cheers and merry fucks to the cunts who spawned you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 敬被彻底搞砸的新加州共和国，敬它所有勇敢的捍卫者！干杯，祝那些生了你的女人快乐！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6B0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not about money. I'm doing it for Michael.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这与钱无关，我是为了迈克尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You NCR? I don't see any badge. I'm not telling you shit. You know who I am? What I can do to you? Walk your happy ass out while you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是NCR的？我没看到什么警徽。我什么都不会告诉你的，你知道我是谁吗？我能做什么？趁你还来得及，赶紧滚出去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6A9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to answer for what you did to the Augens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要为你对奥根一家做的事负责。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that what this is about? King, you fucking... fine, you want to hear my side? I'll give it to you. I'm not a monster. I had my reasons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是为了这个吗？金，你他妈的...好吧，你想听听我的说法吗？我给你。我不是怪物，我有我的理由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6AA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Peter Augen was going to destroy everything. This isn't about my ego... it's about an empire that employs thousands of people, feeds the republic!
ESP.TRADUIT: 彼得·奥根要毁掉一切。这与我的自负无关...这是关于一个雇佣了成千上万人，养活共和国的帝国！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6AA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Peter was weak... and he was a rat. My ranches feed half of California! It's not about me, it's about propping up our republic!
ESP.TRADUIT: 彼得太弱了...他是个叛徒。我的农场养活了半个加州！这不是为了我，而是为了维护我们的共和国！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6AA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have problems... serious problems. You start fucking with the food supply and it can all fall apart. I couldn't afford to hesitate. I acted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有问题...严重的问题，一旦你搞砸了食物供应，一切就会崩溃。我不能再犹豫了，我采取了行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6AA_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not NCR, and I'm damn sure not here to arrest you. Just tell me why you did it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是NCR，我也肯定不是来逮捕你的。告诉我你为什么要这么做吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's who you are... the do-gooder from Goodsprings. What luck... Peter... was a loose end. He would've turned, eventually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是这样的人...清泉镇的慈善家。什么运气...彼得...是一个悬而未决的问题，他最终会变节的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6AB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't get my rocks off having families or random drifters killed. I make hard choices to keep an empire afloat. You think this is easy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会通过杀害平民和流浪汉来找刺激，我做出艰难抉择只为维持帝国不倒。你觉得这很容易吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6AB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody else has the balls to hold it together. The politicians can bitch about my methods, but they still buy our beef! I run this republic!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人有胆量把它维系在一起。政客们可以抱怨我的方法，但他们还是会买我们的牛肉！我掌管着这个共和国！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6AB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Peter Augen wasn't going to testify, but you killed him anyway. You tried to kill me, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 彼得·奥根本来不打算作证，但你还是杀了他。你也想杀了我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You, Peter... and that brat... you're all parasites. Put me down and you take food out of people's mouths. I can't be replaced. No one can do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，彼得...还有那个小鬼...你们都是寄生虫，把我干掉，你才能把食物从别人嘴里拿出来。我是无可替代的，没人能做到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can waltz in here like a desperado and murder me, but you'll always be a bottom-feeding insect... a leech, a pawn in the hands of better men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以像个亡命之徒一样大摇大摆地走进来杀了我，但你永远只能是只吃底层食物的昆虫...一条蚂蝗，一个更优秀的人手中的棋子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6AC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I made history. History! You? You're just another drifter. Get on with it, then. I made my mark. Pull the trigger and get back to irrelevence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我创造了历史，历史！你呢？你不过是另一个流浪汉。那就继续吧，我留下了自己的印记，扣动扳机，回到无关紧要的事情上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6AC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are those your last words?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是你的遗言吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come and get it, puppy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来啊，小狗狗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Attack> I'm putting you down. This is for everyone you hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我会宰了你，这是为了所有被你伤害过的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got a family!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有家人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jason Bellek [0202F69E] (mod) Quest : ([02006FD2]aaDetour02) Go Boy, Go EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Detour.esm\aaDetGenericMaleVoiceType\aaDetour02_aaDetour02Belle_0002F6AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before I end it, you're gonna eat your lying tongue and murdering hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我结束之前，你会吃了你说谎的舌头和杀人的手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to leave for a while. I'll take your advice and work with the Followers, finish my education. After that... I'll keep killing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要离开一段时间。我会接受你的建议和天启追随者一起工作，完成我的学业。之后...我会继续杀人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Men like Bellek... they don't care about the law. He didn't have any remorse. When I'm older I'm going to kill men like him... as many as I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像贝莱克这样的人...他们不关心法律，他没有任何悔意。等我长大了，我要杀了像他这样的人...尽我所能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want them to be afraid... to know what it's like. I won't be afraid again, though. Not ever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让他们害怕...知道那是什么感觉。不过我不会再害怕了，永远不会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm leaving, and I don't want you to interfere. Thank you for everything. I'll pay you back someday... somehow. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要走了，我不想让你干涉。谢谢你所做的一切，总有一天我会报答你的...以某种方式。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little less angry... but just a little. Feels like the weight on me is a little less, but... I know my family isn't coming back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没那么生气了...但只是一点点。感觉身上的负担减轻了一些，但是...我知道我的家人不会回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你感觉如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I guess so. He won't be the last. I know that much now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我想是的。他不会是最后一个，现在我知道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to the international brotherhood of killers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎加入国际杀手兄弟会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do whatever you want. I don't care anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想怎么做就怎么做，我已经不在乎了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Augen [02000DD1] (mod) Quest : ([02000ADD]aaDetour01) Detour EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't mind if I cut off a piece for myself, do you? I bet his meat is... rarified.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不介意我给自己切一块吧？我敢打赌他的肉...很稀有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wolf Departs the Mojave Wasteland
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃尔夫离开莫哈维废土

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wheeler's Exit
ESP.TRADUIT: 惠勒的出口

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yum Yum
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吃

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next Time
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一次

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travel to Yucca Grove.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往丝兰林。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look for Wheeler.
ESP.TRADUIT: 寻找惠勒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak to Wedgwood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟韦奇伍德谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meet Wedgwood outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在外面见韦奇伍德。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with Wedgwood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 处理韦奇伍德。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak to Wheeler.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟惠勒谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 返回莫哈维废土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're Free to Go
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以走了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the man under the overpass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查天桥下的那个人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the trooper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查士兵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the man by the bridge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查桥边的那个人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak to Sebastian.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟塞巴斯蒂安谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell Sebastian when you're ready to travel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好出发的时候告诉塞巴斯蒂安。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guide the runaway slaves to the meeting spot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 引导逃跑的奴隶前往集合地点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak to Cultellus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟库尔特卢斯谈谈，

ESP.ORIGINAL: Defeat Cultellus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 击败库尔特卢斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Assist Cultellus.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)协助库尔特卢斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak to Sebastian.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟塞巴斯蒂安谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guide the runaway slaves to Camp Golf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 引导逃跑的奴隶前往高尔夫营地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Siege of Firebase Augen
ESP.TRADUIT: 围攻奥根火力点

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go Boy, Go
ESP.TRADUIT: 加油孩子，加油

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查峡谷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with John Sharp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对付约翰·夏普。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak to Michael.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟迈克尔谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Search Sharp's corpse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搜查夏普的尸体。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak to Michael.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟迈克尔谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak to Michael about next move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟迈克尔谈谈下一步行动。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 返回莫哈维废土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 返回莫哈维废土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find Jason Bellek.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到杰森·贝莱克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Jason Bellek.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀了杰森·贝莱克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Escort Michael to the Old Mormon Fort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 护送迈克尔去旧摩门要塞。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak to Michael.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟迈克尔谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say your goodbyes to Michael.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟迈克尔说再见吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Promise Michael you'll kill Jason Bellek.
ESP.TRADUIT: 答应迈克尔你会杀了杰森·贝莱克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find Jason Bellek.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到杰森·贝莱克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Jason Bellek.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀了杰森·贝莱克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Freedom!
ESP.TRADUIT: 自由！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Detour
ESP.TRADUIT: 绕行

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the noise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查噪音。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Escort the child to Goodsprings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 护送孩子去清泉镇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sit down and ask Michael about the ambush.
