ESP.ORIGINAL: The Auto-Doc steadily heals the defenders at Charles Augen's residence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自动医生稳定的治疗查理斯·奥根住所的守卫者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Firestorm
ESP.TRADUIT: 烈焰风暴

ESP.ORIGINAL: With LeMay as your companion, fire-based weapons deliver 25% more damage. LeMay's attack's have a chance to make enemies spontaneously combust.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当李梅是你的同伴时，火力武器的伤害提高25%。勒梅的攻击有一定几率使敌人自燃。

ESP.ORIGINAL: LeMay confidently guides you through the craggy desert, stopping briefly to rest after nightfall. Soon thereafter, your party quietly crosses Highway 93 without incident. Just as dawn breaks, LeMay stops and points out the Legion banners in the distance - you have arrived at Big Wash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李梅自信的带着你穿过崎岖的沙漠，在夜幕降临后短暂停下来休息。不久之后，你们一行人平安地穿过了93号高速公路。黎明破晓时，李梅停下来，指着远处的军团旗帜 - 你已经到达了大波浪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Aut viam inveniam aut faciam."
ESP.TRADUIT: “倘若无路，我自开之。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wolf is unconscious but clinging to life. You notice a number of bruises as well as a nasty gash on his scalp. How do you wish to proceed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃尔夫已失去知觉，但仍在苟延残喘。你注意到他的头皮上有很多瘀伤，还有一道严重的伤口。你想如何继续？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave him alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Medical] Treat his injuries.
ESP.TRADUIT: [医学]治疗他的伤势。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Smear Goo Goo Bar chocolate on his wounds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他的伤口上涂抹黏黏巧克力棒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Administer a Stimpak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用治疗针。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You clean the wound on Wolf's head and then stitch it closed. He regains consciousness soon after.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你清理沃尔夫头上的伤口，然后缝合。他很快就恢复了意识。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You lock eyes with Gabriel and shake your head. He exhales with disgust and then leads his fellow slaves towards the mines. LeMay leads your party back to Freddy's without incident. After safely passing through the ghoul-infested tunnels, you arrive back at the Colorado River.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和加布里埃尔对视，摇了摇头。他厌恶的呼了一口气，然后领着他的奴隶同伴向矿井走去。李梅带着你们平安无事地回到了弗莱迪家，在安全通过了食尸鬼出没的隧道后，你回到了科罗拉多河。

ESP.ORIGINAL: LeMay takes charge and charts a course through rough terrain in order to evade Legion patrols. The pace is slow and steady so that the younger followers may keep up. After a night of continuous movement your exhausted party arrives at Willow Spring. The slaves remain behind in a small cave while you, LeMay and Ace conduct reconnaissance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了躲避军团的巡逻，李梅负责指挥并绘制了一条穿越崎岖地形的路线。行程缓慢而稳定，以便年轻的追随者能跟上。经过一个晚上的连续移动，疲惫的一行人到达了柳树泉。奴隶们留在一个小洞穴里，而你，李梅和艾斯负责侦查。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You apply heaping gobs of Goo Goo Bar onto Wolf's injuries. You notice steam rise around his head wound as the oozing chocolate cauterizes the site. The room fills with an oddly intoxicating aroma of dark chocolate, peanut butter and blood. Soon thereafter, Wolf springs to life, his head still smoking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在沃尔夫的伤口上涂了一堆黏黏棒。你注意到，随着渗出的巧克力烧灼他头部的伤口，蒸汽在伤口周围上升。房间里充满了一种奇怪的、令人陶醉的黑巧克力、花生酱和血液的香气。不久，沃尔夫醒了过来，他的脑袋还在冒烟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You inject the Stimpak into Wolf's robust glutes. He produces a deep sigh, passes gas and then regains consciousness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把治疗针注射到沃尔夫强壮的臀部。他深深地叹了口气，放了个屁，然后恢复了意识。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After witnessing Ranger Hart's death, Michael quickly sprints out of sight. You find no signs of the child, who is now set on making his own way in the Mojave Wasteland. It is uncertain if your paths will cross again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目睹了游骑兵哈特的死亡后，迈克尔迅速跑出了你的视线。你没有发现孩子的踪迹，他现在正在莫哈维废土上寻找自己的路。不确定你们的道路是否会再次相交。

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Some men you see every day for ten years and you never notice; some men you see once and they're with you for the rest of your life."
ESP.TRADUIT: “有些人你十年来天天见，却从未注意到；有些人你见过一次，他们就会与你共度余生。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Auto-Doc has been repaired, and is in good working order. Charles Augen and any other defenders will now benefit from steady regeneration.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自动医生已经修复完毕，工作状态良好。查理斯·奥根和其他守卫者现在将从稳定的恢复中受益。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You retrace your steps and return on the path that Mojo charted. Michael is completely silent on the journey, his expression locked in resolute anger. As the sun descends below the mountains behind you, you see Goodsprings in the distance. Michael lets out a sigh but otherwise remains quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你沿着莫乔所绘制的路径返回。迈克尔在旅途中一言不发，他的表情充满了坚决的愤怒，当太阳落在你身后的山脚下时，你看到了远处的清泉镇。迈克尔叹了口气，但还是保持沉默。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Molly has died!
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫莉死了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ranger Hart has died!
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵哈特死了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: LeMay has gone to the Lucky 38.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李梅已经去了幸运38。

ESP.ORIGINAL: LeMay has returned to Goodsprings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李梅回到了清泉镇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: El Oso flashes a menacing grin and then leads his well-fed band of gunslingers out of the hideout. His followers laugh and jeer at Mojo as they file out, confident that the deal ended in their favor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 埃尔奥索露出凶狠的笑容，然后带着他那群吃饱了的枪手离开了藏身之处。他的追随者们鱼贯而出，一边嘲笑着莫乔，一边相信这笔交易最终会对他们有利。

ESP.ORIGINAL: LeMay has died!
ESP.TRADUIT: 李梅死了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Michael dashes away on the road to Primm and quickly disappears around the bend. A few minutes later, you hear a cacophony of growling, barks and then human screams. After a few moments all is silent again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迈克尔在前往普瑞姆的路上飞奔而去，并迅速消失在转弯处。几分钟后，你听到了刺耳的咆哮声，犬吠声，然后是人类的尖叫声。过了一会儿，一切又归于寂静。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
As you investigate the grisly caravan ambush, you detect the acrid scent of gunpowder; the blood and viscera strewn across the road is fresh. You are likely the first person to happen upon the scene.
Soon thereafter, you hear a faint rustling nearby...
ESP.TRADUIT:
当你调查可怕的商队伏击时，你闻到了火药的刺鼻气味，散落在路上的血液和内脏都是新鲜的。你很可能是第一个出现在现场的人。
不久之后，你听到附近传来一阵轻微的沙沙声...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ranger Hart scowls and then shakes her head in disgust. She pivots away and sets out in the direction of the Mojave Outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵哈特皱了皱眉，然后厌恶的摇了摇头。她转身向莫哈维前哨的方向走去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After burying any dead comrades, the surviving slaves begin climbing the steep, rugged trail around Gass Peak. Not long after the group departs, you spot a figure on the ridge dressed in simple, brown robes. He offers a friendly wave before disappearing behind the rocky heights. Soon thereafter, the runaway slaves escape from view, their fates unknown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在埋葬了所有死去的战友后，幸存的奴隶们开始攀登加斯峰附近陡峭崎岖的小径。在这群人离开后不久，你在山脊上看到一个穿着简单棕色长袍的人，他友好地挥了挥手，然后消失在岩石后面。此后不久，逃跑的奴隶们从人们的视线中消失了，他们的命运无人知晓。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You and Mojo snuff out the fire and gingerly move the smoky, appetizing remains of Sugar Tits outside. Mojo frequently kicks Barf in order to prevent him from consuming pieces of Sugar Tits. While you and Mojo dig a spacious grave, Michael finds a strip of wood and creates a makeshift grave marker.
After several hours the task is complete. You all take a moment beside the grave to pay your respects.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你和莫乔把火灭了，小心翼翼地把奶嘴那烟熏的、开胃的残余物移到外面。莫乔经常踢吐吐，以防止他吃掉奶嘴。当你和莫乔挖掘一个宽敞的坟墓时，迈克尔找到了一块木头，做了一个临时的墓碑。
几个小时后，任务完成了。你们都在坟前默哀了片刻，表达你们的敬意。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
LeMay gently scoops up the headless remains of Ace and places them inside the vertibird. He then takes control of the craft and charts a course for Nellis AFB. Just as you cross the Colorado, you feel a powerful shockwave rock the craft, causing the slaves to gasp and shriek in fright. LeMay is unperturbed, however, and deftly pilots the vertibird to a remote stretch of runway where he conducts a textbook landing.
You and LeMay bury Ace's body in a makeshift grave near the vertibird, where your party begins to hold an impromptu funeral service.
ESP.TRADUIT:
李梅轻轻的舀起艾斯的无头残骸，把它们放进了飞鸟。然后，他控制了飞机，绘制了飞往内利斯空军基地的航线。就在你穿过科罗拉多河的时候，你感觉到一股强大的冲击波冲击着飞机，奴隶们吓得喘不过气，纷纷尖叫起来。然而，李梅却泰然自若，他熟练地驾驶着飞鸟飞到了一条遥远的跑道上，在那里他进行了一次教科书式的降落。
你和李梅把艾斯的尸体埋在飞鸟附近的一个临时坟墓里，在那里你们举行了一场即兴的葬礼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After a brief conversation, Ranger Jackson agrees to take Michael into protective custody. He is quickly escorted away and sent back to California with the next caravan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 经过简短的交谈，游骑兵杰克逊同意对迈克尔进行保护性拘留。他很快就被护送走了，和下一支商队一起被送回了加州。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Molly produces a knife and gleefully hacks into Sharp's chest cavity. She then carves out his warm heart and scarfs it down with relish. She proudly exhibits a jubilant smile as blood and gore drip from her face. By all appearances, this is the happiest moment in her life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫莉拿出一把刀，兴高采烈的刺进了夏普的胸腔。然后，她挖出他温暖的心，并津津有味裹了起来。当鲜血从她脸上滴落下来时，她骄傲的露出了欢快的微笑。显然从各方面来看，这都是她一生中最快乐的时刻。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wolf gathers his personal belongings and heads for the exit, only to stop at the threshold. He slowly scans the bakery, releases a mournful sigh and then wipes tears from his eyes. He tips his hat to you and steps out, making sure to gently close the door without a sound.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃尔夫收拾好了他的个人物品，向出口走去，却在门口停了下来。他慢慢地扫视了一圈面包店，发出一声悲伤的叹息，然后擦去了眼泪。他向你脱帽致意，然后走了出去，他轻轻的关上了门，没有发出任何声音。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wolf sings aloud as as he gathers up ingredients and bakes the babka. After you take a few minutes to admire the artful posters in the bakery, you notice a potent, captivating aroma wafting from the oven. Soon thereafter Wolf gleefully retrieves the hot babkas and places them on the counter. After waiting a moment for them to cool, he shares one with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃尔夫一边收集食材，一边大声唱歌，一边烤巴布卡蛋糕。在你花了几分钟欣赏面包房里精美的海报后，你注意到一股强烈而迷人的香味从烤箱里飘了出来。不久之后，沃尔夫高兴的取回热巴布卡蛋糕，把它们放在柜台上。等它们冷却一会儿后，他和你分享了一个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Molly produces a knife and gleefully hacks into Sharp's chest cavity. She then carves out his warm heart and hands the bloody organ to you. While maintaining eye contact, you devour half the heart before handing it back to her. She gives you a reverent nod before scarfing down the remaining half. She proudly exhibits a jubilant smile as blood and gore drip from her face. By all appearances, this is the happiest moment in her life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫莉拿出一把刀，兴高采烈的刺进了夏普的胸腔。然后她挖出他温暖的心，把血淋淋的器官交给你，在保持眼神交流的同时，你吃掉了一半的心脏，然后把它交还给她，她恭敬地点了点头，一口吞下了剩下的一半。当鲜血从她脸上滴落下来时，她骄傲的露出了欢快的微笑。显然从各方面来看，这都是她一生中最快乐的时刻。

ESP.ORIGINAL: More dogs rush to defend Cool Joe!
ESP.TRADUIT: 更多的狗冲过来保护酷乔！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sebastian shepherds the runaway slaves across the street where they encounter a squad of NCR soldiers. You watch through the window as the servicemembers happily assist the slaves and immediately guide the group into shelter. Spear-Hand is curiously absent during the entire affair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 塞巴斯蒂安带领逃跑的奴隶穿过街道，在那里他们遇到了一队NCR士兵。透过窗户，你看到士兵们愉快的帮助奴隶们，并立即把他们带到了庇护所。奇怪的是，矛手在整个事件中都没有出现。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You make your way westward on the Long 15, passing a handful of caravans over the day's journey. As dusk looms, you spot an isolated building in the distance. After getting closer, you manage to peer through the darkness and make out a sign for the Wry Bean Saloon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在漫长的15号公路上向西行驶，在一天的旅程中，你会遇到几辆大篷车。随着黄昏的临近，你发现远处有一座孤立的建筑。走近后，你设法透过黑暗看了看，认出了一个“苦豆沙龙”的招牌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This path leads from Potosi Pass back to the Mojave Wasteland. You are confident that you'll never return here. Are you sure you wish to continue?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这条小路从波托西山口通向莫哈维废土，你确信你再也不会回到这里了。确定要继续吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remain in Potosi Pass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 留在波托西山口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travel to the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往莫哈维废土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: LeMay enters the vertibird and begins prepping it for flight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李梅进入飞鸟，开始为飞行做准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: "The mystery of human existence lies not in just staying alive, but in finding something to live for."
ESP.TRADUIT: “人类生存的奥秘不是简单的为了活着，而是找到活下去的目的。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legionaries have placed a collar on this slave. The device is digging into his neck. He's obviously suffered from their abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团士兵给这名奴隶戴上了项圈，这个装置正扎进他的脖子里。他显然受到了他们的虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the slave to his fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让奴隶自生自灭吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remove the collar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 取下项圈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legionaries have placed a collar on this slave. The device is digging into her neck. She's obviously suffered from their abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团士兵给这名奴隶戴上了项圈，这个装置正扎进她的脖子里。她显然受到了他们的虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the slave to her fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让奴隶自生自灭吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remove the collar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 取下项圈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have learned how to make an Improvised Explosive Gnome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经学会了如何制作简易爆炸地精。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cool Joe and his allies have arrived to help you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 酷乔和他的伙伴们来帮助你了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cool Joe and his allies have departed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 酷乔和他的伙伴们已经离开了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a Mark III Auto-Doc, primarily used for routine surgeries. The control systems have been damaged, rendering the Auto-Doc useless. (Repair 60 or higher required)
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是III型自动医生，主要用于常规手术。控制系统已经损坏，导致自动医生失效。(需要修理60或以上)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave it alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别去碰它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try To Fix It (Repair)
ESP.TRADUIT: 尝试修理(修理)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kick It (Luck)
ESP.TRADUIT: 踢它(运气)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before you can react, Nash presses the muzzle of his silenced .22 pistol against his head and pulls the trigger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你做出反应之前，纳什就用他的.22消音手枪抵住了自己的头，扣动了扳机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After confirming Bellek is dead, Michael bolts out the door and into a waiting elevator. As you scramble to catch him, he gives a heartfelt wave just before the doors shut. Michael's ultimate destination remains unknown to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在确认了贝莱克的死讯后，迈克尔冲出房门，进入了等待他的电梯。你慌忙想去抓住他，但只看到他在电梯门关上前向你真诚的挥了挥手。你仍然不知道迈克尔的最终去向。

ESP.ORIGINAL: John Sharp hands over his knife without a word, then swiftly departs the dusty confines of the tent for parts unknown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰·夏普一言不发的递出他的刀，然后迅速离开了布满灰尘的帐篷，前往未知的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Rules are made for people who aren't willing to make up their own."
ESP.TRADUIT: "规则是为那些不愿意自己制定规则的人制定的。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: Harcourt carefully places the documents in a satchel and then trots away at a rapid pace, never once looking back in your direction. In a few moments he disappears around the bend towards the southern canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈考特小心翼翼地把文件放在一个包里，然后快步离开，一次也没有回头看你的方向。过了一会儿，他消失在南部峡谷的拐弯处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: LeMay hauls two corpses to the spot while you gather props and build a small campfire. LeMay stages the bodies in believable fashion before emplacing a small speaker for broadcasting dialogue. After several hours of work the ambush site is set.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李梅将两具尸体拖到现场，而你则收集道具并生起一个小营火，李梅以一种令人信服的方式布置了这些尸体，然后放置了一个小喇叭来播放对话。经过几个小时的工作，伏击地点已经确定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mojo guides you into the rugged foothills east of Potosi Mountain. He keeps a leisurely pace, stopping frequently to eat snacks and expound at length about his various travels. You sense that your destination is close when Barf alerts at the opening of a narrow gorge. There is trouble ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫乔带领你进入了波托西山东部崎岖的山麓。他保持着悠闲的步伐，经常停下来吃零食，详细阐述他的各种旅行。当吐吐在一个狭窄峡谷的开口处发出警报时，你感觉你的目的地就快到了。前面还有麻烦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mojo guides you into the rugged foothills east of Potosi Mountain. Ranger Hart exhorts Mojo to keep a brisk pace in spite of his grumbling. Although the trip is taxing, you're comforted by a cool breeze as you climb closer to the pass. You sense that your destination is close when Barf alerts at the opening of a narrow gorge. There is trouble ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫乔带领你进入了波托西山东部崎岖的山麓。游骑兵哈特告诫莫乔，尽管他满腹牢骚，但还是要保持轻快的步伐。虽然旅途很累，但当你爬到山口时，凉爽的微风会让你感到安慰。当吐吐在一个狭窄峡谷的开口处发出警报时，你感觉你的目的地就快到了。前面还有麻烦。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dravec quickly scoops up a stunned Michael and tossed him over his shoulder, then quickly strides towards the exit. One of his minions tosses a dingy bag of caps in your lap as they leave.
You lock eyes with Michael just as Dravec carries him out the door; his gaze is one of utter shock and despair, but it transforms into pure hatred just before he disappears beyond the threshold.
ESP.TRADUIT:
德劳韦茨迅速抓起目瞪口呆的迈克尔，把他甩到肩上，然后快步走向出口。他的一个手下在离开时把一袋脏兮兮的瓶盖扔到你腿上。
当德劳韦茨扛着迈克尔走出房门时，你与他目光相遇，他的眼神是极度的震惊和绝望。但就在他消失在门槛外之前，他的眼神变成了纯粹的仇恨。

ESP.ORIGINAL: LeMay has given you the Firestorm perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李梅给你带来了烈焰风暴的特技。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost LeMay's Firestorm perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经失去了李梅的烈焰风暴特技。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Michael eagerly absorbs the fundamentals of firearms safety and basic marksmanship. With more practice, he'll likely develop into a competent shooter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迈克尔急切的学习枪械安全原理和基本射击技术。随着更多的练习，他可能会发展成为一个有能力的射手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: "I know what gold does to men’s souls."
ESP.TRADUIT: "我知道金子能改变人的灵魂。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Eat well, for tonight we dine in Hades."
ESP.TRADUIT: "吃个痛快吧，今晚我们将在地狱用餐！"

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to your medical expertise, you manage to stabilize Molly. She will make a full recovery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多亏了你的专业医学知识，你成功稳定了莫莉的病情。她会完全康复的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This dust-covered, pre-war Mister Gutsy lies inert on the ground. Besides some unusual insignia, you make out the word "LeMay" stenciled over the weathered, blue paint. With adequate skill or the right combination of parts you should be able to restore it to working order. (Repair 60 or higher required; alternatively, 2 Pieces of Scrap Metal, 2 Sensor Modules, and some Scrap Electronics will suffice)
ESP.TRADUIT: 这位满身灰尘的战前勇敢先生躺在地上一动不动。除了一些不寻常的标志，你还能在风化的蓝色油漆上看到“李梅”这个词。有足够的技能或正确的组合部件，你应该能够恢复它的工作状态。(需要修理60或以上；或者，2块废金属、2个传感器模块和一些电子废料就足够了)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the robot alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Repair] Jury rig the robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: [修理]临时装配机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Luck) Kick the robot and swear loudly.
ESP.TRADUIT: [运气]踢机器人并大声咒骂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Repair with parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用零件修理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You conceal yourself behind the Yucca and begin using the call, which emits an uncanny croak. Within a few minutes, you notice dust rising from the nearby ridge and hear vegetation shifting nearby. The Ebony Radscorpion has arrived.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你隐藏在丝兰后面，开始使用呼唤，发出一种不可思议的声音。几分钟后，你注意到附近的山脊上扬起了灰尘，并听到附近的植被在移动。乌黑辐射蝎来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: LeMay boards the vertibird and takes control without saying a single word. Just as you cross the Colorado, you feel a powerful shockwave rock the craft, causing the slaves to gasp and shriek in fright. LeMay is indifferent, however, and deftly pilots the vertibird to a remote stretch of runway where he conducts a textbook landing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李梅登上了飞鸟，一言不发地控制了飞机。就在你穿越科罗拉多河的时候，你感觉到一股强大的冲击波冲击着飞船，奴隶们吓得喘不过气，尖叫起来。然而，李梅无动于衷，他熟练地驾驶着飞鸟飞到一条遥远的跑道上，在那里进行了一次教科书式的降落。

ESP.ORIGINAL: LeMay has been repaired, and is in good working order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李梅已经修复，工作状态良好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mutter a perfunctory goodbye to Michael and then begin the trek back to Goodsprings. Just before you exit the pass, you look back to see him watching you. He waves for a moment, wipes tears from his eyes and then retreats into Charles' compound.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你敷衍地对迈克尔说了声再见，然后开始了返回清泉镇的长途跋涉。就在你离开山口之前，你回头看到他在看着你。他挥了挥手，擦了擦眼泪，然后回到了查理斯的院子里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: More ants rush to defend the queen!
ESP.TRADUIT: 更多的蚂蚁冲过来保卫蚁后！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wheeler gingerly places the documents and dog tags in his vest and then sets out on the Long 15. Gusts of dry wind stir a cloud of dust that shrouds his figure in the darkness; in a few moments he disappears from view.
ESP.TRADUIT: 惠勒小心翼翼地把文件和狗牌放在他的马甲里，然后向着15号公路出发了。一阵干燥的风搅起一团灰尘，让他的身影笼罩在黑暗中，不一会儿，他就从视野中消失了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ajax is now your ally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿贾克斯现在是你的盟友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You patiently wait behind cover into the early morning hours. Strong winds and dust lash the canyon and shake the Joshua trees, but otherwise you fail to discern any movement. Just as you let out a tired sigh, you make out crimson-clad figures moving towards your position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你耐心的躲在掩体后面一直等到凌晨。强风和灰尘冲击着峡谷，摇晃着约书亚树，但除此之外，你看不到任何动静。就在你发出一声疲惫的叹息时，你隐约看到了一个红色的身影正在向你的位置移动。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After starting a small fire, you stay and tend it for several hours as Charles cooks steaks over the open flame. After dusk, everyone gathers to eat and enjoy a moment of tranquility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在生了一堆小火之后，查理斯在明火上烤牛排，你就呆在那里照看它好几个小时。黄昏过后，大家聚在一起吃饭，享受着片刻的宁静。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sugar Tits. Served with me 10 years. Fought In 21 engagements with the Vipers and the Jackals. Cheerful in all weathers. Never shirked a task. Splendid behavior.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奶嘴。跟随我10年，与毒蛇帮和豺狼帮交战21次，风雨无阻，从不逃避任务。出色的表现。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trudy notes Michael's poor condition and offers him some food and soda on the house. Michael smiles in response and retreats to the corner, nervously watching the door as he eats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 楚迪注意到迈克尔的身体状况很差，给了他一些免费的食物和苏打水。迈克尔笑了笑，退到角落里，一边吃一边紧张地看着门口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rampart is retreating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 壁垒正在撤退。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sebastian gathers the escaped slaves and shares the disappointing news. After assuaging their fears and assuring them of success, he guides his companions out of Fay's house and departs in the general direction of the Sheep Mountains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 塞巴斯蒂安召集了逃跑的奴隶，并分享了这个令人失望的消息。在安抚了他们的恐惧并向他们保证成功后，他带领他的同伴们走出了费伊的房子，朝着绵羊山的大致方向离开了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You climb into the confined tunnel and manage to worm your way upwards, eventually reaching the surface. Just as you emerge from the opening, you hear a low rumble and see dust and debris spew from the hole. The entrance is now impassable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你爬进狭窄的隧道，设法向上爬行，最终到达了地面。就在你从洞口出来的时候，你听到一声低沉的隆隆声，看到灰尘和碎片从洞口喷涌而出。入口现在无法通行了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You scan the approaches of the pass for several hours; only the distant howls of coyotes catch your attention in the tranquil darkness. As dawn approaches, you discern movement from the direction of the southern canyon. A lone, unarmed figure steadily approaches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你花了几个小时扫视山口的入口，宁静的黑暗中，只有远处郊狼的嚎叫吸引了你的注意。随着黎明的临近，你可以看到南部峡谷方向有动静。一个孤身一人、手无寸铁的身影稳步走近。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Potosi Pass is a remote location in the Spring Mountains. According to Mojo, you will be undertaking a long, arduous trek through rugged terrain. Food, water and ammunition may be scarce during your journey. This will be a one-way trip until your mission is complete. Do you wish to continue?
ESP.TRADUIT: 波托西山口位于春山山脉的一个偏僻地带。根据莫乔的说法，你将在崎岖的地形上进行一场漫长而艰巨的跋涉，在你的旅途中，食物、水和弹药可能会短缺。这将是一次单程旅行，直到你的任务完成。你想继续吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Long Journey
ESP.TRADUIT: 漫长的旅程

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remain in the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 留在莫哈维废土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travel to Potosi Pass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往波托西山口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You find a rotting head inside the box. You motion for Michael, who reluctantly examines the remains. As tears of rage trickle from his eyes, he nods and confirms it is his uncle, Charles Augen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在盒子里发现了一颗腐烂的头颅。你请求迈克尔帮忙，他不情愿地检查了尸体，愤怒的泪水从他的眼中流出，他点点头，确认那是他的叔叔，查理斯·奥根。

ESP.ORIGINAL: LeMay inexplicably reboots and springs to life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李梅莫名其妙地重启并恢复了生命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mojo leads his entourage out of Potosi Pass, stopping to wave goodbye before exiting. While Mojo gestures frantically, Barf reguritates on his shoes, prompting a colorful tirade. Barf is indifferent to his antics, and soon thereafter the caravan disappear from view. You sense that your paths will cross again in the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫乔带着他的随从走出了波托西山口，在离开之前停下来挥手道别。当莫乔在疯狂挥手时，吐吐呕吐在了他的鞋子上，引发了一场精彩的长篇大论。吐吐对他的滑稽动作无动于衷，很快，大篷车就从视野中消失了。你感觉到，未来你们的道路还会再次相遇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charles Augen has died!
ESP.TRADUIT: 查理斯·奥根死了！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You patiently wait behind cover into the early morning hours. Strong winds and dust tear through the canyon and rattle the Joshua trees, but otherwise you fail to discern any movement. Just as you let out a tired sigh, you hear the distinct sound of metallic shuffling as a trio of Enclave Protectrons approach to help with the looming engagement.
As soon as you turn your attention back to the kill zone, you notice a collection of crimson figures approaching your position.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你耐心地躲在掩体后面一直等到凌晨。强风和灰尘撕裂了峡谷，震得约书亚树嘎嘎作响，但除此之外，你看不到任何动静。就在你发出疲惫的叹息时，你听到了一个明显的金属拖曳声，三个英克雷保护者正在靠近，帮助你应对即将到来的交战。
当你将注意力转回杀伤区时，你注意到一群红色的身影正在向你靠近。

ESP.TRADUIT: 简易爆炸地精
